1b1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du Ar+ya la li ta bi stA ra nA ma
1b2(mdo sde): ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du// / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes
1b3(mdo sde): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po// sangs rgyas
2a1(mdo sde): bya/ / dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
2a2(mdo sde): skad bdag gis gros pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal
2a3(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi
2a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun chen po la/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang / tshe dang ldan pa
2b1(mdo sde): rta thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa grags sbyin dang / tshe
2b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dri ma med dang / tshe dang ldan pa lag bzangs dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa
2b3(mdo sde): lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /
2b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka phi
2b5(mdo sde): na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma
3a1(mdo sde): 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'ug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa
3a2(mdo sde): nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa pha rol tu 'gro ba chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa
3a3(mdo sde): ba ku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de
3a4(mdo sde): dag la sogs pa dge slong khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong thams cad kyang / skye ba gcig
3a5(mdo sde): gis thogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad
3a6(mdo sde): kyis rnam par rtsa ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs thams cad thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa thams cad thob pa/ byang chub sems
3b1(mdo sde): dpa'i smon lam thams cad shin tu yong su rdzogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang
3b2(mdo sde): thob pa/ / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thams cad la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu rdzogs pa sha stag ste/
3b3(mdo sde): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
3b4(mdo sde): po seng ge'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don grub blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems
3b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtag par spor dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
3b6(mdo sde): snying rje cher sems dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs gcig go// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na 'khor bzhi dang /
3b7(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i sras dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang / chab 'og gi rgyal phran dang / rgyal po'i zham ring ba dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag
4a1(mdo sde): dang / blon po dang / 'khor gyi mo dang / grob khyer ba dang / yul gyi mi dang / mu stegs can dang / dge slong dang / zam pa dang / dpyod pa dang //
4a2(mdo sde): tu rgyu sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bla mar byas/ bsti stang du byas/ mchod pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das ni bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba bsod cing mang ba dang /
4a3(mdo sde): na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad rung ba brnyes shing / bcom ldan 'das ni brnyes pa dam pa dang / grags pa dam pa
4a4(mdo sde): brnyes kyang / pad+ma la chus mi gos pa ltar/ thams cad du ma chags ma gos par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang / sgra dang / snyan pa ni 'di skad du/ bcom ldan
4a5(mdo sde): 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i
4a6(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bar 'jig rten du mngon par grags par gyur to// de ni spyan lnga dang ldan pa ste/ 'jig
4a7(mdo sde): rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu spyad mir bcas pa dag rang gis mngon par
4b1(mdo sde): mkhyen pas mngon du mdzad nas/ nye bar bsgrubs te rab tu ston to// de thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs/
4b2(mdo sde): su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dgapa/ yongs su dkar ba'i chos ston te/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis nam gyi gung thun la/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan
4b3(mdo sde): bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/
4b4(mdo sde): skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gseb nas/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/
4b5(mdo sde): des gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i bu tshad med pa dag yang dag par bskul to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer
4b6(mdo sde): gyi tshogs de las bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo / / ye shes 'od ldan mun bcom 'od mdzad pa// 'od bzang gzi brjid dam pa dri med pa// skra lus rab zhi thugs dge zhi
4b7(mdo sde): papo/ / shAkya'i seng ge thub dang phrad par gyis// ye shes rgya mtsho mthu chen dag pa ste// chos kyi mnga' bdag kun mkhyen thub pa'i dbang // mi dang lhas mchod lha yi lhar gyur pa// chos
5a1(mdo sde): la rab byung mnga' dbang mdzad la rton/ / gang zhig gdul dka'i sems la mnga' mdzad de// gang zhig bdud kyi snying las grol ba'i thugs// de 'dir mthong thos don med
5a2(mdo sde): ma yin gyis/ / rnam grol mthar phyin zhi ba'i drung du deng // mtshungs med chos la snang bar gyur pa ste// mun sel tshul bzang ston par rab mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyod zhi mkhyen pa dpag med pa//
5a3(mdo sde): de yi drung du dad pa mchog gis don// de ni sman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi gtong // de ni smra ba dpa' bo tshogs ngan 'joms// de ni chos kyi rtsa lag don dam mkhas// de ni 'dren pa bla med lam ston
5a4(mdo sde): pa'o/ / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya ba la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od zer des phog cing / tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag
5a5(mdo sde): gis kyang bskul ma thag tu rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyis mthus bskal pa grangs med tshad med bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
5a6(mdo sde): 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dag dang / chos bstan
5a7(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran par gyur to/ / de nas de'i nub mo mi nyal tsam na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dga' bo dang
5b1(mdo sde): shin tu dga' bo dang / tsan dan dang / mchod byas dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / dul ba'i dbang phyug la sogs pa de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu mang po kha dog 'phags
5b2(mdo sde): shing / shin tu 'phags pa dang ldan pa dag gis/ lha'i snang bas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
5b3(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
5b4(mdo sde): to/ / bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rol pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po bsdus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bstan pa/ dga'
5b5(mdo sde): ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas 'bab pa dang / ched du dgongs te lhums su 'jug pa'i rnam par rol pa dang / mngal gyi gnas kyi khyad par kun tu bstan pa/ rigs bzang por skyes pa'i sa'i thugs
5b6(mdo sde): kun tu bstan pa/ byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad las yon tan gyi khyad par gyis shin tu 'da'a'ang bstan pa/ 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang / yi ge dang / grangs
5b7(mdo sde): dang / lag zis da kyis dag ra mo gro'i thabs dang / 'phong dang / stobs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs rnams sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa kun tu bstan pa/ btsun mo
6a1(mdo sde): 'khor dang / yul gyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa kun tu bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pas yongs su grub pa'i 'bras bu brnyes//
6a2(mdo sde): pa yongs su brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam por rol pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jigs pa bstan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa bsdus
6a3(mdo sde): pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa nges par bstan pa/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon chad gsungs pa mchis te/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i bla ma dang / chos
6a4(mdo sde): kyi tog dang / mar me mdzad dang / yon tan gyi tog dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang / 'od zer chen po dang / drang srong lha dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / bden pa'i tog dang / rdo rje mkhregs
6a5(mdo sde): dang / thams cad zil gyis gnon dang / gser mdog dang / shin tu 'thor gshegs dang / byi ru'i rgya mtsho dang / me tog gi tog dang / gzugs bzang dang / spyan bzang dang / drang srong sde
6a6(mdo sde): dang / dmag tshogs las rgyal dang / mtho ba dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / mdzod spugazi brjid dang / shin tu rgyas dang / 'od zer bzang po dang / bkra shis ldan dang / bltan bzang dang
6a7(mdo sde): seng ge'i gzi brjid chen po dang / blo gros brtan pas byin dang / sos ka'i spos dri dang / bden pa'i phyogs grag pa rgya chen dang / 'od ldan dang / skar rgyal dang / 'jig rten mdzes dang
6b1(mdo sde): 'od rgya chen dang / rin chen grags dang / grags shul gzi brjid dang / rin po che'i gzi brjid dang / tshangs pa'i gzi brjid dang / sgra snyan dang / me tog bzang po dang / ri rab me tog dang /
6b2(mdo sde): rab tu yid 'ong dbyangs dang / dge ba tshul bzangs dang / rab tu 'dzum pa'i spyan dang / yon tan phung po dang / 'brug sgra dang / kha dog mdzes dang / tshe'i gzi brjid dang / ngom bag glang po'i
6b3(mdo sde): 'gros dang / 'jig rten mngon par smon dang / dgra las rgyal dang / yang dag mchod dang / rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyo ba dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang /
6b4(mdo sde): gser thub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis kyang sngon chad gsungs pa lags na/ de bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa
6b5(mdo sde): dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba dang / sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di yang
6b6(mdo sde): brjod pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
6b7(mdo sde): gang zag thams cad kyi brtson 'grus brtsam pa bskyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi bcad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yongs su
7a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa yang kun tu bstan pa'i slad du/ da bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs/
7a2(mdo sde): brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas lha'i bu de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang /
7a3(mdo sde): yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / me tog
7a4(mdo sde): man+da ra ba dag gis kyang mngon par gtor te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nub mo de'i nam nangs pa dang / smig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der gshegs te/
7a5(mdo sde): byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te/ gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// bzhugs
7a6(mdo sde): nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdang 'dir nga'i drung du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
7a7(mdo sde): dga' bo dang / shin tu dga' bo dang / tsan dan dang / mchod byas dang / rab zhi dang / dul ba rab zhi dbang phyug la sogs pa de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu
7b1(mdo sde): mang po zhes bya ba nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to zhwa bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ka/
7b2(mdo sde): la ba de logs su thal mo sbar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgya cher rol pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs legs par bstan du gsol/ de ni skye bo mang po
7b3(mdo sde): la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba mdzad pa dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
7b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen
7b5(mdo sde): po de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge slong dag gong ni
7b6(mdo sde): mdang gsum 'dir/ / gnas pa bzang pos bde bar gnas gyur cing // nyon mongs med par rab tu gnas gyur la// rtse gcig sems su mnyam par bzhag drung du// rdzu 'phrul che zhing kha dog
7b7(mdo sde): bzang ldan la/ / dri med dpal 'bar lha yi bu lhags nas// dpal gyis rgyal byed tshal 'di snang byas te// dga' bas nga yi gan du mngon par lhags// dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po tsan dan
8a1(mdo sde): dang / dga' bo rab tu sems ni mchod byas dang // shin tu dga' bo ni pa lha bu// bye ba sgra mang de dang de dag rnams// nga yi zhabs la phyag batshal bsor byas /
8a2(mdo sde): ngayi mdun du 'dir ni 'khod par gyur// de dag sor mo thal sbyar gus bcas par// de dag 'dir ning la gsol ba btab// 'jig rten kun la sman pa'i don slad du// rgyal ba kun gyis sngon
8a3(mdo sde): cad gang gsungs pa/ / shin tu rgyas mdo gleng gzhi chen po 'di// thub pa 'dod chags bsal bas de ring yang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun gzung bzhed pas// phas kyi rgol dang
8a4(mdo sde): bdud rnams 'dul mdzad pa/ / theg pa chen po mchog 'di rab gsung zhing // thub pa de slad legs par bshad du gsol// lha'i tshogs kyis gsol ba de gnad phyir// mi gsung gyur pas
8a5(mdo sde): gnang ba mdzad pas na/ / thams cad tshim zhing rab dga' mgu gyur nas// dga' ba thob pas me tog sil ma gtor// de phyir dge slong dag gis rgyas pa'i mdo// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i
8a6(mdo sde): don gyi phyir/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis sngon bshad pa// gleng gzhi chen po khyed kun 'dir nyon cig/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // dge slong dag de la chos kyi
8a7(mdo sde): rnam grangs shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ / rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa/ mchod par bya bas mchod
8b1(mdo sde): pa/ dbang bskur ba thob pa/ lha brgya stong gis bstod cing bkur te/ brjod cing bsngags pa/ bsam pa thob pa/ smon lam gyis yang dag par 'phags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad/
8b2(mdo sde): yang dag par thob pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi mig shin tu rgyas shing yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / dga' ba 'bar ba
8b3(mdo sde): blo rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa chen po'i dam pa'i pha rol tu
8b4(mdo sde): son pa/ tshangs pa'i lam byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa chen pos sgrib pa med
8b5(mdo sde): cing chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba mngon du gyur pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
8b6(mdo sde): yan lag dang / lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos
8b7(mdo sde): lus legs par brgyan pa/ yun ring por rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa/ ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pas/ log pa med pa'i tshig gi lam yang dag par smra ba/ drang zhing ma yo la gya gyu med pa'i yid
9a1(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / zhum pa thams cad med pa/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/
9a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos ngor lta zhing lta ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs
9a3(mdo sde): pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / srin po rnams kyi mngon par dga'
9a4(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i grags pa dang ldan pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu phye ste bstan pa la thogs pa med pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs
9a5(mdo sde): ba bzung ba la dran pa'i snod 'khrugs pa med pa dang / gzungs mtha' yas mu med pa rab tu thob pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang
9a6(mdo sde): bo dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i chos rin po che dang / bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos kyi
9a7(mdo sde): gru chen po'i ded dpon chen po chu bo bzhi'i pha rol du 'gro ba'i bsam pa can/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad pa/ g.yul po'i thog ma la rab tu 'dug pa/
9b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs 'joms pa/ ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon sra ba dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba las snying rje chen po'i chu ba lhag pa'i bsam pas skyes pa/ zab cing
9b2(mdo sde): brtan pa/ brtson 'grus kyi chos kyi chus mngon par brlan pa/ thabs mkhas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi ze ba can/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ze 'bru dang ldan pa/
9b3(mdo sde): yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i mtsho las skyes pa/ nga rgyal dang dregs pa'i gdung ba med pa'i zla bas dri ma med pa'i 'dab ma rgyas pa/ tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / bag yod pa'i bsung gi
9b4(mdo sde): nga phyogs bcur thogs pa med par ldang ba/ 'jig rten na shes pas thu bor gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/ skyes bu chen po'i pad+ma/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs
9b5(mdo sde): kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba/ shes rab dang / ye shes kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mi shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa rgyas pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i mchog tu mgyogs pa'i shugs dang
9b6(mdo sde): ldan pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sder mo dang mche ba shin tu rno ba/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'i so drang bsnyed pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis shin tu bsdus pa'i mgo dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel par
9b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis khong du chud pas rim gyis 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par yongs su rdzogs pas ral pa can du byas shing rig
10a1(mdo sde): pa dang ye shes kyi the can/ rnam par thar pabasgo gsum gyi bgadangs pa/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan dang / nAH/
10a2(mdo sde): par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i ri sul gyi phug na gnas pa/ spyod lam bzhi dang / dul ba'i nags tshal dang / nags 'dab nas skyes pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ stongs
10a3(mdo sde): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / nye ba'i stobs dang ldan pa/ skye ba dang 'jig pa'i 'jigs pa dang / spu g.yo ba med pa/ rtsal la zhum pa med pa/ mu stegs can gyi bong bu dang / ri dgas
10a4(mdo sde): mang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa/ bdag med par smra brjod pa'i seng ge'i nga ro chen po sgrog pa/ skyes bu seng ge rnam par grol ba dang / bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor las shes rab kyi 'od dang /
10a5(mdo sde): 'od zer gyis mu stegs byed srin bu me khyer gyi tshogs 'od med par byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag gi ling tog dang / rab rib med par byed pa stobs dang brtson 'grus 'bar ba/ lha dang mi'i
10a6(mdo sde): nang du bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i nyi ma/ nag po'i phyogs med pa/ dkar po'i phyogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ blta na sdug cing yid du 'ong bas mig gi
10a7(mdo sde): dbang po la thogs pa med pa/ lha brgya stong gi skar ma'i tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor can/ byang chub kyi yan lag gri bde bas
10b1(mdo sde): zla ba'i 'od zer du gyur pa/ mi dang lha mkhas pa'i me tog ku mud kha 'byed pa/ skyes bu chen po zla ba 'khor gyi gling bzhir song ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che dang ldan pa/ sems can
10b2(mdo sde): thams cad la sems mnyam par sbyor ba/ blo dpyad thogs pa med pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs shin tu phun sum tshogs shing rab tu rdzogs pas khyad par du
10b3(mdo sde): bogs dbyung bar bya ba'i bsam pa can/ chos kyi rgyal po'i chos kyi 'khor lo rin po che mchog dam pa thogs pa med par bskor ba/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rigs kyi brgyud du byung ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo
10b4(mdo sde): sgyur ba chen po/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba/ chos rin po che thams cad kyi rab tu gang ba/ thos pas mi ngoms pas yangs shing rgya che la mtha' yas pa'i ye shes
10b5(mdo sde): dang tshul khrims kyi tshod las mi 'da' ba/ blo rgya mtsho dang sa ltar rgya che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / mnyam pa'i sems su gyur pa/ ri rab ltar brtan zhing mi g.yo
10b6(mdo sde): la bskyod par mi nus pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pa/ nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma med cing yang sa la 'dra ba med par rgya che ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa shin
10b7(mdo sde): tu yongs su dag pa/ sbyin pa legs par sbyin pa/ sngon sbyor ba legs par byas pa/ lhag pa'i bya ba legs par byas pa/ bden pa'i rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs
11a1(mdo sde): su btsal ba/ gos par bya ba bsgos pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nges par byas pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa bdun du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sbyin pa rnams
11a2(mdo sde): bdun byin pa/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po lnga shin tu bsten pa/ legs par spyad pa lus kyi rnam gsum/ ngag gi rnam bzhi/ yid kyi rnam gsum spyad par gyur pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsten
11a3(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa brten par gyur pa/ yang dag pa'i smon lam yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa'i smon lom btab pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yan lag bzhi
11a4(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan pa la zhugs pa/ yang dag pa'i rnam par thar pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa/ yang dag pa'i mos pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa dang por byas pa/ sangs
11a5(mdo sde): / rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu'i rjes su rab tu byung ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lnga bcu rtsa lnga la sbyin pa phul bar gyur pa/ rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag phyed dang bzhi la lhag
11a6(mdo sde): par bya ba byas pa/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag mtho ris dang thar pa'i lam du btsud par gyur pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa tshe/
11a7(mdo sde): gcig gis thogs pa/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa/ lha'i bu dam pa tog dkar po zhes bya ba/ lha'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di ni 'din shi 'phos nas mi'i 'jig rten du
11b1(mdo sde): skyes te/ ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes der shin tu mchod pa/ gzhal med khang gnas sum khri nyis stong la/
11b2(mdo sde): rab tu gnas pa/ stegs bu dang / ba ga ma dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyams kyis legs par brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
11b3(mdo sde): dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla res bres pa/ me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dag chal par bkram pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu dbyangs len pa/
11b4(mdo sde): me tog a ti mug ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / skya snar dang / sa brtol dang / btang bzung dang / btang zung chen po dang / mya ngan mtshang dang / n+ya gro da dang / tin tu ka dang / a sa na dang / dong ka'i
11b5(mdo sde): me tog dang / shing ke sa ra dang / ta ma la dang / sa la dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa chen pos brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ gzhi mnyam zhing bkod pas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog
11b6(mdo sde): snang 'od dang / ma li ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / bar shi ka dang / ta ra ni dang / ba li dang / ko ta ra ni dang / mchog tu dri zhim dang / da nus ka ri dang / lha'i sna ma'i me tog dang / ut+pal dang /
11b7(mdo sde): pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri rab tu zhim pa'i bla re chen po phyogs phyogs su bres pa/ bya 'dab sden dang / ne tso dang / raM skegs dang / khu byug dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / dur ba
12a1(mdo sde): dang / kun la dang / ka la bing+ka dang / shang shang ti'u la sogs pa bya sna tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mig mngon du phyogs te lta zhing ltad mor bya ba/
12a2(mdo sde): chos rgya che ba chen po yang dag par brjod pas/ 'dod pa la dga' ba'i shugs kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / khro ba dang / tha ba dang / khong khro ba
12a3(mdo sde): med par gyur pa/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dran pa rgya che zhing gsal ba skye ba'i gzhal med khang chen po de na bde bar gnas shing / chos kyi yang dag pa'i gtam byung ba dang / sil
12a4(mdo sde): snyan dang / glu dbyangs brgyad khri bzhi stong pa'i sgra de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las dge ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag par bskul ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo //
12a5(mdo sde): bson nams rgya chen tshogs mnga' dran rtogs dang // blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'od mdzad pa// mtshungs med stobs mnga' sgyu rtsal rgya che ba// mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs par mdzod// rgya chen
12a6(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ / dri ma gsum spangs rgyags dang skyon zhib// dge ba dri med rnam par dag pa'i thugs// sngon tshe ji ltar sbyin spyad dgongs par mdzod// zhi gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs
12a7(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / / dul dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab stobs// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig rnam spyad pa// spyod rigs cher byung dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod// sems can rnams la thugs brtse
12b1(mdo sde): mdzad gyur cing / / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig khyod kyis mchod// dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod cig grags mtha' yas// de'i dus lags kyis btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ rga shi nyon mongs 'jig
12b2(mdo sde): mdzad rdul bral ba/ / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dri za dang // lha min dbang po dag kyang sdod lags kyis// 'chi 'pho'i tshul mkhyen 'pho ba bstan par mdzod// bskal pa stong du dka' ba spyad gyur kyang // rgya
12b3(mdo sde): mtsho'i chu yis ji bzhin mo ngoms kyis/ / ngoms pa khyod kyi thugs dam dge ba ste// yun rings skom nyen skye bo tshim par mdzod// smad pa med pa'i grags pa mnga' ba khyod// chos la dgyed par khyod dgyes 'dod/
12b4(mdo sde): mi dgyes// 'on kyang dri ma med pa'i spyan mnga' ba// lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la thugs brtse mdzod// lha rnams bye ba khyod la chos thos pas// ngoms par 'gyur ba ma lags 'on gyis kyang // dal dang mi
12b5(mdo sde): ldan gyur pa'i ngan song du/ / gnas par gyur pa dag la gzigs su gsol// dri ma med pa'i spyan mnga' phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten dag gi sangs rgyas gzigs gyur cing // de dag rnams las chos gsan/
12b6(mdo sde): chos mchog de// 'jig rten dag la rnam par dbye ba mdzod// dpal ldan khyod kyi bsod nams dpal gyis ni// dga' ldan pho brang shin tu mdzes mod kyi// 'on kyang thugs rje thugs dang ldan pas na//
12b7(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni char pa phog/ brtul zhugs grub pa byang chub reg ces te// 'dod pa'i khams las rab tu 'das pa yi// gzugs kyi khams na lha rnams gang 'khod pa// du ma thams cad mngon par
13a1(mdo sde): @rab tu dga'/ / mgon po khyod kyis bdud kyis las rnams bcom// khyod gzhan mu stegs can rnams la ma mdzad de// khyod ni byang chub phyag mthil bzhag dang 'dra// de'i dus lags kyi/
13a2(mdo sde): btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ nyon mongs rab tu 'bar ba'i 'jig rten la// dpa' bo khyod kyis sprin ltar khyab mdzod de// bdud rtsi'i char pa mngon par rab tu phog// lha mi rnams kyi nyon mongs zhi bar mdzod//
13a3(mdo sde): khyod ni sman pa khams la mkhas pa ste// yun ring nad pa sman pas bor ba yi// sems can rnam thar gsum gyi sbyar sman gyis// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la myur du 'khod// seng ge'i nga ro thos par ma gyur pas//
13a4(mdo sde): wa rnams 'jigs pa med par sgra sgrog gis// sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra ni rab sgrogs te// mu stegs can gzhan wa rnams skrag par mdzod// sa yi dkyil na stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi// stobs ldan
13a5(mdo sde): phyag na shes rab sgron ma bsnams/ / phyag mthil dam pas sa la brdab mdzod de// 'di rnams khyod kyis rab tu pham par mdzod// gang dag khyod la lhung bzed 'bul ba yi// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po
13a6(mdo sde): sdod cing mchis/ / khyod bltams gang dag len par 'gyur ba yi// brgya byin tshangs pa khrag khrig sdod cing mchis// blo gros bzang po rigs chen rigs ldan pa// gang la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' yi//
13a7(mdo sde): spyod pa ston 'gyur dam pa'i rigs skyes par// rigs kyi nang na btsun pa'i rigs la gzigs// snod gyur gang du nor bu rin po che// bzhag na dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ba bzhin// nor bu rin chen lta bur dri
13b1(mdo sde): med thugs/ / 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni char pa phog// glu dbyangs sgra las rnam pa 'di lta yi// tshigs su bcad pa mang po byung gyur nas// 'di ni dus lags btang snyoms ma mdzod ces// snying rje'i yid dang
13b2(mdo sde): ldan la bskul bar byed/ / yang dag par spro bar bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dus de lta bus yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhal
13b3(mdo sde): med khang chen po de nas byung ste/ chos kyi mtho ba zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs chen po gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug cing dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston pa der/ byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs so//
13b4(mdo sde): zhugs nas kyang seng ge 'i khro chos pa po zhes bya ba la 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' dang skal ba mnyam pa/ theg pa mtshungs pa la zhugs pa de dag kyang khang bzangs de nyid du zhugs
13b5(mdo sde): so/ / gang yang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang spyod pa 'dra ba dag dang / lha'i bu de dag kyang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs rnams bsal cing / lha'i bu ba la
13b6(mdo sde): rnams kyang bsal nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa mthun pa'i 'khor can du byas te/ 'khor bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad brgyad dang / khang bzangs der zhugs nas/ so so ci rigs par rang rang gi seng ge'i
13b7(mdo sde): khril 'khod par gyur to/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lo bcu gnyis na ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de'i tshe/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag 'dzam bu'i gling du
14a1(mdo sde): lhags nas/ lha'i kha dog mi snang bar byas te/ bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur nas/ bram ze rnams rigs byed slob du 'dzud de/ gang zhig rnam pa 'di lta bu mngal du zhugs
14a2(mdo sde): par gyur na/ de ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par gyur te/ de dag dang ldan na rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gsum du 'gyur ba med de/ de gal te khyim na gnas na
14a3(mdo sde): ni/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che
14a4(mdo sde): dang / glang po rin po dang / rta rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang bdun no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor
14a5(mdo sde): lo rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ gso sbyong gi nyi ma tshes bco lnga la mgo khrus byas te/ dbu zungs su gnas shing / steng
14a6(mdo sde): gi khyams na bud med kyi tshogs kyi kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che rtsibs stong yod pa/ mu khyud dang ldan pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa/ thams cad gser
14a7(mdo sde): las grub pa/ mgar bsam byas pa/ 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam nas 'byung ste/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/
14b1(mdo sde): bdag gis thos pa/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ gso sbyong gi nyi ma tshes bco lnga la mgo khrus byas te/ dbu zungs su gnas shing steng gi khyams na bud med kyis tshogs kyis kun nas
14b2(mdo sde): bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che byung bar gyur na/ de ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes thos na/ bdag gi drung du lha'i 'khor lo rini po che 'ongs pa las na/
14b3(mdo sde): bdag kyang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po yin du nges so snyam ste/ de nas rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
14b4(mdo sde): lag pa g.yubs lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de skor zhing 'di skad du/ btsun pa lha'i 'khor lo rin po che chos kyi skor cig/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig smras pa dang / de nas lha'i 'khor lo
14b5(mdo sde): rin po che de/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas bskor bas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las shar phyogs su legs par 'gro ste/ rgyal po 'khor lo sgyur ba yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag
14b6(mdo sde): bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu rjes su 'gro'o/ / sa'i phyogs gang du lha'i 'khor lo rani po che de gnas par gyur pa der/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa
14b7(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas shar phyogs kyi khams kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de dag dngul gyi snod ni gser phyes bkang ste thogs/ gser gyi snod ni dngul sil ma bkang ste thogs nas/ 'khor lo/
15a1(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsu zhing 'di skad du/ lha 'dir legs par gshegs so// lha tshur gshegs su gsol/ lha'i chab srid ni shin tu rgyas shing 'byor la bde ste/ lo legs shing
15a2(mdo sde): nyams dgyes la/ skye bo mang po dang mis gtams pa lags na/ lha nyid kyi yul du byon nas bzhugs su gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas khams kyi
15a3(mdo sde): rgyal po de dag la 'di skad du khyed rang rang gi rgyal srid dag chos kyis gyis shig/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no// khyed srog chag dag pa gsod cig/ ma byin par ma len cig/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem
15a4(mdo sde): par ma byed cig/ brdzun du ma smra zhig/ phra ma ma zer cig/ ngag rtsub po ma smra zhig/ tshig kyal pa ma smra zhig/ brnab sems can du ma gyur cig/ gnod sems can du ma gyur cig/ log par lta bar ma gyur
15a5(mdo sde): cig/ srog gcod pa la byams par ma gyur cig/ log par lta ba can gyi bar la sems par ma gyur cig/ nga'i yul du chos ma yin pa byung nga re/ chos ma yin par spyod pa la byams par ma byed cig ces bsgo
15a6(mdo sde): nas/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ de ltar shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do// shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas nas/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la 'gro'o//
15a7(mdo sde): phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la song nas/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgal lo// rgal nas kyang lho phyogs su nam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis legs par 'gro ste/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang dpung gi
15b1(mdo sde): tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu 'gro'o/ / snga ma bzhin du lho phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do// lho phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do//
15b2(mdo sde): byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la 'gro'o// byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la song nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgal lo// rgal nas kyang nam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal
15b3(mdo sde): po'i pho brang du legs par 'ongs nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgo'i steng du nyams pa med par gnas te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ni/ 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//
15b4(mdo sde): 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i glang po rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad thal dkar du
15b5(mdo sde): gyur pa/ yan lag bdun shin tu gnas nga/ gtsug gser gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyis dra bas g.yogs pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan
15b6(mdo sde): pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can te/ 'di ltar glang po'i rgyal po byang chub ces bya'o// gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba glang po rin po che de brtag par 'dod par
15b7(mdo sde): gyur pa de'i tshe/ nyi ma shar kar glang po rin po che de la zhon te/ sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mur thug pa dang bcas pa kun tu bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas/ khye'u
16a1(mdo sde): sus kyi dga' ba myong bar byed de/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni glang po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rta rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa
16a2(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'irta rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad sngon por gyur pa/ mgo gnag pa/ rngog ma lcang lor 'dug pa/ zhon na gus par byed pa/
16a3(mdo sde): gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa/ gser gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can te/ 'di ltar rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi
16a4(mdo sde): shugs can zhes bya'o/ / gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ rta rin po che brtag par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ nyi ma shar kar rta rin po che de la zhon nas/ sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor
16a5(mdo sde): dang bcas pa rgya mtsho'i mur thug pa dang bcas pa kun tu bskor te/ phyir rgyal po'i pho brang du 'khor nas/ khye'u sus kyi bde ba myong bar byed de/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rta rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin
16a6(mdo sde): no/ / 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bu rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i nor bu rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad du sngo ba/ bai nu R+Ya'i
16a7(mdo sde): rang bzhin zur brgyad du 'dug pa/ shin tu sbyangs pa 'byung ste/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur
16b1(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che de brtag par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mtshan mo nam gyi gung la/ mun pa mun nag gi nang du nor bu rin po che de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ bskyed mos tshal gyis bzang po blta ba'i phyir
16b2(mdo sde): song na/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu snang bas gsal bar 'gyur ro// nor bu rin po che de'i 'khor na gnas
16b3(mdo sde): pa'i mi de dag kyang snang ba des gsal bar gyur pa dang / gcig gis gcig mthong / gcig gis gcig shes nas gcig 'di skad du smra ste/ bzhin bzangs dag longs/ las kyi mtha' dag byos shig
16b4(mdo sde): tshong dus dag khrom/ nyi ma shar te nyin mor shes so zhes zer te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nor bu rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i
16b5(mdo sde): bud med rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bud med rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ tshul dang mthun pa/ rgyal rigs
16b6(mdo sde): su skyes pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi sdom pa/ ha cang yang mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba// ha cang yang mi gnag pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/
16b7(mdo sde): tshul du shes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ kha nas ut+pa la'adid ldang ba/ ka tsa
17a1(mdo sde): lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ de grang ba'i dus na ni lus la reg na dro ba/ dro ba'i dus na lus la reg na bsil ba ste/ de 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ma gtogs par gzhan
17a2(mdo sde): la yid kyi kyang 'dod chags su mi byed na/ lus kyi lta ci smos te/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni bud med rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po khyim bdag rin po
17a3(mdo sde): che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i khyim bdag rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ lha'i
17a4(mdo sde): mig dang ldan pa 'byung ngo / / de lha'i mig des dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu bdag po dang bcas nor gyi gter dag kyang mthong / bdag po med pa'i gter dag kyang mthong ste/ de bdag po med pa'i gter gyi na
17a5(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag gis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor gyi dgos pa byed de/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni khyim bdag rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po blon po
17a6(mdo sde): rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i blon po rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa'o// de 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal
17a7(mdo sde): po des bsams pa tsam gyis bskor ba'i bya ba'i dpung rnams bsko'o/ / 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni blon po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rin po che sna bdun de
17b1(mdo sde): ngag dang ldan pa yin no/ / de la bu stong 'byung ste/ dpa' brtul yod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa sha stag ste/ de rgya mtsho la thug ba'i sa/
17b2(mdo sde): chen po ma lus pa gnod pa sngo ba med cing / 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing / mtshon gyis brda ba med la/ chos kyi legs par phab ste gnas so// gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu
17b3(mdo sde): byung na sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa/ 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston par 'gyur ro zhes rig byed 'don du 'dzud do// de bzhin du lha'i bu
17b4(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags shing / rang sangs rgyas dag la bskul ma 'debs te/ 'phags pa dag da ste lo bcu gnyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' yum gyis lhums su 'jug gis
17b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ning 'ang por tshig ces zer so/ / dge slong dag de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grob byer chen don/ mjug ma sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i rol/ rang sangs rgyas glang ngo zhes bya ba 'dug pas/
17b6(mdo sde): de thos nas rdo ba'i steng du 'ji ba la bya ba bzhin du 'dug ste/ nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags so// gyen du 'phags nas kyang / me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te/
17b7(mdo sde): sgron ma bzhin du mya ngan las 'das so// de'i mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu rgyus dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni mes yongs su zad par
18a1(mdo sde): gyur te/ ring bsrel 'ba' shigs la lhags nas/ rkang rjes de dag ni da dung yang drang srong gi rjes shes grag ste yod do// dge slong dag 'di tshe yul wA ra NA si ri dgas kyi nags
18a2(mdo sde): drang srong lhung ba na/ rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya 'khod pa de dag gis kyang sgra de thos nas/ nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags nas/ me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te/ sgron ma
18a3(mdo sde): bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / de dag gi mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu rgyus dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni mes
18a4(mdo sde): yongs su zad par gyur te/ ring bsrel 'ba' shigs la lhungs so// de ltar 'dir drang srong rnams lhung ngo zhes/ de phyin chad drang srong lhung ba zhes bya ba yang / drang srong lhung ba/ drang srong lhung ba
18a5(mdo sde): zhes ming du chags par gyur to/ / mi 'jigs pa byin pa'i ri dgas dag kyang de na gnas pas// de phyin chad ri dgas kyi nags zhes bya ba yang / ri dgas kyi nags/ ri dgas kyi nags zhes ming du gyur to//
18a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'dug pa ni/ rnam par lta ba chen po bzhi la rnam par lta ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus la rnam par lta ba dang /
18a7(mdo sde): gling la rnam par lta ba dang / yul la rnam par lta ba dang / rigs la rnam par lta ba'o// dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dus rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
18b1(mdo sde): ni thog ma'i dus sems can 'du ba'i tshe/ ma'i mngal du mi 'jug gi/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten gsal bar kun nas snang bar gyur te/ skye ba snang bar gyur/ rga ba snang bar gyur/ na ba snang bar gyur/
18b2(mdo sde): 'chi ba snang bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal du 'jug go// dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gling rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub
18b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni mtha' 'khob kyi gling du mi skye/ shar gyi lus 'phags por mi skye/ nub kyi ba glang sprod du mi skye/ byang gi sgra mi snyan du mi skye/ lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling nyid du skye'o// dge slong dag
18b4(mdo sde): ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' yul rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na mi rnams dbang po rtul zhing blun la lug ltar lkug pa'i rang bzhin can/
18b5(mdo sde): legs par bstan pa dang / nyes par bstan pa'i don shes par bya ba'i skal ba med pa dag yod pa dag tu mi skye'i/ byang chub sems dpa' ni yul gyi dbus nyid du skye'o// dge slong dag ci'i phyir/
18b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rigs rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rigs dma' ba gdol pa'i rigs sam/ smig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ shing rta mkhan gyi
18b7(mdo sde): rigs sam/ g.yung rigs su mi skye'i// bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs kho na ste/ rigs gnyis su skye'o// de la gang gi tshe bram ze'i rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe/ bram
19a1(mdo sde): ze'i rigs su skye'o/ / gang gi tshe rgyal rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe/ rgyal rigs su skye ste/ dge slong dag da ltar ni rgyal rigs btsun par bya bas/ de'i phyir byang chub
19a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal rigs su skye ste/ dge slong dag don gyi dbang de la brten nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa/ rnam par lta chen po bzhi la rnam par
19a3(mdo sde): lta ste/ de ltar bltas nas cang mi zer bar gyur to// // 'phag pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po gnyis pa/ dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'
19a4(mdo sde): de dag gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs rin po che ni ji lta bu zhig tu skye bar 'gyur/ yum ni ji lta bu zhig gi lhums su 'jug par 'gyur zhes 'dri'o// de la la la
19a5(mdo sde): na re yul ma ga d+ha na lus 'phags kyi rigs 'di 'byor cing rgyas la/ lo legs pa dang bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes
19a6(mdo sde): zer ro/ / la la na re de ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni ma yi rgyud kyi dag pa yang ma yin/ pha'i rgyud kyis dag pa yang ma yin la/ bsod nams chung ngus
19a7(mdo sde): byung gis/ bsod nams rgya chen pos mngon par byung ba ma yin zhing / rgod la mi brtan te mi gnas pa yin la/ yul de yang nye 'khor gsegs mas gang ba/ bskyed mos tshal dang / mtsho dang //
19b1(mdo sde): mtshe'u dag kyang mi mang la/ ri brags ltar mtha' 'khob kyi gnas su gyur pa ste/ de'i phyir de ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re ko sa la'i rigs 'di 'khor mang zhing
19b2(mdo sde): bzhon pa mang la nor che ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di/
19b3(mdo sde): ltar ko sa la'i rigs ni/ gdol pa'i rigs las shi 'phos nas skyes pa yin te/ pha dang mas dag pa yang ma yin la/ dma' ba la mos pa ste/ rigs mtho bar yang mi bya/ nor dang rin
19b4(mdo sde): po che'i gter yang tshad med par phun sum tshogs pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir de ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re rgyal po bad sa la'i rigs 'di 'byor cing rgyas la lo legs pa/
19b5(mdo sde): dang / bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang de'i tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
19b6(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po bad sa'i rigs ni phal pa ste/ gtum la/ gzi brjid 'bar ba yang ma yin zhing / skyes pa gzhan las skye ba grub pa/ pha ma nyid kyi gzi brjid kyi las kyis
19b7(mdo sde): grub pa ma yin la/ de'i rgyal po yang chad par smra ba ste/ de'i phyir de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re grong khyer chen po yangs pa can 'di ni 'byor cing rgyas la/ lo legs
20a1(mdo sde): pa dang / bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ nyams dga' ba/ skye bo mang po dang / mis kun tu gang ba/ stegs bu dang / ba gam dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang //
20a2(mdo sde): bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs dag gis legs par brgyan pa ste/ me tog gi ra ba dang / nags tshal gyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin la
20a3(mdo sde): lha'i pho brang dang 'dra ba yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
20a4(mdo sde): 'di ltar de dag la ni phan tshun du rigs par smra ba med do// chos spyod pa med do// gong ma dang / bar ma dang / rgan pa dang / gtso bo dag la yang rim gror bya ba med cing / re re zhing yang
20a5(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bdag ni rgyal po'o/ / bdag ni rgyal po'o snyam du sems pas/ slob mar khas len pa med cing / chos khas len pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no/
20a6(mdo sde): zhes zer ro// la la na re grong khyer 'phags rgyal na/ rab snang gi rigs 'di ni dpung che zhing bzhon pa mang ba/ pha rol gyi g.yul ngor rgyal ba thob pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
20a7(mdo sde): yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/ / la la na re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni khro zhing gtum la/ rlang zhing gzu lums can/
20b1(mdo sde): rgod pa ste/ las yod par lta ba yang ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de yang byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re grong khyer bcom brlag 'di
20b2(mdo sde): 'byor cing rgyas la lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang ldan pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis kun tu gang ba yin pas/ rgyal po lag bzang sde dpa' ba'i bdag po rgyal po'i pho brang de ni byang chub sems
20b3(mdo sde): dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/ / la la na re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po de ni log par lta ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes
20b4(mdo sde): pa ste/ mi rgod dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi rigs te/ de'i phyir de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro//
20b5(mdo sde): la la na re grong khyer ha sti na pu ra 'di'i rgyal po ni skye bseng gi bu'i rigs kyi rgyud las skyes pa/ dpa' zhing rtul phod pa dang ldan pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gyi sde 'jom pa ste/
20b6(mdo sde): rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skya bseng gi bu'i rigs su skyes pa dag
20b7(mdo sde): gis rigs kyi rgyud rnam par 'khrugs par byas te/ g.yul ngor brtan pa la ni chos kyi bu zhes zer// 'jigs sde la ni rlung gi bu zhes zer/ srid sgrub la ni dbang po'i bu zhes zer/ rig byed dang lhar
21a1(mdo sde): bcas la ni tha skar gyi bu zhes zer te/ de'i phyir rigs de yang byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro// la lan re grong khyer bcom brlag
21a2(mdo sde): 'di ni shin tu yang nyams dga' zhing phan tshun 'byor gyi steng du/ rgyal po bzang po'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa'i sa yang yin la/ rgyal po de yang glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang /
21a3(mdo sde): dpung gi tshogs mang po dang ldan pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / nor dang / yo byad shin tu mang ba/
21a4(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / blon po thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa/ mdza' ba dang ldan zhing chos la dga' ba ste/ rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug
21a5(mdo sde): pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro/ / la la na re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po bzang po'i beshes gnyen yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa de yod mod kyi/ de ni shin tu rgas pas bu bskyed
21a6(mdo sde): pa'i mthu yang med la/ bu yang mang bas de'i phyir rigs de yang byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi bos ma yin no zhes zer ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha de dag gis
21a7(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul chen po bcu drug po thams cad na/ rgyal po'i rigs mthon po mthon po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad la bltas na/ thams cad kyang nyes pa dang bcas par mthong ste/ de dag de
21b1(mdo sde): ltar sems pa'i yid la byed pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu ye shes tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ theg pa chen po 'di la nges par gyur pa zhig yod pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
21b2(mdo sde): dang / lha'i 'khor chen po yod pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag tshur shog/ byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi drung du dong ste/ rigs rin po che yon tan ji lta bur phun sum tshogs pa
21b3(mdo sde): zhig tu srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'gyur ba dri'o zhes smras pa dang / legs so zhes te/ de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du phyin te dris pa/ skyes
21b4(mdo sde): bu dam pa'i rigs rin po che yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ji lta bu zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa skye bar 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang / lha'i
21b5(mdo sde): tshogs chen po de dag la rnam par bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i rigs de ni/ rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi phun sum tshogs pa
21b6(mdo sde): yin te/ drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs de ni btsun pa yin/ rigs de ni kun gyi mngon par shes pa yin/ rigs de ni phran tshegs med cing gnod par byed pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni
21b7(mdo sde): rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa yin// rigs de ni skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni sngon gyi skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni
22a1(mdo sde): btsun pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni kun gyi mngon par shes pa'i skyes du zung phun sum tshogs pa yin+da/ rigs de ni dbang che bar thag/
22a2(mdo sde): pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni skyes pa mang ba yin/ rigs de ni bud med mang ba yin/ rigs de ni 'jigs pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni dman pa med cing zhus
22a3(mdo sde): pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni brkam pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni blon pos blta zhing longs spyod la spyod pa yin/
22a4(mdo sde): rigs de ni bzo don yod pas bshams shing longs spyod la spyod pa yin/ rigs de ni mdza' ba brtan pa yin/ rigs de ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags kyis srog la
22a5(mdo sde): lta ba yin/ rigs de ni byas pa gzo ba dang ldan pa yin// rigs de ni brtul zhugs shes pa yin/ rigs de ni 'dun pas mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni zhe sdang gi mi 'gro ba yin// rigs
22a6(mdo sde): de ni gti mug gi mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin/ rigs de ni gti mug la mi gnas pa yin/ rigs de ni lag
22a7(mdo sde): spabs che ba yin/ rigs de ni bya ba la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni gtong ba la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni sbyin pa la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni zho sha shes pa yin/ rigs de ni rtsal
22b1(mdo sde): brtan pa yin/ rigs de ni mthu rtsal dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni rtsal mchog dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni drang srong mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni lha mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni mchod
22b2(mdo sde): rten mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni mtshun rjed pa yin/ rigs de ni khon du 'dzin pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni phyogs bcur sgra grags pa yin/ rigs de ni 'khor chen po dang ldan pa yin//
22b3(mdo sde): rigs de ni 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni bla na med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa yin// rigs de ni rigs kyi nang nas gtso bor bya ba yin// rigs de ni rigs la dbang thob pa yin//
22b4(mdo sde): rigs de ni dbang che bar grags pa yin/ rigs de ni phar 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni mar 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni dge sbyong du 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni bram zer 'dzin pa yin/ rigs
22b5(mdo sde): de ni nor dang 'bru'i bang mdzod mang ba yin/ rigs de ni dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai rUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang /
22b6(mdo sde): dngul dang / rdzas dang / yo byad mang ba yin/ rigs de ni glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / lug shin tu mang ba yin/ rigs de ni bran po dang / bran mo dang /
22b7(mdo sde): las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba shin tu mang ba yin/ rigs de ni thub par dka' ba yin/ rigs de ni don thams cad grub pa yin// rigs de ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rigs kyi brgyud du skyes
23a1(mdo sde): ba yin/ rigs de ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i grogs kyis bskyed pa yin/ rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su rigs btsun par skyes pa yin/ rigs de ni 'jig/
23a2(mdo sde): rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i nang na/ rigs la smos pa'i skyon gyi kha na ma tho ba thams cad dang bral ba ste/
23a3(mdo sde): grogs po dag gang du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs de ni rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa yin no// grogs po dag srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems/
23a4(mdo sde): dpa' bud med gang gi mnga' du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i bud med de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
23a5(mdo sde): dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni kun gyi mngon par shes pa'i bud med kyi mngal du 'jug go/ / kun gyis mngon par shes pa dang / spyod pa la glags mi thod pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
23a6(mdo sde): cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / ming phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu zheng phun sum tshogs pa dang / sngon chad ma btsas pa dang / tshul khrims phun sum
23a7(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang / btong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang mthun par 'dzin pa dang / gsal ba dang / dul ba dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / mkhas pa
23b1(mdo sde): dang sgyu med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / mi khro ba dang / phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / mi rgod pa dang / mi g.yeng ba dang / ca co med pa dang / bzod cing nges pa dang ldan pa dang /
23b2(mdo sde): ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi shas chung ba dang / bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba dang / khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs dang ldan pa dang / yon tan
23b3(mdo sde): thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bud med kyi mngal du byang chub sems dpa'i srid pa tha ma pa 'jug go/ / grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa bud med gang gi mngal du 'jug pa'i
23b4(mdo sde): bud med de ni/ yon tan gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa yin no// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' ni zla ba mar gyi ngo la ma'i mngal du mi 'jug gi/ byang chub sems dpa'
23b5(mdo sde): srid pa tha ma pa ni/ zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ste/ rgyas pa la skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa'i tshe/ ma gso sbyongs blangs pa'i mngal du 'jug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
23b6(mdo sde): lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' las rigs yongs su dag pa dang / ma yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de dag thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ skyes bu dam pa 'dis rnam pa ji snyed
23b7(mdo sde): du bstan pa de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i rigs de gang zhig la yod snyam du sems so/ / de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa la zhugs pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya'i grong khyer 'di
24a1(mdo sde): 'byor cing rgyas la/ bde zhing lo legs pa dang ldan te/ nyams dga' zhing skye bo mang po dang / mis gang ba yin la/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang ma'i brgyud kyis dag
24a2(mdo sde): pa/ pha'i brgyud kyis dag pa/ chung ma dag pa dang ldan pa/ las kyi mtha' la nyon mongs pa med pa/ dpe byad bzang ba/ shin tu mdzangs pa/ bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa
24a3(mdo sde): grags pa chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rigs kyi brgyud du skyes pa/ nor dang / gter dang / rin po che dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa las yod par lta ba/ sdig pa'i lta ba med pa
24a4(mdo sde): shAkya'i yul kun nas yang rgyal po de gcig pur zad de/ tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / 'khor gyi mi thams cad kyis rim gror bya zhing mchod pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug
24a5(mdo sde): pa/ ha cang yang mi rgan/ ha cang yang mi gzhon zhing / gzugs mdzes la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/ bzo shes pa/ dus shes pa/ bdag shes pa/ chog shes pa/ sems can shes/
24a6(mdo sde): pa/ 'jig rten shes pa/ mtshan shes pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi rjes su ston pa'o// ser kya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi gnas te/
24a7(mdo sde): gang dag der skyes par gyur pa de dag kyang de dang / skal ba 'dra ba dag go// rgyal po zas gtsang ma de la lha mo sgyu 'phrul zhes bya ba/ shAkya'i bdag po shin tu legs par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i/
24b1(mdo sde): bu mo zhig yod pa'ang / phyug cing gzhon zhing dar la bab pa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ sngon chad ma btsas pa/ bu dang bu mo med pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ bu don la dris pa ltar
24b2(mdo sde): blta na sdug pa/ lha'i bu mo ltar rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bud med kyi skyon rnams dang bral ba/ bden par smra ba/ mi drag pa/ mi bslang ba dang / mi gcor ba/ kha na ma tho ba med
24b3(mdo sde): pa gyo mnga'i sgra lta bu med pa/ ca co med pa/ 'jam zhing snyan la/ yid du 'ong bar smra ba/ mi nges pa/ khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa dang / khro ba med pa dang /
24b4(mdo sde): phrag dog med pa/ dus su smra ba/ gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ khyos chog par 'dzin pa/ khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs can/ skyes pa gzhan la bsam pa'i yid
24b5(mdo sde): la bya ba dang bral ba/ mgo dang / rna ba dang / sna gnas su phebs pa/ bung ba'i mchog gi kha dog lta bu'i sgra dang ldan pa/ dpral ba legs pa/ smin tshugs legs pa/ khro gnyer med pa/
24b6(mdo sde): bzhin 'dzum pa/ gsong por smra ba/ 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshigs dang ldan pa/ mthun par 'dzin pa/ drang ba/ gya gyu med pa/ sgyu med pa/ g.yo med pa/ khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa
24b7(mdo sde): mi rgod pa/ mi g.yeng ba/ kha ngan mi smra ba/ 'chal pa'i tshig med pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi shas chung ba/ ngang des shing bzod pa dang ldan pa/ rkang lag dang
25a1(mdo sde): mig dang / blo shin tu bsrungs pa/ rkang lag shin tu 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ pad+ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma ltar mig shin tu rnam par dag pa//
25a2(mdo sde): sna dbyibs legs shing mdog sdug pa/ yan lag shin tu brtan pa/ 'ja'i dbyibs ltar shin tu 'dud pa/ yan lag dang nying lag shin tu 'byes pa/ yan lag la smad du med pa/
25a3(mdo sde): mchu bim pa ltar dmar ba/ blta na mdzes pa/ mgul rim bzhin du 'dug pa/ rgyan dam pa dang ldan pa/ sna ma'i me tog dang / ba ra shi ka ltar so shin tu rnam par dag pa/ phrag pa leg
25a4(mdo sde): par byin gyis 'tsham pa/ rim gyis legs par grub pa'i dpung dang ldan pa/ sked pa gzhu'i chang zungs ltar phra ba/ gzhog nyams pa med pa/ lte ba khung zab pa/ sta zur 'jam
25a5(mdo sde): zhing yangs la/ zlum zhing brtan par grub pa/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs shing mtshungs pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ glang po'i sna ltar mnyam zhing legs pa'i brla dang ldan pa/ byin pa
25a6(mdo sde): ri dgas e na ya'i lta bu/ lag pa dang / rkang pa'i mthil rgya skyegs kyi khu ba ltar 'dug pa/ 'gro ba'i mig tu sdug pa/ mig gis dbang po nyams pa med pa/ yid du 'ong zhing blta
25a7(mdo sde): na sdug pa/ bud med rin po che'i gzugs las khyad par du 'phags pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ sgyu 'phrul sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs su 'dug pa/ sgyu 'phrul zhes ming gi brdar btag pa/
25b1(mdo sde): sgyu rtsal la mkhas pa/ dga' tshal gyi lha'i bu mo lta bu zhig rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum du tshul dang mthun gyis/ gang
25b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas rigs dag las bstan pa de ni/ shAkya'i rigs nyid la snang gi/ gzhan la ni ma yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dag pa'i sems can chos mtho khang
25b3(mdo sde): bzangs na/ / chos bzangs seng ge'i khri la rab tu 'dug/ byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ldan pa dang // skal ba mnyam pa'i lha rnams drang srong 'khor// de na 'dug cing de ni 'di
25b4(mdo sde): snyam sems/ / rigs gang rnam dag rab tu shes dang ldan// byang chub sems dpa' skye dang tshul mthun gang // pha ma gang zhig dag pa'i dngos dang ldan// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di kun tu
25b5(mdo sde): rnam bltas na/ / rgyal rig rgyal brgyud che ba gang yin pa// kun kyang skyon dang bcas par rjes bsams nas// shAkya'i rigs ni skyon dang bral bar mthong // zas gtsang rgyal po'i rigs
25b6(mdo sde): nang rigs dang ldan/ / mi dbang rgyud na rnam dag cho rigs can// 'byor cing rgyas la 'khrug pa med pa ste// skye bo dam pa chos ldan rim gro can// ser skyar brjod pa'i grong khyer
25b7(mdo sde): sems can gzhan/ / kun kyang bsam pa rab dag chos dang ldan// bskyed mos kun dga' gzhal med khang gis brgyan// skye ba'i ser ni ser skyar brjod pa mdzes// kun kyang
26a1(mdo sde): tshan chen stobs dang ldan pa ste/ / glang po gnyis sam gsum gyi stobs kyang bdog/ 'phong rtsal brlabs pa'i pha rol mthar phyin kyang // srog gi don du
26a2(mdo sde): gzhan la gnod mi byed/ / zas gtsang rgyal po'i bud med dben pa de// bud med dam pa stong gi mchog tu phyin// yid du 'ong ba sgyu 'phrul sprul pa'i gzugs// de yi ming yang lha
26a3(mdo sde): mo sgyu 'phrul te/ / mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang lha yi bu mo bzhin// 'byes pa'i lus ldan yan lag dri med sdug/ lha dang mi rnams gang yang rung ba dag/ sgyu 'phrul mthong na gang ngoms
26a4(mdo sde): de med kyang / / 'dod chags zhen med sdang bas zhe sdang med// de ni 'jam snyan drang ba'i ngag dang ldan// mi brlang mi rtsub shin tu nges pa ste// de ni bzhin 'dzum khro nyer rab tu spangs//
26a5(mdo sde): ngo tsha khrel yod chos spyod ldan pa ste// nga rgyal med cing ma khengs rgod pa med// phrag dog med cing skya dang g.yo med de// gtong la dga' zhing rtag tu byams sems ldan// las yod lta zhing /
26a6(mdo sde): log pa'i sbyor ba spangs// bden la gnas shing lus dang yid rab bsdams// sa la gang yod bud med skyon mang tshogs// de dag thams cad de la yod ma yin// mi yi 'jig rten dri za'i
26a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten nam/ / lha yi 'jig rten dag na bud med gzhan// lha mo sgyu 'phrul mtshungs med ga la lhag/ drang srong chen po'i mar ni de 'os te// tshe rabs lnga brgya kho nar tshang bar yang /
26b1(mdo sde): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mar gyur to// de dang der ni yab kyang zas gtsang ste// de yi yon tan ldan pa ma yi 'os// dka' thub can ltar de ni brtul zhugs gnas// brtul zhugs rjes/
26b2(mdo sde): spyod rtag par chos kyang spyod// rgyal pos gnang ste mchog sbyin thob pas na// 'dod pa ma spyad zla ba sum cu gnyis// gang gi phyogs na de 'dug 'breng ba 'am// nyal zhing 'gro bar gyur
26b3(mdo sde): ba'i gnas dag kyang / / de yi las dge gzhol ba'i 'od zer gyis// shin tu snang bar 'od kyis gsal bar 'gyur// lha dang lha min mi rnams gang yang rung // 'dod chags sems kyis
26b4(mdo sde): blta bar nus pa med/ / spyod lam rnams su 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan// de la kun kyang ma dang bu mor lta// sgyu 'phrul lha mo dge ba'i las kyi rgyus// rgyal po'i srid ni rab yangs rnam
26b5(mdo sde): par 'phel/ / khams kyi rgyal po'ang 'jug par mi byed cing // rgyal po'i grags dang brjod pa rnam par 'phel// de ltar sgyu 'phrul snod du mthun gyur cing // de ltar sems can dam pa mchog
26b6(mdo sde): mdzes pas/ / de nyid yon tan mchog dang ldan pas na// 'di ni bur 'gyur de ni ma yi 'os// lha mo yon tan mchog dang ldan pa ste// glang po khri yi stobs bdog ma gtogs par//
26b7(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan 'di ni mi mchog ste// 'dzin par nus pa'i bud med gang yang med// de skad che ba'i lha yi bu rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' shes rab rgya chen dag/ shAkya'i
27a1(mdo sde): rigs rnams dga' bar mdzad pa yi/ / yum du legs ldan sgyu 'phrul 'gyur zhes zer// rigs yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
27a2(mdo sde): / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rigs la rnam par bltas nas// dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang chen po 'argya dang rgyar dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi
27a3(mdo sde): yod pa gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug ste/ / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston pa rgyal mtshan mthon po zhes bya ba yod de// byang chub sems dpa' de gzhal med khang chen po
27a4(mdo sde): der song nas phyin pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa// khyed rnams 'dir 'du bar gyis shig/ 'chi 'pho ba rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos rjes su dran pa
27a5(mdo sde): chos rjes su bstan pa tha ma'i chos mnyan pa byang chub sems dpa' las nyon cig/ de skad kyi tshig thos nas/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas te/
27a6(mdo sde): gzhal med khang chen po dor 'dus so// der byang chub sems dpas 'khor gyi khyams gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam du yangs par byin gyis brlabs par gyur nas// de de
27a7(mdo sde): tsam du bzang zhing de tsam du blta na sdug la/ de tsam du rgyan gyis rgyas shing // de tsam du yid du 'ong bar gyur pa des/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad rang
27b1(mdo sde): rang gi khyim gyi bkod pa la dur khrod lta bu'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mthun pas yongs su brgyan pa'i se/
27b2(mdo sde): ge'i khri nor bu rin po che du mas rtsa ba spras pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu'i stan du ma bting ba/ lha'i spros zhim po du mas bsgos pa/ bdug spos dam pa mchog tu bya ba du mas bdugs pa/ lha'i
27b3(mdo sde): me tog kha dog du ma'i dgram pa bkram pa/ nor bu dang / rin po che'i 'od brgya stong du ma 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can/ nor bu rin po che du ma'i dra bas g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer
27b4(mdo sde): ka'i dra ba du ma'i sgra byung bas mngon par dga' ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu brgya stong du ma mngon par dkrol ba'i sgra dang ldan pa/ rin po che dra ba brgya stong du mas yongs su gsal bar
27b5(mdo sde): gyur pa/ rin po che gdugs brgya stong du mas kun nas bkab pa/ dar brgya stong du ma rab tu dpyangs pa/ dar gyi phreng ba lnga ldi brgya stong du mas shin tu brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo brgya stong du mas
27b6(mdo sde): glu blangs/ gar byas/ rol mo byas pa/ yon tan brgya stong du ma kun tu brjod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du mas rjes su bsrungs pa/ brgya byin brgya stong du mas phyag byas pa/
27b7(mdo sde): tshangs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu btud pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bzung ba/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mtha' yas par
28a1(mdo sde): d gongs pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par pha rol tu phyin pa tshogs su byas pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba de
28a2(mdo sde): lta bu la 'dug go/ dge slong dag de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri chen po yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa la 'dug nas/ lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la smras pa// //
28a3(mdo sde): grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa'i lus bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa la ltos/ shar dang / lho dang nub dang / byang dang 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs
28a4(mdo sde): bcu kun na byang chub sems dpab dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'khod cing / thams cad kyang srid pa tha ma pa la mngon du phyogs pa/ lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ shi 'pho'i
28a5(mdo sde): rnam pas lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo yang dag par ston pa tshad med pa/ grangs med/ bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la ltos/ de nas lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis
28a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag mthong bar gyur te/ mthong bar gyur nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar
28a7(mdo sde): ba btud de/ yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad du 'di ltar bdag cag gis bltas pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyed cig mthong ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa
28b1(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ legs so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas byang chub sems dpas yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la bos nas/ 'di skad ces
28b2(mdo sde): smras ste/ grogs po dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' de dag lha'i bu de dag la gang ston pa shi 'pho'i rnam pas lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo nyon cig/ grogs po dag/
28b3(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ lha'i 'khor la gdon mi za bar yang dag par bstan par bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad gang
28b4(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grogs po dag dad pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bsam pa mi phyed par 'gyur ro// dang ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rnyog pa can dang par 'gyur ro// mchog tu
28b5(mdo sde): dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro// dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lus kyi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus kyi nyes
28b6(mdo sde): pa rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / ngag gi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ngag gi nyes pa bzhi yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// yid kyi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
28b7(mdo sde): brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba spong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
29a1(mdo sde): chos rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos bstan pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i ska na/ skyon med par
29a2(mdo sde): 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rdzas thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ smon lam
29a3(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / lha rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rgya chen por 'gyur ro// byams pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i
29a4(mdo sde): dngos po thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ / snying rje ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rnam par gtse ba med pa lhur len par 'gyur ro// dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi dga' ba
29a5(mdo sde): thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/ / btang snyoms ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa la smod par 'gyur ro// mi rtag par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa dang / gzug
29a6(mdo sde): yod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal du so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ smon lam kun tu chad par 'gyur ro//
29a7(mdo sde): bdag med par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag la mngon par zhen pa med par 'gyur ro// zhi bar so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rjes su chags pa 'bar ba
29b1(mdo sde): med par 'gyur ro/ / ngo tsha shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ nang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// khrel yod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ phyi rol nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// bden pa ni chos snang
29b2(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ lha dang mi rnams mi slu bar 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag slu ba med par 'gyur ro// chos spyod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos la rten par
29b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ngan song gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// byas pa bzo ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
29b4(mdo sde): byas pa rnams chud mi za bar 'gyur ro/ / byas pa rig pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan la brnyas pa med par 'gyur ro// bdag shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag la bstod
29b5(mdo sde): pa med par 'gyur ro/ / sems can shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan la smod pa med par 'gyur ro// chos shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos
29b6(mdo sde): la nan tan byed par 'gyur ro/ / dus shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mthong ba don yod par 'gyur ro// nga rgyal bcom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/
29b7(mdo sde): ro// zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems can chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung bar 'gyur ro// khon du 'dzin pa med pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'gyod pa med par 'gyur ro//
30a1(mdo sde): mos pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ the tshom med pa lhur len par 'gyur ro// mi sdug pa so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa spong bar
30a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / gnod sems med pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyur ro// gti mug med pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi shes pa rnam par sel bar
30a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / chos don du gnyer ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ don la rton par 'gyur ro// chos 'dod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos snang ba thob par 'gyur ro// thos pa tshol ba ni chos
30a4(mdo sde): sdang ba'i sgo ste/ tshul bzhin du chos la so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// ming dang gzugs yongs su
30a5(mdo sde): shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rgyur lta ba yang dag par 'jom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rig pa dang rnam par grol ba thob
30a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba ni chos sdang ba'i sgo ste/ mtho bar sems pa med cing dma' par sems pa med par 'gyur ro// phung po la mkhas pa ni chos
