30a7(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo ste/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// khams mnyam pa nyid ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ kun 'byung ba spong bar 'gyur ro// skye mched gsal ba ni chos snang ba
30b1(mdo sde): sgo ste/ lam sgom par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'gog pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// lus la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus dben pa
30b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / tshor ba la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// sems la song ba'i dran pa ni chos ldang ba'i sgo ste/ sems la sgyu ma lta bur
30b3(mdo sde): so sor rtog par 'gyur ro/ / chos la song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rab rib dang bral ba'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi dge ba'i chos
30b4(mdo sde): thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro// dad pa'i dbang
30b5(mdo sde): po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ shin tu rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dran pa'i dbang po
30b6(mdo sde): ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ las legs par byas par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi dbang po ni chos snang
30b7(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ mngon sum gyi ye shes su 'gyur ro// dad pa'i stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdud kyi stobs la yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni chos snang
31a1(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// dran pa'i stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi 'phrog par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
31a2(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi stobs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi thub par 'gyur ro// dran pa yang dag byang chub yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos
31a3(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes par 'gyur ro/ / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus
31a4(mdo sde): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ shin tu rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ting nge 'dzin sgrub
31a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bya ba byas par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
31a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par 'gyur ro// btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ skye ba thams cad du smon par 'gyur ro// yang
31a7(mdo sde): dag pa'i lta ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog dang / yongs su rtog pa
31b1(mdo sde): thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/ / yang dag pa'i ngag ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ yi ge dang / sgra dang / skad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad brag cha dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ro//
31b2(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ las med cing rnam par smin pa med par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ tshol ba thams cad rgyun chad par
31b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ pha rol gyi ngogs su phyin par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med
31b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems mi 'khrugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dkon mchog
31b5(mdo sde): gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / bsam pa'i ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med par 'gyur ro// lhag pa'i bsam pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
31b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la lhag par dmigs par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
31b7(mdo sde): pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing / ser sna can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro//
32a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi khom pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las yang dag par 'da' zhing // tshul khrims 'chal sems can
32a2(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags
32a3(mdo sde): pa spong bar 'gyur zhing / gnod sems can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i chos brtsams pa thams
32a4(mdo sde): cad nyams su len par 'gyur zhing / le lo can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bsam gtan dang
32a5(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa thams cad skyed cing / sems g.yengs pa can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ma rig pa
32a6(mdo sde): dang / gti mug gi mun pa mun nag dang dmigs pa'i lta ba spong zhing / shes rab 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// thabs mkhas pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
32a7(mdo sde): sems can ji ltar mos pa bzhin du spyod lam ston cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad sdur
32b1(mdo sde): cing byang chub brnyes pa las chos nod par 'gyur ro/ / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag gi bde ba la mi chags shing yongs su skyo ba med par 'gyur ro//
32b2(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems
32b3(mdo sde): can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / ye shes kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ de
32b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ / lhag mthong gi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ shes rab kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni
32b5(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro// rton pa la 'jug pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gzungs thob pa ni chos snang
32b6(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro// spobs pa thob pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad legs par bshad pas tshim par byed par
32b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang 'thun par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/
33a1(mdo sde): lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sa nas sar
33a2(mdo sde): 'phar ba'i ye shes ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mngal du 'jug pa dang / btsas pa
33a3(mdo sde): dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
33a4(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag/ 'di dag ni chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad ces bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe//
33a5(mdo sde): lha'i 'khor du gdon mi za bar gang bstan par bya'o// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ lha'i 'khor de dag las lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong // bra na
33a6(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ / lha'i bu sngon yongs su sbyang pa byas pa sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha'i bu
33a7(mdo sde): bye ba sum cu rtsa drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad kyang lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du yogs par
33b1(mdo sde): gyur to/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor de dag rgya cher dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// // gang gi tshe na dga' ldan
33b2(mdo sde): gnas mchog nas/ / 'dren pa skyes bu seng ge 'chi 'pho'i tshe// lha rnams dag la tshig tu smra ba ni// bag med mtha' dag rnam par spong shes smra// lha yi dga' ba rnam mang ji snyed pa// yid kyis
33b3(mdo sde): bsams pas 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ / thams cad las dge rgyu las byung ba ste// de ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin// de lta bas na byas pa gzo bar gyis// sngon gyi dge bsags 'di ni
33b4(mdo sde): zad gyur te/ / gang du mi bde sdug bsngal myong 'gyur ba// ngan song dag tu song bar gyur ta re// nga la gus par bya ba bskyed nas ni// chos gang thos par gyur pa de dag la// nan tan gyis
33b5(mdo sde): ni rab tu sgrubs shig dang / / bde ba mtha' yas nges par thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag brtan pa min// ther zug ma yin rmi lam 'dra ba ste// smig rgyu dang ni sgyu ma rnams
33b6(mdo sde): dang 'dra/ / glog dang dbu ba 'dra zhing 'gyur ba yin// 'dod pa'i yon tan dag ni dga' bas ni// lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin du ngoms mi 'gyur// gang dag rdul med 'jig rten 'das
33b7(mdo sde): pa yi/ / shes rab ldan pa de dag ngoms par 'gyur// lha mo dag dang 'grogs dang glu dbyangs ni// gar gyi ltad mo pa dang mtshungs shing 'dra// dper na 'dus pa dag ni khri las su// /
34a1(mdo sde): phan tshun 'gro bar sbyor ba byed dang mtshungs// dge ba'i las byas rjes su 'brang byed cing // phyi bzhin 'gro bar byed pa ma gtogs par// 'dus byas dag la gros/
34a2(mdo sde): yod ma yin te// mdza' bshes nye du med cing 'khor kyang med// de lta bas ni lhan cig mthun byos la// phan tshun byams sems phan pa'i sems byos te// chos kyi spyad pa dag ni
34a3(mdo sde): spyad par gyis/ / spyad pa legs par spyad la gdung ba med// thos dang tshul khrims sbyin la dga' gyur cing // bzod dang nges pa phun sum tshogs kyis te// sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang
34a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang / / de bzhin bag yod pa dag dran par gyis// rten pa med cing sdug bsngal bdag med la// rgyu dang rkyen rnams dag ni ldan gyur cing // bdag po med la bems por gyur pa
34a5(mdo sde): yi/ chos 'di dag la tshul bzhin brtag par gyis// nga la rdzu 'phrul dag ni gang yod dang // spobs pa ye shes dbang rnams gang thob pa// kun kyang las dge 'i rgyu las byung ba ste// thos
34a6(mdo sde): pa tshul khrims bag yod rnams las byung / / sems can don dang phan dang byams don du// nga yi tshul khrims dang ni thos pa dang // bag yod pa dang sbyin dang dul ba dang // yang dag sdom
34a7(mdo sde): pa'i rjes su bslab par gyis/ / ngag dang skad dang sgra rnams tsam gyis ni// dge ba'i chos rnams sgrub par mi nus kyis// nan tan snying por bya bas sgrub bos sgrub byos la// ji skad
34b1(mdo sde): smras pa de bzhin bya bar byos/ / gzhan gyi gleng ba'i skabs ni ma dbye bar// bdag gis rtag tu sgrims pas 'bad par gyis// la las byas shing sbyin pa yod ma yin// ma byas par yang /
34b2(mdo sde): 'grub par 'gyur ba med// sngon chad 'khor bar 'khor tshe sdug bsngal dag/ myong bar gang gyur de ni dran par gyis// khyed cag log pa nyid du nges pas na// mya ngan las 'das 'dod chags
34b3(mdo sde): bral ma thob/ / de lta bas na dal dang bshes gnyen dang // tshul dang mthun pa'i yul du gnas pa dang // chos mnyam dam pa thob par byas nas ni// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs
34b4(mdo sde): zhi bar gyis/ / nga rgyal dang ni rgyags dang dregs mthong la// rtag tu mnyen zhing dran la g.yo med cing // mya ngan 'das par 'gro la gzhol byos te// lam rtog bya ba'i phyir ni sbyor bar
34b5(mdo sde): gyis/ / gti mug rnyog pa'i mun pa thams cad kyang // shes rab sgron mas rnam par bsal bar gyis// bag la nyal bcas skyon gyi dra ba rnams// ye shes rdo rje yi ni rnam par grol//
34b6(mdo sde): shin tu mang por smra ba ci dgos te// don dang yang dag ldan pa'i chos de la// khyed cag gnas pa byas par ma gyur na// de la chos kyis len pa ma yin no// gang tshe ngas ni byang chub
34b7(mdo sde): thob gyur te/ / 'chi med 'gro ba'i chos char 'bebs pa'i tshe// rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa khyed// chos kyi dam pa mnyan pa'i phyir shes shig/ chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u ste/
35a1(mdo sde): bzhi pa'o// // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la chos kyi gtam 'di yang dag par bstan// yang dag par
35a2(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod// yang dag par dga' bar byas// bzod par byas nas// lha'i 'khor bkra shis dang ldan pa rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag kho bo ni
35a3(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro'o/ / kho bo sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smras pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun
35a4(mdo sde): par bya ba bzhi las mgron du bos la/ grogs po dag de kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar 'dug pa de ni/ kho bos byas pa ma shes
35a5(mdo sde): shing rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro/ / de nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la 'jus te 'di skad ces 'dzer to// skyes bu dam pa khyod mi
35a6(mdo sde): bzhugs na/ dga' ldan gyi gnas 'di mdzes par mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dis khyed
35a7(mdo sde): la chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras te/ de nas byang chub sems dpas rang gi mgo las thod dang cod pan phog ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i mgo la bzhag nas 'di
35b1(mdo sde): skad du/ skyes bu dam pa khyod ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras te/ de nas byang chub sems
35b2(mdo sde): dpas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnas dam par dbang bskur nas/ yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag/ kho bos ji lta bu'i gzugs
35b3(mdo sde): kyis ma'i mngal du 'gro bar bya/ de la kha cig na re bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su gshegs par rigs so zhes zer ro// la la na re brgya byin gyi gzugs su/ la la na re tshangs pa'i
35b4(mdo sde): gzugs su/ la la na re rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na re rnam thos kyi bu'i gzugs su/ la la na re sgra gcan gyi gzugs su/ la la na re dri za'i gzugs su/ la la
35b5(mdo sde): na re mi 'am ci'i gzugs su/ la la na re lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na re dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na re zla ba'i gzugs su/ la la na re nyi ma'i
35b6(mdo sde): gzugs su/ la la na re nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gzugs su bzhud pa'i rigs so zhes zer ro// de nas tshangs rigs kyi lha'i bu gzi brjid dam pa zhes bya ba sngon drang
35b7(mdo sde): srong las shi 'phos pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi
36a1(mdo sde): tshig rig byed kyi bstan bcos las ji skad du 'byung ba de lta bu'i gzugs su byang chub sems dpa' sus kyi lhums su bzhud pa ni rigs so/ / de bang ci 'dra zhe na/
36a2(mdo sde): glang po dam pa lus chen mchog gyur pa// mche ba drug can gser gyi thabs g.yogs// mgo bo rab tu dmar zhing shin tu mdzes// 'gram nas zag cing gzugs ldan dpal ldan
36a3(mdo sde): pa'o/ / rig byed bstan bcos yang dag mkhas pa yi// bram zes rnam pa de 'dra de shes nas// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan 'gyur zhes// yang dag nyid du lung ni ston
36a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas skye ba'i dus la bltas nas/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas bzhin du/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa der
36a5(mdo sde): snga ltas brgyad bstan to/ / brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim de rtswa dang / sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing / dri ma med la/ chag chag legs
36a6(mdo sde): par btab pa dang / phyag dar legs par byas shing / rlung rdul can dang / mun pa dang / rdul dang bral ba dang / sbrang ma dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / phye ma leb dang
36a7(mdo sde): sdig sprul med cing / me tog gi kun tu gang ba/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba dang po'o// ri'i rgyal po gang ri la bya 'dab spen dang
36b1(mdo sde): ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / ngur pa dang / kun la dang / ka la bing+ge dang / shang shang ti'u la sogs pa/ sgro shog sna tshogs mdzes pa/ yid du/
36b2(mdo sde): 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i bya'i tshogs gang dag gnas pa de dag der 'ongs nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de'i stegs bu dang / ba gam dang / rta babs dang / skar khung
36b3(mdo sde): dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs kyi steng dag tu gnas shing / dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ rang rang gi sgra skad dag 'byin
36b4(mdo sde): te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba gnyis pa'o// gang yang rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba dang / nags tshal nyams dga' ba dang / skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba
36b5(mdo sde): dag na/ me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dus tha dad par 'byung ba de thams cad kyang kha 'bus shing me tog rgyas par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba gsum pa'o//
36b6(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i chu'i longs spyod kyi rkyen rdzing la sogs pa gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / pad+ma 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/ tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo
36b7(mdo sde): tsam dag gis khebs par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba bzhi pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de na mar dang / 'bru mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram gyi dbu ba dang /
37a1(mdo sde): sha kha ra la sogs pa bza' ba'i rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag kyang / yongs su spyad pas zad par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gang bar snang ste/ 'di ni snga ltas
37a2(mdo sde): byung ba lnga pa'o/ / rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor chen po dag na/ rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / khar dza dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / bi wang dang
37a3(mdo sde): gling bu dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / khar ba sol khril dang / pheg la sogs pa rol mo'i cha spyad gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma blangs/ ma dkrol bar yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rang sgrog
37a4(mdo sde): par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba drug pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam pa na/ gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUn+da dang / dung dang
37a5(mdo sde): man shel dang / byi ru la sogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang kha bye zhing / dri ma med la rnam par dag cing rab tu gang bar snang ste/ 'di ni snga ltas
37a6(mdo sde): byung ba bdun pa'o/ / nyi zla'i 'od zil gyis rlag par byed cing / lus dang sems dga' ba skyed pa'i 'od dag cing dri ma med pas snang bar gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba brgyad pa'o// /
37a7(mdo sde): / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po gsum pa// lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang khrus byas// lus byug pas
37b1(mdo sde): byugs/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lag pa shin tu brgyan te/ gos shin tu 'jam pa mchog bgos shing / btsun spu dang bcas la/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa
37b2(mdo sde): thob nas/ bud med stong phrag bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma rol mo bya ba'i khang bzangs na/ bde bar gnas pa'i drung du phyin te/ g.yas rol na khri
37b3(mdo sde): bzang po rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa la 'dug nas/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin khro gnyer med cing / rab tu dang ba'i mchog gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
37b4(mdo sde): rgyal po sa bdag legs par bdag la gsan du gsol// rgyal po khyod la gsol gyis bdag la de gnod shig/ bdag gi bsam pa yid la ci mchis cir dga' ba// de dag bdag
37b5(mdo sde): la gsan cing thugs dgyes rangs par mdzod/ / lha bdag nyer gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs len par gsol// bdag ni 'gro la byams pas yan lag brgyad len te/ srog/
37b6(mdo sde): chags gnod pa spangs shing bsam pa rtag dag pas/ ji ltar bdag la byams pa de ltar gzhan la bgyi// rku sems rnam par spangs te 'dod dang dregs pa spangs/ rgyal po 'dod pa
37b7(mdo sde): rnams la log par g.yem mi bgyid/ / bden la gnas shing phra ma ma mchis zhe gcod spangs// mi dge kyal pa'i tshig kyang yongs su mi spyod do// gnod sems zhe sdang tha ba gti
38a1(mdo sde): mug rgyags pa dang / / brnab sems kun spangs rang gi nor gyis 'tshal bar bgyi// yang dag sbyor bas kha gsag tshul 'chos phrag dog spangs// dge bcu
38a2(mdo sde): las lam 'di dag bdag gis spyad par bgyi/ / bdag ni tshul khrims brtul zhugs mngon dga' rab bsdams kyis// mi yi dbang po dag la bzhed pas sred ma mdzad// rgyal po
38a3(mdo sde): khyod la yun rings mi dger gyur du mchi/ / bdag gi tshul khrims brtul zhugs nyer gnas dgyes par mdzod// rgyal po bdag gi 'tshal ba 'di lags de myur stsol// khang bzangs
38a4(mdo sde): bsil khang ldan pa dang skya ldan pa'i nang / / me tog bkram pa'i mchis mal 'jam zhing dri bda' bar// grogs mos rtag tu bskor cing bde dgar gnas snyam bgyid// skyes pa nyung rum
38a5(mdo sde): rnams dang de bzhin khye'u dag dang / / bud med phal pa rnams kyang mdun na mchis mi 'tshal// snyan cing yid mchi sgra snyan nyan pa ma gtogs par// gzugs dang sgra gsung yid du mi mchi
38a6(mdo sde): bdag mi 'tshal/ / bcings dang btson rar stsal pa thams cad dgye bar gsol// nor gyis brel ba'i mi rnams nor dang ldan par mdzod// zas skom rang ba shing rta khyogs dang byin pa rta//
38a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba bde ba'i slad du dgung bdun stsal pa mdzod// pho brang 'di na skyes pa khye'u dang bud med dag/ ji snyed mchis pa 'thab rtsod khro ba'i tshig bral zhing // phan tshun byams pa'i yid ldan
38b1(mdo sde): phan dang des sems kyis/ / dga' tshal gnas pa'i lha ltar mthun zhing bde spyod mdzod// rgyal po'i chad pa che phra gnyer gyis bda' ba dang // gnod pa bgyi dang brdeg gcog sdig ru mi
38b2(mdo sde): mdzad par/ / kun la'ang dang ba'i thugs kyis byams dang phan dgongs te// lha yis skye bo rnams la sras gcig bzhin du gzigs// rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dga' gyur nas
38b3(mdo sde): smras pa khyod ni ci 'dod de kun de bzhin bya/ / khyod kyis bsam pa yid kyis gang rnams rjes bsam shing // khyod kyis mchog blangs gang yin de ni ngas sbyin no// rgyal po'i dam pas rang
38b4(mdo sde): gi 'khor la bsgo ba ni/ / khang bzangs dam pa'i steng du phun sum tshogs pa shoms// me tog mdzes pa khrom la bdug spos mchog gis bdugs// gdugs dang ba dan ta la'i phreng ba'i
38b5(mdo sde): rgyan kyang gyis/ / thab phod stong phrag nyi shu sna tshogs go cha can// mda' mdung lpags mda' mdung thung ral gri thogs pa dag/ yid 'ong sgra gcan dang skya ldan pa skor gyis te/ lha mo
38b6(mdo sde): 'jigs pa med par bya phyir srung zhing gnas/ / khrus byas spos byug gos mchog dag gis yan lag brgyan// bud med rnams kyis de bskor lha yi bu mo 'dra// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ldan
38b7(mdo sde): sil snyan stong blangs te/ / lha mo der zhugs lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas// lha yi rin chen rin thang chen pos rtsi spras pa// khri la gos mchog mang pos yid 'ongs mal bshams te/
39a1(mdo sde): mal phyin gtsug gi nor bu rin chen klong byas nas// 'dres pa'i nags tshal lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas/ dge slong dag de nas rgyal po chen po
39a2(mdo sde): bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / bdud kyi bu ded dpon dang /
39a3(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / mdun na 'don tshangs mchog dang / mdun na 'don tshangs bzangs dang / 'od bkod pa dang / 'od gsal dang // gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi dbang phyug chen
39a4(mdo sde): po dang / mthar thug dang / bog min pa dang / de dag la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang lha brgya stong mang po 'dus te/ gcig la gcig 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag
39a5(mdo sde): bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis su med par gshegs su gsol na/ bdag cag gis byas pa ma shes par 'gyur te/ bdag cag la mi chas/ grogs po dag
39a6(mdo sde): khyed kyi nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thog ma yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang / lhums su bzhugs pa dang / bltams pa dang / thor bu dang / byis pa'i nang na rol pa dang /
39a7(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / rol mo gzigs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud 'dul ba dang /
39b1(mdo sde): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan gyi bar du/ phan pa'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang /
39b2(mdo sde): phangs pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / gnyen pa'i sems kyis rtag par rgyun du byang chub sems dpa'i zham 'bring na 'khod par su dag spro// de'i tshe tshigs
39b3(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ / khyed las su zhig rtag tu dga' yid kyis// gzugs mchog mnga' ba'i zham ring byed par spro// su dag rang gi bsod nams
39b4(mdo sde): gzi brjid dang / / stobs dang grags pa rnam par spel bar 'dod// gang zhig lha yi pho brang 'di dag na// lha mo dag dang 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi// lha yi bde bas dga' bar
39b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa dag/ dri med zla ba'i zhal gyi zham ring gyis// de bzhin 'dres pa'i nags tshal mdzes pa mchog/ lha yi 'byung gnas lha yi pho brang na// gser mdog me tog rgyas par
39b6(mdo sde): dga' 'dod na/ / dri med gzi brjid mnga' ba'i zham ring gyis// gang gis sna tshogs shing rta de bzhin du// dga' tshal me tog man dar 'dab rgyas su// lha mo lhan cig rtse bar
39b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa dag/ skyes bu chen po 'di yi zham ring gyis// 'thab bral ba dag po 'am dga' ldan bdag po 'am// yang na dbang phyug 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang // 'gro ba kun gyi mchod
40a1(mdo sde): 'os 'dod pa dag/ grags pa mtha' yas padi yi zham ring gyis// gang zhig 'phrul dga'i khang pa mdzes pa dang // dbang sgyur lha yi gnas su rtse 'dod
40a2(mdo sde): cing/ yid kyi 'phrul gyis thams cad spyod 'dod pa// yon tan mchog mnga' bdi yi zham ring gyis// bdud kyi dbang po zhe sdang yid med pa// rdzu 'phrul dbang phyug kun gyi mthar phyin
40a3(mdo sde): pa'i/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dbang mthar phyin 'dod na// phan pa dzad pa 'di dang lhan cig deng // de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams las 'da' byas te// tshangs pa'i gnas su gnas par
40a4(mdo sde): su 'dod pa/ / de ni tshad med bzhi yi gzi mnga' ba// skyes bu chen po'i zham ring deng nas kyis// 'on tam gang zhig mi yi nang dag tu// 'khor los sgyur yul yangs par skye 'dod
40a5(mdo sde): na/ / rin chen 'byung gnas mi 'jigs bde sbyin pa// bsod nams yangs pa mnga' ba'i zham ring gyis// gang zhig sa bdag de bzhin tshong dpon bu// phyug cing sgyid la nor mang
40a6(mdo sde): tshogs chen dang / / dgra yi dpung bcom 'khor dang ldan 'dod pa// de ni phan mdzad 'di dang lhan cig deng // gzugs dang longs spyod de bzhin dbang phyug dang // snyan pa grags dang spobs
40a7(mdo sde): dang yon tan dang / / gzung 'os tshig dang mnyan pa'i tshig 'dod pa// de ni tshangs dbyangs mkhas pa'i gan du song // lha dang mi yi 'dod pa gang yin dang // srid pa gsum gyi bde ba thams
40b1(mdo sde): cad dang / / bsam gtan bde dang dben pa'i dpe 'dod pa// de ni chos kyi dbang phyug zham ring gyis// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang spang ba dang // nyon mongs mun pa sel bar su 'dod cig//
40b2(mdo sde): zhi ba rab zhi nyer zhi yid ldan pa// de ni thugs dul zham ring myur du song // gang zhig slob dang mi slob rang rgyal dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob 'dod dang // stobs bcus
40b3(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra sgrogs su 'dod pa/ / de ni yon tan rgya mtsho mkhas drung song // gang zhig ngan song rnams kyi lam gcod cing // bzang 'gro 'chi ba med pa'i lam dbye dang // yan lag brgyad
40b4(mdo sde): lam 'gro bas 'gro 'dod na/ / 'gro lam mthar phyin 'di yi zham ring gyis// gang zhig bde gshegs yongs su mchod pa dang // thugs rje mnga' ba de las chos nyan dang // dge 'dun
40b5(mdo sde): yon tan thob par 'dod pa ni/ / yon tan rgya mtsho 'di yi zham ring gyis// skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal zad pa dang // 'khor ba'i bcings pa rnam par grol ba dang // nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam
40b6(mdo sde): rnam dag spyod 'dod pa/ / de ni sems can dag pa'i zham ring gyis// 'gro ba kun na yid 'ong sdug mdzes shing // gzugs mchog mtshan dang yon tan rgyas pa dang // bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang /
40b7(mdo sde): 'grol 'dod pa// de ni blta sdug mkhas pa'i gan du song // tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab dang // zab cing blta dka' gting dpag dka' ba yi// rnam grol thod 'dod mkhas pa/
41a1(mdo sde): gang yin de// sman pa'i rgyal po'i gan du myur du song // yon tan 'di dang gzhan yang rnam mang dang // srid pa'i bde dang de bzhin mya ngan 'das// yon tan thams cad
41a2(mdo sde): rab tu rdzogs 'dod pa/ / de ni brtul zhugs grub mkhas gan du song // tshig de thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'bum dang /
41a3(mdo sde): 'thab bral gyi lha 'bum dang / dga' ldan gyi lha 'bum dang / 'phrul dga'i lha 'bum dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lnga sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyis byung ba drug khri dang / tshangs ris kyi lha drug khri brgyad stong dang /
41a4(mdo sde): 'og min gyi bar gyi lha brgya stong mang po dag 'dus par gyur pa dang / gzhan yang shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs nas lha'i bu brgya stong mang po 'dus par
41a5(mdo sde): gyur pa de dag las gang dag mchog tu bya ba'i lha'i bu dag gis lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / bdag cag rnams kyi bsam pa yang dag ci 'dra
41a6(mdo sde): yi/ / tshig 'di lha yi dbang po bdag gis gsan du gsol// 'dod pa'i dga' byor bsam gtan bde ba mchog spangs te// sems can dag pa dam pa 'di yi zham ring bgyi// lhums su
41a7(mdo sde): gshegs dang lhums na bzhugs dang bltams pa'i tshe/ / bdag nyid chen po mchod 'os shin tu mchod par bgyi// bsod nams dag gis bsrungs pa'i drang srong yongs bsrungs nas//
41b1(mdo sde): zhe sdang sems kyis sus kyang glags rnyed 'gyur ma mchis// glu dbyangs sil snyan rol mo'i dbyangs sba legs bsgrags pas// yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i yon tan bsngags brjod de//
41b2(mdo sde): gang thos skye bo byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa// lha dang mi rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyi// rgyal po'i pho brang me tog bsil mas rgyas par dgang // a ga ru mchog nag pos
41b3(mdo sde): bdugs te dri zhim bgyi/ / de yi dri chor lha mi rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing // nad med rims nad bral zhing bde bar 'gyur bar bgyi// me tog man+da ra dang kun nas 'du ba dang // sim byed rab tu
41b4(mdo sde): sim byed sba la rnam snang dang / / me tog bzang pos phrin las dge las byung ba de// mchod pa'i slad du ser skya'i grong kun dgang bar bgyi// ji srid yum gyi lhums na dri gsum mgos
41b5(mdo sde): bzhugs/ / ji srid rga shi mthar phyin bltams par gyur gyi bar// de srid dus su dang ba'i yid kyi zham ring bgyi// blo gros che mnga' mchod pa bgyi bar bdag cag sems// bltams nas
41b6(mdo sde): gom pa bdun gshegs brgya byin tshangs pa yis/ / lag tu blangs te spos chu dag gis sku bsil ba// sems can rnam par dag pa de ni mthong ba yi// lha mi de dag thob pa rgya chen legs
41b7(mdo sde): par 'thob/ / ji srid bar du 'jig rten rjes su mthun mdzad cing // 'dod pa'i nyon mongs 'joms mdzad btsun mo'i nang bzhugs la// ji srid cig na rgyal srid kun spangs khab nas 'byung
42a1(mdo sde): de srid dus su dang ba'i sems kyis zham ring bgyi/ / ji srid cig na ran bsnams byang chub snying por gshegs// ji srid gcig na bdud bcom byang chub reg gyur cing /
42a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa khrag khrig 'khor lo bskor bar gsol btab pa// de srid bde bar gshegs la mchod pa rgya chen bgyi// sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med btul gyur te// stong gsum
42a3(mdo sde): khams su sangs rgyas phrin las nam langs nas/ / zhi zhing bsil ba'i mya ngan 'das par gshegs gyur pa// de srid kun gyis drang srong grags chen gtang mi bgyid// dge slong dag
42a4(mdo sde): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can dag pa mchog dam pa ji lta bu
42a5(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i na chung de ni ji lta bu zhig yod snyam nas/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa mchog tu bya ba dag khyer nas lha'i lus yid las
42a6(mdo sde): grub pa thob cing / bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs pa de dag skad cig de nyid la lha'i pho brang de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ ser skya'i grong khyer chen po
42a7(mdo sde): dam pa bskyed mos tshal brgya stong gis brgyan pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog khang bzangs chen po dang skya ldan zhes bya ba lha'i dbang po'i pho brang lta bu der phyin nas/ lha'i bu mo gos
42b1(mdo sde): lcug lhug po gyon pa/ dge ba dri ma med pa'i bsod nams gzi brjid kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ lha'i rgyan gyis lag pa shin tu brgyan pa de dag gis lha mo sgyu 'phrul mal mchog gi steng na 'dug
42b2(mdo sde): pa mthong nas/ phan tshun mdzub mos ston cing / nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod de gcig la gcig tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ lha gnas 'khod pa'i lha yi bu mo rnams//
42b3(mdo sde): yid 'ong byang chub sems dpa'i sku mthong nas// de tshe de dag 'di snyam sems gyur te// byang chub sems dpa'i yum 'gyur ci 'dra snyam// lag na me tog phreng can de dag rnams// the tshom
42b4(mdo sde): skyes nas rgyal po'i pho brang du/ / me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas su// sor bcu thal mo sbyar te 'dud cing lhags// lcug lcug gos gyon 'jo bag gzugs 'chang bas// lha mo sgyu
42b5(mdo sde): 'phrul mal steng gnas mthong nas/ / lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mos phyag byas te// mi yi bud med gzugs la legs ltos 'dzer// bdag cag nga rgyal sems kyis mngon sems
42b6(mdo sde): pa/ lha yi bu mo'i gzugs mchog yid 'ong snyam// rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di yi gzugs mthong na// lha yi lus kyang zil gyis non par mthong // 'di ni gang zag mchog gis yum 'gyur
42b7(mdo sde): du/ / yon tan ldan pas shin tu gsha' zhing 'os// nor bu rin chen snod bzang gnas pa ltar// lha mo 'di ni lha yi lha snod yin// rkang lag mthil dang spyi bo man chad du// yan lag yid
43a1(mdo sde): bong lha las lhag pa ste/ / mig gis blta na ngoms par 'gyur ma yin// yid dang sems ni phyir zhing dga' bar 'gyur// 'di yi la bzhin lus mdzes sprug
43a2(mdo sde): pa ni/ / nam mkha'i dkyil na zla ba mdzes pa 'dra// nyi ltar dri med me ltar 'bar ba ste// 'di yi lus las 'od gsal bzang po 'byung // gser sbram bcom bzang po'i gser bzhin du
43a3(mdo sde): lha mo 'di yi kha dog rnam par mdzes/ / 'di yi sgra ni 'jam gtsang dri zhim ste// bung ba mchog gi mdog 'dra lcang lor 'khyil// 'di yi mig ni pad+mo'i 'dab ma 'dra// rnam dag son
43a4(mdo sde): nam mkha'i skar ma bzhin/ / sked pa gzhu ltar phra zhing sta zur yangs// phrag pa zlum zhing tshig rnams mngon pa med// brla legs glang po mchog gi sna 'dra ste// byin pa shin tu legs
43a5(mdo sde): pa byin gyis phra/ / rkang lag mthil mnyam shin tu dmar ba ste// 'di ni gzhan min lha yi bu mor nges// de ltar rnams mang du mar blta byas nas// me tog gtor te bskor ba byas
43a6(mdo sde): nas ni/ / grags ldan rgyal ba'i yum la bstod byas te// skad cig gcig gis phyir yang lha gnas dong // de nas phyogs bzhi skyong ba bzhi po dang // 'thab bral rab dang brgya byin
43a7(mdo sde): 'phrul pa dang / / lha tshogs lha min grul bum srin po dang // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye ches smras pa// skyes bu mchog gi mdun du khyed deng la// skyes bu dam pa de la bsrung dang bskyab
43b1(mdo sde): pa bgyis/ / 'gro ba dag la yid kyis sdang ma byed// mi rnams la yang gtse ba ma byed cig/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim mchog gang gnas pa// der ni mthun par 'khor dang lhan cig kun//
43b2(mdo sde): mda' gzhu ral gri mdung thung mtshon thogs la// nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te blta bar gyis// de ltar shi 'pho'i dus shes lha bu rnams// me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas ni// sor
43b3(mdo sde): bcu'i thal mo sbyar te 'dud byos la/ / dga' ba'i sems kyis sgyu 'phrul drung du dang // smra ba'i seng ge'i dus ni deng lags kyis// 'jig rten kun la thugs rjes brtse bskyed de// mi dbang
43b4(mdo sde): sems can dag la 'chi 'pho ston/ / mchod sbyin don du bdag cag gsol ba 'debs// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe// shar phyogs
43b5(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ / dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang po dag/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems
43b6(mdo sde): dpa' ga la ba der lhags so/ / de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa// dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong
43b7(mdo sde): phrag mang po dag/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas// lha'i bu mo 'bum
44a1(mdo sde): phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing / byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags
44a2(mdo sde): so/ / de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa
44a3(mdo sde): bzhi sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so// de nas byang chub sems
44a4(mdo sde): dpa' khang pa rtsegs pa chen po bsod nams thams cad kyis yang dag par byung ba dpal gyi snying po lha rnams kyis kun nas blta ba'i nang du 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha
44a5(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas bskyod par brtsams so// dge slong dag de ltar bskyod par brtsams pa'i tshe//
44a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ltar rgya che zhing yangs la/ thag gru che ba 'dir sngan chad ma byung ba'i 'od snang ba lha'i 'od las shin
44a7(mdo sde): tu 'das pas yongs su gsal zhing snang bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi bar gang sdig pa sdig pas khebs nas/ mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa/ snang ba med pa/ gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag
44b1(mdo sde): 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che la/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pas kyang / 'od dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid kyi lam mer ma gyur/ thal ler ma gyur/ lhang nger ma gyur pa/
44b2(mdo sde): der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang rang gi lag pa brkyang pa'ang mi mthong ba de dag tu'ang de'i tshe/ snang ba chen pos rgyas par khyab par gyur cing / der skyes pa'i sems can de dag snang
44b3(mdo sde): ba des khyab par gyur nas/ gcig gis gcig mthong zhing / gcig gis gcig shes te/ 'di skad du kye grogs po dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so// kye grogs po dag
44b4(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so zhes zer bar gyur pa de lta bu'i 'od lus las bkye'o/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug dang / ltas chen po bco brgyad du g.yos
44b5(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ / 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul lo// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// 'khrugs// rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug
44b6(mdo sde): so/ / bur 'ur/ rab tu bur bur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to// dbus dma' na
44b7(mdo sde): mtha' mtho bar gyur to/ / shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho bar gyur to// nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho bar gyur to// lnga phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho bar gyur to// byang
45a1(mdo sde): phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho bar gyur to/ / de'i tshe sma dga' bar 'gyur ba tshim par 'gyur ba/ mgu bar 'gyur ba/ dang bar 'gyur ba/ sim par 'gyur ba/ mnyan
45a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba/ bsngags par 'os pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ mnyan na gtang mi bra ba/ mi mthun pa med pa/ dngang bar 'gyur ba med pa dag kyang grags par gyur to// skad cig de la sems can
45a3(mdo sde): gang la yang gnod pa 'am/ 'jigs pa 'am/ dngang ba 'am/ bag nod pa med par gyur to// skad cig de la nyi zla dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag gi 'od kyang
45a4(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur to/ / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bde ba
45a5(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan par gyur te/ sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod par mi 'gyur/ zhe sdang gis gnod par mi 'gyur/ gti mug gis gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / phrag dog gam
45a6(mdo sde): ser sna 'am/ nga rgyal 'am/ 'chab pa dang / rgyags pa 'am/ khro ba 'am/ gnod sems sam/ yongs su gdung bas gnod par 'gyur ba med par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyang
45a7(mdo sde): skad cig de la phan tshun pha ma tsam du sems pa'i 'du shes su gyur nas/ byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// lha dang mi'i rol mo sesil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya
45b1(mdo sde): stong dag kyang ma dkrol ma blangs par yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin par gyur to/ / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang lag pa dang / phrag pa dang / spyi bos gzhal med khang chen po de dag bdegs
45b2(mdo sde): cing khyer bar gyur to/ / lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag gis kyang rang rang gi glu dbyangs blangs te/ mdun dang rgyab dang / g.yas g.yon dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyis
45b3(mdo sde): mngon par bstod pa/ khyod kyis sngan chad dge las bsags pa dang // yun rings dus kyi dge bas byung ba dang // khyod kyis chos rnams kun gyis tshul sbyangs pas// de ring mchod pa rgya chen byung/
45b4(mdo sde): bar gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyi sngon// sras mo sras sdug sbyin pa mdzad pas na// lha yi me tog char du bab pa 'di// sbyin pa spyad pa de yi 'bras bu lags// gtso bo khyod kyis
45b5(mdo sde): rang gi sha bcad de/ / srang la gcal nas thugs byon bya phyir btang / sbyin pa de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// yi dgas 'jig rten rnams kyang zas skom thob// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod
45b6(mdo sde): kyis sngon/ / tshul khrims ma zhig ma nyams bsrungs pas na// tshul khrims de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// mi khom ngan song yongs su dag par gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyi sngon//
45b7(mdo sde): byang chub bsgrub pa'i gzhir ni bzod pa bsgoms// bzod pa de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// lha dang mi kun byams pa'i sems su gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// brtson 'grus ma
46a1(mdo sde): gong dam pa bsgoms pas na/ / brtson 'grus de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// spu ni ri rab bzhin du mdzes par grub// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// nyon
46a2(mdo sde): mongs sbyangs slad bsam gtan bsgoms mdzad pas/ / bsam gtan de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// 'gro ba kun la nyon mongs gnod mi 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon//
46a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs gcod pa'i shes rab bsgoms mdzad pas// shes rab de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// 'od gsal dam pa rnam pa snang zhing mdzes// byams pa'i go mnapas nyon mongs 'joms
46a4(mdo sde): mdzad cing / / sems can kun la thugs rje che byung ba// dgyes pa mchog brnyes btang snyoms mchog ldan pa// bde gshegs tshangs gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab sgron ma'i
46a5(mdo sde): 'od dang gzis 'phags shing / / gti mug skyon gyi mun pa kun sel ba// 'dren pa stong gsum dag na mig gyur pa'i// thub pa lam ston khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa mngon
46a6(mdo sde): shes mchog la mkhas/ / bden pa gzigs shing dam pa'i don bslabs pa// brgal nas srog chags gzhan dag sgrol mdzad pa// bde gshegs grol gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
46a7(mdo sde): thabs dang mngon shes dam pa kun la mkhas// 'chi 'pho 'chi 'pho med pa'i 'pho ba ston// 'jig rten chos kyi rjes su mthun mdzad kyang // 'jig rten gang du'ang chags pa khyod mi mnga'
46b1(mdo sde): gang dag khyod ni nyan tam ltar lhags pa/ / de dag thob pa dam pa bsam mi khyab// khyod las chos nyid thos te gang dad cing // dga' ba yangs pa skyes pa smos ci 'tshal// dga' ldan
46b2(mdo sde): gnas rnams kun ni mog mog gyur/ / 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma mngon du shar// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab// nyon mongs gnyid kyis log las sad par mdzad/
46b3(mdo sde): deng ni pho brang 'byor cing rgyas gyur la// bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams lang long 'gyur// lha yi bu mos sil snyan sgra phyung bas// rgyal po'i khab na sgra snyan grag par gyur// bsod nams
46b4(mdo sde): gzi brjid rdzogs shing las dge ba/ / bud med gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan gyur pa// de yi sras gyur de ni de ltar 'byor// dpal gyis 'jig rten gsum ni zil gyis gnon//
46b5(mdo sde): mi mchog 'byung ba de yi gzi brjid kyis// deng phyi phyin chad pho brang dam pa 'dir// lus can rnams la 'dod sdang 'thab rtsod med// kun kyang byams pa'i sems kyis srid zhur bcas// /
46b6(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs rgyal byung bas na// rgyal po'i rigs ni rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur// ser skya'i grong 'di shin tu phun sum tshogs// rin chen mdzod kyis rab tu gang bar
46b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / gnod sbyin srin po grul bum gsang ba pa// lha dang lha min tshogs rnams dbang por bcas// mi mchog srung ba gang dag gnas pa rnams// de dag ring por mi thogs thar
47a1(mdo sde): pa 'thob/ / gus dang sri zhal ni gnas nas su// 'dren pa khyod bstod bsod nams gang bsags pa// kun kyang byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo// mi yi dam pa
47a2(mdo sde): khyod ltar myur du shog/ bskyod par brtsams pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // dge slong dag de ltar dgun 'das te/ dpyid kyi dus la dpyid zla tha chung gi tshe/ skar ma sa ga
47a3(mdo sde): la bab pa'i dus kyi dam pa la/ shing rnams kyi lo ma rgyas shing me tog mchog tu rgyas nas/ grang dro dang / mun pa dang / rdul med cing sa gzhi sngo gzhon nu skyes pas khebs par
47a4(mdo sde): gnas pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso bo 'jig rten gyi mchod pas dus la bab pa'i chod la rnam par gzigs nas/ tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya la skar ma rgyal gyi dus su// yum gso sbyong
47a5(mdo sde): blangs pa'i rum du/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas 'phos te/ dran zhing shes bzhin du/ glang po'i phru gu thal dkar mche ba drug dang ldan pa/ mgo'i kha dog srin bu
47a6(mdo sde): ldam bu chu gsher gyi mdog lta bu/ mche ba la gser 'tshig pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ dbang po nyams pa med par byas te/ ma'i glo g.yas pa nas bzhugs so//
47a7(mdo sde): zhugs nas kyang glo g.yas logs su brten te gnas kyi/ glo g.yon pa logs su nam yang ma brten to// lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma la bde ba na nyal ba des kyang rmi lam 'di lta bu mthong ngo // /
47b1(mdo sde): glang po kha ba dngul mdog mche ba drug/ rkang lag rab mdzes mgo bo dmar sdug pa// 'gros bzang lus tshigs rdo rje bzhin brtan pa// glang po'i mchog gcig khong du song snyam byed//
47b2(mdo sde): des ni de 'dra'i bde ba brgya lam na'ang // ma mthong ma thos myong bar ma gyur te// lus kyang bde zhing sems kyang bder gyur nas// bsam gtan mnyam par gzhag pa bzhin du gyur//
47b3(mdo sde): de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rgyan dang gos lcug lhug por gyon cing thogs pa las// lus dang sems bde bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / nyams bde ba thob nas/
47b4(mdo sde): mal dam pa de las langs te/ bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ khang bzangs de'i steng nas babs te/ shing mya ngan ma tshang gi nags tshal ga la ba der song
47b5(mdo sde): nas/ de mya ngan ma tshang gi nags tshal du bde bar 'dug ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du pho nya btang nas// rgyal po gshegs su gsol/ lha mo de khyod kyi zhal mthong bar bzhed do zhes
47b6(mdo sde): byas pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshig de thos nas rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ lus g.yos nas khri bzang po las langs te/ blon po dang / grong rdal ba dang / 'khor dang /
47b7(mdo sde): gnyen pa'i skye bo dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ mya ngan ma tshang gi nags tshal ga la ba der song ngo // song nas kyang bdag gis lus shin tu lci ba snyam byed nas
48a1(mdo sde): mya ngan ma tshang gi nags tshal du 'gro ma nus te/ de mya ngan mtshang gi nags tshal gyi sgor 'dug nas cung zad cig bsams te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// bdag
48a2(mdo sde): ni g.yul du dpa' ba'i phul phyin pa/ deng ltar lus lci bdag gis myong mi dran// bdag gi khyim dubang 'gro bar deng ma nus// kye ma 'di ci su la dri bar bya// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyis lha dag
48a3(mdo sde): nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod nas lus phyed mngon par sprul te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de spras pa// dka' thub brtul zhugs yon tan 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod//
48a4(mdo sde): byams dang snying rje tho bas bsod nams ye shes dbang bskur ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' che ba dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos gyur te// rgyal po khyod kyi sras gyur lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngal du
48a5(mdo sde): zhugs/ / de tshe rang gi mgo cog sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas te// rgyal po rim gro bya bar ldan gyur de yi nang du zhugs// nga rgyal dregs pa med pas lha mo sgyu 'phrul ngor bltas te// ngas ni khyod
48a6(mdo sde): la ci bya ci sbyar khyod kyis nga la spros/ lha mos smras pa/ kha ba dngul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste// rkang lag legs shing rab 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid// glang ngos
48a7(mdo sde): dam pa rdo rje bzhin du tshigs brtan gzugs bzang ba/ bdag gi rum du zhugs kyis de yi lo rgyas gsan par gsol// stong gsum khams 'di mdzes par rab rib ma mchis bdag gis mthog/
48b1(mdo sde): bdag ni nyal zhing mchis na lha rnams bye bas rab tu bstod// 'on kyang bdag la 'khro zhing 'tshig dang zhe sdang rmongs ma mchis// zhi ba'i sems su gyur cing bsam gtan bde dang ldan snyam bgyid// /
48b2(mdo sde): bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni rigs la dge 'am dngos sam ci// bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni yang dag ldan par lung ston pa// rig byed rmi lam gzhung la mkhas shing gza' yi cho ga mkhan// rgyal po myur du bram
48b3(mdo sde): ze 'dir ni legs par dgug tu gsol/ / de skad tshig thos rgyal pos de yi dus kyi skad cig la// bram ze rig byed bstan bcos gzhung la shin tu mkhas pa gnyer// sgyu 'phrul bram ze rnams kyi
48b4(mdo sde): mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras/ / kho mos rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong na de yi lo rgyus gson/ bram ze rnams kyis smras pa// lha mos bka' stsal du gsol// khyod kyis rmi lam ci 'dra ba zhig gzigs
48b5(mdo sde): thos nas kyang dpyad par bgyi'o/ / lha mos smras pa/ kha ba dngul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste/ rkang lag legs shing rab 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid// glang po'i dam pardo
48b6(mdo sde): rje bzhin du tshig brtan gzugs bzang ba/ / bdag gi rum du zhugs pa de yi lo rgyus mnyan par gyis// de skad tshig thos nas ni bram ze rnams kyis 'di skad smras// rigs la dngos po ma mchis
48b7(mdo sde): dgyes pa rgya chen brnyes par 'gyur/ / khyod la sras mnga' mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa skye bar 'gyur// rgyal po'i rigs su rigs ldan 'khor lo sgyur ba che ba nyid// gal te 'dod pa dag dang rgyal
49a1(mdo sde): srid pho brang spangs gyur te/ / 'jig rten kun la thugs brtse chags med rab tu byung gyur na// de ni 'jig rten gsum na sbyin gnas sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste// bdud rtsi
49a2(mdo sde): mchog gi ro yis 'jig rten thams cad tshim mdzad 'gyur/ / de skad tshig snyan lung bstan te/ rgyal po'i pho brang zan zos nas/ bya dga' byin pa blangs nas su/ bram ze de dag dong ngo // dag
49a3(mdo sde): slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas bram ze mtshan dang ltas shes shing rnam par 'byed pa dang / rmi lam gyi gzhung shes pa dag las de skad kyi tshig de thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs la/
49a4(mdo sde): rab tu dga' zhing / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bram ze de dag bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / myang ba mang po nyams su bsod pas tshim zhing ngoms par byas nas/ bya dga' byin te bkye'o// /
49a5(mdo sde): de nyid kyi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de'i sgo bzhi na/ grong khyer gyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo thams cad du sbyin pa byin te/ ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/
49a6(mdo sde): zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/ spros 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/ phreng ba 'dod pa
49a7(mdo sde): rnams la ni phreng ba/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha/ gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin no// dge slong dag de
49b1(mdo sde): nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'di khyim gang na 'dug na bde zhing nyon mongs pa med par 'dug par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas skad cig nyid la rgyal po
49b2(mdo sde): chen po bzhi/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// lha thugs las su ma mdzad par btang snyoms su bde bar bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems
49b3(mdo sde): dpa'i pho brang ba sham mo/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// skyong ba'i gzhal med khang rnams ngan// sum cu
49b4(mdo sde): gsum pa yi bzang / / byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang ni// rnam par rgyal tsam bdag gi dbul// de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di
49b5(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ / kho bo'i khang khyim mthong gyur nas/ brgya byin bye ba ngo mtshar gyur/ 'thab bral rab kyi dpal ldan lang / rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo// de nas
49b6(mdo sde): lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// grags pa che mnga' sngon chad ni// dga' ldan gang du bzhugs gyur pa// pho brang dam pa 'dzin pa de/
49b7(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo// de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// dpal ldan yid las grub pa'i khang /
50a1(mdo sde): de ni rin chen rang bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' mchod don du/ rgyal po bdag gis dbul bar bgyi/ de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rgyal ba
50a2(mdo sde): zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'dod pa'i khams gnas ji snyed pa// gzhal med khang mdzes gang yod pa// bdag gi gzhal med khang drung na// 'od dang mdog
50a3(mdo sde): kyang gtor bar snang / / de bas dpal ldan bdag gis dbul// byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// rin chen rang bzhin pho brang bzang // de ni rgyal po blang bar gyis// lha yi me tog
50a4(mdo sde): rab bkang ste/ / lha yi spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i// pho brang yangs pa bdag gis dbul// der ni lha mo bzhugs par gyis// dge slong dag de ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i
50a5(mdo sde): dbang po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i phyir// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa der rang rang gi khyim phul bar gyur to// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang
50a6(mdo sde): mi'i las ni 'das kyis/ lha yir ni ma gyur pa bshams par gyur te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus/ khyim de dag thams cad du lha mo sgyu 'phrul
50a7(mdo sde): mngon par ston to/ / byang chub sems dpa' lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ glo g.yas phyogs logs su skyil mo krung bcas te gnas par gyur to// lha'i dbang po de dag
50b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyang so so nas bdag nyid kyi khyim na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'dug gi/ gzhan ma yin no zhes de ltar shes par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ting 'dzin bkod
50b2(mdo sde): ba che la gnas gyur te/ sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab sprul byas nas// lha rnams thams cad bsam pa rdzogs par byas// rgyal po'ang de ltar yid bzhin bsam pa grub//
50b3(mdo sde): de nas lha'i 'khor de'i nang nas/ lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang mi'i lus kyi dri bro na skyong zhing 'byol na/ de ma yin pa'i lha
50b4(mdo sde): gzhan sum cu rtsa gsum pa 'am/ 'thab bral lam/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dag lta smos kyang ci dgos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gtsang zhing dri nga ba dang bral ba/ 'jig rten thams
50b5(mdo sde): cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ sems can rin po che dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/ yum gyi lhums mo'i lus dri mi zhim par zhugs par gyur snyam pa dang /
50b6(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bud med kyi lus ni smad pa lags pa dang / 'dod
50b7(mdo sde): chags la spyod ces bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ngo mtshar che na/ bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ sngon byang chub
51a1(mdo sde): sems dpar gyur pa/ 'di ltar dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/ yum gyi lhums mi'i lus su glo g.yas phyogs su brten te bzhugs so zhes bgyi
51a2(mdo sde): pab 'di ni rab tu yang ngo mtshar che ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mdzad do zhes de skad du smras pa ni bdag la spob ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
51a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa/ rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba gang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i yongs su spyad par gyur pa mthong
51a4(mdo sde): bar 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus ni de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus ni da lags te/ de bzhin gshegs par byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad
51a5(mdo sde): pa de bstan te mthong na glo ba dga'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do// de nas mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa/ tshangs pa
51a6(mdo sde): 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
51a7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dud cing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen bzhin
51b1(mdo sde): du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa khyod kyis sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i ma'i rum na zla ba bcur 'dug bdug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyod
51b2(mdo sde): pa blangs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags so// bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa da de ga la yod ston cig/ gsol pa
51b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na mchis lags/ bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa de'i phyir zla ba bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de 'dir khyod kyis ston cig dang / ji tsam
51b4(mdo sde): du 'dus byas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ / de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ tshangs pa dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po
51b5(mdo sde): che bkod pa de blang gis de'i bar du khyed 'khod cig/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nas mi
51b6(mdo sde): snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig de nyid la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin to// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so//
51b7(mdo sde): grogs po khyod song la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'di man chad/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas yan chad du sgra sgrogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che ni bkod pa bdag cag gis de
52a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug nas/ khyed kyi nang nas mthong bar su dga' ba myur du shog cig ces sbas go bar gyis shig/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/
52a2(mdo sde): lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa blangs te/ tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag tshad sum brgya pa'i
52a3(mdo sde): steng du bzhag nas/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du phab bo// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'dus pa chen por gyur
52a4(mdo sde): te/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de yang lha'i gos dang / lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i spos dang / lha'i me tog dang / lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / lha'i longs
52a5(mdo sde): spyod rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas par gyur cing / lha dbang che bar grags pa dag gis yongs su bskor bar gyur pa ni 'di tsam ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su 'dug nas rgyang
52a6(mdo sde): ring po nas/ gdong thal mos bskyabs te/ mgo byol nas bltas kyang mthor bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i nang na tshangs pa dag ni mthu che ba ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab
52a7(mdo sde): bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dag kyang de dag gi drung na dma' ba yin na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
52b1(mdo sde): kyis de'i tshe/ lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i sgra de dag zhi bar mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de thos pa tsam gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams myo myo por 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir ro//
52b2(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi drung du lhags nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa 'di bdag cag gis
52b3(mdo sde): mthong bar mi nus na ji ltar bgyi/ des de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag kho bos kyang ji ltar bya/ kho bo nyid kyis kyang mthong bar mi nus so// grogs po dag 'on kyang de ni nam bcom ldan
52b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar phul ba de'i tshe mthong grang ngo / / de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i dbang po de bas na/ ci nas kyang myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du gsol/ smras pa/ grogs po dag lha'i
52b5(mdo sde): bu mngon par 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar phyin te/ dga' bar bya ba'i tshig brjod par gyur gyi bar du sdod cig/ de nas de dag phyogs gcig tu 'khod
52b6(mdo sde): de mgo byol nas/ bcom ldan 'das logs su lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshad pa lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drag brgyad cu pa po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub
52b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de khyer te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der phul lo// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de ni/ gzugs bzang /
53a1(mdo sde): mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ steng khang pa brtsegs pas legs par brgyan pa ste/ de'i tshad ni 'phang du 'di lta ste dper na/ byis pa
53a2(mdo sde): btsas nas zla ba drug lon pa tsam mo/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du khri bshams pa ni 'di lta ste dper na/ byis pa btsas nas zla ba drug lon pa 'dug pa'i stegs bu tsam mo// byang chub sems
53a3(mdo sde): dpa'i yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de'i kha dog dang dbyibs ni 'di lta bu ste/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyibs dang / kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do// lha rnams
53a4(mdo sde): kyis de mthong na yang mig 'khrugs shing ngo mtshar du gyur to/ / de de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhag na lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ dper na mgar ba mkhas pas gser shin tu
53a5(mdo sde): bzhu ste/ legs par sbyangs nas/ dri ma'i skyon med par byas pa'i gser bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de rnam par mdzes so// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de'i nang du khri bshams
53a6(mdo sde): pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dung mgrin ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyibs dang / kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do// tshangs pa chen pos gos bgos pa de yang byang
53a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i khri de'i drung na mdzes par mi snang ba/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung dang char gyis btab pa'i la ba nag po bzhin no// khang pa brtsegs pa de ni tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las byas
53b1(mdo sde): pa ste/ de'i phye ma zho gcig la'ang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyis rin du mi chog go// khang pa brtsegs pa de ni tsan dan sbrul gyis snying po de lta bus kun nas bskor ba ste/ khang pa brtsegs
53b2(mdo sde): pa de dang 'dra ba gnyis pa gcig kyang khang pa brtsegs pa dang po de'i nang na ma chags ma reg par 'dug go/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de kho na dang 'dra ba gsum pa gcig kyang / khang pa brtsegs pa
53b3(mdo sde): gnyis pa de'i nang na ma reg ma chags par 'dug go/ / spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa de'i nang du khri de bzhag ste/ gdan bting ngo // tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po de kha dog ni rnam pa 'di
53b4(mdo sde): lta ste/ dper na bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i rig dam pa dang ldan pa bzhin no// spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de'i 'khor na/ me tog lha'i las 'das pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
53b5(mdo sde): kyang ma skyed par/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pas khang pa brtsegs pa der skye'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de ni rdo rje'i rang
53b6(mdo sde): bzhin te/ sra zhing brtan la mi shigs pa ste/ ka tsa linI'i gos ltar reg na bde ba'o// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas bkod pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub
53b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa der kun tu snang ngo / / gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du 'jug pa de'i nub mo 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/ sa chen po
54a1(mdo sde): rngams dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad brtol te/ pad+ma byung bas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags so// pad+ma de ni kha lo sgyur ba skyes
54a2(mdo sde): bu dam pa dang / tshangs pa chen po brgya phrag bcu'i stong la dbang bas mthong du zad kyi/ gzhan sus kyang mthong ba med do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na snying
54a3(mdo sde): khu dang / snying po dang / bcud ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pad+ma chen po de la zil mngar gyi thigs pa chags te 'dug nas/ de tshangs pa chen pos bainy+tsa'i snod bzang pos blangs shing //
54a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas/ byang chub sems dpas kyang de blangs te tshangs pa chen po la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'thungs par gyur to// snying khu'i thigs pa de 'thungs na byang chub sems
54a5(mdo sde): dpa' srid pa tha ma pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ma gtogs par de yang dag par bde bar zhu bar nus pa/ sems can gyi khams na sems can de lta bu de
54a6(mdo sde): gang yang med do/ / las gang gi rnam par smin pas snying khu'i thigs pa de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' la yod par gyur ce na/ byang chub sems dpas sngon yun ring por byang chub sems
54a7(mdo sde): raba'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can nad pa dag la sman byin pa dang / sems can bsam pa la rten pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang / skyabs su 'ongs pa rnams
54b1(mdo sde): yongs su ma btang ba dang / rtag par me tog gi phud dang / 'bras bu'i phud dang / ro'i phud de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams dang / de bzhin
54b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams dang / pha dang ma la phul zhing phyis bdag nyid yongs su spyod spyod pas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas tshangs pa chen po// zil mngar gyi thigs/
54b3(mdo sde): pa de byang chub sems dpa' la 'bul lo// khang pa brtsegs pa der gnas kyi khyad par dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang / phreng ba brgyus pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa 'phags pa ji snyed cig yod pa
54b4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas der byung bar snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa der/ gos stong phrag brgya'i
54b5(mdo sde): rgyan ces bya ba phrug gcig byung ste/ de'i de 'byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ma gtogs par/ sems can gyi ris na sems can de lta bu de gang yang med do// gzugs dang sgra dang
54b6(mdo sde): dri dang / ro dang reg pa mchog tu bya ba dam pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de na med pa gang yang med do// // 'phags pa rgya cher rol
54b7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / bam po bzhi pa// yongs su spyad par bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa de ni 'di ltar phyi nang shin tu yongs su grub pa/ 'di ltar shin tu yongs su rdzogs
55a1(mdo sde): paste/ 'di ste ste/ dper na yul ka ling ka nas byung ba'i dang ltar reg na bde ba'o// de yang 'ol byir bstan par zad kyi/ de la dper med do// byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam
55a2(mdo sde): gyis 'di ni bsam pas 'grub ste/ gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi'i 'jig rten du skye ba dang / khyim nas mngon par byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
55a3(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / ma gang gi rum du skye bar 'gyur ba de'i rum g.yas par khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che bkod pa dam pa sngar mngon par 'grub
55a4(mdo sde): cing / phyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos te/ khang pa brtsegs pa der skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug par 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa'i lus nur
55a5(mdo sde): nur po dang / mer mer po dang / ltar ltar po dang / reng ring por 'gyur ba med cing / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'dug bzhin du 'byung la/ lha mo sgyu
55a6(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi rmi lam du glang po che chen po 'ongs par mthong ba 'di ni chos nyid do/ / de de ltar 'dug pa la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
55a7(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad dang / gang las lag na rdo rje skyes pa'i gnod sbyin gyi rigs gsang ba pa zhes bya ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin
55b1(mdo sde): 'brang bar gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro byed pa'i lha mo bzhi yod de/ u khu li zhes bya ba dang / mu khu li zhes bya ba dang / rgyal mtshan ldan pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od dang ldan pa zhes
55b2(mdo sde): bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ngo // lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub
55b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes nas/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus ni rnam pa 'di lta bur gyur te/
55b4(mdo sde): dper na/ mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na/ ri'i spo la me'i phung po 'dug pa ni dpag tshad gcig nas kyang snang / dpag tshad lnga'i bar nas kyang snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub
55b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus mngon par grub pa yang de lta bur gyur te/ 'od gsal zhing gzugs bzang la mdzes shing blta na sdug par gyur pa de/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang
55b6(mdo sde): du skyil mo krung du 'dug na/ gser gyi sa le sbram rigs dang ldan pa rin po che bai DUR+Yas brgyan pa ltar shin tu mdzes par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i mas kyang byang chub sems dpa' rum na 'dug
55b7(mdo sde): pa mthong bar gyur to/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ sprin gyi tshogs chen po'i nang nas glog byung ba ni snang ba chen po bskyed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rus 'jug pa yang dpal dang /
56a1(mdo sde): gzi brjid dang / kha dog gis nye bar rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang po de snang bar byed do// snang bar byas nas spos kyi khang pa rtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar
56a2(mdo sde): byed do/ / spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar byas nas/ spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa snang bar byed do// spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa snang bar byas nas/
56a3(mdo sde): ma'i lus thams cad snang bar byed do// de snang bar byas nas/ de stan gang la 'dug pa de snang bar byed do// de snang bar byas nas/ khyim thams cad snang bar byed do// khyim thams cad
56a4(mdo sde): snang bar byas nas/ 'od 'phro ba khyim gyi steng du byung ste/ shar phyogs snang bar byed do// de bzhin lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs
56a5(mdo sde): bcu kun tu rgyang grags tsam du phyogs re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i dpal dang / gzi brjid dang / kha dog gis snang ba byas par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar
56a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bskur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnod sbyin
56a7(mdo sde): lnga brgya tsam dag dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi ma 'ongs te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas de dag 'ongs par rig nas lag pa g.yas pa brgya ni// mdzub mo bsgreng nas stan ston na/
56b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa de dag kyang ji ltar bting ba'i stan la 'khod par gyur te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug bzhin du/ skyes zin pa'i gzugs dang 'dra bar/
56b2(mdo sde): lag pa skyod cing 'deg la/ rnam par bskyod cing gzhog par mthong nas/ de dag dga' mgu zhing nyams bde ba thob ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// byang chub
56b3(mdo sde): sems dpas kyang de dag de ltar 'khod pa mthong nas/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga'
56b4(mdo sde): bar byed do/ / gang gi tshe de dag 'dod 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems sems kyis rnam par shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ de dag 'dong ba'i brda
56b5(mdo sde): ston to/ / de ltar lag pa brkyang ste 'dong ba'i brda bstan nas/ phyir skum par byed de/ ma la gnod pa med do// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni/ byang chub
56b6(mdo sde): sems dpas kyang 'dod par gnang ngo snyam sems shing / de dag byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dong bar gyur to// de ltar byang
56b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nub mo mi nyal nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang zhing / brkyang nas kyang bskum pa dang / bskums nas kyang dran zhing shes bzhin du/ lag pa de 'jog pa'i rgyu ni de yin no//
57a1(mdo sde): rkyen ni de yin no// gzhan yang gang gi tshe skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo su yang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa de'i tshe/
57a2(mdo sde): thog mar ni byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar bya ba smra'o// de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i ma dga' bar bya ba smra'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ sngar
57a3(mdo sde): dga' bar bya ba smra ba la mkhas par gyur te/ lha 'am klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa su yang rung / byang chub sems dpa' la sngon du dga' bar bya ba'i tshig smra bar nus
57a4(mdo sde): pa med do/ / byang chub sems dpa' nyid thog mar dga' bar bya ba smra zhing / de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i ma dga' bar bya ba smra'o// de nas snga dro'i dus zad de/ nyi mgung
57a5(mdo sde): la bab nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu mngon par 'phags pa/ mngon par 'phags pa dag byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang / de la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
57a6(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / byang chub sems dpas de dag rgyang ring po nas 'ong bar mthong nas/ gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
57a7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag dga' bar byed cing / 'dzub mo brkyang ste stan ston to// dge slong dag de'i tshe 'ang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyir bzlog ma nus nas rdzi
57b1(mdo sde): ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpas de ltar 'khod par rig nas chos kyi gtam gyis
57b2(mdo sde): yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs stong/ yang dag par dga' bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' lag pa gang du brkyang pa de logs su byang chub sems
57b3(mdo sde): dpa'i ma yang lta bar gyur to/ / de nas lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar bya ba smra'o snyam mo// de dag re re zhing yang 'di snyam du byang chub sems
57b4(mdo sde): dpa' ni bdag 'ba' shig la smra ste/ bdag 'ba' shig la dga' bar bya ba smra'o snyam mo// khang pa brtsegs pa der lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de dag gi gzugs brnyan
57b5(mdo sde): snang bar gyur to/ / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i longs spyod yongs su dag par gyur pa de lta bu ni gzhan dag na med do// dge slong dag gang gi tshe/ lha'i dbang
57b6(mdo sde): po brgya byin dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang / byang chub sems dpas de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ lag pa g.yas pa
57b7(mdo sde): brkyang ste/ de dag 'dong pa'i brda ston to// brda bstan nas phyir bskum pa byas te dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do// de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / de ma yin pa'i
58a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu sum cu rtsa gsum pa dag kyang 'di snyam du/ bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dong bar gnang ngo snyam du sems shing / de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang
58a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dong bar gyur to/ / dge slong dag nyi ma phyed kyi dus 'das nas/ phyi dro'i dus la bab pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha'i bu
58a3(mdo sde): brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lha yul ba'i snying khu'i thigs pa de khyer nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der/ byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba
58a4(mdo sde): dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar gyur to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas te 'ongs par shes nas// byang chub sem
58a5(mdo sde): dpas yang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag la dga' bar bya ba smras te/ mdzub mo brkyang nas stan ston to//
58a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bka' las bzlog pa ma nus nas/ ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi
58a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpas de ltar 'khod par rig nas/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs
58b1(mdo sde): bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byed/ byang chub sems dpas lag pa gang du brkyang ba de logs su lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang lta bar gyur to// de ltar na lha de dag kyang bdag cag ni byang chub sems
58b2(mdo sde): dpa' dang dga' bar bya ba'i gtam byed do snyam ste/ lha'i bu de dag re re zhing yang 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag 'ba' shig la smra ste/ bdag 'ba' shig la dga' ba'i gtam byed do//
58b3(mdo sde): snyam mo// dge slong dag gang gi tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag 'dong bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang / byang chub sems dpas de dag gi sems kyi rtog
58b4(mdo sde): pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ de dag 'dong ba'i brda ston to// de ltar 'dong ba'i brda bstan nas phyir bskum pa byas te/ dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa
58b5(mdo sde): bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do/ / de'i tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas kyang 'dong par gnang ngo snyam du sems
58b6(mdo sde): shing / de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dong bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' yang dran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa 'jog
58b7(mdo sde): par gyur to/ / dge slong dag shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu kun nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong
59a1(mdo sde): mang po byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / chos yang dag par brjod par bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar gyur
59a2(mdo sde): to/ / de dag de ltar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas lus las 'od bkye ste/ 'od kyi bkod pa de dag seng ge'i khrir sprul nas/ de ltar sprul pa'i khri de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de
59a3(mdo sde): dngag 'khod du bcug ste/ de dag de ltar 'khod par shes nas 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid rgya cher rnam par dbye ba'i don du dris te brtags kyang skal ba mnyam pa'i lha rnams ma gtog
