59a4(mdo sde): par gzhan sus kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas nub mo mi nyal nas lus las 'od bkye ba'i rgyu ni de yin no// rkyen ni de yin no// dge slong dag lha mo
59a5(mdo sde): sgyu 'phrul gyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ lus lci bar ma tshor te/ gzhan du na yang ba dang / 'jam pa dang / bde bar tshor zhing lto mi bde ba'i sdug bsngal gang
59a6(mdo sde): yang myong bar ma gyur to/ / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ zhe sdang gis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ gti mug gis yongs su gdung bas kyang yongs su gdung bar ma gyur//
59a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'am/ gtse ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la yang rnam par rtog par ma gyur te/ grang ba 'am/ tsha ba 'am/ bkres pa
59b1(mdo sde): 'am/ skom pa 'am/ mun pa 'am/ rdul dang / ngal ba tshor ba 'am/ mthong bar ma gyur te/ de la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg yid du mi 'ong bar snang bar ma
59b2(mdo sde): gyur to/ / rmi lam ngan pa yang mthong bar ma gyur to// de la bud med kyi sgyu'am/ g.yo 'am phrag dog gam/ bud med kyi nyon mongs pa dag kyang nyams su gnod par byed par ma gyur
59b3(mdo sde): to/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ma ni/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te/ tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems
59b4(mdo sde): dpa'i ma yang skyes pa gang la yang 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar ma gyur la/ skyes pa gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i ma la 'dod chags kyi sems mi skye'o// ser skya'i grong khyer chen po
59b5(mdo sde): de yang yul gzhan dag na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo su gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 'byung pos non pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
59b6(mdo sde): kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma mthong ma dag tu sos shing dran pa thob par gyur to// mi ma yin pa de dag kyang myur du gnas gzhan du 'dong bar gyur to// sems can gang la la zhig nad
59b7(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur te/ rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa las byung ba'i nad kyis gnod par gyur pa dang / mig gi nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/
60a1(mdo sde): lce'i nad dam/ mchu'i nad dam/ so'i nang ngam/ lkog ma'i nad dam/ shu ba 'am/ 'bras sam/ mdze 'am/ sha bkra 'am/ skem pa 'am/ brjed byed dam/
60a2(mdo sde): rims sam/ lba ba 'am/ phol mig gam/ me dpal lam/ rkang shu la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i mas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa tsam
60a3(mdo sde): gyis nad dang bral bar gyur cing / rab rang gi gnas su 'dong bar gyur te/ tha na lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis rtswa nyag sa 'ga' zhigs las blangs te/ sems can nad pa dag la byin na yang de dag dablang
60a4(mdo sde): ma thag tu nad med cing nyams pa med par gyur to/ / gang gi tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul des bdag gi lha g.yas par blta ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me lo//
60a5(mdo sde): gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag pa la gdong gi dkyil 'khor snang ba bzhin te/ de ltar de mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// dge
60a6(mdo sde): slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rus na gnas pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par lha'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung zhing / lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur
60a7(mdo sde): char na dus bzhin du 'bab/ rlung ni rus bzhinas srang // dus dang skar ma dag kyang dus bzhin su 'gyur zhing 'phob gyur to// rgyal srid kyang ban zhing la legs la/ 'jug pa me na
60b1(mdo sde): med par gyur to/ / ser skya'i grong khyer chen po da na/ shAkya'i rigs dang / sems can gzhan dag 'khod pa thams cad kyang za zhing 'thung / dga' zhing rtse la dga' dgur spyod do// sbyin pa dag
60b2(mdo sde): kyang gtong / bsod nams dag kyang byed de/ zla ba bzhi 'das pa'i dus ston bzhin du thams cad kyang dga' ba'i mchog gis rtse zhing bde bar gnas pas gnas par gyur to// rgyal po zas
60b3(mdo sde): gtsang ma yang tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs te/ rgyal po'i las btang nas/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal yongs su dag par gnas pa bzhin du/ thams cad kyang dga' ba'i mchog gis chos
60b4(mdo sde): kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur to/ / dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa ni rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan pas gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe
60b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas
60b6(mdo sde): pa'i tshe/ gnas gnas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lakra so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong la g+sa so// de bzhin gshegs pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 'jig
60b7(mdo sde): rten skyong ba bzhi dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / mi gzhan dag kyang bstan te mthong nas/ de dag tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes so// mi mjed
61a1(mdo sde): kyi bdag po tshangs pas de'i phyir yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mchod par byed pa'i phyir bteg ste/ khyer nas bzhag par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang
61a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag la bka' stsal/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pas/ lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas par gyur to//
61a3(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang tshe rgyal sras sems can dam pa ma yi rum gnas pa// de tshe sa 'di tshal dang bcas par rnam pa drug tu g.yos// gser mdog 'od bkye ngan song thams cad rnam
61a4(mdo sde): par sbyangs par gyur/ / chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes lha yi tshogs rnams rab tu dga'// gzhal med khang chen dbyibs legs rin chen du mas rnam par spras// der ni dpa' bo rnam par
61a5(mdo sde): 'dren pa bzhugs par gyur nas 'dug/ tsan dan dri zhimachog gis rab tu gang zhing rnam par mdzes// stong gsum rin chen yongs su bkang ba de yi srang phyad rin mi chog/ stong chen 'jig rten
61a6(mdo sde): khams kyang 'og nas brtol ba byas nas ni/ / yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas kyi pad+ma'i snying khu'i thig pa byung // de ni zhag bdun bsod nams gzi brjid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'phags// de las
61a7(mdo sde): snying khu'i thigs blangs tshangs pa rgyal ba'i sras la 'bul/ / byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo tshangs pa 'dra ba ma gtogs par// sems can gang gis de zos 'jur 'gyur sems can ris
61b1(mdo sde): na med/ / bskal pa du ma'i bsod nams gzi brjid snying khu'i thigs gnas pa// de zos lus dang sems dang shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur// 'dren pa mchod phyir brgya byin tshangs pa
61b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ / byang chub sems dpa'i drung du rtag par dus gsum rgyun tu 'ong // phyag byas mchod byas chos kyi dam pa de dag thos gyur nas// bskor ba byas te kun kyang gang
61b3(mdo sde): nas 'ongs pa'i gnas su 'dong / / 'jig rten khams rnams kun nas chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' 'ong // 'od bkod khrir gyur rnams la de dag gnas par phan tshun snang // mchog tu bya/
61b4(mdo sde): ba'i theg pa dam pa'i chos ni thos gyur nas// kun kyang dga' ba'i sems 'gyur bstod pa'i phreng ba brjod cing 'dong // bud med byis pa gang dag sdug bsngal ldan par gyur pa dang // 'byung pos
61b5(mdo sde): non dang sems 'khrugs gos med rdul gyis yog pa rnams/ / de kun lha mo sgyu 'phrul mthong nas sems ni rnyed gyur te// blo gros rtog dran dang ldan zhing so so'i khyim khyim 'dong // rlung dang bad kan
61b6(mdo sde): mkhris pa'i nad dang 'dus pa'i nad thebs dang / / mig nad rna nad dag gis lus sems mi bder gyur pa dag/ rnam mang tha dad nad kyi rnam pas gang dag gnod gyur pa// de dag sgyu 'phrul lag pa
61b7(mdo sde): mgo la bzhag pas nad med gyur/ / yang na rtswa yi nyag ma 'ga' zhig sa las blangs byas te// sgyu 'phrul nad pa byin na thams cad rims nad med par gyur// bde ba thob cing da rod ma nyams
62a1(mdo sde): so so'i khyim du 'dong / / de ni sman gyur sman pa'i rgyal po rum na 'dug phyir ro// gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul bdag gi lus la brtag byas pa// de tshe byang chub sems dpa'/
62a2(mdo sde): rum na 'dug pa mthong ba ni ji ltar bar snang gnas kyis zla ba skar mas bskor gnas pa// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan pa snang // de la 'dod chags zhe sdang gti
62a3(mdo sde): mug gnod par 'gyur ba med/ / de la 'dod pa de med de la phrag dog 'tshe ba med// dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems dang dga' dang yid bder gnas// de la bkres dang skom dang tsha dang
62a4(mdo sde): grang ba'i gnod pa med/ / lha yi rol mo sil snyan dbyangs sgra ma byas rtag tu 'byung // lha yi spos dri me tog dam pa mchog mdzes char yang 'bab// lha dang mi rnams de la lta zhing lha mi thams
62a5(mdo sde): cad kyang / / de dag phan tshun gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba gang yang med// sems can dga' bder rtse zhing zas dang skom gyi sbyin pa byed// dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs de dag dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid
62a6(mdo sde): dang ldan/ / rgyal po'i srid bde 'khrug pa med cing char pa dus bzhin 'bab// rtswa dang sman dang me tog rnams kyang de yi dus su skye// rgyal po'i khab tu zhag bdun rin chen char pa bab gyur pas
62a7(mdo sde): sems can dbul po de las len cing sbyin byed bde bar spyod/ / sems can dbul zhing sdug bsngal gyur pa de tshe gang yang med// ri rab zom gyi dga' tshal sems can bzhin du dga'
62b1(mdo sde): dang ldan/ / shAkya'i rgyal po de yang gso sbyong rab la nyer gnas shing // de ni rgyal po'i bya ba mi byed chos la rtag par spyod// de ni dka' thug nags tshal song nas lha mo sgyu 'phel la/
62b2(mdo sde): sems can mchog srel khyod kyi lus la bde ba ci 'dra rmed// lhums su 'jug pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // dge slong dag de ltar zla ba bcu 'das te/ byang chub
62b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' btsa' ba'i dus la bab pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i bskyed mos tshal du snga ltas sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo // sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ me tog thams cad kha 'bus
62b4(mdo sde): nas rgyas par gyur pa dang / rdzing dag na me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po yod pa dag kyang kha 'bus nas rgyas par gyur pa dang / me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing
62b5(mdo sde): ljon pa gsar pa dag kyang sa las 'thon te/ kha 'bus nas rgyas par gyur pa dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad byung ba dang / gter chen po nyi khri 'bus te byung nas gnas par snang ba dang /
62b6(mdo sde): khyim gyi nang du yang rin po che'i myu gu 'thon pa dang / spos chu'i dpa' dpal gyi wa 'bru mar dri zhim pos sbags pa rnams kyang zag par gyur pa dang / gangs kyi ri'i ngogs las seng ge'i
62b7(mdo sde): phrug gu dag 'ongs te/ dga' bar rtse zhing ser skya'i grong khyer dam pa la bskor ba byas nas/ sgo na gnas par gyur kyang / sems can gang la yang 'tshe ba med par gyur pa dang / glang po'i
63a1(mdo sde): phrug gu thal kar lnga brgya lhags te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rkang pa la sna'i rtse mos nyug cing gnas par gyur pa dang / lha'i byis pa rogs pa ska rags bcings/
63a2(mdo sde): pa dag kyang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi pang pa nas pad pa dag tu 'gre ldog par snang bar gyur pa dang / klu'i bu mo mchod pa sna tshogs kyi yo byad thogs pa dag kyang lus
63a3(mdo sde): phyed phyung zhing nam mkha' la rgyu bar snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo khri yang rma bya'i mdongs lag na thogs shing nam mkha' la 'khod par snang ba dang / bum pa gang ba khri yang ser skya'i gnas kyi
63a4(mdo sde): grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byed par snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo khri yang spos chu'i ril ba bying gar glad la thogs shing 'khod par snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo khri yang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
63a5(mdo sde): ba dan thogs shing 'khod par snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo brgya stong mang po dag kyang dung dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / kha ra rnga mgul nas dpyangs te/ sdod cing 'khod par snang ba dang / rlung
63a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang mi ldang bar gnas par gyur pa dang / chu klung dang chu bran thams cad kyang mi mgul zhing mi 'bab par gyur pa dang / nyi zla dang / gzhal med khang dang / rgyu skar dang / skar
63a7(mdo sde): ma'i tshogs rnams kyang mi rgyu bar gyur pa dang / skar ma rgyal dang yang ldan par gyur pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim yang rin po che'i dra bas yog par gyur pa dang / me yang mi
63b1(mdo sde): 'bar bar gyur pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs dang / yang thog dang / rta babs dag la'ang nor bu dang / rin po che dag 'phyang bar snang bar gyur pa dang / ras bcos bu'i mdzod
63b2(mdo sde): dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi mdzod rnams kyang sgo 'byed par snang ba dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rgod dang / spyang ki dang / wa'i sgra dag kyang med par gyur pa dang / sgra skad snyan pa'i
63b3(mdo sde): sgra dag kyang 'byung bar gyur pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyi las kyi mtha'ang rgyun chad par gyur pa dang / sa'i phyogs mthon dman du 'dug pa rnams kyang mnyam par gnas par gyur pa dang / lam gyi
63b4(mdo sde): gzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / srang dang / tshong dus kyi 'khor kyang lag mthil ltar gzhi mnyam zhing 'jam la/ me tog sil mas gang ste mdzes par snang ba dang / sbrum ma thams cad kyang bde
63b5(mdo sde): ba dang / legs par btsa' bar gyur pa dang / shing sA la'i nags tshal gyi lha thams cad kyang shing gi lo ma'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste phyag 'tshal zhing / gnas par snang ba ste/ snga ltas sum
63b6(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis po de dag byung bar gyur to/ / de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi gzi brjid dang / mthus kyang byang chub sems dpa' btsa' ba'i dus la bab par
63b7(mdo sde): shes te/ nam gyi srong la rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du 'ongs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa// bdag gi bsam pa gang lags gsol gyis lha ni gsan du gsol// yun ring ring po
64a1(mdo sde): 'das nas bskyed mos tshal gyi blo skyes te/ gal te khyod mi bkyon cing zhe sdang phrag dog mi mnga' na// bdag gi rtse sa skyed mos tshal du mchi bar bgyi// chos dgongs
64a2(mdo sde): brtson pa dka' thub spyod pas khyod kyang skyo mkhyen grang / / bdag kyang sems can dag pa srel nas yun ni ring lags na// sA la'i shing ljon sdong po mchog kyang me tog la 'bus te// skyed mos
64a3(mdo sde): tshal gyi dog sar da ni mchi ba'i rigs so lha/ / sos ka'i dus mchog bud med rnams kyi rgyan du 'gyur lags te// nags rgya khu byug dang ni rma bya sgra rab snyan pa 'byin// gtsang zhing mdzes la sna
64a4(mdo sde): tshogs me tog rdul gyi ngad kyang ldang / / da ni mchin ma thogs legs par bka' lung stsal du gsol// rgyal po'i dbang pos lha mo las ni de skad tshig thos nas// dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i
64a5(mdo sde): sems kyis 'khor la spras pa ni/ / bzhon pa bzhon chen 'gyogs pa'i shugs ldan dag kyang bstad par gyis// yon tan phun sum tshogs ldan lum bi ni tshal brgyan par gyis// ri sngong
64a6(mdo sde): mdog ldan sprin gyi kha dog mthun par gyur pa yi/ / glang po stong phrag nyi shu snyed cig myur du bstad par gyis// glang po'i dbang po mche ba drug ldan dril mdzes glo las brgyas// gser dang nor bus
64a7(mdo sde): rnam par sbas shing gser gyi dra bas spud/ / rgyal po'i bcibs pa rlung ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa ste// dngul dang kha ba'i mdog 'dra rnga rngog ljang lo bzang 'khril ba'i// rta mchog
64b1(mdo sde): stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du stod gyis te/ / gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba glo nas dbyang ba gyis// skyes bu rtul phod g.yul la mos shing 'thab 'dod dpa' bo dag/ mda' gzhu
64b2(mdo sde): ral gri mdung thung zhags pa mtshon cha rnon thogs pa/ / stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du chos te bshams gyis la// sgyu 'phrul 'khor dang bcas pa bag yod par ni bsrung bar gyis// lum
64b3(mdo sde): bi ni der gser dang nor bu'i rgyan khrom brgyan par gyis/ / gos dmar rnam pa mang pos shing rnams thams cad brgyan par gyis// lha yi dga' tshal bzhin du me tog sna tshogs chal par khrom/
64b4(mdo sde): de ltar thams cad bshams zin myur du nga la sbran par gyis// 'khor rnams kyis ni de skad tshig thos skad cig tu// bzhon pa kun bshams de bzhin lum bi ni yang brgyan byas te// rgyal gyur
64b5(mdo sde): rgyal gyur sku tshe ring skyongs rgyal po gshegs su gsol/ / ji skad bka' stsal de bzhin kun gyis dus bab lha gzigs shig/ mi yi bdag po dam pa de yang dga' ba'i sems gyur nas// khyim
64b6(mdo sde): gyi dam par zhugs te bud med rnams la 'di skad smras/ / gang zhig nga la snying nye la dga' bar 'dod pa dag/ nga yi bka' bzhin gyis te bdag gi lus kun brgyan par gyis// spos mchog
64b7(mdo sde): dad kyi dri zhim kha dog sna tshogs sdug pa'i gos/ / 'jam zhing yid 'ong dga' ba'i sems kyis legs par bgo ba gyis// brang na 'phyang ba'i mu tig se mo do yis brgyan par gyis// rgyan gyi
65a1(mdo sde): khyad par thams cad der ring kun gyis bstan par gyis/ / khar rnga rgyud gcig gling bu pi wang rdza rnga dum dum pheg/ sil snyan yid du 'ong ba brgya stong dag kyang bshams par/
65a2(mdo sde): gyis sgra snyan thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba skye 'gyur zhing // lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin dga' bar 'gyur ba khyed kyis kyis// shing rta'i mchog 'dir lha mo sgyu 'phrul gcig pu
65a3(mdo sde): 'dug par gyis/ / bud med skyes pa gzhan dag su yang shing rta der ma 'khod// na chung sna tshogs go can rnams kyis shing rta de drongs te// gang du'ang yid du mi 'ong mi mthun sgra rnams
65a4(mdo sde): mi grag gis/ / lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim nas byung ste sgo drung phyin pa'i tshe// rta dang glang po shing rta rkang thang dpal ldan sna tshogs dpung // rgyal po'i sgo drung lhags tshe sgra chen mang po grag par
65a5(mdo sde): gyur/ / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa'i sgra ltar de dag yongs su grags// de tshe bkra shis don du dril bu brgya stong dkrol ba byas// shing rta de yang de ltar rgyal pos sna tshogs brgyan pa la// lha
65a6(mdo sde): rnams stong gis lha yi khri yang legs par bshams pa byas/ / rin chen shing ljon me tog lo ma ldan gzhi ldan par byas// rma bya khrung khrung ngang ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin// gdugs dang
65a7(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan ba dan che phra kun nas 'khor bar bsgreng / / lha yi gos dang dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mchog gis bkab// lha yi bu mo nam mkha' las ni shing rta de la lta// lha yi sgra dbyangs snyan pa
65b1(mdo sde): sgrog cing bstod pa'i tshig brjod de/ / gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul seng ge'i khri la 'dug gyur pa// de tshe stong gsum sa 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos// lha rnams gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin cing
65b2(mdo sde): me tog sna tshogs 'thor/ / de ring lum bi ni 'dir 'gro ba'i dam pa bltams gyur te// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi ni shing rta'i mchog de 'dren par byed// sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po dbang po'ang lam
65b3(mdo sde): gyi byi dor byed/ / tshangs pa skye bo mi srun sel cing sngon du 'gro bar gyur// lha rnams brgya phrag stong yang thal mo sbyar bas phyag 'tshal 'dud// rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bkod
65b4(mdo sde): pa de la lta/ / de ni 'di snyam 'di ni lha yi lha zhig yin snyam byed// gang la skyong ba bzhi dang tshangs pa'i dbang por bcas pa'i lha// mchod pa rgya chen byed pa 'di ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur//
65b5(mdo sde): srid pa gsum na lha klu brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong // gang yang mchod pa 'di 'dra bzod pa'i sems can de med de// yang na mgo 'gas yang na de dag srog dang bral bar 'gyur//
65b6(mdo sde): 'di ni lha yi dam pa yin pas mchod pa thams cad bzod// dge slong dag de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rta'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni kun
65b7(mdo sde): nas bskor/ glang po che'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang rkang thang dpa' zhing rtul phod pa yan lag dam pa dang ldan pa/ go cha legs par bgos par sra
66a1(mdo sde): ba'i go gyon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni yongs su bsrungs/ shAkya'i bu mo stong phrag drug khris ni mdun du ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i phu nu'i rigs su skyes
66a2(mdo sde): pa'i shAkya'i rgan pa dang / gzhon pa dang / bar ma bzhi khri ni yongs su bsrungs/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras/ glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra byed/ khar ba'i sil khrol dang pheg rdog
66a3(mdo sde): sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len pa drug khris ni kun nas bskor/ lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / klu'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / dri za'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / mi 'am ci'i
66a4(mdo sde): bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa sha stag glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs kyis bsngags pa brjod pa
66a5(mdo sde): rjes su 'brang bas 'gro'o/ / lum bi ni'i nags tshal thams cad kyang spos chu'i chag chag gis btab cing / lha'i me tog gis gtor bar gyur to// nags tshal dam pa de'i nang na/ shing
66a6(mdo sde): ljon pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang dus la ma bab par lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu skyes par gyur to// nags tshal de ni lha rnams kyis kyang legs par brgyan par gyur
66a7(mdo sde): te'adi lta ste dper na/ 'dres pa'i tshal lha rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa bzhin no// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lum bi ni'i nags tshal du phyin nas shing rta dam pa de las bkra
66b1(mdo sde): te/ mi dang lha'i bu mo dag gis yongs su bskor cing / shing drung nas ni shing drung dag tu 'gro// nags tshal nas ni nags tshal dag tu 'chag/ ljon pa nas ni ljon pa dag la lta zhing // de rim
66b2(mdo sde): gyis shing rin po che chen po mchog dang phul du bya ba/ yal gshin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ lo ma dang / dog pa bzang po dang ldan pa/ mi dang lha'i me tog sna tshogs rab tu rgyas pa/ spos mchog
66b3(mdo sde): dang / phul du bya ba'i dri'i ngad dang ldan pa'i gos kha dog sna tshogs dpyangs pa/ nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs lta bu'i 'od rnam pa tha dad pa 'bar ba/ rtswa ba dang / sdong po dang / yal ga dang /
66b4(mdo sde): lo ma rnams rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa/ yal ga ring zhing shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ p+lag sha zhes bya ba sa'i phyogs lag mthil ltar mnyam zhing shin tu bzad la yangs pa/
66b5(mdo sde): rtswa sngon po rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu skyes pa/ ka tsa li nI'i gos ltar reg na bde ba'i sa la 'dug pa sngon gyis rgyal ba'i yum gyis brten pa/ lha'i glu dbyangs blangs pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha bzang zhing dri ma
66b6(mdo sde): med la rnam par dag pa rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi thor tshugs dang / cod pan mngon par gtud pa'i spyi bos mngon par phyag bya ba'i shing ljon pa blag sha de'i drung du phyin to//
66b7(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid dang mthus/ shing blag sha des mngon par gtud de phyag byas so// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul nam mkha'i dkyil du snang ba'i glog gis phreng ba lta bu'i lag pa
67a1(mdo sde): g.yas pa brkyang nas/ p+lag sha'i yal ga las bzung ste/ tshul du shis par nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas nas/ bya chungs skyes byed cing 'dug par gyur to//
67a2(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i nang nas lha'i bu mo drug khri lhags te/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul la rim gro dang / bkur sti byed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ rnam
67a3(mdo sde): pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par gnas so/ / de zla ba bcu tshang nas ma'i glo g.yas pa nas dran zhim shes bzhin du mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par byung ste/ gzhan ltar ma yin zhing gzhan
67a4(mdo sde): dag la mngal gyi dri ma zhes bya ba brjod pa de lta bu med par gyur to/ / dge slong dag de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa gnyis mdun na 'khod de/ de
67a5(mdo sde): gnyis kyis rim gro dam pa chen pos lha'i gos ka shi ba'i sle ba mos lus dang yan lag thams cad kyis dran zhin shes bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blangs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' khang
67a6(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa gang gi nang na 'dug cing / ma'i rum na gnas gnas pa de yang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gyen du bteg ste/
67a7(mdo sde): mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khyer ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni mir gyur pa gang gis kyang ma blangs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha rnams kyis blangs so//
67b1(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu sa la 'bab ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de sa la babs par gyur ma thag tu/ pad+ma chen po zhig gis sa 'di yang brtol te 'byung ngo // klu'i rgyal
67b2(mdo sde): dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo gnyis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na lus phyed phyung ste 'khod nas bsil ba dang / dro ba'i chu'i rgyun gnyis mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus bkrus so//
67b3(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa gzhan yang lha'i bu brgya stong mang po dag byang chub sems dpab btsas ma thag tu spos chu sna tshogs dang / me tog sil mas lus 'dra
67b4(mdo sde): zhing mngon par 'thor ro/ / bar snang las kyang rdul yab kyi rnga ma gnyis dang / rin po che'i gdugs byung bar gyur to// de pad+ma chen po de la 'dug nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta ste/ seng ge'i lnga
67b5(mdo sde): stangs dang / skyes bu chen po'i lta stangs kyis rnam par lta'o// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba lnga'i mig thogs pa med pas stong gsum gyi stong
67b6(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dang / ldengs su bcas/ yul du bcas lngar bcas pa rnas mthong bar b+ha
67b7(mdo sde): sems cang thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang sems can gang tshul khrims sam/ ting nge 'dzin tam/ shes rab bam/ dge ba'i sdod pas bdag da
68a1(mdo sde): de lta bu gang la la zhig yod dam zhes rnam par lta'o/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bdag dang mtshungs pa'i sem
68a2(mdo sde): can gang yang ma mthong nas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing bag tsha ba med de/ zhum pa dang / bag 'chums pa med pas legs par bsams pa dran par byas
68a3(mdo sde): te/ bsam pa brtags nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes par byas te/ sus kyang brtan pa med par byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar
68a4(mdo sde): bya'o zhes/ shar phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba de dang de dag tu pad+ma dag kyang skyes par gyur to// lha dang mi rnams kyi sbyin
68a5(mdo sde): pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes lho phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro/ / nub phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor nas gom pa bdun pa la gnas te/ nga ni 'jig rten na phul du phyin pa'o//
68a6(mdo sde): 'di ni nga'i skye ba tha ma ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung ngo zhes seng ge ltar tshim par gyur pa'i sgra sbags so// sems can thams cad kyi nang na bla na med par bya'o/
68a7(mdo sde): zhes/ byang phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro// bdud dang bdud kyi sde ni gzhom par bya'o// sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me bsad pa'i phyir chos kyi char sprin
68b1(mdo sde): chen po'i char phab ste/ de dag bde bas tshim par bya'o zhes 'og gis phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro// sems can thams cad kyis gyem du blta bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes steng gi phyogs
68b2(mdo sde): logs su gom pa bdun bor nas steng du lta'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' tshig de brjod ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sgras mngon par go/
68b3(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid do// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa btsa' bar 'gyur ba dang
68b4(mdo sde): gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa de'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi rnam pa de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo // dge slong dag de'i tshe sems
68b5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyang rab tu dga' zhing spu g.yos par gyur to/ / 'jig rten du sa g.yo ba chen po shin tu 'jigs shing spu g.yo bar 'gyur ba yang byung bar gyur to// mi dang lha'i sil snyan dang
68b6(mdo sde): rol mo'i dbyangs sgras bya ba thams cad kyang ma blangs par sgra byin par gyur to/ / de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dus dang / dus mtshams so so'i
68b7(mdo sde): shing thams cad kyang me tog rgyas shing 'bras bu chags pa dang / rnam par dag par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil nas kyang sprin gyi sgra grags te/ sprin med pa'i nam mkha' las kyang
69a1(mdo sde): dal bu dal bus phra ba phra ba'i char lha yul ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / spos kyi phye ma dang 'dres pa bab par gyur to// rlung reg na mchog tu/
69a2(mdo sde): bde ba 'jam pa/ dri zhim po dag kyang ldang par gyur to// phyogs thams cad kyang mun pa dang / rdul dang / du ba dang / khug rna med cing rab tu dang bas rnam par mdzes par gyur to//
69a3(mdo sde): steng gi bar snang las kyang tshangs pa'i sgra chen po snyan cing zab pa grags par gyur to// nyi zla dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od thams cad kyang zil gyis
69a4(mdo sde): mnan te/ 'od kha dog brgya stong dang ldan pa/ reg na mchog tu bde ba/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sems la bde ba skye dag 'jig rten las 'das pas stong gsum gyi stong chen
69a5(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyang bde bas shin tu tshim par gyur te/ 'dod chags
69a6(mdo sde): dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / dregs pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / zhum pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / chags pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna thams cad dang bral zhing mi dge
69a7(mdo sde): ba'i bya ba thams cad spangs par gyur to/ / sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad kyang zhi bar gyur to// bkres shing skom pa'i sems can rnams kyang bkres pa dang skom pa med par gyur to//
69b1(mdo sde): chang gis ra ro zhing myos pa rnams kyang myos pa med par gyur to// smos pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to// mig med pa rnams kyis kyang mig thob par gyur to// rna ba 'on pa
69b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang sgra thos par gyur to/ / yan lag dang nying lag nyams pa rnams kyang dbang po nyams pa med par gar te// dbul po rnams kyis kyang nor thob par gyur to// btson ra na
69b3(mdo sde): 'khod pa rnams kyang btson ra nas thar bar gyur to/ / mnar med pa la sogs pa'i sems ca dpral rams cad kyi nang du bya ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad de'i tshe rgyun
69b4(mdo sde): chad par gyur to/ / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba la sogs pa'i sag pas // gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams bkres pa dang
69b5(mdo sde): skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur to/ / gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bskol pa sasnying grangs med par spyad pa shin tu spyad pa/ brtson 'grus chen po dang
69b6(mdo sde): ldan pa mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor ba'i tshe/ chos nyid thob pas de'i pags ba cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
69b7(mdo sde): rnams sa'i phyogs de/ de'i tshe zhig par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob par mdage slong dag de tsam du stobs kyi shugs drag po dang ldan par byang chub
70a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar gyur to// de'i tshe glu'i
70a2(mdo sde): sgra chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ / gar gyi sgra chen po yang byung bar gyur to// de'i tshe me tog dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che dang / rgyan dang / gos kyi sprin dpag tu med pa
70a3(mdo sde): dag kyang char du mngon par bab par gyur to/ / sems can thams cad kyang bde ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ mdor na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags
70a4(mdo sde): ba 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe/ bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus
70a5(mdo sde): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
70a6(mdo sde): pa ni sems can thams cad las ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur na/ da bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
70a7(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ni lan bzhi 'am/ lan lngar yang / lan bcur yang / lan lnga bcu'i bar du yang / lan brgya'i bar du yang
70b1(mdo sde): lan brgya stong du ma'i bar du yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka'
70b2(mdo sde): stsal to/ / kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ dge slong la la lus ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma bsgoms pa khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa/ byis pa mi mkhas
70b3(mdo sde): pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal can/ rgod pa/ khengs pa/ ma bsdams pa sems g.yengs pangos mang ba/ dad pa med pa/ dge sbyong gi dri mar gyur pa/ dge sbyong
70b4(mdo sde): gi tshul dang mi 'dra ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rum du 'gro ba yongs su dag pa 'di lta bu yid mi ches shing de dag phyogs gcig tu tshogs nas/ gcig la
70b5(mdo sde): g cig 'di skad du kye khyed cag 'di lta bu'i mi rigs pa la ltes pang rlab sems da pa'i khu shugs dang 'dres pa la yang 'di lta bu'i longs spyod yod ces
70b6(mdo sde): bya ba dang / de 'byung ba'i tshe ma'i glo g.yas pa nas yangal gyi dri mas ma gos par byung la bya gyung zhes zer bar 'gyur te/ skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sems can
70b7(mdo sde): l egs par byas pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus mi gtsang ba'i khu ba'i nang de mi 'gyuzhes dge slong dag sems can dam pa de lta bu dag gi mngal du 'gro
71a1(mdo sde): ba dang / mngal na gnas pa ni shin tu yang bzang ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la snying brtse bas mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ lhar gyur
71a2(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis chos kyi 'khor lo mi skor ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo sems can rnams zhum par 'gyur zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
71a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ni lhar gyur pa yin gyis/ bdag cag ni mi tsam du zad pas na/ bdag cag gis gnas de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par byas par mi nus so zhes zhum par gyur tu
71a4(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i phyir te/ skyes bu glen pa chos kyi rkun por gyur pa de dag 'di snyam du sems can de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de ni bdag cag gis tshod bzung bar bya ba ma yin no snyam du mi
71a5(mdo sde): sems so/ / kun dga' bo de dag ni de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul la yang yid mi ches par 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshe
71a6(mdo sde): 'phrul lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/ kun dga' bo do ltar skyes bu glen pa/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pas zil gyis non pa mi gtsang bar bying ba/ rim gro'i zil gyis
71a7(mdo sde): non pa ma rabs kyi ngang tshul can de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos spong zhing bsod nams ma yin pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba mang po ji snyed cig mngon par 'du byed pa la ltos/ / /
71b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ dam po lnga pal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma byung ba'i dus na/ 'di lta bu'i mdo snga
71b2(mdo sde): bzang po la yang spong zhing mi snyan par brjod pa de lta bu'i dge slong dag kyang 'byung ba lags pa bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de dag ni mdo sde 'di lta bu spong zhing mi
71b3(mdo sde): snyan par brjod par yang mi zad de sdig pa rnam pa du ma bangom par 'du bya ba mngon par du mi gnyer ba dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa
71b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bo na skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de 'dra ba de dag gi 'gro ba ni ci 'dra ba ga tu mas ni ji lta bu zhig tu mchi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
71b5(mdo sde): de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub med par byas te/ 'das pa dang / ma byom ldang 'das rnams la mi snyan pas skur pa btab pa'i 'gro ba gang yin
71b6(mdo sde): pa'i 'gro ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kur das khe sprubal lo zhes brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
71b7(mdo sde): to/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi spyod pa 'angadi dag thos ras bdag ni brgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de dag
72a1(mdo sde): gi spyod pa ni mnyam par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag ni mi mnyam pa'i spyod pa can du 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de dag tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i spyod pa des/ mnar men/
72a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig/ mdo sde 'di la
72a3(mdo sde): bu 'di dag thos nas ma mos shing / yid mi ches pa dang / spong ba de dag ni shi 'phos ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin
72a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa la ni tshad du ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad med cing zab la rgya che zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o// kun dga' bo la la zhig mdo sde
72a5(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyes pa'i sems can de dag gis thob pa de ni legs par thob pa yin te/ de dag gi 'tsho ba ni don yod pa'o//
72a6(mdo sde): de dag gi mi'i dngos po ni don yod pa'o// de dag gi spyod pa ni legs par spyad pa'o// de dag gis ni snying po blangs so// de dag ni ngan song gsum las grol ba'o// de dag ni
72a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su 'gyur ro/ / de dag gis ni dgos pa thams cad yongs su thob bo// de dag gis ni dad pa thob pa ni don yod do// de dag gis ni yul 'khor gyi zas
72b1(mdo sde): legs pa zos so/ / de dag ni sems can dam pa rnams la legs par mos pa yin no// de dag ri bdud rtse zhags pa gtubs pa yin no// de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa
72b2(mdo sde): las rgal to/ / de dag gis ni mya ngan gyi zu de dag gis ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po rjes su 'thob bo// de dag gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba legs par blangs so//
72b3(mdo sde): dag ni sbyin pa'i gnas yin te/ mchod pa 'os pa'o// de dag ni 'jig rten du 'brang bar dkon pa'o// de dag ni 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su bzung ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
72b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams na dang rnam dga' ba sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba don dang ldan pa ma yin te/
72b5(mdo sde): kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni nga dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig yid du 'grogs par gyur pa'i grogs po yin no// daci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo la la ni thos pa tsam gyis dga' zhing yid du
72b6(mdo sde): 'ong ba yod kyi/ mthong na ma yin no// kun dga' bo la la mi mthong bas dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod kyi/ thos pas ni ma yin no// kun dga' bo la la ni mthong na yang dga' zhing yid du 'ong la/
72b7(mdo sde): thos nas yang dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod do// kun dga' bo gang yang rung ste/ la 'a zhig mthong ngar thos nas dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar gar na/ khyod kyis de la 'di ltar de dag ni nga dang
73a1(mdo sde): tshe rabs 'ga' zhig tu 'grogs pa'i grags po yin par nges par rtogs par bya ba ste/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so// de dag ni de bzhin gshe/
73a2(mdo sde): pas dgrol bar bya'o// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / yon tan gyi cha mnyam pa'o// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ba'o// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas
73a3(mdo sde): bzung ba'o/ / kun dga' bo nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nyid kyi tshe yang sems can su yang rung ste/ 'jigs pas nyam thag cing 'ongs nas/ mi 'jigs pa slong na sems
73a4(mdo sde): can de dag la dngas mi 'jigs pa byin par gyur na/ da bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo dad pa la
73a5(mdo sde): brtson par gyis shig/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bcol ba'o// kun dga' bo khyod kyi bya ba ci yod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byas so// nga rgyal gyi zug rngu ni de bzhin gshegs
73a6(mdo sde): pas bsal to/ / kun dga' bo grogs po'i gtam thos pa tsam gyis kyang dpag tshad brgya'i lam du yang 'gro ste/ thos pas kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba yin na/ sngar ma mthong ba las mdza' bo mthong
73a7(mdo sde): bar gyur na spos kyang ci dgos te/ gang nga la rten cing dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa de dag ni ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhye//
73b1(mdo sde): cing / sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mdza' bo ste/ de dag ni bdag cag gi yang mdza' bo yin no snyam du dgongs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang yin pa
73b2(mdo sde): de mdza' bo la sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no/ / mdza' bo de'i gang sdug pa'i grogs po de yang de la sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no// kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod mos par bya zhing khong du chud par byas
73b3(mdo sde): dad pa tsam yang bskyed par gyis shig/ ngas ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang gtad de/ de dag kyang 'di dag ni bdag cag gi yang
73b4(mdo sde): mdza' bo yin no zhes bya bar mkhyen cing / bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig la bu dag nyan cing / mthun par 'dzin pa gcig pu
73b5(mdo sde): zhig bdog par gyur la/ skyes bu de yang mdza' bo mang ba zhig yin na/ pha de shi zin kyang pha'i mdza' bos yongs su bzung ba'i bu de ni phongs par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin du gang
73b6(mdo sde): su yang rung ste/ nga la dad na de dag ngas bzung ba yin te/ de dag ni nga'i mdza' bo'o// de dag ni nga la skyabs su dong ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mdza' bo mang po mnga' ba ste/ de bzhin
73b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mdza' bo de dag kyang yang dag par gsung zhing brdzun du mi gsung bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdza' bo de dag kyang / yang dag par gsung ba ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
74a1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la de dag rjes su gtad kyis/ kun dga' bo dad pa la brtson par gyis shig/ 'di ni ngas khyod la btsal/
74a2(mdo sde): ba'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas shing / lha mo sgyu 'phrul la lha'i ma
74a3(mdo sde): tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan gyis mngon par 'thor bar gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge ba dri med rnam dag gser gyi 'od ldan nyi ma'i'od
74a4(mdo sde): ldan pa/ / lha yi bu mo sgra dbyangs snyan brjod stong phrag drug cu de yi tshe// skad cig de la lum bi ni lha mo sgyu 'phrul de la smra/ mi dgyes ma mdzad rab tu dgyes mdzad bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rjed
74a5(mdo sde): lags/ / bdag cag rnams kyis bgyi ba ci mchis ci bgyi ci 'tshal bka' stsol cig/ bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rjed nus ldan nye ba'i sems dang ldan pa lags// khyod kyis dgyes shing bde ba'i
74a6(mdo sde): nyams bskyed mi dgyes thams cad spang bar gsol/ / rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa de ring lha mo myur skyed 'gyur// ji ltar zhugs shing 'di rnams kha 'bus sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing /
74a7(mdo sde): stong phrag bgrangs pa'i lha rnams drung na gnas shing lag pa 'dud pa dang // ji ltar dog sa rgya mtshor bcas te rnam pa drug tu g.yos lags na// khyod las lha yul mi yul sgra grags 'jig
74b1(mdo sde): rten 'das pa'i sras bltam 'gyur/ / ji ltar rnam dag 'od kyis rnam par mdzes shing gser gyi kha dog bzang // nam mkha'i dkyil las yid 'ong sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol sgra 'byin dang
74b2(mdo sde): ji ltar dag cing gtsang la 'dod chags bral ba'i lha rnams brgya stong yang / / dga' sems phyag 'tshal ba las de ring 'jig rten kun phan bltam par 'gyur// brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten
74b3(mdo sde): skyong dang de bzhin lha rnams gzhan dag kyang / / dga' zhing brod pa'i sems kyis drung du gnas nas lag pa 'dud pa bgyid// skyes bu seng ge brtul zhugs grub pa de yang brtsib logs g.yas
74b4(mdo sde): nas byung / / gser gyi ri dang 'dra zhing dag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i 'dren pa bltams// brgya byin tshangs pa gnyis kyis lag pa dar te thub pa de yang blangs// zhing rnams brgya stong 'od bzang
74b5(mdo sde): bkye bas thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur/ / ngan song gsum gyi sems can rnams kyang bde zhing sdug bsngal med gyur te// lha rnams brgya phrag stong gis me tog gtor te gos kyi
74b6(mdo sde): g.yab mo phyung / / de tshe sa 'di stobs mthu ldan zhing rdo rje'i dngos gnas pad+ma mdzes// sna tshogs mngon mthon dge la 'dren pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ris zhabs bzhag ste// gom pa bdun
74b7(mdo sde): du bzhud nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dam pa gsungs pa ni/ / rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa sems can mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i mchog dang brgya byin lha mchog nam mkha'i
75a1(mdo sde): dkyil na 'khod gyur te/ / gtsang zhing dang la mdzes pa'i spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku yang bsil// klu yi rgyal gnyis bar snang gnas nas grang dro'i chu yi rgyun
75a2(mdo sde): kyang gtong / / lha rnams brgya stong dag kyang spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku bsil byed// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang rim gro dam par lag pa bzang pos len// stong gsum 'di
75a3(mdo sde): yang rgyu dang mi bcas par rab tu g.yos par 'gyur/ / mdzes pa'i 'od rnams bkye bas ngan song rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa bltams pas nyon mongs
75a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal de dag zhi/ / mi yi 'dren pa rgyal ba la// lha rnams me tog sil mas 'thor// stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa yi// brtan pa gom pa bdun du bzhud// sa phyogs gang
75a5(mdo sde): du zhabs bzhag pa/ / der ni pad+ma bzang ba'i mchog/ rin chen kun gyis brgyan pa dag/ sa las mngon du mthon par gyur// de ltar gom pa bdun bzhud nas// rga dang 'chi ba sel ba yi//
75a6(mdo sde): sman pa dam pa 'dir byung zhes// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi gsung brjod do// 'jigs med phyogs su rnam gzigs te// de nas don ldan gsung phyung ba// da ni 'jig rten kun gyi gtso//
75a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten phul phyin rnam par 'dren// nga yi skye mtha' 'di yin zhes// mi yi 'dren pas 'dzum pa mdzad// lha dbang bcas dang 'jig rten skyong dag rab tu dang sems skyes//
75b1(mdo sde): spos chu mchog gis 'jig rten phan pa'i don mdzad sku yang ba sil// klu dbang rnams kyang lhan cig mthun par byas nas ni// dri zhim spos chu dag gi rgyun gyis sku yang bsil ba byas/
75b2(mdo sde): lha gzhan khrag khrig dag kyang bar snang la ni gnas nas su// dri zhim spos chu mchog gi rgyun gyis rang byung sku yang bsil// gdugs dkar yangs dang rnga yab bzang po dam pa thogs nas ni
75b3(mdo sde): bar snang 'khod de lha rnams mi yi khyu mchog sku bsil byed/ / skyes bu gcig cig rings par 'ongs nas zas gtsang de la dgar smras pa// lha gcig 'byor pa rgyas gyur khyod kyi sras ni mtshan gyis
75b4(mdo sde): brgyan pa bltams/ / de ni nges par 'khor lo sgyur ba'i dbang phyug gdung rabs rin chen 'tsho ba// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di gdugs mang gcig 'gyur bas kyis dgra yang ma mchis 'gyur//
75b5(mdo sde): de nas skyes bu gnyis 'ongs zas gtsang rgyal po'i mdun du de song ste// lha cig 'byor pa rgyas gyur shAkya'i rigs su rgyal bu skyes gyur nas// shAkya rnams kyi grong du rogs pa 'bum
75b6(mdo sde): phrag lnga ni btsas pa skyes par gyur/ / kun kyang gzhan gyis mi thub stobs dang ldan zhing chen po che dang 'dra// skyes bu gzhan 'ongs smras pa bdag las bgyis pa'i sgra gson lha// 'dun
75b7(mdo sde): pa can la sogs pa 'bangs kyi byis pa brgyad brgya btsas par gyur/ / bsngags ldan gyi ni zla bo chibs rta stong phrag bcu dag 'brangs gyur te// chibs mchog dam pa gser gyis 'od ldan rnga
76a1(mdo sde): rngog ljang lor 'khril ba lags/ / mtha' 'khob khams kyis rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu dag kyang de bzhin du// rgyal po khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchis kyis legs
76a2(mdo sde): bar rgyal gyur lha/ / da ni bdag mchis sug las ci bgyi rgyal pos bdag la bka' stsal gsol// rgyal po khyod 'dir mnga' brnyes bdag 'bangs jo bo lha cig rgyal bar spyon// gser
76a3(mdo sde): gyi dra bas mdzes pa'i glang po dam pa stong phrag nyi shu dag/ nam mkha' las na dgra dag 'byin cing rgyal po'i khab tu mgyogs su mchis// sa srung la sogs na gu za lu dag dang be'u ni drug stong
76a4(mdo sde): 'brangs/ / lha cig lha mchog bltams zhing de dag btsas pas rgyal khab phun sum tshogs// rje cig rgyal po gshegs te bsod nams gzi 'od ldan pa bltams pa yi// yon tan dag ni mthong /
76a5(mdo sde): bar gyur nas lha dang mi rnams stong bgrangs pa// rab tu dga' bar gyur dang kun la nyid kyis legs par gzigs su gsol// myur du rgyal gyur cig ces byang chub dam pa mya ngan med par bzhugs
76a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa dang / skad cig de la sbyin pa gtong ba yang de bas rgya cher gyur to// ya rabs kyi rigs lnga brgya yang btsas par gyur to//
76a7(mdo sde): grags ldan la sogs pa bu mo khri dang / bran mo brgyad brgya dang // bdun pa la sogs pa bran lnga brgya dang / rte'u mo khri dang / bsngags ldan la sogs pa te'u mo khri dang / 5/ glang gi phru gu mo rdza
76b1(mdo sde): brgya dang / ba glang gi phru gu po lnga brgya po dag kyang btsas shing 'brangs par gyur nas/ de dag thams cad rgyal po zas gtsang mas sna grangs yi ger bris te sras bu gzhon nu rtsed pa'i phyir byin
76b2(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus/ gling bye ba brgya phrag bzhi'i dbus kyis phyogs nas a shod tha'i sdong po skyes par gyur to// gling
76b3(mdo sde): phra mo rnams su yang tsan dan gyi nags tshal skyes par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du grong khyer gyi kho ra khor yug tu yang bskyed mos tshal lnga brgya dag kyang byung bar gyur to// /
76b4(mdo sde): gter lnga stong yang sa'i 'og nas gyen tu 'bus te sgo ston par gyur to// de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i don bsam pa gang yin pa de de dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur nas
76b5(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du bdag gis bu gzhon nu de'i ming ji skad cig gdags par bya snyam pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bu 'di skyes ma thag tu bdag gi don thams cad yang
76b6(mdo sde): dag par grub par gyur gyis/ 'di'i ming ni don thams cad grub par gdags so snyam ste// de nas rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro tshar byas nas/ bu 'di'i ming don
76b7(mdo sde): thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o zhes ming du btags so/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas/ ma'i glo g.yas pa yang ma ral ma nyams shing sngon bzhin du gyur to//
77a1(mdo sde): der khron pa lan gsum ldud pa dag kyang byung bar gyur to// spos kyi 'bru mar gyi rdzing bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to// de nas lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag lhan
77a2(mdo sde): spos kyis bsgos pa'i 'bru mar gyi dri zhim po khyer te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas/ bltams pa legs par bltam mam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar
77a3(mdo sde): gyur to/ / lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byug pa dang / rnam par byug pa thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas/ bltams pa legs par bltam mam/ sku la mi
77a4(mdo sde): bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to/ / lha mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas/ bltams pa legs par
77a5(mdo sde): bltam mam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i gos thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas/ bltams pa
77a6(mdo sde): legs par bltam mam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i rgyan thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas/
77a7(mdo sde): bltams pa legs par bltam mam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang glu dbyangs len cing byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags te/
77b1(mdo sde): bltams pa legs par bltam mam/ sku la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa ji snyed cig 'khor
77b2(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' las 'ongs te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du 'khod nas/ rgyal po 'phel bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra sgrog par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang
77b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun du lum bi ni'i nags tshal du/ lha dang mi'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// bsti stang byas so//
77b4(mdo sde): mchod pa byas so// bza' ba dang / bcab pa dang / myang ba dag kyang drangs par gyur to// shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang 'dus nas/ kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur to// sbyin pa
77b5(mdo sde): dag kyang byin no/ / bsod nams dag kyang byed do// bram ze sum khri nyis stong yang nyin gcig bzhin du tshim par byas so// su dag ci 'dod pa de dag la yang de byin par gyur to//
77b6(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa yang bram ze'i 'khor der bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su sprul te/ gral gyi thog ma la 'khod nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod par gyur to// ji
77b7(mdo sde): ltar ngan song rnams zhi zhing / / ji ltar 'gro kun bde las na// 'gro la bde ba 'god pa yi// bde ba mdzad cig bltams par mngon// ji ltar rab rib me 'od kyis// lha dang nyi zla'i
78a1(mdo sde): 'od rnams kyang / / mi snang zil du rlag pa las// bsod nams thod cig byung bar mngon// mig med rnams kyang mthong gyur cing // rna ba 'on pas sgra thos la//
78a2(mdo sde): smyon pa rnams kyang dran ldan la// 'jig rten mchod rten 'gyur bar mngon// ji ltar nyon mongs mi gnod cing // 'gro ba byams pa'i yid gyur las// tshangs pa bye bas mchod 'os su//
78a3(mdo sde): go don mi za bar 'gyur bar mngon// sa la me tog rgyas gyur cing // sa yang mnyam par gnas pa las// 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa yi// thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar mngon//
78a4(mdo sde): ji ltar 'jig rten 'khrug med cing // pad+ma chen po mthon pa las// nges par gzi brjid chen po 'di// 'jig rten mgon du byon par 'gyur// lha yi spos kyis sbags gyur pa// 'jam
78a5(mdo sde): pa'i rlung gis ngad ldang zhing / / sems can nad rnams zhi gyur las// 'di ni sman pa'i rgyal por byon// gzugs khams gnas pa'i lha rgyal po// 'dod chags bral ba 'di dag kyang //
78a6(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar cing 'dug pa las// 'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas su byon// mi rnams kyis ni lha mthong zhing // lha rnams kyis ni mi mthong yang // phan tshun 'tshe ba med pa las// 'di ni ded dag
78a7(mdo sde): chen por byon/ / me rnams zhi bar gnas gyur cing // chu klung thams cad mi g.yo la// sa yang dal bus g.yo ba las// 'di ni yang dag gzigs par 'gyur/ dge slong dag
78b1(mdo sde): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / lha mo sgyu 'phrul shi ba'i dus byas par gyur te/ de shi ba'i dus byas nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skyes so//
78b2(mdo sde): dge slong dag khyed 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa'i lan bon gyis/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byas so snyam na/ de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni mthar thug pa'i phyir/
78b3(mdo sde): ro// dge slong dag 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang btsas nas zhag bdun lon nA ma 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes te dbang po yongs
78b4(mdo sde): su rdzogs nas mngon par byung na ma snying 'gas su 'ong ba'i phyir ro/ / dge slong dag de ltar zhag bdun lon nas/ thog mar ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas// lha mo sgyu 'phrul bkod pa ji lta
78b5(mdo sde): bus bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs par gyur pa de dag las bye ba brgya stong gyur pas kyang lhag pa'i bkod pa chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su zhugs so//
78b6(mdo sde): de zhugs pa dang / bum pa spos chus gang ba lnga stong gis mdun du drangs par gyur to// de bzhin du bu mo lnga stong ni rma bya'i mdongs lag na thogs te 'dun du bdong bar gyur to// bu mo lnga stong
78b7(mdo sde): ni shing ta la'i yal ga thogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ / bu mo lnga stong ni spos chu'i ril ba bying gar thogs te/ lam chag chag gis 'debs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// bu mo lnga
79a1(mdo sde): stong ni nags tshal gyi me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba khye'u tshang sna tshogs thogs te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to/ / bu mo lnga stong ni bzang por sgyur ba'i rin po che thogs te/ laH/
79a2(mdo sde): gyi byi dor byed cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// bu mo lnga stong ni stan bzang po thogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// bram ze lnga stong ni dril bu thogs te/ bkra shis kyi sgra 'byin cing mdun du
79a3(mdo sde): 'dong bar gyur to/ / glang po lnga stong ni rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur lo/ ta ti wi ni gser gyi rgyan gyi makod cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// shing rta brgyad khri na
79a4(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng zhing dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas legs par brgyan te/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to// rkang thang dpa' zhing rdul phod pa yan
79a5(mdo sde): lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ go cha sra ba bgos pa bzhi khri ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i grags
79a6(mdo sde): pagrags pa che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag ni/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing phye bzhin 'dod
79a7(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ / shing rta gang la byang chub sems dpa' 'dug par gyur pa de yang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bkod pa chen po du mas legs par brgyan par gyur to// lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad
79b1(mdo sde): kyis chas pas/ rin po che'i phreng ba thogs pa nyi khris shing rta de drangs te/ lha'i bu mo gnyis kyis bar du ni mi'i bu mo gcig bdug/ mi'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni/ lha'i bu mo gcig 'dug kyang
79b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu mos kyang mi'i bu mo'i dri mi zhim pa mi tshor/ / mi'i bu mos kyang lha'i bu mo'i gzugs mthong na bag med par ma gyur to// dge slong dag ser
79b3(mdo sde): skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ched du khyim lnga brgya phub ste/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer der 'jug pa'i tshe/ rang rang gis byas pa'i
79b4(mdo sde): khyim gyi sgor 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas lus gus par btud de rim gro dang bcas pas 'di skad du/ kye don thams cad grub pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye lha'i lha 'dir gshegs su
79b5(mdo sde): gsol/ kye sems can dag pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye kha lo sgyur ba dam pa 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye dga' zhing bde ba dang mchog tu dga' ba mdzad pa 'dir gshegs su
79b6(mdo sde): kye smad pa med pa'i grags pa mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye kun nas spyan mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/ kye mi mnyam pa dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba med pa'i yon tan dang
79b7(mdo sde): gzi brjid mnga' ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa'i sku mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes de skad 'dzer to/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
80a1(mdo sde): mas de dag thams cad dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim de kun tu yang zhugs par byas te/ zla ba bzhi lon nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi/
80a2(mdo sde): khyim du zhugs te/ rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs chen po der byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs par gyur to// de na shAkya'i rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus te bgros pa/
80a3(mdo sde): phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems kyi yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jam pa dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa' gtsang ba dang / byi dor bya ba dang / nyams su blang bar sus nus zhes byas pa dang //
80a4(mdo sde): de na shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o// bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o zhes zer ro// de na shAkya ches bgres ches bgres de dag na re/ bu mo
80a5(mdo sde): 'di dag thams cad ni byis pa gzhon nu thor bu gzhon la/ gzugs dang ngar la bab pas rgyags shing dregs pa yin pas/ 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la dus dus su rim gro bya bar mi nus
80a6(mdo sde): so/ / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi 'di gzhon nu'i sru mo ste/ 'dis ni gzhon nu bde ba dang legs par bskyed par nus so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang mnyes par nus so zhes thams cad
80a7(mdo sde): gros gcig tu 'dus te/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis dad par byas nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis gzhonu nude legs par bskyed do// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rim gror ma
80b1(mdo sde): ma sum cu rtsa gnyis bsgos par gyur te/ de la brgyud ni bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma'o// brgyad ni nu ma snun pa'i ma ma'o// brgyad ni rkyen grogs kyi ma ma'o// brgyad ni dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma'o//
80b2(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad bsogs te dpyad pa/ ji ltar gzhon nu 'di 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig tu gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyis rab tu byung
80b3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung zhes dpyad pa dang / de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i ngos la drang srong chen po nag po zhes bya ba/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig snag gi tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba dang /
80b4(mdo sde): lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa las/ des byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i tshe/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul mang du mthong ste/ nam mkha'i dkyil na yang lha'i bu mang po sangs rgyas kyi sa
80b5(mdo sde): sgrogs cing gos kyi g.yab mo g.yo ba pa dang / dga' zhing phan tshun du 'dong ba mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ ma la bdag gi rnam par blta ba zhig tu bya 'am snyam nas/ des lha'i mig gis
80b6(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du bltas na/ ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de na rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa/ 'jig rten thams
80b7(mdo sde): cad kyis mchod pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus legs par brgyan pa zhig btsas par mthong nas/ bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u shes par
81a1(mdo sde): gyis shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling du ni rin po che chen po byung ste/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid
81a2(mdo sde): kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa btsas so// de gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi la dbang
81a3(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po/ srid kyi mthu stobs thob pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/
81a4(mdo sde): de'i rin po che bdun ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin
81a5(mdo sde): che dang bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de la bu stong yod par gyur te/ dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde 'joms pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
81a6(mdo sde): de ni sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa/ chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med pa dang / chos dang mthun par rang gi mthus zil gyis mnan cing mngon par phab ste/
81a7(mdo sde): dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro// de gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/
81b1(mdo sde): ston pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na tshur shog/ de ltar 'dong ngo // de nas drang srong chen po nag po snag/
81b2(mdo sde): gi tsha bo mis byin dang 'grogs te/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha'i dkyil nas ldings te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po ga lA der song nas phyin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul brtul nas rkang gis ser
81b3(mdo sde): skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dong ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim ga la ba der phyin nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgor bsdad do// dge slong dag de ltar drang srong nag po dos rgyal po
81b4(mdo sde): zas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgo drung du srog chags brgya stong mang po 'dus pa mthong ngo / / de nas drang srong nag po sgo ba'i drung du song ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// kye mi khyod song la rgyal po zas gtsang
81b5(mdo sde): ma la chab sgo na drang srong gcig mchis so zhes gsol cig/ de nas sgo ba des de ltar bgyi'o zhes drang srong nag po'i ltar mnyan te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song nas byin pa dang / thal mo
81b6(mdo sde): sbyar te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ chab sgo na drang srong rgan po 'khogs pa nas gzer ba zhig mchis te/ 'di skad du bdag ni rgyal po'i zhal
81b7(mdo sde): mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes mchi'o/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong nag po'i stan 'ding du bcug ste/ mi de la 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong de nang du 'ong bar gyis shig/
82a1(mdo sde): de nas mi de rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung nas drang srong nag po la 'di skad ces smras te/ nang du bzhud cig/ de nas drang srong nag po rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song /
82a2(mdo sde): ste phyin pa dang / mdun du 'dug ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po rgyal bar spyon cig/ rgyal bar spyon cig/ sku tshe ring bar srungs shig/ chos bzhin du rgyal po
82a3(mdo sde): mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ drang srong nag po la yon chu dang / rkang pa la gtor ba'i chus mchod pa byas te/ shin tu legs par yongs su bkur nas stan la 'dar to// de stan
82a4(mdo sde): la bde bar 'dug par shes nas/ rjes dang bcas/ gus pa dang bcas par 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong sngon mthong bar mi dran na/ 'dir ci la byon/ ci zhig bzhed/ de skad ces smras pa
82a5(mdo sde): dang drang srong nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras zhig bltams par gyur pa de blta zhing bdag 'dir mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa/
82a6(mdo sde): drang srong chen po gzhon nu nyal zhing mchis kyis langs kyi bar du cung zad cig gzhes shig/ drang srong gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu chen po de lta bu ni ring por mi nyal te/ skyes bu dam de
82a7(mdo sde): bu dag ni sad par gnas pa'i ngang tshul can no/ / dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas drang srong nag po de la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ sad pa'i brda byas so// de nas
82b1(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang mas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa lag pa gnyis kyis shin tu legs par blangs te/ drang srong nag po'i drung du khyer ro// de nas drang srong nag pos/ byang chub sems dpag
82b2(mdo sde): bltas na/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par rnam par spras pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
82b3(mdo sde): ba las 'phags pa'i lus can/ nyi ma brgya phrag stong las kyang lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ yan lag thams cad du mdzes pa mthong nas/ kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar gyis gang zag 'di byung
82b4(mdo sde): ngo/ / kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar chen po dang ldan pa'i gang zag 'di byung ngo zhes/ ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas stan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la
82b5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' phang du blangs te/ sems shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
82b6(mdo sde): yod pa mthong ste/ de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag de rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni mi 'gyur ro// gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por
82b7(mdo sde): 'gyur te zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed do// zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ba dang / gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni/ de bzhin gshegs par
83a1(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su grags pa 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ba mthong nas/ des de lta bur mthong ba dang mchi ma blags te/
83a2(mdo sde): dus nas shugs ring du phyung ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong de mchi ma blags te ngus nas/ shugs ring du 'byin par mthong nas/ sngangs te mi dga' zhing rings pa rings par drang srong chen
83a3(mdo sde): po de la smras pa/ drang srong de ltar bshums shing blags te bshums pa dang / shugs ring du 'byin pa ci zhig nongs/ gzhon nu 'di la mi dge ba 'am cig mi gda' 'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
83a4(mdo sde): drang srong chen po nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag ni gzhon nu'i slad du ngu ba yang ma lags/ 'di la mi dge ba yang gang yang ma mchis te/ bdag
83a5(mdo sde): nyid ngu bar bas so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rgas shing 'khogs te/ nas gzer lad lta gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par
83a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/
83a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par bskor bar mi nus bskor bar 'gyur ro// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du chos ston par 'gyur te/ tshangs par spyod pa// thog
83b1(mdo sde): mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba'i chos don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i mthar phyin pa'i chos yang
83b2(mdo sde): dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ / sems can skye ba'i chos can dag 'di las chos de thos nas/ skye ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi/
83b3(mdo sde): ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams ni rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngag
83b4(mdo sde): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur/ sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi me sa gdungs pa
83b5(mdo sde): rnams la ni dam pa'i chos kyi char pas sim par mdzad par 'gyur/ sems can lta ba ngan pa sna tshogs 'thibs pos khebs pa la ma gol bar zhugs pa rnams ni/ lam drang por mya ngan
83b6(mdo sde): las 'das par 'dren par 'gyur/ sems can 'khor ba'i dra ba dang / btson rar 'khod cing nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bas bcings pa rnams ni/ bcings pa las yongs su grol bar mdzad
83b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ sems can mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ling tog gis mig ldongs pa rnams la ni shes rab kyi mig skyed par 'gyur/ sems can nyon mongs pa'i zug rngus rdu
84a1(mdo sde): pa rnams la ni/ zug rngu 'byin par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ u dum wa ra'i me tog ni brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // rgyal
84a2(mdo sde): po chen po de bzhin du bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brgya la brgya lam na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de ltar gzhon nu 'di ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag
84a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu sgrol
84a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing / / 'chi ba med pa la rab tu gzhog par 'gyur la/ bdag gis ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog de mi mthong ba dang / bdag ni nad ma mchis pa 'di las 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur
84a5(mdo sde): te/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni de'i slad du ngu zhing mi dga' bas shugs ring du 'byin pa lags so// rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi bstan bcos las 'byung ba lta na ni/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub
84a6(mdo sde): pa yang kha ba na bzhugs par mi 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po// gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ste/
84a7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu'i gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po
84b1(mdo sde): mtshan dang po 'di dang ldan no/ / rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu stang zil bcag pa'i 'phro dang / rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar mthon mthing du grub cing lcang lor khril la g.yas su
84b2(mdo sde): 'khyil pa dang / dpral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i smin mtshams su mdzod spu skyes pa ni/ kha ba dang / dngul gyi mdog ltar mchis pa
84b3(mdo sde): lags so/ / rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni spyan gyi rdzi ma pa'i lta bu dang / spyan dkar gnag 'byes pa dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang /
84b4(mdo sde): tshems shin tu dkar ba dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa dang /
84b5(mdo sde): 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / mdun mtho ba dang / thal gong rgyas pa dang / pags pa srab cing mdog gser 'dra ba dang / bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag
84b6(mdo sde): pus mor slebs pa dang / ro stod seng ge'i lta bu dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po ga zhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng ga ba pa dang / sU re re nas skye ba dang / yan
84b7(mdo sde): lag gi spu ga ya sa phyogs nas gyen du 'khyil ba dang / mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa dang / brla legs par zlum pa dang / byin pa ri dgas kyis rgyal po e na ya'i lta bu dang / sor mo ring ba
85a1(mdo sde): dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang / zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil mnyam pa dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel ba dang ldan pa lagra
85a2(mdo sde): so/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo re re skyes pa ni bzang zhing rtsibs stong dang ldan na khyud dang bcas/ lte ba dang bcas pa lags
85a3(mdo sde): so/ / rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni zhabs mnyam zhing shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
85a4(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan no/ / rgyal po chen po/ mtshan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po la mi 'byung ste/ mtshan de lta bu dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'byung ngo //
85a5(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mchis te/ de dag dang ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gdon mi 'tshal
85a6(mdo sde): bar rab tu 'byung ba'i don du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sen mo mtho ba dang
85a7(mdo sde): sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang / sen mo'i mdog snum pa dang / sor mo rnams zlum pa dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / sor mo byin gyis phra ba dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / long bu mi mngon pa dang /
85b1(mdo sde): tshigs mi mngon pa dang / zhabs mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni/ phyag gi ri ma
85b2(mdo sde): mtshungs pa dang ldan zhing phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa dang / phyag gi ri mo zab pa dang / phyag gi ri mo ya yor ma gyur pa dang / phyag gi ri mo rim par 'tsham pa dang / sgros bim pa ltar dmar ba dang / sgra mi drag
85b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshig dang / ljags mnyen zhing 'jam la zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa dang / glang po che'i nga ro dang 'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa dang / snyan cing 'jam pa dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po/
85b4(mdo sde): gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ phyag ring ba dang / sku'i na bza ba gtsang ma phun sum tshogs pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i sku
85b5(mdo sde): dang / zhum pa mi mnga' ba'i sku dang / rim par 'tsham pa'i sku dang / shin tu sba bar mdzes pa'i sku dang / rnam par legs par grub pa'i sku dang / pus mo'i lha nga yangs shing rgya che la shin tu gang
85b6(mdo sde): ba dang ldan pa lags so/ / rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sku zlum pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa dang / sku ya yo ma mchis pa dang / sku rim gyis legs par grub bdang
85b7(mdo sde): lte ba zab pa dang / lte ba ma g.yo ba dang / lte ba rim gyis gzhol ba dang / drang srong ltar gtsang sbras spyod pa dang / kun nas mdzes pa dang / snang ba dam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing rab rib ma
86a1(mdo sde): mchis pa'i 'od kun nas 'byung ba dang ldan pa lags so/ / rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni/ glang po ltar dal ba'i 'gros dang / seng ge'i
86a2(mdo sde): stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / khyu mchog gi stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / ngang pa'i stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / g.yas phyogs su mdzes par 'khor ba'i 'gros dang / dku zlum pa dang /
86a3(mdo sde): dgu skabs phyin pa dang / dbu ma rmongs pa dang / sked pa gzhu'i chang zungs ltar phra ba dang / mdag gi nyes pa sngo ba 'am/ gnag pa'i spyan dang bral ba'i sku dang ldan pa lags so//
86a4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni/ mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba rno ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / shangs legs par mtho ba dang / spyan gsal ba dang / spyan
86a5(mdo sde): dri ma med pa dang / 'dzum bu'i spyan dang ldan pa dang / spyan ring ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i spyan dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad
86a6(mdo sde): grub pa ni smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang / smin ma stug pa dang / smin ma gnag pa dang / smin ma rgyun chags pa dang / smin ma rim gyis gzhol ba dang / mkhur ba rgyas pa dang / mkhur ba mi
86a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa med pa dang / mkhur ba skyon dang bral ba dang / sdang ba dang khro ba'i mdog med pa dang / shin tu rigs pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams
86b1(mdo sde): cad grub pa de ni mthong sgra yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa dang / gdong dang dpral ba rkyen du 'bab pa dang / rabu yongs su rgyas pa dang / dbu skra gnag pa dang / dbu smra mnyam pa dang / dbus
86b2(mdo sde): dri zhim pa dang / dbu skra mig pa shor ba dang / dbu skra mi 'dzing ba dang / dbu skra byin gyis phra ba dang / dbu skra lcang lor 'khyil ba dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po/ gzhon nu don thams
86b3(mdo sde): cad grub pa de ni/ dbu skra dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / sdong ris kyi dbyibs lta bu'i dbu skra dang ldan pa'o// rgyal po chen po/ 'di dag ni gzhon nu don thams
86b4(mdo sde): cad grub pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ste/ de dag dang ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni kha ba na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi/ gdon mi 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i slad du khab nas mngon par 'byung
86b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po las gzhon nu'i lung bstan pa de thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang // yid/
86b6(mdo sde): bde ba skyes nas/ stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// khyod la lha kun phyag 'tshal zhing // drang srong rnams
86b7(mdo sde): kyis mchod gyur te/ / 'jig rten kun gyis mchod rten pas// / bdag kyang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong chen po nag po snag gi tsha bo mes byin dang
87a1(mdo sde): bcas te/ kha zas tshul dang 'dra bas tshim par byas nas/ gos bskon te/ bskor ba byas so// de nas drang srong chen po nag po gnas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul
87a2(mdo sde): gyis nam mkha' las rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo / / de nas drang srong chen po nag pos bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la 'di skad ces smras so// mis byin khyod kyis nam sangs rgyas
87a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes thos pa de'i tshe/ khyod song ste de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung shig dang / de ni khyod kyi yun po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
87a4(mdo sde): lha yi tshogs rnams nam mkha'i ngos la gnas te sangs rgyas sgra sgrogs pa// lha yi drang srong nag po ri yul gnas pas mthong nas dga' mchog thob// 'di na srog chags rnams kyi dga' skyes sadra
87a5(mdo sde): rgyas zhes bya'i tshig 'di ci/ / bdag gi lus kyang rab sim gyur cing sems bde mchog tu zhi bar gyur/ lha 'am 'on te lha min yang na nam mkha' lding ngam mi 'am ci// sangs rgyas zhes
87a6(mdo sde): bya dga' dang mos byed tshig 'di sngon chad ma thos ci/ lha yi mig gi sa phyogs bcur ri dang sa dang rgya mtsho rnams la bltas/ phyis yang sa ri mcho la rmad du byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs mthong /
87a7(mdo sde): 'od gsal mdzes pa lus la sim byed 'di ni rab tu bzang snang zhing // ji ltar ri yi rtse mo rnams su byi ru'i myu gu mthon gyur la/ shing ljon rnams kyang me tog bzang rgyas sna tshogs 'bras
