115b7(mdo sde): sems dang sems byung 'du shes rnam par rtog pa dag/ mchog dang tha ma de bzhin rgya chung yangs pa dag/ thams cad sems kyi 'gyur ba gcig gis rab tu mkhyen// dge slong dag
116a1(mdo sde): de ltar shAkya gzhon nu de dag thams cad zil gyis non par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig khyad par du 'phags par gyur to// de'i rjes la mchongs pa dang /
116a2(mdo sde): rgyal dang / bang la sogs pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' nyid khyad par du 'phags par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
116a3(mdo sde): brtul zhugs dka' thub sdom pa'i yon tan dang // bskal pa bye bar bzod dul byams stobs kyis// lus dang sems ni ci nas yang mdzad pas// de yi shugs kyi khyad par mnyan par gyis
116a4(mdo sde): sems can mchog 'di grong khyer 'di na bzhugs par khyed kyis mthong / / 'on kyang 'di ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// skad cig gcig la rin chen gser dang mchod
116a5(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs kyis/ / rgyal ba dpag tu med pa dag la mchod par mdzad du bzhud// 'on kyang rdzu 'phrul de 'dra brnyes pa de// byon tam bzhud par khyed kyis yongs mi shes// ji tsam zhugs shes
116a6(mdo sde): de la ci zhig bskyed/ / 'di ni mtshungs pa med kyis rim gro skyed// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par 'phags par gyur to// de nas shAkya de dag gis smras pa/
116a7(mdo sde): gzhon nu 'di la stobs kyi khyad par ci yod pa'ang sad par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag kyang dus gcig tu
116b1(mdo sde): so so nas stobs 'gyed par gyur te/ shAkya gzhon nu sum cu rtsa gnyis shig tshogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la brgal ba ltar chas te 'khod do// de'i nang nas dga' bo dang / kun
116b2(mdo sde): dga' bo gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brgal ba'i phyir drung du phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lag gis reg ma thag tu/ de gnyis kas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang /
116b3(mdo sde): gzi brjid ma bzod de sa la 'gyel to// de'i 'og tu shAkya gzhon nu lhas sbyin nga rgyal can/ mthus bsnyems pa de stobs kyi nga rgyal dang / shAkya'i nga rgyal gyis bsnyems la/ byang chub sems
116b4(mdo sde): dpa' la sngo zhing / thams cad dang ldan pa'i ltad mo pa'i dkyil 'khor la bskor te/ bsgyings nas byang chub sems dpa' la stobs brgal to// de nas byang chub sems dpas ma
116b5(mdo sde): brtabs shing mi rings par/ stangs bzangs por gzhon nu lhas sbyin lag pa g.yas pas bteg ste/ bsad pa'i blos ma yin gyis/ nga rgyal bcag pa'i phyir byams pa'i sems kyi nam mkha
116b6(mdo sde): las bskor bskor te/ sa'i steng du bor yang de'i lus la gnod par gyur pa med do// de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ de lta bu gnod par 'gyur bas chog gis thams
116b7(mdo sde): cad gcig tu 'dus te brgal bar gyis shig/ de nas de dag thams cad nga rgyal gyis rlom zhing byang chub sems dpa' la rub par gyur to// de nas de dag byang
117a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang lus kyi mthu ma bzod de/ byang chub sems dpas reg pa tsam gyis sa la 'gyel
117a2(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ / de nas lha dang mi brgya stong de dag/ e ma a la la zhes zer zhing / ca co dang gzha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ngo // nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis
117a3(mdo sde): kyang me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab ste/ dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa// de dag gyad chen stobs po che
117a4(mdo sde): 'dra la/ cig char skyes bu'i mchog la rub gyur kyang // reg pa tsam gyis sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur// lhun po ri rab rdo rje'i khor yug dang // phyogs bcu dag na ri gzhan gang yod pa/
117a5(mdo sde): lag pas mnyes shing darmeg med byer rlog na// mi lus snying po med pa mtshar ci che// 'di ni shing dbang mchog drung sdang ba'i gyad// dpung bcas bdud rnams rgyal mdzad sder bcas pa/
117a6(mdo sde): nag po'i rtsa lag byams pa'i stobs kyis 'joms// bla med byang chub zhi bar 'tshang yang rgya// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu khyad par du 'phags par gyur to//
117a7(mdo sde): de nas shAkya lag na be con can gyis/ shAkya gzhon nu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// 'di dag ni sad kyang zin/ mthong yang zin gyis/ da ni 'phong zhig bstan par gyis shig/ de'i
117b1(mdo sde): tshe kun dga' bos rgyang grangs gnyis kyi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so/ / de'i 'og tu lhas sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhi'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du
117b2(mdo sde): btsugs so/ / de'i 'og tu mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so// de'i 'og tu shAkya lag na bcon can gyis rgyang grags brgyad kyi pha rol
117b3(mdo sde): tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu lcags kyi rnga gcig 'ben du btsugs te/ de'i drung du shing ta la bdun
117b4(mdo sde): dngar nas/ / de'i pha rol tu lcags kyi phag rgod kyi gzugs 'khrul 'khor du byas pa gcig btsugs so// de nas kun dga' bos rgyang grag sa gnyis kyi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs
117b5(mdo sde): nas phog par gyur te/ de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so// lha sbyin gyis rgyang grags bzhi'i pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs nas phog par gyur te/ de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so//
117b6(mdo sde): mdzes dga' bos rgyang grags drug gi pha rol na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs nas phog par gyur te/ de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so// lag na be con can gyis rgyang grags brgyad kyi pha rol
117b7(mdo sde): na rnga'i 'ben 'dug pa la 'phangs nas phog par gyur te/ thal byung du phyin nas de phan chad kyi la phog par ma nus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' la gzhu gang dang gang byin pa de
118a1(mdo sde): dag la la ni gzhu rgyud chad/ la la ni chag nas/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grong khyer 'di na gzhu gzhan la la bdag gis brdung bzod pa 'am/ lus kyi stobs
118a2(mdo sde): dang mthu bzod pa mchis sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu yod do// gzhon nus smras pa/ lha de lta bu gang na mchis/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu khyod kyi mes seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba byung
118a3(mdo sde): ste/ de'i sna ba ru da ltar lha khang na spos dang phreng bas mchod de/ de ni sus kyang brdung bar yang mi nus na/ dgang bar lta smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod do// byang chub sems dpas smras pa
118a4(mdo sde): lha de blang du gsol/ / sad par bgyi'o// de nas gzhu de blangs te 'ongs pa dang / shAkya gzhon nu thams cad kyis nan tan gyi mchog gis bsgrims kyang gzhu de brdung bar yang
118a5(mdo sde): ma nus na/ dgang bar lta smos kyang ci dgos te ma nus so// de nas gzhu de shAkya lag na be con can gyi lus kyi mthu stobs thams cad phyung ste/ gzhu de brdung bar brgal na ma brdungs so// de nas
118a6(mdo sde): gzhu de byang chub sems dpa' la byin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpas gzhu de blangs te/ stan las ma langs par skyil mo krung phyed bcas te/ lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas/
118a7(mdo sde): lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo gcig gis brdungs so// gzhu de de ltar brdungs pa'i tshe/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad du sgra mngon par grags par gyur to// grong khyer gyi mi thams
118b1(mdo sde): cad kyang skrag sgeg por gyur te/ gcig la gcig 'dri zhing 'di ltar ci'i sgra zhig ces zer ro// de la la na re gzhon nu don grub kyis mes kyi snam du brdungs nas/ de'i sgra byung ba ni 'di yin no/
118b2(mdo sde): zhes zer ro// de nas lha dang mi brgya stong dag/ a ma a la la zhes zer zhing / ca co dang gzha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang
118b3(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gdan las ma bzhengs brtsol ba ma mchis su/ thub pas snam ru 'di 'dra brdungs pa las// gdon mi
118b4(mdo sde): 'tshal bar dgongs pa rdzogs gyur te/ / bdud kyi sde bcom myur du thub pas byon// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas mda' blangs nas gzhu de dang sbyar te bkangs nas/
118b5(mdo sde): 'phangs pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ kun dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / lha sbyin gyis 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / mdzes dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / lag na be con can gyi 'ben
118b6(mdo sde): du rnga btsugs pa de thams cad las thal nas/ rgyang grags bcu'i pha rol tu bdag gi 'ben lcags kyi rnga btsugs pa dang / shing ta la bdun dang ra ba dang / phag rgod kyi gzugs 'khrul 'khor du byas
118b7(mdo sde): pa las kyang thal te mda' de sa la gzug nas mi snang bar nub par gyur to/ / sa phyogs gang du mda' de zug ste nub pa'i sa phyogs der khron pa lta bu'i khung zhig byung nas/ da ltar yang mda'i khron pa
119a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yin no/ / de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing / ca co dang / gzha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to// shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang /
119a2(mdo sde): ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thob ste/ kye ma ngo mtshar to// 'dis ni bslabs kyang ma bslabs par rtsal gyis shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes zer ro// nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod
119a3(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / skye bo'i tshogs phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// de lta bu ngo mtshar yang ci che ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni sa yi snying po
119a4(mdo sde): sngon gyi sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs/ / zhi gnas snam ru thogs shing stong pa bdag med mda' rnams kyis// nyon mongs dgra rnams bcom ste lta ba'i dra ba dral nas su// byang chub dam
119a5(mdo sde): pa zhi ba rdul med mya ngan med pa 'thob/ / de skad ces smras nas/ lha'i bu de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te dong ngo // de bzhin du mchongs pa dang /
119a6(mdo sde): yi ge dang / lag rtsis dang / rtsis dang / grangs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / bang dang / tshar dang / rgyal dang / 'phong dpyad dang / glang po che'i gnyar bzhon
119a7(mdo sde): pa dang / rta rtsal dang / shing rta'i thabs dang / mda' gzhu'i thabs dang / brtan pa dang / mthu dang / dpa' ba dang / 'gyed stobs dang / lcags kyus sgyur thabs dang / zhags pa'i thabs dang /
119b1(mdo sde): mdun du brdzu ba dang / phyir bsnur ba dang / bzur ba dang / 'dzin stangs dang / goms stabs dang / thor tshugs dang / bcad pa dang / dral ba dang / dbugs pa dang // gzhig pa dang
119b2(mdo sde): gsheg pa dang / ma 'chor bar phog pa dang / gnad du phog pa dang / sgra grag par phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dang / cho lo'i rtsed mo dang / snyan dang gas sbyar ba dang / lam dang / ri mo dang
119b3(mdo sde): gzugs dang / gzugs kyi las dang / thags kyi dpyad dang / me'i las dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang sgra dang / gar dang / glu dang / yi ge bklags pa'i mig 'or dang / gtam dang // bzhad gad dang
119b4(mdo sde): rtsed mo dang / bro dang / sgeg pa dang / 'phreng ba rgyu ba dang / rlung yab g.yob pa dang / nor bu tshor gyis bsgyur ba dang / gos tshon gyis bsgyur ba dang / mig 'phrul gyi cho ga dang / rmi lam gyi dpyad dang /
119b5(mdo sde): bya'i skad dang / bud med kyi mtshan dang / skyes pa'i mtshan dang / glang po'i mtshan dang / rta'i mtshan dang / ba lang gi mtshan dang / ra'i mtshan dang / lug gi mtshan dang / khyi'i mtshan dang / shes
119b6(mdo sde): sal dang / sgra nges par sbyor ba dang / nga ro sbyar ba dang / sngon gyi rab sa dang / sngon byung ba dang / rig byed dang / lung bstan pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge lci yang dang / tshig sdeb pa dang /
119b7(mdo sde): mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang // skar ma'i lugs dang / grangs can gyi lugs dang / rnal 'byor gyi lugs dang / las kyi tshogs dang / bye brag pa'i lugs dang / nor gyi rig pa dang / phur bu'i lugs
120a1(mdo sde): dang chu'i lugs dang / lha ma yin gyi lugs dang / bya dang / ri dgas kyi skad dang / gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang / rgya skags kyi 'khrul 'khor dang / spra tshil gyi las dang //
120a2(mdo sde): 'dru shur dang / brko bzhog dang / lo ma phra ba dang / spos sbyar ba la sogs pa'i sgyu rtsal 'jig rten pa dang / lha'i dang / mi'i las 'das pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig khyad
120a3(mdo sde): par du 'phags par gyur to/ / de'i tshe shAkya lag mabatsan can gyis rang gi bu mos 'chos byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang ni'i rim gyis bag mar blangs te/
120a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten dang mthun pa tsam du bya ba'i phyir bu da med brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang du 'dug ste/ dga' zhing rtse la
120a5(mdo sde): yongs su spyod pa ston to/ / bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad kyi nang nas shAkya'i bu mo sa mtsho ma btsun mo'i mchog tu dbang bskur bar gyur to// de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa mtsho ma gyos
120a6(mdo sde): skyug gam/ nang mi gang mthong yang rung ste/ gdong mi sbed do// de dag kyang de la bag sar mo ni zhum zhum por 'dug pa'i rigs na/ 'di ni rtag tu ma g.yogs so zhes 'phya smod cing mi snyan par
120a7(mdo sde): zer ro/ / de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa mtsho mas gtam de thos nas/ nang mi rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dug dang 'greng dang 'chag pa la// 'phags
120b1(mdo sde): pa dag ni ma g.yogs mdzes/ / nor bu rin chen 'od gsal ba// rgyal mtshan rtse mor gsal na mdzes// 'phags pa 'gro na'ang mdzes pa ste// 'ong na'ang de bzhin mdzes pa yin//
120b2(mdo sde): 'greng ba 'am de bzhin 'dug pa dang // thams cad du'ang 'phags pa mdzes// 'phags pa smra na'ang mdzes pa ste// mi smrar 'dug kyang de bzhin mdzes// dper na ka la bing ka ni//
120b3(mdo sde): mthong dang sgra tsam thos bzhin no// ku sha'i gos ni gyon pa dang // gos ngan gyon dang lus rid pa// de ni rang gi gzi yis mdzes// yon tan ldan pa yon tan brgyan// gang la sdig
120b4(mdo sde): pa med gyur pa/ / 'phags pa kun tu dge ba yin// byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni// ji snyed brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin// gang dag snying la sdig pa yod cing tshig 'jam pa// de dag dug gi
120b5(mdo sde): bum par bdud rtsi blugs pa bzhin/ / brag gi ser ga rtsub pa lta bu nang yang rtsub// de 'dra de dag sbrul gyi kha la nyug pa bzhin// des pa de dag gan du kun 'ong kun phyag 'tshal// 'bab
120b6(mdo sde): stegs thams cad lta bur 'gro ba kun gyi gsos/ / 'phags pa dag ni rtag tu'o zhes bkang bum 'dra// bdag nyid dag pa de 'dra mthong na bkra shis dge/ gang dag sdig pa'i grogs
120b7(mdo sde): po yun ring yongs spong zhing / / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rin po chos ni yongs bzung la// sdig pa rnams spong sangs rgyas chos la mngon chags pa// de lta bu dag mthong na bkra shis
121a1(mdo sde): 'bras bu yod/ / gang dag lus bsdams lus kyi skyon rnams rab bsdams dang // gang dag tshig bsdams rtag tu tshig 'tshal med gyur la// dbang po smras shing
121a2(mdo sde): shin tu bsdams la yid dang ga/ / de lta bu dag gdong g.yogs te ni ci zhig bya// gal te lus la gos ni stong gis g.yogs gyur kyang // gang dag sems bshus ngo tsha med cing khrel
121a3(mdo sde): med dang / / gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan med cing bden tshig med// de dag sgren mo bas kyang sgren mor 'jig rten rgyu// gang zhig sems sbas rtag tu dbang po bsdams gyur cing // bdag
121a4(mdo sde): gi khyo cho ga sems can gzhan la mi sems pa/ / de 'dra ba dag nyi zla bzhin du ma g.yogs snang // de 'dra ba dag gdong g.yogs te ni ci zhig bya// gzhan yang drang srong bdag nyid che
121a5(mdo sde): dang gzhan sems blo mkhas dang / / de bzhin lha tshogs dag gi kho mo'i bsam pa dang // kho mo'i tshul khrims yon tan sdom dang bag yod mkhyen// de lta bas na kho mos gdong bkab ci zhig/
121a6(mdo sde): dgos// dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i bu mo sa mtsho ma'i spobs pa bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thos so// thos nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi
121a7(mdo sde): rangs te/ / rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ ras bcos bu bzang po rin po tshe du mas sbas bzung cig dang / mu tig gi do shal srang bye ba brgya stong rib dang // mu tig
121b1(mdo sde): dmar po bzang pos sbas pa'i gser gyi phreng bas shAkya'i bu mo sa mchom la bkab nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / kho bo'i bu ni yon tan ci 'dras brgyan pa dang // mna' mas rang gi yon/
121b2(mdo sde): tan ji ltar rab smras pa/ sems can dag pa de gnyis phrad par gyur pa ni// mar dang mar gyi snying khu ji ltar 'dra ba bzhin// sgyu rtsal bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
121b3(mdo sde): / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po brgyad pa// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa na/
121b4(mdo sde): gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las byed par spro bar gyur pa/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
121b5(mdo sde): chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba du ma de dag rang rang gi dga' ba'i sgra byin cing lhags par gyur to// de la dge slong dag dus gzhan zhig na/ lha dang klu dang
121b6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba mang po dag 'di snyam du
121b7(mdo sde): sems par gyur te/ ma la skyes bu dam pa 'di btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ha cang yun ring du thogs par gyur na/ sems can gang dag 'dis yun ring po nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang snyan
122a1(mdo sde): par smras pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pas yongs su smin par byas pa dang / gang dag 'dis byang chub thob nas chos bstan pa shes par 'gyur ba/ chos kyi snod du
122a2(mdo sde): gyur pa'i sems can de dag med par gyur nas/ phyis byang chub sems dpa' mngon par phyung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gcig tu
122a3(mdo sde): mo 'gyur grangs snyam mo/ / de nas de dag gus pa dang bcas/ rjes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal nas/ nam zhig na bdag cag gis
122a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dam pa mchog rab dag pa 'di mngon par 'byung ba dang / mngon par byung nas kyang / shing gi rgyal po chen po de'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa btul nas/
122a5(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan
122a6(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa dang / lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med paskor zhing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam
122a7(mdo sde): b ar rol pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos pa ji lta bzhin du legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa'i bsam pa de lta bus sdod cing 'khod par
122b1(mdo sde): gyur to/ / dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa nas bzung ste/ yun ring por rtag par rgyun du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
122b2(mdo sde): chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par gyur cing / dge ba'i chos spyod pa thams cad la bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur pa yin la/ yun ring po nas dus shes pa dang / chod shes pa dang /
122b3(mdo sde): ran pa shes par gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pa las ma nyams pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rtse ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang /
122b4(mdo sde): dbang po la mkhas pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa shes pa dang / dus la lta zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar dus ran pa las mi yol bar gyur pa'o// de mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan
122b5(mdo sde): pas 'di ni rab tu bzung ba'i dus so/ / 'di ni tshar bcad pa'i dus so// 'di ni bsdu ba'i dus so// 'di ni phan gdags pa'i dus so// 'di ni btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i dus so//
122b6(mdo sde): 'di ni smra ba'i dus so// 'di ni mi smra bar bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i dus so// 'di ni rab tu 'byung ba'i dus so// 'di ni kha ton bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni tshul bzhin
122b7(mdo sde): yid la bya ba'i dus so/ / 'di ni rab tu dben par bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so zhes bya ba nas/ 'di ni bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis bar gyi nang
123a1(mdo sde): du 'gro ba'i dus so/ / 'di ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang /
123a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so// 'di ni chos bstan pa'i dus so// 'di ni nang du
123a3(mdo sde): yang dag par gzhag pa'i dus so zhes bya ba thams cad bdag nyid kyis shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' dus thams cad du rtag par dus shes par gyur cing / dus la lta ba yin yang / dge slong
123a4(mdo sde): dag 'di ni chos nyid kyis thob pa yin te/ srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'khod pa rnams la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
123a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams glu dbyangs dang sil snyan gyi sgra las/ chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag gis yang dag par skul ba mdzad do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sems can mchog gang phyogs
123a6(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs/ / de dag mthu yis sil snyan sgra dag las/ tshigs bcang sgra snyan 'di dag byung ba yis// mi mchog dam pa rnams la yang dag skul// sdug bsngal brgyas gang
123a7(mdo sde): sems can mthong nas ni/ / 'gro ba'i mgon dang skyabs dang gnas 'gyur zhing // phan byed mchog dang dpung gnyen gyur cig ces/ khyod kyis sngon ni smon lam de skad btab/ dge ba dpa' bo sngon gyi
123b1(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / 'gro phan bya zhes smon btab dran par byos// 'di ni khyod kyi dus man tshod yin gyis// drang srong mchog rab mngon par 'byung bar byos// sangs rgyas lha mi 'dul byed 'jig rten
123b2(mdo sde): mchog/ yon tan brgyas gang bar ni gyur cig ces// de'i phyir khyod mngon mgo dang rkang lag dang // nor gyi dam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang btang // khyod ni khrims kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub
123b3(mdo sde): spyad/ / khyod ni bzod pas 'gro la phan pa byed// khyod ni brtson pas yon tan brgya yis gang // bsam gtan shes rab srid gsum mnyam pa med// khro bas non cing tha ba'i dri mang ba//
123b4(mdo sde): de dag bde gshegs khyod kyi byams pas khyab// dge ba'i yon tan bral ba log par nges// mi mkhas rnam mang dag la khyed snying rje// bsod nams ye shes dge bas lus khyab cing // rdul
123b5(mdo sde): bral bsam gtan mngon shes lham mer 'dug/ phyogs bcu 'di dag rnams su rab tu gsal// sprin med zla ba dri ma med pa 'dra// 'di dang gzhan yang snyan pa rnam mang gis// sil snyan
123b6(mdo sde): las dag rgyal bas sgra bsgrags te/ / mngon par khyod 'byung dus ni 'di yin zhes// lha mis mchod par 'os la skul ma 'debs// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khyim dam pa
123b7(mdo sde): mchog yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bde bar gnas pa dang mthun pa// lha'i khang khyim lta bu stegs bu dang / sgo khang dang / rta babs dang /
124a1(mdo sde): skar lung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs mchog dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rkyen rnam pa tha dad pa dbye ba shin tu rnam par phye ba/ gzugs
124a2(mdo sde): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du mas legs par brgyan ga/ dar gyi lda ldi brgya stong du ma mngon par dpyangs pa// rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i mu
124a3(mdo sde): tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu dpyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi spang leb can gyi zam pas mdzes par byas pa// me tog gi phreng ba dang / chun po mang pos dpyangs pa/ bog snod nas spos kyi
124a4(mdo sde): bdugs pa/ dar la'i bla re bres pa/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog dri mchog tu zhim zhing shin tu mdzes pa dag bkram pa/ rdzing me tog pad+ma dkar po dang / pad+ma dang ldan pa'i chu'i gnas
124a5(mdo sde): yongs su spyad par bya ba mang ba/ bya 'dab skyong dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / ngur pa dang / ku na la dang / ka la bing ka dang / shang shad
124a6(mdo sde): te'u la sogs pa bya rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshogs sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i sa gzhi'i gnas yongs su spyad par bya ba/ gzugs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan kun tu ston pa/
124a7(mdo sde): lta bas mi ngoms par nyams dga' ba dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' dam pa'i bskyed pa'i khyim dam pa mchog de na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khang pa mdzes pa chen po mchog na
124b1(mdo sde): gnas pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma dang bral ba/ yan lag dri ma med pa/ phreng ba dag dang / rgyan mabor ba/ dri mchog tu zhim pa dam pa'i byug pas lus bskus pa/ dkar zhing bzang
124b2(mdo sde): la dri ma med cing rnam par dag la dri ma dang bral ba'i gos gyon pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ mal cha lha'i ras bcos bu bzang po phra ba du ma bting ba/ 'jam pa ka tsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/
124b3(mdo sde): yan lag dam pas spras pa'i mal bzang po'i steng na 'dug pa btsun mo'i 'khor dam pa lha'i bu mo dang 'dra ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa/ blta ba dang mthun pa/ spyod pa bzang pos mdzes
124b4(mdo sde): par byas pa/ gzugs bzang ba'i nang na 'dug pa/ dung dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / kharnga dang / pi wang dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg dang / ki ma la dang
124b5(mdo sde): na khu la dang / sgra snyan dang / gling bu snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs dang / sil snyan dang / gla dbyangs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ bslab pa la bud med kyi tshogs kyis kyang // sgra mnyan zhing 'jam bstan
124b6(mdo sde): la yid du 'ong ba dang / gling bu 'bud pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' slong ngo // phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byin gyis brlabs kyis
124b7(mdo sde): sil snyan gyi sgra phyung ba'i sgra skad de dag las byang chub sems dpa' la skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / / bud med gang dag rab tu yid dga' sems dang bas// sil snyan yid du
125a1(mdo sde): 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin tshe/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dam pa dag gi mthu yis ni/ tshigs bcad rnam pa sna tshogs rnam mang 'di dag byung / rtag tu mgon med gyur pa'i/
125a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba 'di mthong nas/ go 'phang mya ngan med mchog rdul med sangs rgyas te/ skye dang rga dang sdug bsngal dag las sgrol lo zhes/ dpa' bo khyod sngon smon lam de skad btab par gyur/ de phyir
125a3(mdo sde): dge myur grong khyer mchog 'di nas/ / byung ba sngon gyi drang srong zhabs bcags pa/ sa phyogs de ni rab tu mnan nas su// rgyal ba'i ye shes mtshungs med 'tshang rgyar gyis// khyod kyi sngon
125a4(mdo sde): chad sna tshogs rin chen nor/ / rkang lag phangs pa'i lus kyang btang bar gyur// drang srong chen po de ring khyod dus 'di// chos kyi chu bo mtha' yas 'gro la phye// khyod kyi tshul khrims ma
125a5(mdo sde): nyams dri med dge/ sngon chad khyod ni rtag tu mchog gi rgyan// drang srong chen po khyod khrims 'dra ba med// 'gro ba nyon mongs rnam pa mang las khrol// khyod kyis srid pa brgyar ni bzod pa spyad/
125a6(mdo sde): khyod ni 'gro bas ngan brjod rnam mang bzod// bzod pas bzod cing dul bas nges pa'i bdag/ rkang gnyis dbang po mngon par 'byung blo gyis// khyod btson brtan zhing mi g.yo g.yo ba med//
125a7(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa sngon mthar rgya chen gyur// g.yon can bdud ni sde dang bcas btul te// ngan song gsum po mtha' dag skam par gyis// gang phyir khyod kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad//
125b1(mdo sde): dus ngan nyon mongs snyigs ma bsregs kyis la// khyod kyis bdud rtsi chu bo'i char phob ste// mgon med ring nas skom pa tshim par gyis// 'chi med mya ngan med gnas sangs rgyas te// skom
125b2(mdo sde): pas nyam thag bdud rtsis tshim bya zhes/ / khyod kyis sngon spras tshig mchog dran byos te// grong khyer dam pa 'di nas myur du byung // khyod ni shes rab mchog gi spyod pa mkhas// khyod kyi ye shes
125b3(mdo sde): mtha' yas dri med che/ / rmongs pa'i yid gnyis lam la gnas rnams la// shes rab 'od dge dam pa mdzes par gyis// khyod kyi srid pa brgyar ni byams pa spyad// snying rje dang ni dga'
125b4(mdo sde): mchog btang snyoms dang / / khyod kyis spyod pa dam pa gang spyad pa// spyod pa de nyid 'gro la rnam par phye// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dag gi gzi brjid kyis// yon tan me tog sna tshogs tshigs
125b5(mdo sde): bcad 'di/ / sil snyan dag las rnam mang yid 'od grag/ mal na 'dug pa'i gzhon nu de la skul// gang gi tshe na dga' byed bud med rab tu dga' ba rnams// shin tu mdzes shing rab tu
125b6(mdo sde): snyan pa'i sil snyan sgrog pa'i tshe/ / phyogs bcu dag gi rgyal ba lha mi 'dul ba mdzad rnams kyang // sil snyan dag las gsung mchog ha cang mi che rjes su sgrog/ 'gro la phan byed yon tan mangs
125b7(mdo sde): ldan khyod 'gro rnams su/ / rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe na rgyal ba'i yon tan gnyug mar byas// sngon gyi brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad pa dran gyis te// shing mchog drung du myur song 'chi med go 'phang thob
126a1(mdo sde): par gyis/ / lha mi dag ni shin tu sgom zhing rgyal ba'i yon tan bral// khyod ni shin tu stobs ldan bdud rtsi'i rabro rtag tu sbyin// stobs bcu 'ir zla dam pa mkhas pa rnams
126a2(mdo sde): kyis mchod byas pa/ / bdud rtsi de ni mi bdag khyod kyis myur du rnam par phye// rgyal ba'i yon tan 'gro la phan pa byed la dga' ba po// khyod kyis sngon gyi srid par nor dang nor bu gser rnams btang
126a3(mdo sde): chung ma bu sdug dag dang grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa dang / / rang gi mgo dang mig dang lag pa dag dang rkang pa'ang btang // mi mchog khyod ni gna' sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa'i tshe// mi zhig khyod
126a4(mdo sde): la mngon du phyogs nas 'di skad tshig smras te/ / grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa 'di kho la byin zhes byas// de yi tshe na rab tu dga' zhing 'khrugs par gyur pa med// gna' sngon khyod ni rgyal
126a5(mdo sde): po'i bram ze dge bar gyur pa'i tshe/ / skye bo bla ma bsnyen bkur byed cing gzhan la 'khu mi byed// bram ze dam pa dag dang skye bo mang po dag la bkod// de nas shi 'phos srid pa'i 'gro ba lha
126a6(mdo sde): yi gnas su skyes/ / sngon khyod rgyal po'i bu las drang srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe// rgyal po ngan pa khros pas khyod kyis yan log bcad pa na// khyod ni yid 'khrugs gyur pa med par 'chi ba'i dus
126a7(mdo sde): byas te/ / de yi chen khyod kyi rkang lag dag la 'o ma zag/ khyod sngon drang srong sngo bsangs zhes byar gang tshe gyur pa na// ri mchog gnas na brtul zhugs dga' zhing bla ma la yang dga'// mi mi
126b1(mdo sde): bdag pos dug mda' dag gis khyod la bsnun pa na/ / khyod ni rgyal po de la yid 'khrugs med cing snying brtser gyur// khyod sngon ri dgas bdag po yon tan can du gyur pa'i tshe// ri gzar 'bab
126b2(mdo sde): chu chen pos mi zhig khyer bar gyur pa na/ / phan dang ldan pa khyod kyis mi de phyung ste thang la bzhag/ khyod kyi dgra bo khrid de 'ongs pa na yang yid ma 'khrugs// mi mchog khyod sngon bram ze'i bur ni gang che
126b3(mdo sde): gyur pa na/ / khyod kyi nor bu rgya mtsho chen po yangs par lhung ba'i tshe// khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po zad par bya bar brtsams pa dang // stobs brtan khyu mchog khyod kyi nor bu de tshe phyir yang rnyed// skyes
126b4(mdo sde): bu mchog khyod gna' sngon drang srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe/ / bram ze zhig gis bdag gi skyabs gyur shog ces khyod gan 'ongs// smras pa bram ze dam pa kho bo dgra las phyung zhes byas// khyod kyis
126b5(mdo sde): rang lus btang gi bram ze de ma btang ngo / / gna' sngon shing gi gnas su drang srong sngo ba sangs drung 'ongs te// 'dod pas smras pa shing 'di lo ma du yod grongs shes byas// shing 'di lo ma
126b6(mdo sde): ji snyed yod par rab grangs rab mkhas pas/ / khyod kyi de bzhin nor pa med cing mthun par tshig tu brjod// khyod sngon ne co yon tan ldan gyur shing la gnas pa'i tshe// zad par gyur kyang sngon gyi drin
126b7(mdo sde): la bsams te de ma spangs/ / lha yi bdag po khyod kyi yon tan dran nas rab tu dga'// snga mkho bzhin du shing mchog de ni dpal dang ldan par byas// khyod kyi brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad pa de
127a1(mdo sde): dag mtshungs med de/ / yon tan ldan pa yon tan lam la spyad pas yon tan mang // khyod kyi dus la dbang grong khyer bcas pa'i sa yang thob // 'gro ba dag ni rgyal po
127a2(mdo sde): yon tan spyod la myur du khod/ / gang gi tshe na bud med rin chen bzang po'i gos kyis lus brgyan te// sil snyan dam pa mchog rab yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab sgrog pa// de tshe phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i gzi
127a3(mdo sde): yis tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs pa/ / sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'di dag sil snyan dag gis sgra las rab tu byung // rga dang shi bas zin pa'i 'jig rten dag la bdag ni skyabs gyur ces// 'jig rten
127a4(mdo sde): sgron ma khyod kyis bskal mang snga rol smon lam de skad btab/ / mi yi seng ge khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam dag ni dran gyis shig/ rkang gnyis dbang po khyod de mngon par 'byung ba'i dus ni 'di yin no//
127a5(mdo sde): khyod 'dir srid pa khrag khrig dag tu sbyin pa mang po du ma byin// nor dang rin po che dang gser dang gos bzangs rin chen spras pa dang // rkang lag dag dang mig dang phangs pa'i bu dang rgyal srid 'byor pa dag
127a6(mdo sde): khyod kyis btang yang khyod ni slong ba rnams la tha ba zhe sdang med/ / khyod 'dir zla ba'i tog dang mche ba bzang dang rgyal po zhi bar gyur// snying brtse snying rje'i yid dang zla ba'i sgron dang gtsug na nor bur gyur//
127a7(mdo sde): rgyal po dpa' bo brtan dang mig bzangs dang ni de la sogs pa byas// rgyal po khrag khrig mang po sbyin dga' rnam par 'phrul pa de nyid khyod// bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyis bskal pa mang por
127b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims spyod pa spyad/ / nor bu rin chen dri ma med pa lta bur tshul khrims rnam dag gyur// khyod kyis 'bri yi rnga ma ci 'dra de 'drar tshul khrims bsrungs shing spyad// tshul khrims dga' bas khyed/
127b2(mdo sde): kyis 'dir ni 'gro la rgya chen don yang byas// 'dir khyod glang po mchog tu gyur te rngon pa dgra yis mdas bsnun tshe// gtun po dgra la snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas de ni khyod kyis bskyabs// bzang zhing
127b3(mdo sde): mdzes pa'i mche ba yongs su btang ste tshul khrims yongs ma btang / / khyod kyis de la sogs pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa mang po byas// bzod la dga' bas khyod kyis 'gro ba'i mi phan
127b4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal stong ming dang / / tshig rtsub dag dang bsad pa dang ni bcing ba mang po bzod pa byas// khyod kyis gna' sngon mi gang dag la bde ba kun gyis rim gror byas// de dag phyi nas khyod kyi gshed
127b5(mdo sde): mar gyur kyang khyod kyis de dag bzod/ / mgon po khyod ni ri mchog gnas na gang tshe dred mor gyur pa'i tshe// kha ba bab cing chu brug pa ni 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mi bzung ste// rtsa ba 'bras bu rnam par
127b6(mdo sde): mang dang bde ba kun gyis rim gro byas/ / de yis myur du khyod la gsod pa khrid 'ongs khyod kyis de la bzod// byang chub btsal phyir brtul zhugs dka' thub yon tan rnam mang ye shes la// khyod
127b7(mdo sde): kyis brtson 'grus shin tu brtan par gnas shing mi g.yo g.yo ba med/ / dbang sgyur bdud kyang khyod kyi brtson 'grus stobs kyis stobs ni med par byas// mi yi seng ge khyod 'dir mngon par
128a1(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i dus la dbab bo/ / khyod 'dir gna' sngon kha ba'i kha dog 'dra ba'i rta mchog gyur pa'i che// snying rje bskyed nas nam mkha' las ni srin po'i gling du myur du song //
128a2(mdo sde): de tshe 'phongs shing 'dug pa'i mi de blangs te bde la rab tu bzhag/ khyod kyis 'di la sogs pa brtson 'grus rnam par 'phrul pa mang po byas// myur du 'gyur zhing g.yo la yul la dga' zhing rgod pa'i
128a3(mdo sde): sems btul te/ / bsam gtan par gyur dul des zhi gnas rnams kyis nyon mongs gtso bo bcom// khyod 'dir bsam gtan dga' bas rang gi yon tan dag gis 'gro don byas// da 'dir sems
128a4(mdo sde): can mchog khyod bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bya ba'i dus la bab/ / gna' sngon khyod ni drang srong bsam gtan dga' zhing rab tu gnas par gyur// rgyal po med pa'i mi dag gis ni khyod khring rgyal srid
128a5(mdo sde): dbang yang bskur/ / khyod kyis skye bo dag ni dge ba bcu dang tshangs pa'i lam la bkod// de yi tshe na mi las shi 'phos thams cad tshangs pa'i gnas su dong // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
128a6(mdo sde): 'gro ba rnam mang shes pa'i cho ga khyod rab mkhas/ / gzhan gyi spyod dang 'gro ba'i skad shes pa dang dbang po shes pa dang // tshul dang dul dang blo gros rnam mang rgyu ba'i pha rol khyod phyin gyur//
128a7(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras khyod 'dir ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la dbab bo// khyod kyis gna' sngon skye bo lta ba log par zhugs par gyur pa dag/ rga shi sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos nyam thag
128b1(mdo sde): 'khod pa 'di mthong nas/ / srid pa rnam par bzhig pa'i drang lam nyid kyis khong du chud byas te// mun pa bcom pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la don chen rab tu byas// tshigs bcad//
128b2(mdo sde): rnam pa mang po mdzes pa yon tan ldan pa sna tshogs 'dis// sil snyan sgra bsgrags de las rgyal ba'i gzi yis dpa' bo bskul bar gyur// blo mchog ldan pa khyod 'dir mngon par 'byung ba'i
128b3(mdo sde): dus ni dbab kyis/ / sdug bsngal gang ba'i skye bo 'di dag mthong nas btang snyoms ma byed cig/ bud med gos dang rin po che dang do shal spos phreng sna tshogs kyis// brgyan pa dag kyang
128b4(mdo sde): sems dang phangs pa skyes nas rab tu dga' ba rnams/ / sems can mchog la sil snyan rab tu sgrog cing slong bar byed pa na// rgyal ba'i mthu yis sil snyan dag las tshigs su bcad
128b5(mdo sde): pa 'di 'dra byung / / gang gi don du khyod kyis 'gro la phan phyir bskal pa du mar ni// btang bar dka' ba btang zhing tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus shin tu spyad// bsam gtan shes rab
128b6(mdo sde): shin tu bsgoms pa khyod kyi dus la da bab kyis/ / 'dren pa mngon par 'byung ba'i blo la myur soms phyi shol ma byed cig/ sngon chad rin chen mdzod dang gser dang dngul dang rgyan rnams rab
128b7(mdo sde): tu btang / / skye ba de dang de dag tu ni mchod sbyin rnam pa mang po byas// khyod kyis chung ma bu po bu mo lus dang rgyal srid srog btang ste// byang chub don du gtang bar dka' ba dpag tu med pa khyod kyis
129a1(mdo sde): btang / khyod ni rgyal po mi dman bsod nams dpal gyis rnam par grags par gyur// mu khyud 'dzin dang mu khyud nag po tshangs pas byin dang ral pa can// mchod/
129a2(mdo sde): sbyin stong ldan dang ni chos sems 'od 'phro can dang nor bstan dang // shin tu don bsams gyur te sems can dman la gtang bar dka' ba btang // zla ba'i bu dang brtson 'grus 'bar dang
129a3(mdo sde): bsod nams 'od zer can du gyur/ / gtong ba tshe dang ldan zhing mthu ldan khyod ni byas pa bzo bar gyur// rgyal po drang srong zla ba gzugs ldan dpa'o bden pa 'phel ba dang // rgyal po legs
129a4(mdo sde): par smra ba tshol dang blo gros bzang dang nges par gyur/ / zla ba'i 'od dang khyad par 'gro dang rdul dang phyogs kyi bdag por gyur// rab sbyin dpa' bo ka shi rgyal po rin chen gtsug phud zhi ba ston// mi
129a5(mdo sde): dbang de dag rnams dang gzhan du gyur te btang bar dka' ba btang / / khyod kyis ji ltar gtong ba'i char phab de bzhin chos kyi char pa pho bo// khyod kyis sngon chad sems can snying po gang+gA'i bye ma snyed cig/
129a6(mdo sde): mthong // sems can thar par bya phyir byang chub dam pa'i mchog ni tshol ba na// khyod kyis mchod pa dpag med bsam mi khyab pas sangs rgyas de dag mchod// dpa'o grong khyer dam pa 'di nas
129a7(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i dus la dbab bo/ / thog mar khyod kyis don yod thong las la'i me tog gis ni mchod// rnam par snang mdzad la ni rang ba'i sems kyis skad cig bar du bltas// rnga dbyangs ldan pa
129b1(mdo sde): la ni khyod kyis a ru ra yi 'bru gcig phul/ / tsan dan mthong nas khyod kyis rtsa yi me sgron blangs te khyim du bzung // rdul po grong khyer 'jug pa mthong nas phye ma spar gang rab tu gtor// chos kyi dbang /
129b2(mdo sde): phyag chos 'chad pa na legs shes bya ba rab tu byin// kun tu gzigs pa mthong nas phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod// 'od 'phro chen po'i phung po la ni khyod kyis dga' bas gser phreng
129b3(mdo sde): gtor/ / 'od zer rgyal mtshan la ni kha tshar phul zhing gsal la bal sran gtor// ye shes tog la mya ngan med pa'i me tog kha lo sgyur la 'jams// rin chen gtsug tor can la mar me pad+ma ldan la
129b4(mdo sde): sman yang phul/ / thams cad zil gnon mu tig do shal rgya mtsho la ni pad+ma phul// pad+ma'i snying po la ni bla re seng ge la ni char gding phul// sa la'i dbang po rgyal la mar phul me tog rgyas la 'o ma phul
129b5(mdo sde): grags sbyin kun ta'i me tog phul te bden pa gzigs la zhal zas phul/ / ye shes lhun la lus btung klus byin la ni na bzab dbul ba byas// rab mthor gshegs dang tsan dan mchog dang 'od ldan
129b6(mdo sde): la ni tshwa sAr re/ / bkod pa che la pad+ma dbul byas 'od zer rgyal la rin chen phul// shAkya thub la sngar gang gser phul dbang po'i tog la bstod pa byas// nyi ma'i zhal la me tog rna rgyan blo gros bzang
129b7(mdo sde): la gser cod pan/ / klu zil gnon la nor bu phul te rgyal la ras bcos gding ba phul// sman gyi rgyal ba 'i chen gdugs phul seng ge'i tog la khrig dan phul// man tan mchog ldan rin chen dra
130a1(mdo sde): ba 'od srungs la ni glu dbyangs kun/ / spos mchog me tog phul zhing 'od 'phro'i tog la rtag tu me tog phul// mi 'khrugs rgyal la khang brtsegs phul zhing 'jig rten
130a2(mdo sde): mchod la phreng ba phul/ / rgyal spos gtsug la rgyal srid dbul byas rgyal bar dka' la spos kun phul// sgron ma che la bdag phul pad+ma'i mchog la rgyan rnams dbul ba byas// chos kyi tog la me
130a3(mdo sde): tog sna tshogs sgron ma mdzad la ut+pa la/ / mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pa na// khyod kyis sems can snying po de dag rnams dang gzhan yang sngon chad mchod// 'das
130a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang ston pa de dag khyod mchod dran par gyis/ / sems can mgon med mya ngan gang ba mdor mngon par byung // mar me mdzad pa mthong ba tsam gyis khyod kyis bzod pa mchog
130a5(mdo sde): thob ste/ / rjes su mthun pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po nyams pa med pa thob// de nas rab tu dga' bas bskal pa grangs med 'jig rten khams kun tu// sangs rgyas dag ni re re la yang
130a6(mdo sde): mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab byas/ / bskal pa dpag med de dag zad gyur sangs rgyas de dag mya ngan 'das// khyod kyis lus rnams thams cad dang ni de dag ming yang gang du song // dngos po
130a7(mdo sde): thams cad tha mar mdzad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med/ / 'dod pa rgyal srid longs spyod rtag pa min gyis grong khyer mchog nas byang // bskal pa bzad par 'gyur tshe gzi brjid drag po
130b1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'i me 'od ltar/ / rga dang na dang 'chi ba mi bzad 'jigs pa chen po 'ong bar 'gyur// dngos po thams cad tha mar mdzad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med// shin tu sdug bsngal
130b2(mdo sde): sems can ltos la yon tan ldan pa mngon par byang / / rgyal po bde ba'i mal na nyal gyur cing // gang tshe mo tshogs gling bu rgyud gcig dang // sil snyan sna tshogs sgra yis spong byed pa// de rje
130b3(mdo sde): sil snyan sgra las 'di dag byung / / srid gsum rga dang nad kyi sdug bsngal 'bar// 'chi med rab 'bar 'di ni mgon med pa// srid las 'byung la 'gro ba rtag tu rmongs// bum par chud pa'i
130b4(mdo sde): bung ba 'khor ba bzhin/ / srid gsum mi brtan ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra// 'gro ba'i skye 'chi gar la lha dang mtshungs// 'gro ba'i tshe 'gro nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste// rig zar 'bab chu lta bur
130b5(mdo sde): myur 'gyogs 'gro/ / srid sred ma rig dbang gis skye bo rnams// mi dang lha gnas ngan song lam gsum po// 'gro ba lnga po dag tu mi mkhas 'khor// dper na rdza mkhan phang lo skor ba bzhin//
130b6(mdo sde): rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra snyan dang // dri zhim ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa// dus ngan snyil 'gro ba 'di dag thogs// dper na rngon pa'i rI ya spre'u thogs bzhin// 'dod pa'i yon tan
130b7(mdo sde): mya ngan gnod pa mang / / 'jigs bcas rtag tu dgra byed nyon mongs bcas// ral gri'i so 'dra dug sdong lo ma mtshungs// ngan skyugs snod ltar 'phags pa'i skye bos spangs// 'dod pa'i
131a1(mdo sde): yon tan 'jigs bcas nyon mongs bcas/ / rtag tu rjed par byed pa mun pa 'dra// rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu byed sdug bsngal rtsa// srid pa'i sred pa'i 'a bri shing 'phel bar//
131a2(mdo sde): byed/ ji ltar me 'bar 'obs ni 'jigs bcas pa// de ltar 'dod 'di 'phags pa'i skye bos rig/ 'dam rdzab che 'dra ral gyi gshegs nas 'dra// ral gri so la sbrang rtsis bskus dang mtshungs//
131a3(mdo sde): ji ltar sbrul gyi mgo dang ngan skyugs snod// de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis rig/ bya sha kham bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra// ro la khyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yin// 'dod pa'i yon
131a4(mdo sde): tan 'di dag chu zla 'dra/ / gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag cha 'dra ba dang / mig yor 'dra zhing gar la blta 'dra dang // rmi lam mnyam par 'phags pa'i skye bos rig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan
131a5(mdo sde): skad cig ya ma brla/ / sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra zhing brdzun pa can// chu bur dbu ba lta bur yang dag min// yongs su btags las byung bar mkhas pas rtogs// na chod thog mar gzugs
131a6(mdo sde): mchog 'dzin pa'i tshe/ sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod// rga na sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom nas// rnam par spong ste ri dgas klung skam bzhin// nor 'bru dam pa'i rdzas mang stong
131a7(mdo sde): ldan che/ / phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod// nor nyams sdug bsngal bar ni gyur pa'i tshe// rnam par spong ste mi yis 'brog stong bzhin// ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras
131b1(mdo sde): bcas shing / / de ltar sbyin 'dod mi la dga' bar byed// nar nyams rgabs nyan cing spong ba na// de tshe dga' bar mi 'gyur bya rgod bzhin// rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan tshed dpon po bzhin/
131b2(mdo sde): phrad na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed// rga na sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad na// de tshe 'dod par mi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin// rga bas rga byas mchod lal gyur na// sdong po gnam ldugs
131b3(mdo sde): kyis ni bcom pa bzhin/ / rga bas 'khogs nas 'jig pa khang rul 'dra// rga las byung ba thub pa myur du spros// bud med skyes pa'i tshogs rnams rga bas skems// ma lu'i 'khri shings
131b4(mdo sde): la'i nags stug bzhin/ / rga bas brtson 'grus rtsal dang shugs 'phrog ste// dper na skyes bu 'dam du bying ba bzhin// rga bas gzugs sdug gzugs ni mi sdug byed// rga bas
131b5(mdo sde): gzi brjid 'phrog cing mthu stobs 'phrog/ rga bas bde ba 'phrog cing brnyas par byed// rga bas 'chi byed rga bas mdangs kyang 'phrog/ nad brgya mang dang nad thibs sdug bsngal gyis//
131b6(mdo sde): 'gro ba gtses te mi yis yi dgas bzhin// rga dang na bas bcom pa'i 'gro ltos la// sdug bsngal las ni 'byung ba myur shod cig/ dper na dgun slad rlung dang kha ba che// rtswa shing
131b7(mdo sde): gal ba nags sman mdangs kyang 'phrog/ de ltar nang 'di 'gro ba'i mdangs 'phrog cing // dbang po gzugs dang stobs ni nyams par byed// nor 'bru nor ches tha mar zad par byed//
132a1(mdo sde): nad ni rtag tu 'gro ba brnyas par byed// gnod pa byed cing sdug la sdang bar byed// yongs su gdung byed mkha' la nyi ma bzhin// 'chi dang 'pho dang 'chi 'pho dus byed pa/
132a2(mdo sde): phangs shing sdug pa'i skye bo rtag tu 'bral// phyir mi 'ong zhing 'phrad par 'gyur ma yin// shing las lo 'bru 'dra zhing klu yi rgyun dang mtshungs// 'chi ba dbang yod pa dag dbang med byed// 'chi ba
132a3(mdo sde): 'phrog byed chu bos shing ded bzhin/ / mi ni gnyis min grogs med gcig pu 'gro// rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dbang yang med// 'chi bas srog chags brgya phrag mang 'dzin te// 'byung
132a4(mdo sde): po'i tshogs la rgya mtsho'i chu srin bzhin/ / klu la mkha' lding glang chen seng ge 'dra// rtswa rtsi 'byung po'i tshogs la me dang mtshungs// skyon brgya mang po 'di 'dra 'di dag las// 'gro ba sgrol zhes
132a5(mdo sde): khyod kyis smon lam btab/ / sngon gyi smon lam spyod pa de dran byos// khyod ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab// gang tshe bud med tshogs ni rab dga' zhing // sil snyan dag gis thub chen slong
132a6(mdo sde): byed pa/ / de tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi mthus// tshigs bcad sna tshogs sil snyan sgra las byung // 'dus byas thams cad myur du 'jig pa ste// mkha' la glog rgyun ring du mi gnas bzhin/
132a7(mdo sde): khyod kyis dus 'di nye bar gnas gyur gyis// brtul zhugs bzang po mngon 'byung dus la bab// 'du byed mi rtag brtan pa ma yin te// rdza so ma btang lta bur 'jig pa'i bdag/ gzhan gyi rdzas
132b1(mdo sde): ni brnyan po byas dang mtshungs/ / bye ma'i grong khyer lta bur ring mi thogs// 'du byed 'di dag 'jig pa'i chos can de// dbyar gyi zhal la ji ltar 'gogs pa bzhin// chu ngogs bye ma yod pa 'dra ba ste/
132b2(mdo sde): rkyen la rag las rang bzhin nyam chung ba// 'du byed mar me'i 'od 'phro 'dra ba ste// myur du 'byung zhing 'gag pa'i chos can yin// rlung dang mtshungs par ring du mi gnas la// dbu pa lta bur nyam chung
132b3(mdo sde): snying po med/ / 'du byed g.yo ba med cing stong pa ste// brtags na chu shing dag gis phung po 'dra// sgyu ma lta bur sems ni rmongs par byed// lag bcangs stong pas byis pa 'bring dang mtshungs// 'dus
132b4(mdo sde): byas gyur pa thams cad rgyu dag dang / / rkyen rnams kyis ni rab tu 'byung ba ste// gcig gis gcig rgyu byas te brten nas byung // byis pa'i skye bos 'di 'dra de ma rtogs// dper na gres ma mun dza
132b5(mdo sde): brten byas la/ / rtsol ba'i stobs kyis thag par sgyur ba dang // zo chun rgyud mo 'khor lor bcas pa yang // de dag re res 'grub par 'gyur ba med// de ltar srid pa'i yan lag kun grub pa//
132b6(mdo sde): gzhan dang gzhan tshogs pa la brten nas ni// de dag so so re rer 'grub par 'gyur// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs// sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te// sa bon gang yin myu gu de nyid
132b7(mdo sde): min/ de las gzhan min de yang ma yin te// de ltar rtag min chad min chos nyid do// ma rig pa yi 'du byed rkyen yin te// 'du byed de yang yang dag nyid du med// ma rig pa dang 'du byed de dag kyang
133a1(mdo sde): rang bzhin stong ste g.yo ba med pa yin/ / rgya las rgya yi 'bur mi snang mod kyi// rgya de 'phos par dmigs babang yod ma yin// de las de med gzhan las ma yin te// de ltar/
133a2(mdo sde): 'dus byas rtag med chad pa med// mig dang gzugs la brten pa byas nas su// mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dir 'byung yang // mig ni gzugs la rten pa ma yin la// gzugs kyang mig la 'pho/
133a3(mdo sde): ba yod ma yin// 'di dag bdag med mi sdug chos can yang // de dag bdag dang sdug par btags pa ste// nor pa yang dag ma yin btags yin yang // de las mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung //
133a4(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa 'gags nas 'byung 'gyur te// mkhas pas skye dang 'jig pa rnam par mthong // gang du ma song gang nas 'ongs pa min// rnal 'byor pas ni stong pa sgyu ltar mthong // dper na gtsung
133a5(mdo sde): shing dang ni gtsub stan dang / / lag pas bcol ba byas pa gsum tshogs pa// de la brten nas me ni 'byung 'gyur te// byung nas ring por mi thogs 'gags par 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las
133a6(mdo sde): brtags byas te/ / 'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags byas na// de yi 'ong ba'am 'gro ba mi dmigs so// phung po dag dang skye mched khams
133a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi/ / rkyen ni ma rig pa dang sred dang las// de dag tshogs pa sems can zhes brjod kyang // de ni dam pa'i don du dmigs su med// mchu dang lkog ma rkan la brten nas ni// lce bsgyur ba las
133b1(mdo sde): yi ge'i sgra 'byung yang / / lkog mar brten nas ma yin rkan las min// re re la ni yi ge dmigs su med// tshogs pa de la brten nas ngag de ni// yid kyi blo yi dbang gis 'byung mod kyi// yid dang ngag ni//
133b2(mdo sde): mi snang gzugs med de// nang dang phyi rol na yang dmigs su med// mkhas pas ngag skad sgra dang dbyangs rnams kyi// skye dang 'jig la rnam par brtags byas na// de tshe ngag kun brag cha lta bu dang //
133b3(mdo sde): skad cig pa dang snying po med par mthong // dper na shing dang rgyud la brten byas la// lag pas brtsol ba byas pa gsum tshogs na// sgra snyan pi wang gling bu la sogs pa// de dag las ni sgra yang 'byung
133b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ / de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te// 'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags byas na// sgra yi 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mi dmigs so//
133b5(mdo sde): de ltar rgyu dag dang ni rkyen rnams las// 'du byed gyur pa thams cad byung ba ste// yang dag mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni// 'du byed stong pa g.yo ba med par mthong // phung po dag dang skye mched
133b6(mdo sde): khams rnams ni/ / nang yang stong la phyi rol stong pa ste// thams cad bdag gis dben zhing gnas med la// chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag ni//
133b7(mdo sde): mar me mdzad pa mthong nas khyed kyis rtogs// ji ltar nyid kyis rjes su rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin lha mir bcas pa rtogs par gyis// gnod pa yang dag ma yin brtags pa yi// 'dod chags
134a1(mdo sde): zhe sdang dag gis 'gro ba gdungs/ / snying rje'i sprin las zhi ba bsil pa'i chu// 'dren pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab tu phob// byang chub dam pa yang dag thob nas ni// 'phags pa'i
134a2(mdo sde): nor gyis srog chags bsdu'o zhes/ / mkhas pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir// bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// 'phags pa'i nor gyis dman dbul
134a3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal la/ / sems can kha lo sgyur ba ma g.yel bar// 'phags pa'i nor gyis de dag bsdu bar gyis// ngan song sa yi lam ni bcas pa dang // mtho ris bdud rtsi'i sgo mo'i mchog de nika
134a4(mdo sde): sems can bye ba mang la bstan zhes te/ / khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims shin tu bsrungs// tshul khrims ldan pa'i bsam pa 'grub 'gyur gyis// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// ngan song
134a5(mdo sde): gsum po'i sa yi sgo chod de/ / mtho ris bdud rtsi'i sgo ni dbye bar gyis// srog chags rnams kyi khong khro khro gzhi la dang // srid pa'i mtsho las sems can bsgral byas te// zhi bde rims nad
134a6(mdo sde): med la dgod do zhes/ / khyod kyis rtag tu bzod pa shin tu bsgoms// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// dgra dang gnod sems 'tshe bas dkrugs pa yi// 'tshe ba spyod pa yal bar ma dor bar//
134a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba 'di dag bzod pa'i sa la khod// chos kyi gru ni legs par sbyar byas la// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba rnams bsgral te// zhi bde rims nad med la dgod do zhes// gang gi don du khyod kyis
134b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brten/ / sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// 'gro ba chu bo bzhi yis khyer gyur pa// sems can mgon med pa dag brtson stobs dang // brtul ba'i shugs kyis myur du 'di/
134b2(mdo sde): dag thon// dbang po 'khrul dang phal pa'i dbang po dang // spre'u 'dra'i sems las zhi gnas ngas dgod ces// 'dren pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir// nyon mongs gzhal ba'i bsam gtan
134b3(mdo sde): sgoms gyur pa/ / sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// nyon mongs dra bas dkrugs par gyur pa yi// 'gro la ma g.yel nyon mongs gtses pa las// bsam gtan mchog la skye dgu 'di
134b4(mdo sde): dag khod/ / gti mug ma rig mun pa bsgribs pa yi// 'gro ba chos brgya mang po mthong byed pa// yang dag mthong ba'i mig ni sbyin no zhes// khyod kyis sngon chad shes rab shin tu bsgoms//
134b5(mdo sde): sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyi sa la// gti mug ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa yi// 'gro la shes rab dam pa 'od bzang ba// chos mig dri med nyon mongs med pa byin// bud med rnams kyi
134b6(mdo sde): sil snyan glu dbyangs las/ / tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'dra 'di byung ste// de thos nas ni rgyags pa rnams spangs nas// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems btang ngo // dge slong dag de ltar
134b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe/ / chos mnyan pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// chos yid la byed pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di ltar
135a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po sa rlos chos smra ba rnams la gus pa dang bcas par gyur cing / / bsam pa thag pa nas chos don du gnyer ba/ chos 'dod pa/ chos kyi
135a2(mdo sde): kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par gyur pa/ / chos tshol bas ngoms mi shes pa ji ltar thos pa'i chos yang dag par ston pa// bla na med pa'i chos chen po'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa// zang zing
135a3(mdo sde): med par chos ston pa/ / chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna med pa/ slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba// chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa// chos la nan tan byed pa la dpa' ba// chos
135a4(mdo sde): la gnas su 'dzin pa/ chos la skyabs su 'dzin pa// chos la dpung gnyen du 'dzin pa// chos la brten pa/ chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pas nges par byung ba// shes rab kyi
135a5(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa ste/ thabs la mkhas pas rtogs par khong du chud pa yin no// dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa chen pos rnam par rtse zhing btsun mo'i
135a6(mdo sde): 'khor thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod lam ni bstan/ / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dang
135a7(mdo sde): mthun par bya ba'i chos nyid dang mthun par ni byas/ / yun ring po nas 'dod pa'i skyon shin tu rtogs pa yin yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis 'dod pa'i longs spyod ni kun
135b1(mdo sde): tu bstan/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyi tshogs kyi khyad par gyis 'jig rten gyi dbang du bya ba mtshungs pa med pa ni kun tu bstan/ lha dang mi'i las
135b2(mdo sde): shin tu 'das pa snying po dang ldan zhing rgya che la/ rnam pa tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg mchog tu dga' ba nyams dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba bde ba ni bstan//
135b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i yul thams cad la 'dzin pa med par rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba ni bstan/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis grogs su gyur pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems
135b4(mdo sde): can rnams ni mtshungs par gnas pas yongs su smin par byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad kyis ni sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa med par btsun mo'i
135b5(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mang na gnas te/ ji ltar/ gron du gnyer ba'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus la lta zhing / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rgya cher sngon gyi dam bcas pa rjes
135b6(mdo sde): su dran no/ / sangs rgyas dang chos kyang mngon du byed do// smon lam gyi stobs kyang mngon par sgrub bo// sems can rnams la yang snying rje chen po gtong ngo // sems can rab tu thar par bya bar
135b7(mdo sde): yang sems so/ / 'byor pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud pa yin par yang so sor rtog go// 'khor ba la gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa mang po du ma yod par yang rtog go// bdud dang nyes pa'i zhagras
136a1(mdo sde): pa yang yang dag par gcod do/ / 'khor ba'i rgyud las kyang bdag nyid 'da' bar byed do// mya ngan las 'das pa la yang sems yang dag par gtong ngo //
136a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dgu pa// dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mtha' nyid nas kyang
136a3(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i skyon shin tu rig pa yin/ / 'dus byas la bsam pa thag pa nas don du mi gnyer ba yin/ nye bar len pa yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad don du mi gnyer ba yin// sangs rgyas kyi chos
136a4(mdo sde): don du gnyer ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin/ 'khor ba la rgyab kyis bltas pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la mngon du dga' ba yin// bdud kyi spyod yul
136a5(mdo sde): dang ma 'dres pa yin/ / srid pa la 'bar bar skyon du mthong ba yin/ khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i bsam pa can yin/ 'khor ba'i skyon dang nyes dmigs dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin// /
136a6(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa yin// mngon par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can yin// dben pa la gzhol ba yin/ dben pa la bab pa yin/ dgon pa dang bas mtha' la mngon par dga' ba yin//
136a7(mdo sde): rab tu dben pa bsten pa rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa yin/ bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin// bla na med pa'i nan tan la dpa' ba yin// 'jig rten gyi don du 'dod pa yin/ phan par
136b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa yin/ bde bar 'dod pa yin/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba can yin/ phan par 'dod pa can yin/ byams pa la gnas pa can yin/ snying rje chen po
136b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yin/ bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa yin/ rtag tu yid yongs su mi g.yo ba yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can thams
136b3(mdo sde): cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par sems pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar yongs su btang ba yin/ sbyin pa 'ged pa la dga' ba yin/ lhag par gtong
136b4(mdo sde): ba yin/ lag brkyang ba yin/ gtong ba la dpa' ba yin/ mchod sbyin byas pa yin/ bsod nams shin tu phun sum tshogs pa yin// bsod nams kyi yo byad shin tu bzung ba yin// dri ma dang ser
136b5(mdo sde): sna dang bral ba yin/ sems kun tu ma bzung ba yin/ bla na med pa'i sbyin bdag chen po yin// byin nas kyang rnam par smin pa la mi re ba yin/ sbyin pa la dpa' ba yin/ 'dod pa dang 'dod pa
136b6(mdo sde): che ba dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang / rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / gti mug dang / ser sna la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tsho gas phyir rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa'i phyir/
136b7(mdo sde): mngon par byung ba yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rgyun las mi g.yo ba yin/ gtong ba chen po'i sems kyi go cha shin tu bgos pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba can yin
137a1(mdo sde): phan pa 'dod pa can yin/ ya yang bgos pa yin/ go cha bgos pa yin/ sems can rab tu thar par bya ba la dmigs pa yin/ snying rje chen po'i stobs dang rnam par gnon pa
137a2(mdo sde): dang pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa yin/ phyir mi ldog pa yin/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin/ gtong ba'i lag cha can yin/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang re ba ji lta ba bzhin du
137a3(mdo sde): tshim par byed pa yin/ byang chub kyi snod du gyur pa yin/ dus dang phyed par chos rtogs pa yin/ smon lam byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin/ rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal ba yin/ 'khor
137a4(mdo sde): gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon cha sra ba dang ldan pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i phyir rgol ba shin tu tshar gcod pa yin/ tshul
137a5(mdo sde): khrims dang yon tan dang spyod pa la zhugs pa yin/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' legs par bsrungs pa yin// kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba yin/ tshul
137a6(mdo sde): khrims yongs su dag pa yin/ dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral la dri ma spangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ ngan du smras pa dang / ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / brgyad pa dang / spro ba dang //
137a7(mdo sde): smad pa dang / bshung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / gzung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sems ma rnyogs pa yin/ sems ma 'khrugs pa
137b1(mdo sde): yin/ bzod pa dang nges pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gnod par mi sems pa yin/ gnod pa mi byed pa yin/ gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ sems can thams
137b2(mdo sde): cad la phan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus 'bar ba brtsams pa yin/ yi dam la brtan pa yin/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa la phyir mi ldog pa yin/ dran pa dang ldan pa yin//
137b3(mdo sde): shes bzhin can yin/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin/ sems ma g.yengs pa yin/ bsam gtan la rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa yin/ chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin//
137b4(mdo sde): snang ba thob pa yin/ mun pa mun nag dang bral ba yin/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam par sems yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ dran pa nye
137b5(mdo sde): bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad
137b6(mdo sde): shin tu yongs su spyang ba byas pa'i yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis shin tu dkar bar byas pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba yin
137b7(mdo sde): bden pa rjes su rtogs pas gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis rnam par rtse ba yin/ chos thams cad kyi tshul sgyu ma dang / rmig rgyu dang / chu zla dang
138a1(mdo sde): khrag cha dang / mig yor lta bur rtogs pa yin no// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' de ni de ltar rang bzhin gyis chos la gnas pa yin/ de ltar ye shes la gnas/
138a2(mdo sde): pa yin/ de ltar yon tan gyi che ba nyid la gnas pa yin/ de ltar sems can gyi don la brtson par gnas pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs
138a3(mdo sde): pa'i sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis rgya cher bskul ba dang / de'i tshe sngon gyi don gyi byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma par gyur pa rnams kyi
138a4(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor yongs su smin par bya ba'i chos kyis sgo bzhi mngon du byed do/ / bzhi gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang /
138a5(mdo sde): don mthun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sbyor ba/ bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i bsam
138a6(mdo sde): ba chud mi za ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su
138a7(mdo sde): mi btang ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa snying rje chen po'i stobs la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / don
138b1(mdo sde): larnam par nges pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyi stobs kyi khyad par yang dag par bsgrub pa bkang ba chen pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgro mngon du byed pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpas rjes kyis
138b2(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag mngon du byas nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe rnam pa ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas
138b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i mthus sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu brgya stong 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byed do/ / mos pa rgya chen
138b4(mdo sde): dang ni bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam dang srog chags snying rje bas// byang chub dam pa'i mchog tu sems skye zhes// de 'dra'i sgra dog sil snyan rnams las byung // dang zhing dad dang mos dang
138b5(mdo sde): gus pa dang / nga rgyal med cing bla la 'dud pa dang / dri dang dge ba ci zhes tshol ba dang / rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i sgra byung ngo // sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang tshul khrims sgra// bzod pa'i sgra
138b6(mdo sde): dang de bzhin brtson 'grus sgra/ / bsam gtan mngon par bsgrub dang ting 'dzin sgra// shes rab dang ni thabs kyi sgra yang byung // byams pa'i sgra dang de bzhin snying rje'i sgra// dga' dang btang
138b7(mdo sde): snyoms mngon par shes pa'i sgra/ / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po rnam nges pas// sems can yongs su smin pa'i sgra yang byung // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rab phye sgra// yang dag spong dang de
139a1(mdo sde): bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang / / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga rab dbye dang // byang chub yan lag sgra ni sil snyan byung // yan lag brgyad pa'i 'phags lam mchog dbye dang //
139a2(mdo sde): zhi gnas sgra dang de bzhin lhag mthong sgra// mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bdag med sgra// mi sdug sgra yang sil snyan rnams las byung // 'dod chags bral sgra de bzhin dben pa'i sgra// zad
139a3(mdo sde): pa shes pa'i sgra dang mi skye sgra/ / 'gog pa'i sgra dang de bzhi gnas med sgra// mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra yang sil snyan byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// sil snyan
139a4(mdo sde): ngag las 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ste/ / sgra de thos nas bud med thams cad kyis// sems can mchog rab rjes brlabs byang chub smon// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i
139a5(mdo sde): 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pas/ bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / lha'i bu brgya stong mang po gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin
139a6(mdo sde): par byas par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byang ba'i dus la bab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu khrel yod pa'i lha zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag
139a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa des mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na/ lha'i bu 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro pa
139b1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir khang bzangs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ shi 'pho ba ni shin tu bstan// skyes bu seng
139b2(mdo sde): ges tshe yang bstan/ / btsun mo'i 'khor kyang bstan pa mdzad// khyod kyis 'jig rten rjes mthun mdzad// 'jig rten chos ni rjes thob pas// lha mi mang po yongs smin mdzad// mngon
139b3(mdo sde): par 'byung ba'i blo dgongs pa'i/ / de yi dus la deng bab po// ma grol bas ni sgrol mi nus// long bas lam yang ston mi nus// grol bas sgrol bar byed par nus// mig ldan long ba lam
139b4(mdo sde): ston nus/ sems can gang dag 'dod pas 'khol// khyim nor bu dang chung ma chags// de dag khyod kyi rjes slob cing // mngon par 'byung ba bzhed par mdzod// dbang phyug 'dod pas rtse
139b5(mdo sde): ba dang / gling bzhi rin chen bdun spangs te// khyod ni mngon par 'byung rig nas// lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos// khyod ni 'dod la mi dgyes te// bsam gtan bde bas gnas mdzad/
139b6(mdo sde): kyang // lha mi brgya phrag mang po dag/ gnyid kyis log nas sad par mdzad// ngar la bab 'di shin tu 'da'// rig zar 'bab chu mgyogs 'gro bzhin// dar la bab pa yal gyur nas//
139b7(mdo sde): mngon par 'byung ba mdzes ma lags// de slad thog mar gzhon pa'i tshe// dar bab dam par mngon byung ste// thugs dam nyam 'og chud mdzod la// lha mi'i don ni mdzad pa'i rigs// 'dod
140a1(mdo sde): ba'i yon tan mi ngoms te/ / dper na lan tshwa'i chu dang mtshungs// 'phags pa rdul med 'jig rten 'das// shes rab gang ldan de dag ngoms// khyod 'dir rgyal po zas
140a2(mdo sde): gtsang dang / / yul 'khor rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug/ 'dab ma brgya yi zhal 'dra ba// mngon par 'byung bar dgongs su gsol// nyon mongs gdung bas rab gdungs shing // 'byung med
140a3(mdo sde): bcing bas dam bcings rnams/ / dpa' bos myur du mtshungs med pa// thar lam zhi la dgod du gsol// khyod ni sman pa khams la mkhas// sems can yun ring na rnams la//
140a4(mdo sde): chos kyi sman ni sbyar mdzod de// mya ngan 'das pa de myur 'khod// mig med mun pa gti mug glags// lta ba'i dra bas dkris pa yi// lha rnams dang ni mi yi mig/ shes rab sgron mas myur
140a5(mdo sde): du sbyongs/ / byang chub thob par blta bya zhing // bla na med pa'i chos mnyan ces// lha dang lha min klu dag dang // gnod sbyin dri za mang po sdod// klu yi rgyal pos rang gi gnas// khyod kyi dpal
140a6(mdo sde): gyis snang bar mthong / / mchod pa dag ni mtha' yas bgyid// de yi brtul zhugs bsam bskongs// byang chub shing drung yid rdzogs la// lhung bzed bzhi ni dbul lo zhes// 'jig rten
140a7(mdo sde): skyong bzhi sder bcas pa/ / de dag khyod la sdod cing mchis// tshangs pa rab tu zhi spyod pa// byams ldan snying rje thob pa yang // bla med 'khor lo rab bskor bar// mi dbang gsol snyam sdod
140b1(mdo sde): cing mchis/ / byang chub bsnyen bkur byed pa'i lha// byang chub snying por gnas rnams kyang // byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba// blta'o zhes te sdod cing mchis// byang chub sems dpa' btsun
140b2(mdo sde): mo'i nang / bya ba ston pa gzhan yang mchis// de dag thog mar khyod gyur mdzod// de dag 'og tu lus sa re// dbyangs snyan cing ni dbyangs 'jam pa// mar me mdzad kyis lung ston dgod//
140b3(mdo sde): yang dag de bzhin ma nor ba// rgyal ba'i sgra dbyangs bsgrag tu gsol// bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu des byang chub sems
140b4(mdo sde): dpa' bskul ma thag tu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rmi lam 'di bstan to/ / rgyal po zas gtsang ma gnyid kyi log pa'i rmi lam du rmis pa// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na/ lha'i
140b5(mdo sde): tshogs kyis bskor te/ mngon par 'byung zhing mngon par byung nas kyang rab tu byung ste/ gos ngur smrig gyon pa rmis so// de nas de sad pa dang / rings pa rings par nyung rum la dris pa
140b6(mdo sde): gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/ des smras pa lha bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du gzhon nu gdon mi 'tshal bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te/
140b7(mdo sde): snga ltas su snang ba ni 'di dag yin snyam nas/ khongs pa'i snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par gyur to// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gzhon nu ni skyed mos tshal gyi sar yang nam yang
141a1(mdo sde): 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ bud med kyi tshogs kyi nang na mngon par dga' bas 'di nyid du chags par 'gyur te/ mngon par 'byung bar ni mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas rgyal po
141a2(mdo sde): zas gtsang ma sa gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ dpyid dang dbyar dang ston gyi dus ji lta ba bzhin du khang bzangs gsum byed du bcug go// de la dpyid sa gang yin pa de ni shin tu bsil ba'o//
141a3(mdo sde): dbyar sa gang yin pa de ni grang dro ran pa'o// dgun sa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin gyi dro ba'o// khang bzangs re re'i gru skas rnams kyang mi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'dzugs shing 'degs so//
141a4(mdo sde): de dag de ltar 'dzugs shing bdegs pa na gzhon nu sus kyang ma tshor bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes sgra dpag tshad phyed du grag pa byung ngo // ltas pa dang / mtshan mkhan kun gyis kyang
141a5(mdo sde): gzhon nu ni chab sgo bkra shis pa nas/ mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de nas rgyal pos bkra shis kyi sgo'i sgo 'phar chen po byed du bcug ste/ sgo
141a6(mdo sde): 'phar re re yang mi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'byed cing gcod do/ / de dag gi sgra yang dpag tshad phyed du grag go/ de la 'dod pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa med pa yang sbyor ro// glu dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs len
141a7(mdo sde): ba dang / gar byed pa'i na chung dag kyang rtag tu bzhag par gyur to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas la lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ deng bskyed mo'i tshal gyi sar 'gros shing rta myur du sbyor
141b1(mdo sde): cig/ de nas kha lo sgyur rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du song ste 'di skad ces smras so// lha gzhon nu skyed mo'i tshal gyi sar 'byung ngo zhes gsung ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di
141b2(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gzhon nu skyed mo'i tshal gyi sar nam yang ma byung bas sa bzang po blta bar bya ba'i phyir bdag gis gzhon nu skyed mo'i tshal gyi sar phyung na/ 'on tang gzhon nu bud
141b3(mdo sde): mod kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ dga' ba myong bar 'gyur bas/ mngon par mi 'byung ngo snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma byang chub sems dpa' la byams pa dang / rim gro byed pas da
141b4(mdo sde): ste zhag bdun na gzhon nus bzang po lta ba'i phyir skyed mo'i tshal gyi sar 'byung gis/ der khyod kyis gzhon nu mig tu mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur bar yid du mi 'ong ba thams cad ni sol cig/
141b5(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dang / yul nyams dga' ba thams cad ni sbyor cig ces grong khyer du dril bsgrags so// de nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par grong khyer thams cad brgyan to// skyed mo'i
141b6(mdo sde): tshal yang mdzes par byas te/ ras bcos bu kha dog tha dad pa'i bla re ni bres/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis ni legs par brgyan to// byang chub sems dpa' lam gang
141b7(mdo sde): nas 'gro ba'i lam de yang chag chag btab ste/ phyags nas spos chu'i chug dag gas kye me man mi ma ni sa par bas ma pa das ni 'dugs/ bum pa gang bas ni mdzes par byas/ chu shing ljon pa ni bsgreng /
142a1(mdo sde): dar tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi bla re ni bres/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rgyan 'phreng dang chun po ni sbyangs/ dpung bzhi'i bkod pa ni byas so// g.yog
142a2(mdo sde): 'khor kyang gzhon nu'i btsun mo'i 'khor brgyan pa'i phyir btson par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas bskyed mo'i tshal gyi
142a3(mdo sde): sar 'byung ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ mi rgan po gtugs pa/ 'khogs pa/ lus la rtsa rgyus mthon pa/
142a4(mdo sde): so rgal ba/ lus gnyer mas gang ba/ skra byi ba/ skur ba/ gdung rten ltar dgu pa/ zhom pa khar ba la rten pa/ mthu zad pa/ dar yal ba/ mid pa nas sgra ngar ngar po 'byung
142a5(mdo sde): b.lus dgu pas khar ba la brten nas/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dar ba zhig/ lam kar bstan par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo
142a6(mdo sde): sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kha lo sgyur ba mi ring nyam chung zhing // sha khrag skams la rgyus lpags nyi tses dkris// mgo dkar so rgal lus ni rab skem la// khar ba rten cing
142a7(mdo sde): mi bder 'byor 'gro su/ / kha lo sgyur bas spros pa/ lha cig mi 'di rga bas zil gyis non// dbang po nyams shing sdug bsngal brtson stobs nyams// gnyen gyi skye bos brnyas shing mgon
142b1(mdo sde): med gyur/ don bgyid mi nus nags khrod shing ltar bor// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// 'di'i chos 'di rigs kyi yin nam 'on tam ni// 'gro ba 'di kun la yang 'di srid de spros
142b2(mdo sde): shig/ tshig 'di yang dag ji bzhin myur du smos shig dang / thos nas de bzhin don la 'dir ni tshul bzhin bsam// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha 'di rigs chos ma lags yul 'khor chos
142b3(mdo sde): ma lags/ / skye bo kun gyi dar la bab pa rga bas 'jom// khyod kyi yab dang yum dang nye du gnyen tshogs kyang // rga las mthar 'gro ba yi thabs na gzhan ma mchis// byang chub sems dpas
142b4(mdo sde): smras pa/ / kha lo sgyur ba'i byis pa'i skye bo mi mkhas pa'i// blo ngan gzhon pas rgyags shing myos pas rga ma mthong // da ni slar 'gro nga yid shing rta myur du sgyur// nga'ang rga la gnas pas rtse
142b5(mdo sde): dgas ci zhig bya/ / de nas byang chub sems rabs shing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur te// phyir grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na/ bkod pa
142b6(mdo sde): chen pos grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mo'i tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des lam ka na mi nad kyis nyen pa/ dmu rdzing can lus nyam chung ba/ rang gi gcin rkyag tu bying ba/ mgon med pa
142b7(mdo sde): skyabs med pa shin tu sha thang bar dbugs dbyung zhing brngub dgos pa zhig mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang yang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du la lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur
143a1(mdo sde): ba mi rtsub lus kyi mdog ngan la/ dbang po thams cad nyams shing dbugs dbyung rab tu dka'// yan lag lus skams lto bas dkrugs shing nyam thag gyur//
143a2(mdo sde): rang gi gcin rtug smad pa'i gnas na 'dug 'di su// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha cig mi 'di shin tu nad kyis btab pa ste/ nad kyi 'jigs pa nye bar mchis pas 'gum la thug/ nad med
143a3(mdo sde): gzi brjid ma mchis stobs kyang rnam par nyams/ / mgon dang skyabs dang gling dang dpung gnyen ma mchis lags// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nad med pa yang rmi lam na ni rtse dang mtshungs
143a4(mdo sde): nad kyi 'jigs pa 'di ltar shin tu mi bzad pa/ / skyes bu mkhas pas gnas 'di mthong nas ji lta bur// rtse la dga' dang sdug pa'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas byang chub
143a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' shing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur te phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na bkod pa chen pos/ grong khyer gyi nub phyogs kyi
143a6(mdo sde): sgo nas skyed mo'i tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des lam ka na mi shi bar gyur pa/ khyogs la bzhag pa ras kyi bla re phub pa/ nye du'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ kun kyang ngu zhing skad phyung ste/ dul
143a7(mdo sde): smre sngags 'don cing / sgra gshig la mgo la sas 'thor zhing brang brdung la cho nge 'don cing phyi 'brang gyur pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la
143b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ / kha lo sgyur ba mi 'di khyogs la bzhag nas ni/ mi dag sgra bshig mgo la sa yis 'thor byed cing // sna tshogs dag gi tshig ni brjod la brang brdung bas// kun nas ba
143b2(mdo sde): byas te khyer ba su zhig yin/ kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha cig mi 'di 'dzam bu gling du gum pa ste/ slan chad pha ma mchis brang bu rnams mthong mi 'gyur// longs spyod khyim dang mdza' gshes
143b3(mdo sde): gnyen tshogs spangs nas ni/ 'jig rten pha rol mchis te slan chad gnyen mi mthong // byang chub sems dpas spras pa/ rga bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i gzhon pa cir mi rung // sna tshogs
143b4(mdo sde): nad kyis gnod 'gyur nad med cir mi rung / / ring du mi gnas gson pa mkhas la cir mi rung // rga la chags pa skyes bu mkhas la cir mi rung / gal te rga med nad med 'chi ba med gyur kyang //
143b5(mdo sde): 'on kyang phung po lnga 'dzin sdug bsngal che yin na// rga na 'chi ba rtag tu 'brang ba smos ci dgos// legs par slar zlog rab tu thar par bya ba bsam// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems
143b6(mdo sde): dpa' shing rta mchog de slar zlog ste/ phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas/ skyed mo'i tshal gyi
143b7(mdo sde): sar zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu de dag nyid kyis lam ka der dge slong zhig mngon par sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpas dge slong zhi pa dul ba yang dag par
