144a1(mdo sde): bsdams pa tshangs par spyod pa mig phab pa/ gnyab shing gang tsam du lta ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa/ phun sum tshogs pa/ 'gro ba dang ldog pa mdzes pa phun sum chog
144a2(mdo sde): pa mdun du lta ba dang / g.yas g.yon du blta ba mdzes pa/ bskum pa dang basmang ba mdzes pa/ chos gos snam sbyar dang lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs pa marjes pa zhig lam ka na 'dug pa
144a3(mdo sde): de mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba skyes bu sems zhi rab zhi zhing // mig phab 'gro la gnya' shing gang
144a4(mdo sde): tsam lta byed cing / / ngur smrig gos gyon shin tu rab tu zhi bar spyod// lhung bzed thogs nas mi rgod ma khengs su zhig yin// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha gcig mi 'di dge slong zhes ni bgyi ba
144a5(mdo sde): lags/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs shing shin tu dul bar spyod// bdag nyid zhi ba 'chol zhing rab tu byung bar gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang bral ba bsod snyoms spyod cing rgyu// byang chub sems
144a6(mdo sde): dpas smras pa/ 'di ni dge bar legs smras nga yang 'dod pa ste// rab tu byung ba mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags// de ni bdag la phan zhing sems can gzhan la'ang phan/ 'tsho ba bde
144a7(mdo sde): zhing nyams mthun 'chi med 'bras bur 'gyur/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta mchog de slar bsgyur te/ phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag
144b1(mdo sde): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la bskul ba rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas mthong zhing thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir// ra ba rgya chen po byed du
144b2(mdo sde): bcug ste/ 'obs kyang rkor bcug/ sgo brtan po yang 'dzugs su bcug/ srungs ma yang bkod/ dpa' bo rnams kyang sbran/ bzhon pa yang sta gon byas go cha yang gyon du bcug go/ byang
144b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ grong khyer chen po'i sgo bzhi'i lam gyi sum mdo rnams su dpung chen po'i bkod pa bzhag ste// byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba re zhes de
144b4(mdo sde): dag de bsrung du bcug go/ / btsun mo'i 'khor la yang res 'ga' tsam yang glu dbyangs kyi rgyun 'chad da re/ dga' ba dang rtse ba thams cad kyang sbyor cig/ ci nas kyang gzhon nu chags nas
144b5(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur bar bud med kyi rgyu yang ston cig ces bsgo'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thab mo mos pa'i skyes bu lag na ral gri mtshon thogs sgo gar
144b6(mdo sde): bkod/ / go bgos mi rta glang po shing rta mi bskyon glang po'i 'phreng ba'ang bkod// 'obs dang shing thags dag dang rta babs phyir mthon po'ang byed du bcug/ sgo mo rgyang grags grag pa'i
144b7(mdo sde): sgra 'byung ba yang gtan pa dam po bcug/ shAkya'i tshogs rnams thams cad yid mi dga' zhing nyin mtshan bsrung bar byed/ dpung chen de dag rnams kyang sgra ma chen po shin tu grags par byed/
145a1(mdo sde): nges pa 'di nas 'byung du 'ong zhes grong khyer 'khrugs shing yid sngangs skrag/ shAkya'i rigs skyes song na rigs 'di chad par mi 'gyur grang sbram byed/ skye bo
145a2(mdo sde): ngag la bsgo ba rtag tu glu dbyangs rgyun ma bcad/ / rtse bas dga' ba rnams kyis bsnyen bkur gyis shing yid kyang mgu bar gyis// bud med sgra thabs spyod pa gang yin rnam pa du ma mang
145a3(mdo sde): po ston/ / nges pa 'gror mi 'gyur bar bsrung bar byos shing bgegs kyang rab tu byos// kha lo sgyur ba mchog de mngon par 'byung ba'i snga ltas 'di dag ste// ngang pa khrung khrung dag dang
145a4(mdo sde): rma bya ri skegs dag dang ne tso rnams/ / khang bzang skar khung rta babs mchog dang yang thog khri la 'khod nas ni// dman zhing dman la mi dga' mi bde mgo smang sems shing sgra mi 'byin//
145a5(mdo sde): rdzing dang rdzing chen dag gi pad+ma dag kyang rnyis shing rnyis par 'gyur// shing ljon skams shing yal ga me tog lpags la me tog slar mi 'chags// pi wang gling bu rgyud gsum gyis ni brgyan pa de tshe ga
145a6(mdo sde): bur chad/ / rnga dang rdza rnga dag kyang lag pas brdungs na 'chag cing sgra mi 'byung // grong khyer de dag thams cad 'khrugs par gyur cing shin tu gnyid kyis non// gang gi yid kyang gar byed pa dang
145a7(mdo sde): glu len pa la dga' ba med/ / rgyal po 'ang mchog tu rab tu yid dman gyur te sems 'ongs chud cing 'dug/ e ma ma rung shAka rigs rdzu 'phrul rgya chen mi tshig grang snyam byed// sa 'tsho ma dang
145b1(mdo sde): rgyal bu mal cig na ni nyal zhing 'khod pa'i tshe/ / nam phyed tsam nas mchos yi tshe lam du ni 'di dag rmis// sa 'di thams cad rtse mor ldan pa'i ri dang bcas te g.yos par gyur// shing ldan
145b2(mdo sde): rnams kyang rlung gi sa bskyod nas rtsa nas mthon te sa la skyel/ / nyi ma zla ba skar ma'i rgyan dang bcas te mkha' las sa la lhung // lag pa g.yon pas sgra yang rab tu 'bal zhing cod pan lhung
145b3(mdo sde): mthong / / lag pa chad la de bzhin rkang pa'ang chad cing bdag ni sgren mor mthong // bdag gi mu tig do shal nor bu gser gyi 'og bag chad par mthong // nyal khri de yi rkang pa bzhi chag sa yi steng na
145b4(mdo sde): nyal ba mthong / / rgyal po'i gdugs kyi nor bu nor bus spras pa dpal ldan mdzes pa chag par mthong // rgyan rnams kun kyang rnam par thor cing chu yis khyer bar gyur pa dang // khyim tha brgyan yang
145b5(mdo sde): gos dang cod pan bcas te mal steng 'thor bar mthong / / grong khyer dag nas me sgron phyir byung grong khyer mun pas non pa dang // rin po che las byas pa'i dra ba mdzes pa'ang chad par gyur pa rmis//
145b6(mdo sde): mu tig do shal 'phyang ba lhung nas rgya mtsho chen pos dkrugs pa dang // de yi tshe ni ri yi rgyal po ri rab gnas nas g.yos pa rmis// shAkya'i bu mo rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra 'di dag rmis gyur nas// de sad//
145b7(mdo sde): mig nas mchim zag cing rang gi khyo la 'di skad smras// lha cig rmi lam 'di 'dra rmis pa cir 'gyur ba ni bka' stsol cig/ bdag ni dran pa 'khrul cing mig kyang 'khrul la yid ni mya ngan non
146a1(mdo sde): de yis de thos ka la bid rnga sgra tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan pas/ / sa mchom la spras pa/ khyod ni rab tu dga' gyur sdig pa med// sems can gang dag bsod nams mngon spyad/
146a2(mdo sde): de dag rmi lam de 'dra rmi// sdug bsngal du mas nyen pa rmi lam 'di 'dra rmi ba ga la yod// khyod kyis sa 'di rab tu g.yos pa dang // ri rtser bcas te sa la lhung rmis pa// lha dang klu dang srin
146a3(mdo sde): po 'byung po'i tshogs/ / kun gyis khyod mchog gtso mor byed par 'gyur// khyod kyis shing rnams rtsa nas mtho na rmis shing // lag pa g.yon pas sgra 'bal rmis pa ni// sa mtsho myur du nyon mongs
146a4(mdo sde): dra ba bcad/ / 'dus byas dag las lta ba'i dra ba 'byin// khyod kyis nyi zla sa la lhung rmis shing // skar ma rnams kyang lhung bar rmis pa ni// sa mtsho myur du nyon mongs dgra bcom ste// khyod ni
146a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten mchod pa bsngags par 'gyur/ / khyod kyis mu tig do shal 'thor rmis shing // lus kun chad dang sgren mo rmas pa ni// sa mtsho myur du bud med lus spangs te// ring por mi thogs
146a6(mdo sde): skyes pa'i lus su 'gyur/ / khyod kyis khri rkang chag par rmis pa dang // gdugs yu rin chen spras pa chag rmis pa// sa 'tsho myur du chu bo bzhi rgal cig/ nga ni 'jig rten gdugs gcig 'gyur
146a7(mdo sde): ba mthong / / khyod kyis rgyan rnams chus khyer rmis pa dang // nga yi gos dang cod pan khri steng rmis// sa mtsho myur du mtshan gyis brgyan nas ni// 'jig rten kun gyis nga la bstod pa mthong // khyod
146b1(mdo sde): kyis me sgron brgya phrag bye ba dag/ grong khyer byang nas mun nag gyur rmis pa// sa mtsho myur du ma rig rmongs pa'i mun// 'jig rten kun la shes rab snang byed 'gyur// khyod kyis mu tig de
146b2(mdo sde): shal chad pa dang / gser gyi cod cong spras pa chad rmis pa// sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs dra bcad de// 'dus byas dag las 'du shes skud pa 'byin// sa 'tsho gang phyir nga la gus par ni// rtag
146b3(mdo sde): tu rim gro mchog gis mchod byed na/ / khyod la ngan 'gro med cing mya ngan med// myur du dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba 'thob// ngas ni sngon chad sbyin pa gya nom byin// tshul khrims bsrung dang rtag tu
146b4(mdo sde): bzod pa bsgoms/ / de bas nga la dad pa gang rnyed pa// de dag thams cad dga' zhing rab dga' rnyed// 'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su// ngas ni byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyangs//
146b5(mdo sde): de bas nga la dad par gang byed pa// de dag thams cad ngan song gsum po chad// dga' ba thob kyis mi dga' ma skyed cig/ tshim pa thob par gyis la mgu skyed cig/ dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba
146b6(mdo sde): myur 'thob ste/ / khyod kyis rmi ltas bzang gis sa mtsho nyol// sngon chad dge ba'i las ni gang dag bsags gyur pa// mi mchog rnams ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab che// mtshan ma ba/
146b7(mdo sde): dag bsod nams gzi brjid bsags pa dang // dpal gyi gzi brjid snying po can des rmi lam 'gyur// de ni rkang pa dag dang lag pa chen po yis// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag gi chu dkrug dang //
147a1(mdo sde): @sa 'di thams cad sna tshogs mal char gyur pa dang // ri bo lhun po mchog kyang sngas su gyur par rmi// rmi lam na ni 'od rab bkye bas 'jig rten na// mun pa mun nag chen
147a2(mdo sde): po rnam par bsal ba dang / / sa las gdugs shig byung bas 'jig rten gsum khyab dang // 'od kyis reg pas log lhung sdug bsngal rab zhi rmi// dkar gnag srog chags bzhi zhig rkang
147a3(mdo sde): pa ldag pa dang / / kha dog bzhi pa'i byas 'ongs kha dog gcig gyur dang // mchog tu ngan pa smad pa ngan skyugs ri la yang // 'dzegs nas 'gro yang de nas gos pa med pa rmi// rmi lam na ni
147a4(mdo sde): chu bo'i chu yi sa ra pa gang nas/ / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po khyer ba las// de ni grur byas bsgral de gzhan dag bsgral nas ni// de yis 'jigs med mya ngan med mchog thang bkod
147a5(mdo sde): rmi/ rmi lam na ni nad pa mang po nad btab pa// nad med gzi brjid bral zhing stobs kyang nyams rnams la// de ni sman par gyur nas rtsi sman mang byin pas// nad btab sems can khrag
147a6(mdo sde): khrig mang po thar byed cing / / ri rab ngos la seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas ni// slob ma thal mo sbyor cing lha rnams phyag 'tshal la// bdag ni g.yul las rgyal zhing lha rnams nam mkha'
147a7(mdo sde): las/ / kun tu dga' ba'i sgra sgrog par ni rmi lam rmi// bkra shis brtul zhugs bzang po yongs su rdzogs par yang // byang chub sems dpa' rmi lam rnam pa de dag rmi// de thos nas ni 'dra
147b1(mdo sde): ni ring por mi thogs par/ / mi yi lha yi lhar 'gyur snyam ste lha mi dga'// rmi lam gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
147b2(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rgyal po chen po zas gtsang ma la ma byas shing // phas gnang ba med par mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni bdag la mi rigs te// byas pa gzo ba ma yin par 'gyur
147b3(mdo sde): ro snyam nas/ de mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na// rang gi gnas kyi khang bzangs nas byung ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khang bzangs su phyin nas 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' 'dug
147b4(mdo sde): ma thag tu khang bzang thams cad kyang 'od kyis gsal bar gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po sad pa dang 'od de mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang myur ba myur bar nyung rum la smras pa/ kye nyung
147b5(mdo sde): rum ci nyi ma shar tam/ gang gis na 'di 'od kyis rnam par mdzes/ nyung rum gyis smras pa/ lha da dung du dgung phyed kyang ma pas so// lha gzhan yang nyi ma'i 'od ni shing dang rtsig pa thal mi
147b6(mdo sde): phyin/ / lus la gdung bar bgyid cing tsha bar rab tu bgyid// nang par dus na ngang pa dag dang rma bya dang // ne tso lu byug ngur pa dag kyang rang sgra 'byin// 'od 'di lha yi yid du mchi zhing bde ba ste
147b7(mdo sde): rab tu sim bgyid dge bgyid gdung bar gyi ma lags/ / shing dang rtsig pa thal phyung sgrib pa yongam mchis// yon tan ldan pa gcig cig dang ni 'dir byon des// rgyal po de ni mi dga' phyog
148a1(mdo sde): bcur bltas pa dang / / sems can dag pa pad+ma'i mig can de mthong nas// de ni mal nas ldang bar 'dod nam nus te// rnam dag blo can dam pa pha la gus pa skyed//
148a2(mdo sde): de ni rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras// lha cig bdag ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab rigs// bgegs kyang ma mdzad mi dgyes pa yang ma mdzad cig/ rgyal po gnyen
148a3(mdo sde): bcas yul 'khor bcas te bzod par gsol/ / rgyal po de ni mchi mas mig gang 'di skad smras// khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'i dgos pa ci zhig yod// bdag la dam pa ci slong smros shig/
148a4(mdo sde): thams cad sbyin// bdag dang pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khor 'di phan thogs// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas snyan pa'i tshigs smras pa// lha cig dam pa bzhi 'tshal de ni bdag la stsol//
148a5(mdo sde): gal te stsal bar spyod na mnga' ni khyod la mchis// 'on tang rtag tu khyim na gzigs shing 'byung mi 'gyur// lha cig bdag ni rga bas tshugs par mi 'gyur zhing // rtag tu mdog bzang dar
148a6(mdo sde): la bab par gnas pa dang / / nad ma mchis par thob cing nad kyis mi btab dang // tshe dpag ma mchis pa dang rgud par mi 'gyur 'tshal// rgyal pos tshig thos shin tu sdug bsngal nyam thag
148a7(mdo sde): stegazhon nu gnas min slong bas bdag la mthu med do/ / bskal par gnas pa'i drang srong rnams kyang nam du yang // rgan 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang chud las mthar to// rgan 'chib
148b1(mdo sde): 'jigs dang rgud par mi 'gyur ba/ / lha cig gal te mchog bzhi 'di dag mi stsal na// gzhan yang mchog cig gsol gyis rgyal po gsan du gsol// 'di nas shi 'phos nyid mtsham
148b2(mdo sde): sbyor ba mi 'gyur mdzod/ / mi yi dam pa'i tshig ni de skad thos pa dang // sred pa bsrabs te bu la chags pa yongs su gcod// phan byed 'gro ba thar byed rjes su yi rang ngo // khyod kyi bsam
148b3(mdo sde): pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs gyur cig/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' slar song ste/ rang gi khyim du phyin nas/ mal na 'dug pa dang / de song ba 'am
148b4(mdo sde): 'ongs par sus kyang ma tshor ro/ / dge slong dag de'i nam nangs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad sogs te/ de'i lo rgyus rnams smos nas/ gzhon nu ni mngan/
148b5(mdo sde): par 'byung na da ji ltar bya zhes smras so// shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shAkya'i tshogs ni mang la/ de ni gcig pur gyur pas/
148b6(mdo sde): mthus mngon par 'byung ba'i nus pa de la ma mchis so// de nas shAkya de dag dang rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa/ 'os su gyur pa/ 'phong bslabs pa
148b7(mdo sde): chen po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi shar sgor bkod de/ byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ shAkya gzhon nu re re la yang
149a1(mdo sde): 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shing d+ha re re la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkad do// byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir de bzhin du grang khyer
149a2(mdo sde): lho dang / nub dang / byang gi sgor yang shAkya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa 'os su gyur pa/ 'bong bsrabs pa/ chen po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shAkya
149a3(mdo sde): gzhon nu re re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shing rta re re la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ shAkya rgan rabs rgan
149a4(mdo sde): rabs rnams kyang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / mdo sum dang / lam po che mang po thams cad na 'khod do// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas
149a5(mdo sde): te/ rta dang glang po che dag la bzhon nas rang gi khyim sgo na mel tshe byed do// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis kyang rang gi bran mo'i tshogs la smras pa// mar me dri ma med pa bus la nor bu
149a6(mdo sde): thams cad rgyal mtshan rtse mor thogs/ / mu tig rgyan 'phreng rnams kyang sbyongs la khyim 'di kun tu 'od kyis snang bar byos// glu dbyangs dag kyang sbyor la do mod g.yel ba med par mel tshe dam
149a7(mdo sde): du gyis/ / gzhon nu ci nas ma tshor bar ni 'gro bar mi 'gyur tshul du bsrung bar gyis// go bgos lag na lag char ral gri dang / mdung thung mda' dang mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs// sdug pa'i bu ni
149b1(mdo sde): bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir/ / kun kyang rab tu bsgrim pa chen po gyis// sgo kun tshong la gtan pa dam pa rgyug/ sgo 'bar sra brked par gtan chug la// dus la ma bab par ni so ma dbye// sems/
149b2(mdo sde): can dam pa 'di ni shor ta re// nor mu 'do shal mu tig do shal thogs// me tog zla gam seng ge shing lo ris// ska rags sor rdub rna rgyan chings shing thogs// rkang rngub dag kyang shin tu leg
149b3(mdo sde): par thogs/ / lha mi phan pa mang po glang po dregs bzhin 'gro// gal te glo bur mngon par byung nga re// ci nas mi bde rnyed par ma gyur par// de ltar de ltar nan tan cher gyis shig/ bud med
149b4(mdo sde): gang dag mdung thung thogs pa dag/ dri ma med pa lam na 'dug pa skor// ci nas gnyid kyis log par ma gyur pa// phye ma leb bzhin mig gis bsrung bar gyis// rgyal bu 'di ni bsrung ba
149b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ / khyim 'dir rin po che yi dra ba bres// gling bu dag kyang rab tu bud cing long // do mong rdul dang bral ba bsrung bar gyis// phan tshun gcig la gcig ni sbron byas te// do mong mnyal
149b6(mdo sde): shin tu bsrung bar gyis/ / rgyal srid dang ni yul 'khor spangs nas su// khyim nas mngon du 'byung bar gyur ta re// 'di ni mngon par byang bar gyur nago/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'di kun nyams
149b7(mdo sde): dga'/ / rgyal po'i rigs rgyud yun ring gnas pa yang // rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyud ni chad par 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lngas rtsen la sogs pa/
150a1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya rnams gcig tu 'dus nas/ 'di skad ces smras te/ grogs po dag do nub byang chub sems dpa'
150a2(mdo sde): mngon par 'byung gis/ / khyed cag de la mchod pa byed pa'i las la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang lcang lo can gyi pho brang du zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor chen po la smras pa
150a3(mdo sde): grogs po dag do mod byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis/ khyed kyis bcibs pa'i rkang lag nas theg la 'byung bar gyis shig/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gyis smras pa// sku ni sred med
150a4(mdo sde): bu yi stobs ldan rdo rje lta bur mi phyed sra la lci/ / sems can kun gyi dam pa de ni brtson 'grus stobs ldan g.yo ba mi mnga' ste// ri yi dam pa lhun po chen po rmang nas byung ste nam mkhar gzung nus
150a5(mdo sde): kyi/ rgyal ba'i yon tan lhung ba lhun po'i ri lci bsod nams ye shes gnas pa sus kyang gang du bkur mi nus/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa// mi gang nga rgyal 'gying ba de la ston pa lci// gang dag
150a6(mdo sde): dga' gus gnas pa de dag yang bar tshor/ / bsam pas thags pas btson par byos la gus pa yi// bya yis sha kham bzhin du yang bar shes par gyis// kho bo mdun nas 'gro yis khyed cag
150a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis bcibs pa theg/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung tshe bsod nams mang po sogs// dge slong dag de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la spras
150b1(mdo sde): pa/ kye grogs po dag do nub byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis/ de la khyed thams cad mchod pa'i las la spro bar gyis shig/ de nas lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des 'di ska/
150b2(mdo sde): ces smras so// bdag gis ni ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log ra bgyi'o// lha'i bu rtse ba bkod pa zhes
150b3(mdo sde): des 'di skad ces smras so/ / bdag gis ni rta dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / skyes pa dang / bud mang dang 'u pang / bu me rtsabs kyi sgra mi

150b5(mdo sde): / nor bu rin po che me shel gyi 'od 'bar ba// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ me tog sna tshogs cas 'ams pa sems dpas ma @ der dg
150b6(mdo sde): od par bgyi'o/ / klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu zhes bya bas 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni bdag nyid kyi sna la khang pa brtsegs pa dpag chang sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bgyis
150b7(mdo sde): der lha'i bu mo dag bkod la sil snyan dang glu dbyangs len du stsal zhing/ / glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang // bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi bar bgyi'o//
151a1(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyid kyis 'di skad ces smras so// kho bos ni sgo dbye'o// lam mtshon par bya'o// lha'i bu chos spyod kyis 'di skad ces smras so// bdag
151a2(mdo sde): gis ni btsun mo'i 'khor rnams mi sdug par bstan par bgyi'o/ / lha'i bu yang dag sgung pos smras pa/ bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gzims mal nas bzhengs gsol bar bgyi'o//
151a3(mdo sde): de nas klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bos 'di skad ces smras so// bdag

151a6(mdo sde): len pa'i khang bzangs mal bde ba la 'dug pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rnam par sems shing sems can la phan pa bya ba rjes su sngon gyi smon lam gyis tshig

151b3(mdo sde): nag thibs po chen por zhugs pa mi shes pa'i ling tog dang / / rab rib kyis mig bsgribs pa/ shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba/ ma rig pa dang / gti mug gis ljongs pa la chos kyi

151b7(mdo sde): shes pa/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i yid can 'du shes dang / sems dang lta ba phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ gzung ba ngan pas zin pa la 'phags pa'i
152a1(mdo sde): lam bstan te/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal brnyal bar bya'o zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig gsum pa 'di mngon du gyur to// kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten

153a1(mdo sde): @phyung nas ni 'di skad smras/ em skye dgu dag ni sdug bsngal gyur// srin ma'i tshogs la dga' ba ji ltar rnyed// 'dod pa'i yon tan mngaman man tan 'dzin/ gtis
153a2(mdo sde): mun pas rab bsgribs blo gros ngan/ dper na bya ni bya rgyar chud pa bzhin// nam yang 'byung ba rnyed par 'gyur ma yin// // 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg
153a3(mdo sde): pa chen po'i mdo/ / bam po bcu pa// de nas byang chub sems dpas chos snang ba'i sgo 'dis/ yang btsun mo'i 'khor la rtog cing / snying rje chen po'i smre bas/ sems can gyi phyir smre
153a4(mdo sde): ste/ 'di na byis pa de dag ni gsod pa ste/ bsad pa'i gnas su bsad par bya ba gsod pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni chags pa ste/ ngan skyugs kyis gang ba'i snod ri mo can rnams la
153a5(mdo sde): mi mkhas pa chags pa dang mtshungs so/ / 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'bying ba ste// glang po che chur 'bying ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btsas pa ste/ btson ra'i nang gi btson btsas pa dang mtshungs so//
153a6(mdo sde): 'di na byis pa de dag ni mngon par dga' ba ste// phag mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni chags pa ste// khyi keng rus la chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis
153a7(mdo sde): pa de dag ni rab tu lhung ba ste/ / phye ma leb mar me'i me lcer lhung ba dang mtshungs so// 'din byis pa de dag ni thogs pa ste/ spre'u rnyang la thogs pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag na
153b1(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba ste/ ta rgyas zin pa dang mtshungs so// 'din byis pa de dag ni yongs su gtugs pa ste/ sha 'tshang gi gnas kyi lug dang mtshungs so// 'din byis pa de dag ni bcug pa ste/
153b2(mdo sde): sdig pa byed pa gsal shing gi rtse mo la btsugs pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'bying zhing thogs pa ste/ glang po che rgan po 'dam du song ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni
153b3(mdo sde): phongs pa ste/ rgya mtsho chen por gru'i snam bu zhig pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag rab tu lhung ba ste/ dmus long g.yang sa chen por lhung ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su
153b4(mdo sde): zad par 'gyur ba ste/ sa'i gting gi mtshams su song ba'i chu dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni du ba 'thul ba ste/ bskal pa zad pa'i sa chen po dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni
153b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba ste/ rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo'i shugs dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'brog 'chol ba ste/ dmus long ri la phyin pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btags shing 'khor
153b6(mdo sde): ba ste/ khyi stong gis btags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni brnyes pa ste/ dpyid kyi rtswa dang nags tshal dang mtshungs so// 'din byis pa de dag ni yongs su nyams pa ste/ zla ba mar gyi
153b7(mdo sde): ngo'i zla ba dang mtshungs so/ / 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la za ba ste/ klu la nam mkha' lding dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'cha' ba ste/ gru bo che la chu srin chen po dang mtshungs so//
154a1(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'joms pa ste/ 'dron po la chom po mang po dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'jigs pa ste/ shing sa la la rlung dmar chen po dang /
154a2(mdo sde): mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la gsod pa ste/ skye ba po la sbrul mig gdug pa dang mtshungs so// byis pa rnams ni ro myang ba'i 'du shes kyis chod pa ste/ ral gri'i so sbrang rtsis bskus
154a3(mdo sde): pas chod pa bzhin no/ / 'di dag ni byis pa rnams khyer ba ste/ shing gi phung po la chu bo'i chus khyer ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la rtsed pa ste/ byis pa chung ngu rang gi gcin rtug
154a4(mdo sde): la rtse ba dang mtshungs so/ / 'di dag ni byis pa rnams kun tu sgyur ba ste/ glang po che la lcags kyu dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la slu ba ste/ g.yon can gyis byis pa'i rang bzhin
154a5(mdo sde): can dag brid pa bzhin no/ / 'di dag ni byis pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zad par byed pa ste/ rgyan po la dga' ba'i nor dang mtshungs so// 'di dag gis byis pa rnams la 'chos pa ste/ srin mo rnams
154a6(mdo sde): kyis tshong pa 'chos pa dang mtshungs so/ / byang chub sems dpas rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis btsun mo'i 'khor la yongs su brtag pa byas nas/ lus la mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes
154a7(mdo sde): rnam par sgom/ mi mthun pa'i 'du shes nye bar sgrub/ smad pa'i 'du shes skyed/ rang gi lus la yang de dang 'dra bar sgom/ lus kyi nyes dmigs yang dag par mthong / lus la lus su
154b1(mdo sde): mngon par zhen pa las skyod/ sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par 'jig/ mi sdug pa'i 'du shes 'jug par byed/ 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas/ steng gi klad pa man chad mi gtsang ba las byung ba
154b2(mdo sde): dang mi gtsang ba las gyur pa dang / rtag tu mi gtsang ba zag par mthong ngo // de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di ga kyang smras so// las kyi zhing las skyes shing sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i 'jig tshogs
154b3(mdo sde): ming du btags/ / mchi ma rdul dang mchil mas brlan lagacin gyis bsgyur cing khrag gi thig pas gang // zhag dang rnag dang lgang pa dang ni klad rgyas dag dang sdig pa rnams kyis gang / rtag tu ngan skyugs
154b4(mdo sde): zag cing kun kyang dri ma sna tshogs tha dad pa/ pags pa so dang sgra dang spu yis bsgyur cing pags pas g.yogs la spu dang ldan// rgyu ma mchin pa mcher pa chu ser kha chu 'di dag bsags pa nyam
154b5(mdo sde): chung ba/ rkang dang chu rgyus dag gis sbrel te 'khrul 'khor 'dra zhing sha yis mdzes par byas// sna tshogs nad kyis gang zhing mya ngan khyab las bkres dang skom pas kun tu nyen// skye ba po
154b6(mdo sde): ngag lus ni bu ga mang zhing 'chi dang rga ba'i gnas gyur pa/ / mthong nas mkhas pa su zhig rang gi lus dgra dang mtshungs par sems mi 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus
154b7(mdo sde): su song ba'i dran pas gnas par gyur to/ / nam mkha' dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i bu chos spyod pa la 'di skad ces sbas so// grags pa don grub 'di ni btsun mo'i la kho la
155a1(mdo sde): rnam par lta zhing 'dzums yang ston/ sems ni mi dga' mig ni phyir lhan phyi shol byed dam ci// yang na 'di ni rgya mtsho'i zabs dang mtshungs te 'di tshad gzung bar mi
155a2(mdo sde): nus so/ / yang na chags pa med pa 'ang yul rnams la yid chags par ni mi 'gyur grang // lha rnams kyis bskul ba'i yi dam brjed par ma 'gyur grang // lha'i bu chos spyod kyis smras pa/
155a3(mdo sde): de skad smra ci dgos/ 'di sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na yang mngon par 'byung ba dang / gtong ba la rnam pa de lta bur chags pa med par gyur pa/ khyed la mngon sum du gyur pa yin na// da srid
155a4(mdo sde): pabatha ma par gnas pa chags par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' nges par byas pa/ yid byung bar gyur pa/ blo brtul ba/ tshul du shes shing //
155a5(mdo sde): rings thabs med par skyil mo krung bshig ste/ glu dbyangs len pa'i khang bzangs na/ shar phyogs su lta zhing 'dug nas/ lag pa g.yas pas rin po che'i dra ba smad de/ khang bzangs kyi
155a6(mdo sde): steng du song nas sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsams nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/ nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas pa dang / des mthong ba nam
155a7(mdo sde): mkha'i dkyis na/ lha'i dbang po mig stong dang ldan pa lha brgya stong gis bskor cing / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
155b1(mdo sde): dang / ba dan dang / me tog rna rgyan dang / rin po che'i do shal gyi chun po thogs te/ lus btud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi
155b2(mdo sde): yang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / klu'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / go cha sra ba bgos/ ya lad bgos te/ ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / mtshon rtse
155b3(mdo sde): gnyis dang / rtse gsum pa lag na thogs shing tshul du shis par nor bu'i cod pan dang / gtsug phud 'phyang bar byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // lha'i bu nyi ma
155b4(mdo sde): dang zla ba gnyis kyang / glo g.yas g.yon na 'dug par mthong ngo // skar ma'i bdag po rgyal yang nam phyed na shar bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la smras pa/
155b5(mdo sde): nga yi bkra shis 'di ni don kun 'grub/ do nub gdon mi za bar don grub kyis/ 'dun pa phyi shol ma byed la gong du/ rta rgyal rgyan gyis brgyan pa'angang la byin/ de nas 'dun
155b6(mdo sde): bas tshig de thos nas/ yid mi dga' zhing 'di skad ces smras so// smin ma ring zhing pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas 'dra'i spyan mnga' mi yi seng ge ston ka'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang / me tog ku mu
155b7(mdo sde): dA dang zla ba dang ni dga' ba'i pad+ma'i rdzing bu gsar par 'jam pa'i pad+ma rgyas 'dra'i zhal/ / sbyangs pa'i gser dang nyi ma shar ma thag dang zla ba dri med gzi dang mar blugs me yi 'od 'phro
156a1(mdo sde): nor bu glog 'od 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can/ / glang po rgyags pa 'gying ba'i glang po'i stobs can ba lang khyu mchog ri dgas rgyal dang ngang pa'i stobs can stabs mdzes
156a2(mdo sde): shin tu zhabs legs gang du bzhud/ / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa gang gi don du nga yis sngon chad lag pa rkang pa mig dang de bzhin mgo dang lus btang zhing // chung
156a3(mdo sde): ma dang ni phangs pa'i rgyal srid nor gser gos dang rin chen gang ba'i shing rta glang po rlung mgyogs shugs ldan rta pho rtsal mchog ldan pa btang / / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas tshul
156a4(mdo sde): khrims ngas bsrungs bzod pa yongs bsgoms brtson 'grus stobs dang bsam gtan shes rab dag/ de lta mod kyi byang chub zhi ba shis pa thob nas rga shi'i rgya mor chud pa'i sems can nga yis/
156a5(mdo sde): yongs su dgrol ba'i dus la bab/ 'dun pas smras pa/ jo bo khyod bltams ma thag tu blta ba'i phyir/ bram ze ltas mkhan rnams la bstan na/ de dag gis khyod rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i/
156a6(mdo sde): spyan sngar/ lha khyod kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan ces bdag gis thos so// smras pa/ ji lta bur 'gyur/ smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di ni bsod nams brgya
156a7(mdo sde): mtshan ldan/ / khyod kyi bu btsas bsod nams gzi brjid can/ de ni gling bzhi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur// nor bdun dang ni rab tu ldan par 'gyur// gal te 'jig rten sdug bsngal bltas
156b1(mdo sde): nas ni/ btsun mo'i 'khor spangs mngon par byung gyur na// byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob ste// chos kyi chu yis skye dgu 'di tshim byed// rdo bo lung bstan pa 'di ni mchis te/
156b2(mdo sde): 'di ma mchis pa ni ma lags mod kyi/ 'on gyis kyang phan par 'tshal ba bdag gi tshig gsan par gsol/ smras pa ci zhig/ smras pa/ lha cig gang gi don du 'di na kha cig brtul zhugs dang
156b3(mdo sde): dka' thub rnam pa du ma rtsom ste/ ri dgas kyi lpags pa dang / ram pa'i phor tshugs dang / rtswa dang / shing shun gyon pa dang / sen mo dang / sna dang / a ga com ring por 'jig pa dang /
156b4(mdo sde): lus la gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung ba rnam pa du ma spro bar bgyid de/ bdag cag ji ltar lha dang / mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub drag
156b5(mdo sde): bo rtsom mo/ / jo bo phun sum tshogs pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes lags te/ rgyal srid 'byor cing rgyas la bde zhing lo legs te/ nyams dga' zhing mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba 'di dang bskyed//
156b6(mdo sde): mo'i tshal dam pa mchog me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa 'di dag dang / rdzing me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang /
156b7(mdo sde): ku mu dA dang / pad+ma dkar pos mdzes par gyur pa ngang ba dang / rma bya dang / khu brug dang / dung ba dang / khrung khrung dang / dang s+ya sgra skad 'byin pa/ shing a mra dang / mya ngan tshang dang / tsam
157a1(mdo sde): pa ka dang / kur ba ka dang / ke sa ra la sogs pa shing me tog chags pa sna tshogs kyis 'gram 'khor ba/ rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kyi 'phreng gis legs par brgyan pa/
157a2(mdo sde): mig mangs ris su bkod pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyad pa/ dgun dang dbyar dang ston dang dpyid gnas par
157a3(mdo sde): bde ba rnams dang / khang bzangs chen po chos dang / chos bzang dang / bde ba dang / mya ngan bral ba la sogs pa rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa lta bu ston ka'i sprin 'dra ba/ gangs te se lta bu stegs
157a4(mdo sde): bu dang / sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyams kyis legs par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sgra 'byung ba 'di
157a5(mdo sde): dag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / rol mo'i cha spyad rgyud cig pa dang / pi wang dang / khar rnga dang / gling bu dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg dang / kim pa la dang / na gu la dang /

157a7(mdo sde): tshul du shis pa dang / spyod pa mdzes pa 'di dang ni ldan la/ lha khyod kyang dar ni ma yol te/ gzhon pa thor bu dar la bab pa/ lus 'jam pa/ lang 'tsho la bab pa/ dbu skra gnag pa/
157b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa la ma ral pa lags kyis/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po mge stong dang ldan pa/ lha'i bdag po lta bu rang shig dgyes par rol la/ srad kyis bkres nas mngon par 'byung
157b2(mdo sde): bar mdzod cig/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// sum cu rtsa gsum 'jig rten lha dbang ltar// dgyes pa'i cho ga mkhyen pa dgyes par rol// slad kyis bgres par
157b3(mdo sde): gyur nas brtul zhugs dang / / dka' thub dag ni yang dag brtsams par mdzod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa mi dgos te/ 'dod pa 'di dag ni mi rtag pa/ mi btan pa//
157b4(mdo sde): ther zug ma yin pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can myur du 'gro ba g.yo ba ri gzar po'i chu'i shugs dang 'dra ba/ bil ba'i thig pa ltar ring du mi gnas pa/ lag pa bcangs pa stong pas byis pa ltar snying po med pa/ chu shing gi si
157b5(mdo sde): po ltar mthu med ga snod so ma btang ba ltar mthar 'jig pa/ ston ka'i sprin ltar skad cig byung nas med par 'gyur ba/ nam mkha'i glog ltar ring du mi gnas pa/ dug dang bcas pa'i snod ltar 'gyur/
157b6(mdo sde): ba'i sdug bsngal can/ 'khri shing ma lu ta ltar mi bde ba 'byin pa/ byis pa'i blo can rnams kyis 'dod par bya ba/ chu'i chu bur myur du 'gyur ba'i chos can/ smig rgyu ltar 'du shes phyin ci
157b7(mdo sde): log las byung ba/ sgyu ma ltar sems phyin ci log gis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ rmi lam ltar lta ba phyin ci log gis yongs su zin pa/ rgya mtsho gang dka' ba ltar ngoms ma shes par byed pa
158a1(mdo sde): tsha chu ltar skom par byed pa/ sbrul gyi mgo ltar reg par bya dka' ba/ g.yang sa chen po ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa/ shes rab can rnams kyis
158a2(mdo sde): 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang / rtsod pa dang bcas pa dang / nyes pa dang bcas pa dang / skyon dang bcas par shes nas/ rnam par spangs pa/ rig pa rnams kyis smad pa/ 'phags pa rnams
158a3(mdo sde): kyis bshungs pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ma bsngags pa/ mi mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ byis pa rnams kyis bsten pa yin no// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so//
158a4(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams kyis sbrul gyi mgo bzhin spangs// ngan skyugs snod bzhin mi gtsang rnam par spangs// 'dun pa dge ba thams cad 'jig byed par// 'dod pa shes nas nga ni dga'
158a5(mdo sde): mi skye/ / de'i tshe 'dun pa zug rngus zug pa bzhin du skad phyung ste ngu zhing de nas mig nas mchi ma zag la/ sdug bsngal zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so// lha cig gang gi don du 'di na kha cig/
158a6(mdo sde): brtul zhugs rnam pa mang po rtsom ste ri dgas lpags pa 'chang // skra dang sen mo ag com ring du 'jog cing de bzhin shing shun gyon la yan lag skams shing brtul zhugs gnas/ sred pa
158a7(mdo sde): dang ni ldam ldum dag dang ma 'drus 'bras ze kha cig spyi'u tshugs 'dug dang ba lang brtul zhugs gnas/ ji ltar bdag cag 'gro ba'i gtso bo khyod 'phags 'khor lo sbyor ba mchog dang de bzhin
158b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba dang / / brgya byin rdo rje 'chang dang 'thab bral lha dbang 'phrul par 'gyur snyam tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bsam gtan bde ba 'dod// mi yi dam pa khyod kyi rgyal srid 'di ni shin tu 'byor
158b2(mdo sde): cing rab tu rgyas la shin tu lo legs pa/ de bzhin kun dga' ra ba dag dang skyed mo'i tshal dang khang bzangs mthon po rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa mtshungs// bud med 'di dag rnams kyang pi wang dang ni
158b3(mdo sde): gling bu dag dang glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra len cing mchis/ / dga' bar bgyid dang gar dang glu dbyangs sbyar ba shin tu bslabs pa 'di dag spyod cing des pa ma bzhud cig khyang chub sems dpas smras pa/
158b4(mdo sde): 'dun pa nyon cig 'dod pa'i rgyus ni sngon gyi tshe rabs dag na bcings dang ma tsas dang brdeg dang bsdigs pa sdug bsngal brgya dag ngas ni bzod byas 'dus byas rnams ya nga yI yid byung byas ma gyum/ sngon chan bag med namang du song zhing gti mug dkrug la lnga ba'i dra bas dkris dashi un gyur tshwa 'di mi shwe pa 'byung ste ba dag tu 'du ga 'dzin/
158b5(mdo sde): rnam ma thams cad g.yo zhing 'gyur la mi rtag sprin dang mtshungs shing glog dang 'dra ste zil pa'i thigs pa 'dra zhing gsogs gsarnga snying po med la bag yod ma yin stong par gyur pa ste//
158b6(mdo sde): nga yi yid ni yul la chags pa med kyis 'dun pa rta rgyal dam pa bsngags ldan nga byin nga sngon bsams pa'i bkra shis rdzogs kyis thams cad zil gnon chos kun dbang phyug chos rgyal thub
158b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ / 'dun pas spras pa/ pad+ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan zhing // do shal nor bu rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// mkha' la sprin tshogs dag las byung ba'i/
159a1(mdo sde): glog 'drab// mal na rnam par mdzes pa 'di la mi gzigs sam// bair lding dang ni kharda dag dang sgra snyan dang // rnga rnga dag dang gling bu glu dbyangs len pa dang // bya ba
159a2(mdo sde): rma bya ka la bing+ga sgra 'byin pa/ / mi 'am ci'i khyim 'dra 'di yang dor lags sam// su ma na dang ut+pa la dang ba ra sha ka/ tsam ba ka dang dri mchog 'phrang ba me tog brgyus// dus kyi a ga ru
159a3(mdo sde): mchog bdug pas rab bdugs dang / / byug pa dam pa de dag la yang mi gzigs sam// shin tu dri bda' dri ldan ro bro gya nom dang / skyu rum dag dang bshos gtsang shin tu legs sbar dang //
159a4(mdo sde): skyems kyi ro yang kha ra bcas par rab sbyar ba// 'di la'ang mi gzigs par ni lha khyod gang du bzhud// grang ba'i dus na byug pa dro ba dam pa dang // tsha ba'i dus na tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po
159a5(mdo sde): dang / / ka shi pa yin bza' bzang po mang po dang // de dag la yang mi gzigs lha khyod gang du bzhud// lha yul dag na lha rnams dag ni ci 'dra bar// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di dag
159a6(mdo sde): rab 'byor pa/ / dga' zhing bde dang ldan la dgyes par rol mdzod de// de nas shAkya'i dam pa nags tshal bzhud par mdzod// de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/
159a7(mdo sde): bdun pa ngas ni bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med par gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang mi dang lha yi 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyad kyang ngoms par gyur pa med// rgyal po'i
159b1(mdo sde): sras mchog gyur te dbang phyug byas shing gang tshe gling bzhi dag tu 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas rin chen sna bdun ldan zhing bud med dag gi nang na 'dug pa dang / / sum cu rtsa gsum
159b2(mdo sde): dbang dang 'thab bral rab kyi lha dbang byas shing de dag nas ni shi 'phos 'dir 'ongs sprul pa'i lha yi nang na yid 'ong dpal ldan dam pa nga yis sngon chad spyad/ / lha yi gnas su dbang sgyur
159b3(mdo sde): bdud kyi dbang po byas shing 'dod pa 'byor pa mchog tu spyad kyang ngoms ma gyur na da ci dman pa 'di la bsten pas nga ngoms 'gyur ram de ni gnas min no/ / gzhan yang 'dun pa nga ni sdug/
159b4(mdo sde): bsngal mya ngan dgon pa'i 'khor bar gnas pa nyon mongs gdugs pas dkrugs shing nyam ngas rtag tu khyer te mgon med skyabs med cing // gti mug ma rig mun pa dag ni rga dang na dang 'chi/
159b5(mdo sde): ba'i 'jigs pa dag gis nyen la skye ba'i sdug bsngal dgra yis kun tu gnon cing rnam par gnon pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// ngas 'dir chos kyi gru bzang gtod dang tshul khrims brtul
159b6(mdo sde): zhugs bzod pa brtson 'grus stobs can dag gi shing tshogs gsogs te sbyar nas lhag pa'i bsam pa snying po ldan pa rdo rje lta bus gzugs btab sbyar/ / gru de rang nyid zhugs nas
159b7(mdo sde): b dag gis 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dag 'khor ba'i chu bo 'dal bar che ba khro ba'i dba'arlabs ldan pa 'dod chags 'dzin khri gling 'khyil dgra yis rnam par dkrugs pa rgal bar dka' las
160a1(mdo sde): bsgral lo snyam steng sems de 'dra'o/ / de phyir srid mcho grar bcas lta bu'i 'dzin khri dang // nyon mongs srin po yod pa 'di las bdag rgal te// bdag nyid
160a2(mdo sde): rgal bar gyur nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa/ / rga med 'chi med zhi ba'i thang la dgod par bya// de'i tshe 'dun pa de bas kyang rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// lha de ltar nges par mdzad
160a3(mdo sde): dam byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa nga yis nges par byas pa nyon// sems can dgrol phyir phan par bya phyir brtson// mi g.yo las kyang mi g.yo gnod pa med//
160a4(mdo sde): ri rgyal lhun po lta bur brtan mi g.yo// 'dun pas smras pa/ jo bo'i nges pa ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rdo rje gnam lcags dgra sta mdung thung mda' char
160a5(mdo sde): dang / lcags bskol glog gi tshogs ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang // ri rtse kun tu 'bar ba mgo stong rab 'bab kyang // nga ni khyim la 'dod pa'i phyir yang mi skyed do// de'i tshe lha'i bu
160a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' la 'khod pa dag gis ca co dang gzha'i sgra brgya stong phyung ste/ me tog gi ra snga phab nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yul rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags shing //
160a7(mdo sde): sems can dag pa snying rje snying bcer ldan// blo gros mchog ldan rgyal gyur rgyal gyur cig/ mgon po 'gro la mi 'jigs skyon mdzad pa// mkha' la rdul gnag du ba mjug rings dag
160b1(mdo sde): mi chags bzhin du skyes mchog thugs mi chags/ / dri med yul gyi bde bas mi gos te// chu las pad+ma ji ltar 'phags pa bzhin// dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu zhing /
160b2(mdo sde): blo gros dang / lha'i bu tse ba bkod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa rig nas/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad gnyid
160b3(mdo sde): kyis log par byas so/ / sgra thams cad kyang mi grags par byas so// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad gnyid kyis log par rig/ nam gyi gung la
160b4(mdo sde): bab par rig nas/ skar ma'i bdag po rgyal dang ldan par rig/ de kho na mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab par rig nas/ 'dun pa la smras pa/ 'dun pa da skyo bar ma byed par rta bsngags ldan 'as
160b5(mdo sde): brgyan te/ ma thogs par nga la byin/ byang chub sems dpas tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyid la rgyal po chen po bzhis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs thos nas// rang rang
160b6(mdo sde): gi gnas nas byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rang rang gi bkod pas rings rings par yang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por 'ongs so// de nas
160b7(mdo sde): dri za'i bdag po rgya mtshan po yul 'khor srungs ni dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing / shar phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur to//
161a1(mdo sde): 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i shar phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing
161a2(mdo sde): 'dug go/ / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po ni grul bum mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/ spos chu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i bum pa thogs pa bye ba khrag
161a3(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i lho phyogs nyid du gnas
161a4(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang ni klu mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa/ spos kyi phye ma dang /
161a5(mdo sde): me tog gi char gyi sprin kun nas spong ba'i rlung dal zhing dri zhim pa sna tshogs gtong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu nub phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya
161a6(mdo sde): gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// rgyal po chen po lus ngan ni gnod sbyin
161a7(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer thogs pa lag na mar me thogs pa/ sgron ma 'bar ba lag na thogs pa/ mda' gzhu dang / ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang
161b1(mdo sde): rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / 'phangs mdung la sogs pa/ mtshon cha sra ba thogs/ go cha dang ya lang srab bgos pa/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma
161b2(mdo sde): ngag dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub sems
161b3(mdo sde): dba' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha/ lha'i me tog dang / spos dang // 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang /
161b4(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / me tog rna rgyan dang / rgyan thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar
161b5(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i steng gi bar snang la 'khor dang bcas te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// dge slong dag de ltar 'dun pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/
161b6(mdo sde): mig mchis mas gang zhing 'bral sa sa dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// jo bo khyod ni dus mkhyen pa da byed pas mkhyen pa lags na/ da ltar ni bzhud pa'i dus dang tshod ma lags na/ ci'i slad du
161b7(mdo sde): bka' de skad stsal/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa da ni dus la bab po// smras pa/ jo bo gang gi dus la bab/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sems can rnams kyi don
162a1(mdo sde): ni tshol ba na/ / byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob nas// 'gro ba dgrol zhes nga yis yun ring nas// smon lam btab pa de yi dus la bag/ de la 'di ni chos nyid de/
162a2(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa bla ba dang bar snang de bzhin skyong // lha dbang brgya byin rang gi phyogs dang bcas// 'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
162a3(mdo sde): lha rnams brtson par 'gyur/ / klu rgyal chu lha dang ni gzi can dang // ma dros pa dang de bzhin rgya mtsho yang // mi mchog mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab pas// de dag rnams kyang mchod phyir brtson
162a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ / gang dag gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang // rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul rab zhi spyad// de dag rnams kyang 'jig rten gsum mchod pa// mi mchog de la mchod phyir
162a5(mdo sde): mngon par brtson/ / sngon spyad spyod tshe grogs por gyur pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu lhags pa yang // rgyal ba mngon par 'byung ba lta byed cing // rjes su mthun pas mchod pa
162a6(mdo sde): bya snyam byed/ / gsang ba'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po do// rdo rje 'bar thogs nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas// lus la go bgos stobs brtson rtsal dang ldan// gsang ba lag na rdo rje 'bar
162a7(mdo sde): ba thogs/ / lha'i bu nyi ma zla ba de gnyis kyang // g.yas dang g.yon na rab tu gnas par gyur// sor mo bcu yi thal mo sbyar byas te// mngon par 'byung la rjes su rtogs par byed// skar ma
162b1(mdo sde): rgyal de 'khor dang bcas pa yang / / rang gi lus ni rgya chen sprul byas te// mi yi dam pa de yi mdun 'dug nas// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab 'byin te// skar ma rgyal ldan bzhud pa'i dus la bag//
162b2(mdo sde): do nub khyod dge bkra shis thams cad grub// bdag kyang khyod dang thabs cig mchi bar bgyi// 'dod chags sel ba bar chad 'byung ma gyur// lha bu yang dag srul pos bskul byas pa// stobs/
162b3(mdo sde): dang brtson 'grus 'phags pa myur du bzhengs// sdug bsngal nyen pa'i sems can thams cad sgrol// da ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab// lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang po yang /
162b4(mdo sde): yid 'ong me tog char pa 'debs shing lhags// de ni skyil mo krung bcas mchog la 'dug/ lha yis bskor cing mdzes la gzi brjid 'bar// grong khyer na ni skyes pa bud med khye'u dang bu mo
162b5(mdo sde): gang yod pa/ / de dag thams cad yid ngal gyur nas nyal te spyod lam rnams las nyams// rta dang glang po ba lang ne tso khrung khrung rma bya ri skegs rnams// de dag kun kyang yid ngal gyur pa nyal te//
162b6(mdo sde): de dag gzugs mi mthong // shAkya'i bu gang rdo rje sra ba mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs bkod dang // glang chen rta dang shing rta rta babs mchog drung bkod pa de dag nyal// rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye
162b7(mdo sde): bo kun kyang gnyid log par gyur/ / bud med tshogs rnams gnyid log gos bral ba cer bur gyur kyang yod mchor// de ni tshangs dbyangs yid du 'ong tshig ka la 'di'i sgra dbyangs kyis//
163a1(mdo sde): nam phyed 'das te nam gyi gung la bab nas 'dun pa de la smras// 'dun pa rta po bsngags ldan bzang ba legs par nga la byin// gal te nga la byams par sems na
163a2(mdo sde): bgegs ma byed par myur du byin/ / 'dun pas tshig thos mchis mas mig gang rang gi jo bo de la smras// sems can kha lo sgyur mchog gar bzhud bcibs pas khyod la ci zhig bgyi// dus
163a3(mdo sde): mkhyen cing ni chod mkhyen chos spyod gang du'ang gshegs pa'i dus ma lags/ khyod kyi sgo bkus gtan pa dam stsal su yang chab sgo 'byed mi 'gyur// brgya byin gyi ni yid kyi sems 'i
163a4(mdo sde): dbang gis sgo yang 'bye bar gyur/ / 'dun pas de 'dra mthong nas dga' zhing sdug bsngal de ni mchi ma 'khor// kyi hud bdag grogs su yod ji ltar bya zhing phyogs ni gar brgyug snyam//
163a5(mdo sde): gzi brjid ldan pas drag shul can gyi tshig spras brgya byin 'ba' shig thos// yan lag bzhi ldan dpung bcas pa 'di ni ci zhig byed// rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo de dag rnams kyis de ma
163a6(mdo sde): tshor/ bud med tshogs kyang gnyid log lha rnams kyis ni grags ldan gnyid log byas// kyi hud 'di yis sngon chad bsams pa'i smon lam thams cad grub gyur cig/ lha stong bye ba de dag dga'
163a7(mdo sde): ba'i yid kyis 'dun pa de la smras/ / 'dun pa rta mchog bsngags ldan legs par phul cig 'dun pa skyo mi bya// lha dang lha min ngag gis rnga dung rdza rnga rol mo khrag khrig byas// 'on kyang
163b1(mdo sde): lhas bsnyal ba yi grong khyer mchog 'di sad par yong ma gyur/ / bdun pa bar snang dri ma med pa lha yi 'od rab mdzes la ltos// khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bye ba mang po mchod phyir gang
163b2(mdo sde): lcags ltos/ / bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin dpung bskor sgo na mdzes par 'dug pa dang // lha dang lha min mi 'am ci tshogs gang dag mchod phyir lhags la ltos// 'dun pa des kyang lha
163b3(mdo sde): tshig de thos bsngags ldan rta po de la smras/ / sems can kha lo sgyur mchog 'di bzhud khyod ni rta skad sgrogs shing shog/ de yis dbyar gyi kha dog can de rmig pa gser gyis brgyan byas nas//
163b4(mdo sde): yid mi dga' bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i chibs par dbul ba byas// mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan mdzad khyod kyi chibs 'di rigs bzang dge ba lags// khyod kyis sngon chad gang
163b5(mdo sde): dgos smon lam de grub gyur cing gshegs su gsol/ / gang dag bgegs bgyid zhi bar gyur cig dgongs pa'i brtul zhugs grub gyur cig/ 'gro ba kun la bde dang mtho ris pa dang
163b6(mdo sde): zhi ba sbyin gyur cig/ de ni gang che mal nas langs tshes 'di thams cad rnam drug g.yos// rta rgyal dam pa zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba de la zhon// skyong ba'i lag pa rnam dag
163b7(mdo sde): pad+ma dri med 'dra bas rta mchog bteg/ brgya byin tshangs pa de gnyis de yi mdun na lam ni 'di zhes ston// de yis gsal ba dri ma med pa'i 'od btangs sa rnams snang bas gsal//
164a1(mdo sde): de tshe ngan song kun zhi sems can bde ldan nyon mongs gnod pa med// me tog char bab sil snyan bye ba sgra byung lha dang lha min bstod// thams cad dga' dang /
164a2(mdo sde): ldan nas grong khyer mchog la bskor ba byas te dong // skyes bu chen po song bas grong khyer dam pa'i lha yang yid ni dman par gyur nas 'ongs// mdun du 'dug nas snying rjer ngu ba'i yid
164a3(mdo sde): ldan de yis pad+ma 'dra ba'i bzhin la smras/ / khyod bral sgren mor mi mdzes sa 'di grong khyer thams cad mun pas kun tu dkrugs par gyur// do nub khyod kyis khab 'di spangs nas bdag la
164a4(mdo sde): dga' ba de bgyid pa 'di na 'ga' ma mchis/ / slan chad bya tshogs rnams kyi sgra dag dang // grags pa mtha' yas khyod ni sad bgyid pa'i// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gling bu snyan pa dang //
164a5(mdo sde): bkra shis sgra dang glu sgra thos mi 'gyur// nyon mongs bcom pa khyod ni gshegs gyur na// gdugs mtshan khyod la mchod pa bgyid pa yi// lha dang grub tshogs slan chad mthong mi 'gyur//
164a6(mdo sde): lha yi dri yang slan chad snom mi 'gyur// 'phreng ba btags nas zhag lon gyur pa ltar// khyod kyis do nub pho brang de bzhin spangs// khyod bzhud slan chad gzi brjid dpal ma mchis// gar
164a7(mdo sde): la lta ba bzhin du bdag la lta/ / grong khyer kun gyi byin dang stobs phrogs te// 'di ni dgon pa 'dra zhing mdzes ma lags// gang gis sa 'dir 'khor la stobs can du// lung bstan drang srong
164b1(mdo sde): tshig ni deng brdzun gyur/ / bsod nams sdong po chen po khyod byung na// sa 'di shAkya'i stobs ni stobs ma mchis// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir gdung yang 'chad// shAkya'i tshogs 'di
164b2(mdo sde): bsam pa rab tu nyams/ / dri med dri bral khyod ni gar bzhud par// bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig mchi bar bgyi// 'on kyang thugs brtse thugs rje bskyed nas ni// khod kyis pho brang 'di la gzigs
164b3(mdo sde): su gsol/ / blo gros ldan pa khyim la bltas nas ni// snyan pa'i nga ros 'di skad tshig smras te// skye 'chi mthar phyin ma thob bar du ni// ra yis ser skya'i grong khyer 'jug mi bya// rga shi
164b4(mdo sde): med pa'i gnas mchog 'chi med pa/ / byang chub dam pa nga yis ma thob par// nga ni ser skya'i gnas su mngon phyogs te// 'greng 'dug nyal dang 'chag par mi bya'o// gang tshe 'gro ba'i gtso bo
164b5(mdo sde): pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de byung zhing // de ni mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshe// lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod// 'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas chen yin// 'di ni bsod nams zhing chen yin// 'di ni/
164b6(mdo sde): bsod nams 'dod pa'i zhing // 'chi med 'bras bu smin mdzad pa// sems can rnams la thugs rdzebs// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis// 'dis ni
164b7(mdo sde): byang chub yang dag bsgrubs/ / 'di yi tshul khrims yongs su dag/ brtul zhugs bzang zhing spyod ma nyams// 'dod pa dag dang longs spyod rnams// don du mi gnyer tshul khrims srung //
165a1(mdo sde): sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir// 'di ni rtag tu bzod pa gsungs// yan lag nyid lag bcad gyur kyang // khro ba mi mnga' sdang mi mnga'// 'di ni rtag tu
165a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus ldan/ / bskal pa bye bar skyo mi mnga'// 'di yis byang chub yan lag bsgrubs// mchod sbyin dag ni bye ba mdzad// 'di rtag bsam gtan bsam gtan pa// thugs ni zhi zhi
165a3(mdo sde): rab tu zhi/ / nyon mongs thams cad bsregs nas ni// sems can bye ba 'grol bar 'gyur// 'di ni shes rab chags mi mnga'// rtog dang rnam par rtog ldan las// grol zhing thugs
165a4(mdo sde): ni rnam grol te/ / rang byung ba yi rgyal bar 'gyur// 'di ni rtag tu byams thugs ldan// thugs rje yi ni pha rol byon// dga' dang btang snyoms bsam gtan pa// tshangs pa'i lam gyi cho
165a5(mdo sde): ga mkhyen/ / 'di ni shin tu lha yi lha// lha rnams kyis ni mchod pa'i 'os// thugs dge dag cing dri ma bral// yon tan khrag khrig pha rol byon// 'jigs pas gnyen pa rnams kyi skyabs//
165a6(mdo sde): mig med rnams kyi sgron ma ste// gnod pa rnams kyi skyabs kyang lags// rings nas na ba'i sman pa lags// rgyal po dam pa chos kyi rgyal// dbang po lta bur spyan stong mngag/ tshangs
165a7(mdo sde): pa lta bur rang byung gyur/ / lus dang sems ni rab sbyangs pa// brtan zhing shes rab rab tu mang // dpa' zhing thugs ni 'dod chags bral// nyon mongs 'joms pas dpa' bo ste// ma rgyal
165b1(mdo sde): dgra las rgyal ba lags/ / seng ge lta bur bsnyengs pa spangs// glang po lta bur rab dul thugs// khyu mchog lta bur tshogs kyis gtso// bzod de 'khrugs pa rab tu spangs// zla ba lta bur/
165b2(mdo sde): rab tu gsal// nyi ma lta bur snang ba mdzad// sgron ma lta bur gsal mdzad pa// skar ma lta bur mun pa bral// pad+ma lta bur chags mi mnga'// me tog lta bur khrims dri gda'// ston pa lhun
165b3(mdo sde): po ltar mi g.yo/ / dog sa lta bur ba sos su gyur// rin chen 'byung gnas ltar mi 'khrugs// 'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal// 'di ni 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal// 'di ni lha yi bdud kyang
165b4(mdo sde): bcom/ / 'di ni ded dpon chen po ste// lam ngan ngag na gnas rnams la// yan lag brgyad pa lam gyi mchog/ ring por mi thogs ston par 'gyur// rga shi nyon mongs 'joms pa po// mun
165b5(mdo sde): pabapa rab rib rnam par grol/ / sa dang lha yul grags pa yi// rang byung rgyal bar byon pa lags// skyes bu mchog gi gzugs mnga' ba// dpag tu med la bstod pas bstod// khyod la bstod
165b6(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams des/ / sba ba'i seng ge 'dra bar shog/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung nas// shAkya'i yul dang / ko'u ta'i yul dang / gyad yul las 'das
165b7(mdo sde): te/ me ne ya'i yul gyi grong rdal rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba nas/ dpag tshad drug tu byang chub sems dpa' phyin pa dang / nam nangs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
166a1(mdo sde): rta bsngags ldan las babs te/ / sa la 'dug nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
166a2(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs chen po slar bkye'o// slar bkye nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyan 'di dag dang / rta bsngags ldan yang 'dun pa'i lag tu gtad de/ slar btang ngo snyam mo//
166a3(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa la bos te/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'dun pa khyod song la rgyan 'di dag dang / rta bsngags ldan khyer te slar log cig/ sa phyogs gang nas 'dun pa
166a4(mdo sde): slar log pa der mchod rten brtsigs te/ / ding sang du yang mchod rten de la 'dun pa slar log pa'i mchod rten zhes grags pa yin no// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/
166a5(mdo sde): ji ltar na gtsug pud kyang yod la rab tu byung ba zhes bya bar yang 'gyur snyam nas/ des ral gris gtsugs bud bcad de bar snang la bor ba dang / de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i
166a6(mdo sde): phyir blangs te/ ding sang du yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gtsug phud kyi dus ston byed do// der mchod rten yang byas te/ ding sang du yang mchod rten de gtsug pud blangs pa'i mchod rten
166a7(mdo sde): zhes ming du chags so/ / yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ rab tu byung nas yang gos ka shi ba gyon pa ji ltar rung gi gal te nags tshal gyi gnas nas/ tshul dang mthun pa'i gos shig/
166b1(mdo sde): rnyed na ni legs so snyam du sems pa dang / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' la ngur smrig bgos par gyur to snyam mo// de na lha'i bu gcig
166b2(mdo sde): lha'i gzugs mi mngon par byas te/ rngon pa'i gzugs lta bus gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dpas de la 'di skad ces smras
166b3(mdo sde): so/ / gal te grogs po khyod kyis gos ngur sprigs de rnams kho bo la byin na kho bo'i gos ka shi pa 'di rnams kyang khyod la sbyin no// des smras pa/ gos 'di dag kyang khyod la mdzes la/ 'o na rnams
166b4(mdo sde): kyang kho bo la mdzes so/ / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bos khyod la bslang ngo // de nas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu des gos ngur smrig rnams byang chub sems dpa' la byin te/ gos
166b5(mdo sde): ka shi pa rnams kyang blangs so/ / de nas lha'i bu des gus pa bskyed de/ lag pa gnyis kas gos de dag blangs nas spyi bo la bzhag ste/ de dag la mchod pa dang / bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir/ de nyid
166b6(mdo sde): nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo / / de yang 'dun pas mthong bar gyur nas der mchod rten du brtsigs te/ ding sang du yang mchod rten ngur smrig blangs pa zhes ming du chags so// gang gi tshe byang
166b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpas gtsug bud bcad nas/ gos ngur smrig rnams bgos pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgya stong dag dga' zhing mgu la tshim zhing yi rangs te/ mchog tu rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /
167a1(mdo sde): yid bde ba skyes te/ kye grogs po dag gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung ngo // kye grog po dag gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung ngo // de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
167a2(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur te/ sems can skye ba'i chos can grangs med pa dag skye ba las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ba nas/ rga ba dang /
167a3(mdo sde): 'chi ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las sems can rnams yongs su bkrol te/ 'khor ba'i rgya
167a4(mdo sde): mtsho'i pha rol tu sgral nas/ bde ba 'jigs pa med pa/ mya ngan med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ zhi ba rdul dang bral ba 'chi ba med pa'i chos kyis dbyings la 'god par 'gyur ro// zhes pa nas
167a5(mdo sde): a la la zhes bya ba dang / ca co dang ga zha'i sgra skad phyung bar gyur to// sgra de yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nas/ 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grag par gyur to// de nas btsun mo'i 'khor/
167a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis gzhon nu ma mthong nas/ dpyid dang dgun dang dbyar gnas pa'i khang bzangs rnams dang / khri rnams dang / khyim rnams su tshol zhing gang gi tshe/ ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/ gcig tu 'dus
167a7(mdo sde): nas bya ku ra ra mo bzhin du dus mo mthon par gyur to/ / de na bud med kha cig ni shin tu mya ngan gyis nyam thag nas/ kha dzin chung zhes me ci mo// 'tshan ni kyi chu ming po zhes 'dzin cing dru'o// kha cig ni kyi hud khyim tha ba ces/
167b1(mdo sde): 'dzer to// kha cig ni rje bo zhes 'dzer to// kha cig ni sdug pa'i tshig sna tshogs smra'o// kha cig ni lus rdeb cing ngu'o// kha cig ni mgo 'bal lo// kha cig ni gcig gi gdong du gcig/
167b2(mdo sde): lta zhing du'o// kha cig ni mig bsgyur cing ngu'o// kha cig ni lag pa brla la rdeb cing ngu'o// kha cig ni brang brdung zhing du'o// kha cig ni lag pa dpung bar rdob cing du'o// kha cig ni mgo rdung
167b3(mdo sde): zhing du'o/ / kha cig ni mgo las 'thor zhing du'o// kha cig ni sgra 'jig cing ngu'o// kha cig ni sgra 'bal zhing du'o// kha cig ni lag pa bstod de bsgreng nas cho ngo 'don te/ kha cig ni ri dgra
167b4(mdo sde): mo dug mdas phog tu glo bur rgyug cing ngu'o/ / kha cig ni gdong gos kyis g.yogs shing ngu'o// kha cig ni chu shing rlung dmar gyis bskyod pa bzhin du lus 'khyor zhing du'o// kha cig ni sa la
167b5(mdo sde): 'gyel te ma shi tsam du gyur to/ / kha cig ni nya chu nas bton pa bzhin du sa la 'gre ldog cing ngu'o// kha cig ni shing rtsa nas bton pa bzhin du glo bur dus la 'gyel nas du'o// sgra de yang rgyal pos zos nas shAkya rnams la smras pa/
167b6(mdo sde): ci'i phyir btsum mo'i 'khor na sgra chen po 'di grag/ shAkya rnams kyis shwe nas spral rgyal po chen po gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor na mi gda' zhes gda'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ myur du grong khyer gyi sgo rnams chod la nang
167b7(mdo sde): du gzhon nu tshol cig/ de dag gis phyi nang du btsal kyang ma rnyed nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi smre sngags 'don te sa la 'gre ldog cing / rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad
168a1(mdo sde): ces smras so/ / rgyal po chen po bdag bu dang myur du sprad du gsol/ de nas rgyal pos phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa bkye ste/ khyed deng la gzhon nu
168a2(mdo sde): ma rnyed kyi bar du slar ma ldog shig/ mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan rnams kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ni bkra shis kyi chab sgo nas mngon par 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan nas de
168a3(mdo sde): dag bkra shis kyi sgor dong ba dang / lam gyi bar zhig na me tog gi char bab par mthong ngo // de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni lam 'di dag nas byung ngo snyam nas/ de dag cung
168a4(mdo sde): zad cig pha zad du song ba dang / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gos ka shi ba rnams mgo la thogs te/ 'gro ba de mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di dag ni gzhon nu'i gos
168a5(mdo sde): ka shi ba rnams yin na/ gos 'di dag gi phyir 'dis gzhon nu bsad de 'di dag khyer bar ma gyur tam snyam mo// de nas yang de dag gis de'i phyi bzhin du 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan
168a6(mdo sde): dang rgyan rnams thogs te 'ong ba mthong ngo / / de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/ kye 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan khrid de 'ong gis de la ma dris kyi bar du hur 'dums ma byed cig ces smras nas/
168a7(mdo sde): de dag gis 'dun pa la dris pa/ kye 'dun pa gos ka shi pa 'di dag gis phyir mi 'dis gzhon nu bkrongs par ma gyur grang / 'dun pas smras pa/ de lta ni ma yin te/ 'dis kyang gzhon nu la
168b1(mdo sde): gos ngur smrig rnams phul lo/ / gzhon nus kyang na bza' ka shi ba'adi rnams la byin no// de nas lha'i bu des de dag mchod pa'i phyir/ gos de rnams lag pa gnyis kas spyi bo la thogs te/
168b2(mdo sde): de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo // de dag gis 'dun pa la yang dris pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ kho bo cag shAkya gzhon nu zlog tu 'dod na nus sam/ des smras pa/ mi nus so//
168b3(mdo sde): gzhon nus ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pa yin te/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nga ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por
168b4(mdo sde): mi 'jug go zhes de skad gsung bas phyir mi ldog ste/ gzhon nus ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pas slar mi ldog
168b5(mdo sde): de nas 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams khyer te/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du phyin to// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang / rgyan de dag shAkya gzhon nu bzang po dang / ming
168b6(mdo sde): chen dang / ma 'gags pas btegs pa dang / sred med kyi bu chen po ltar mkhregs pa dang / sred med kyi bu phyed ltar mkhregs pa'i rgyud de yang des gis ma theg go// gang gi tshe de dag gis kyang theg par
168b7(mdo sde): ma nus pa de'i tshe/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go ta mi 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis ji srid du rgyan 'di dag mthong ba de srid du bdag gi snying la mya ngan du 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis rgyan 'di dag rdzing du
169a1(mdo sde): dobar snyam mo/ / de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga'u ta mis rgyan de dag rdzing du dor te deng sang du rgyun gyi rdzing bu zhes ming du chags so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ga
169a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dpa' 'byung / / de yis ser skya'i grong khyer ba dag mtha' dag sad// kun gyi snying lam gzhon nu mal na nyal snyam sems// mgu zhing rab tu dga' nas phan tshun tshig
169a3(mdo sde): kyang smra/ / sa 'tsho ma dang de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rnams sad// mal du bltas nas byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong nas// kyi hud bdag bslus byang chub sems dpa' gar bzhud ces/
169a4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khyim du dus mo'i sgra yang byung bar gyur// rgyal pos sgra de thos nas sa la 'gyel gyur te// e ma nga yi bu gcig pa zhes dus mo phyung // de nas de la bum pa'i chu blugs khrus byas nas//
169a5(mdo sde): shAkya mang po dag gis de ni dbug kyang phyung // sa 'tsho ma yang mal nas sa la lhung bar gyur// sgra rnams 'bal zhing rgyan rnams dag kyang bkrol bar gyur// sdug pa kun dang bral ba ring por mi thogs
169a6(mdo sde): shesa'adren pas bdag la sngon gsungs kye ma legs par gsungs/ / gzugs ni gzugs bzang shin tu dri med yan lag smras// gsal zhing rnam dag 'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug/
169a7(mdo sde): dpal yon ldan pas bsngags pa lha mis mchod pa'i 'os// bdag ni mal du bor te khyod ni gang du bzhud// yon tan mnga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong bar// skoms yang mi
169b1(mdo sde): 'tshal rgyags pa rnams kyis rgyags mi bgyid/ / sa la nyal zhing ral pa rnams kyang thogs par 'gyi// khrus bgyi spangs te brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad par bgyi// bskyed ma'i tshal kun
169b2(mdo sde): lo ma me tog 'bras ma mchis/ / rnam dag se mo do yang mun rdul phyag dar 'dra// mi mchog dam pa khyod kyis spangs par gang gyur pa'i// grong khyer khyim rnams mdzes pa ma lags 'brog pa
169b3(mdo sde): mtshungs/ / kyi hud glu dbyangs rab tu snyan pa'i sgra skad can// kyi hud lcug lhug po yi rgyan thogs btsun mo'i 'khor// kyi hud gser gyi dra bas khyab pa'i bar snang yang // yon tan ldan dang bral
169b4(mdo sde): bas phyin chad mi blta'o/ / sru mo de yang shin tu sdug bsngal thob gyur cing // shAkya'i bu mo ma du shig ces dbugs kyang 'byin// nga ni 'jig rten dag na rga shi thar byed ces// mi mchog dam pa des
169b5(mdo sde): ni sngon yang smras pa yin/ / drang srong chen po dge ba stong dag spyad pa de// nam phyed nas ni dpag tshad drug tu song gyur nas// 'dun pa de la rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams gtad// 'dun pa 'di dag
169b6(mdo sde): khyer la ser skya'i grong song shig/ yab dang yum dag la yang nga yi tshig gis ni// gzhon nu song gis slar zhing thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni slar 'dir mchi bar bgyi//
169b7(mdo sde): chos rnams gsan nas thugs kyang zhi bar 'gyur zhes smos// 'dun pas de bzhin 'dren pa ni slar smras pa// 'dun pa legs ldan byang chub sems dpa' gar khrid ces// mi mchog gnyen
170a1(mdo sde): gyi tshogs rnams bdag la brdeg 'gyur gyis/ / bdag la nus pa ma mchis stobs dang mthu ma mchis// byang chub sems dpas slar smras 'dun pa ma 'jigs shig
170a2(mdo sde): nga yi gnyen gyi tshogs rnams dga' par gyur nas ni/ / khyod la ston pa'i bdu shes rtag tu sgom 'gyur te// nga la byams pa bzhin du khyod la'ang byams par 'gyur// 'dun pas rta mchog dang
170a3(mdo sde): ni rgyan rnams khyer nas su/ / mi mchog dam pa de yi skyed mo'i tshal du phyin// skyed mo'i tshal gyi srungs ma dga' ba'i shugs skyes nas// kun tu dga' ba'i sgra ni shAkya rnams la smras//
170a4(mdo sde): gzhon nu 'di yin rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa yang // skyed mo'i tshal du phyin gyis thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ rgyal pos de skad thos nas shAkyas bskor nas ni// rab tu dga' ba'i shugs skyes
170a5(mdo sde): skyed mo'i tshal du phyin/ / sa 'chos byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan rig nas// tshig de la ni yid ma ches te dgar ma gyur// gzhon nu byang chub ma thob bar du phyir 'dir yang // byon cing
170a6(mdo sde): ldog par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin/ / rgyal pos rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa de mthong nas// dus mos btab ste sa yi steng du 'gyel bar gyur// kyi hud nga'i bu glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra mkhas
170a7(mdo sde): rgyal srid thams cad bor te khyod ni gang du song / / 'dun pa khyod kyis nga lu legs par spros// byang chub sems dpa' gar song sbyor ba ci 'dra zhig/ sgon su yis phye zhing gang gis khrid par
170b1(mdo sde): gyur/ / lha tshogs rnams kyis de la mchod pa ji ltar byas// 'dun pas spras pa rgyal po'i dbang po bdag la gson// dgung phyed grong khyer byis pa rgan po gnyid log nas// byang chub sems
170b2(mdo sde): dpa' 'jam dbyangs bdag la 'di skad du/ / 'dun pa rta rgyal nga la myur du byin zhes gsung // bdag gis skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud med tshogs kyang bslang // de dag log cing rab tu log pas
170b3(mdo sde): tshig ma thos/ / bdag ni ngu zhing bdag gis chibs kyi rgyal po phul// phan par mdzad pa gang du dgyes pa gshegs bgyis// brgya byin gyis ni 'khrul 'khor ldan pa'i chab sgo phye// 'jig rten
170b4(mdo sde): skyong ba bzhis ni chibs kyi rkang lag bteg/ dpa' bo bcibs nas stong gsum lam rnams rab tu g.yos// nam mkha' shin tu yangs pa 'di las gshegs gyur te// 'di ni rab tu btang bas
170b5(mdo sde): mun pa mu na nag gsal/ / me tog bab cing sil snyan brgya dag sgra yang byung // lha dang de bzhin lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod// nam mkha' las ni lha tshogs rnams kyis bskor te gshegs//
170b6(mdo sde): 'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams khyer nas su// de ni ngu zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du phyin pa dang // sa 'chos 'dun pa de dang rta mchog mthong gyur nas// rab tu brgyal bar gyur te sa yi steng du 'gyel//
170b7(mdo sde): bud med tshogs mang thams cad rab tu brtson par ni// chu dag blangs shing shAkya'i bu mo 'khru bar byed// mya ngan rnyed pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur du 'ong // phangs pa gnyis dang bral bar gyur
171a1(mdo sde): du 'ong snyam byed/ / shAkya'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyur pa mthu bskyed nas// rta yi rgyal po rta mchog de yi mgul nas 'jus// sngon chad dga' bas rtse ba dag kyang dran
171a2(mdo sde): byas nas/ / mya ngan gyur cing sna tshogs tshig kyang rab tu smra// kyi hud bdag gi dga' skyed kyi hud bdag gi mi mchog dri med zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba// kyi hud bdag gi gzugs can kyi hud
171a3(mdo sde): bdag gi mtshan mchog dri med gzi brjid ldan/ / kyi hud bdag gi yan lag ma smad legs par 'khrungs pa rim gyis 'phags pa mnyam med pa// kyi hud bdag gi yon tan mchog ldan lha mis
171a4(mdo sde): mchod pa thugs rje chen por mchog ldan pa/ / kyi hud bdag gi stobs ldan sred med bu yi mthu dang ldan pa dgra yi tshogs bcom pa// kyi hud bdag gi shin tu 'jam dbyangs ka la bing+ka'i sgra
171a5(mdo sde): skad tshangs dbyangs snyan ldan pa/ / kyi hud bdag gi grags pa mtha' yas bsod nams brgyas 'phags bsod nams rgya chen mnga' ba po// kyi hud bdag gi bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan
171a6(mdo sde): tshogs brgyan drang srong tshogs rnams dga' mdzad pa/ / kyi hud bdag gi nags mchog bung ba sgra 'byin lum bi ni der bltam pa legs bltams pa// kyi hung bdag gi sgra grags lha mi rnams kyi
171a7(mdo sde): mngon par mchod pa'i ye shes sdong po che/ / kyi hung bdag gi ro bro dam pa bim pa'i sgros can pad+ma'i spyan mnga' gser mchog 'dra// kyi hud bdag gi shin tu rnam dag tshems ldan zhob mo lta bu'i
171b1(mdo sde): tshems ldan pa/ / kyi hung bdag gi shangs legs sprin legs sprin mtshams par na ji med mdzod spu gnas pa po// kyi hud bdag gi dpung mgo rab zlum gzhu 'dra'i skyed pa zlum// kyi dud
171b2(mdo sde): bdag gi glang po'i sna 'dra brla ldan phyag zhabs rnam dag mdzes pa'i sen mo can/ / de yi rgyan rnams 'di dag bsod nams dag gis byas pa rgyal po'i rab tu dga' byed pa// kyi hud bdag
171b3(mdo sde): gis glu dang dbyangs sgra dam pa me tog byug pa bzang po'i dus bzang ba/ / kyi hud bdag gi me tog spos rnams glu len dag dang btsun mo'i 'khor ni dga' byed pa// kyi hud bsngags ldan legs
171b4(mdo sde): skyes nga yi khyim thab grogs po yin na khyod kyis gang du khrid/ / kyi hud 'dun pa snying rje med pa mi yi dam pa bzhud tshe sbron cing slong ma phod// do nub grong khyer dam pa 'di nas mi yi kha lo sgyur ba thugs
171b5(mdo sde): rje ldan gshegs te/ / phan pa mdzad pa 'di ni gshegs shes skabs der tshig cig tsam zhig ci yi phyir ma smras// phan pa mdzad pa ji ltar gshegs shing rgyal po'i pho brang 'di nas su yis
171b6(mdo sde): phyung ba byas/ / gang gi phyogs gshegs nags tshal gel ba'i lha mo de yi grogs su 'gyur ba dpal yon ldan// 'dun pa kho mo shin tu sdug bsngal gter bstan nas ni mig phyung 'dra bas
171b7(mdo sde): mig byin cig/ 'dun pa rgyal ba kun gyi pha dang ma dag mchod pa'i 'os shes rtag tu bsngags mdzad na// de dag rnams kyang spangs te byung na bud med 'dod pa'i dga' ba 'di lta smos ci dgos//
172a1(mdo sde): kyi hud sdug pa rnams dang bral ba gar la lta ba'i rang bzhin 'dra ste rtag ma yin// byis pa 'du shes kyis bzung lta ba phyin ci log pas skye dang 'chi bo gnas par 'gyur//
172a2(mdo sde): de yis sngon chad rga shi ldan pa'i 'dus byas dag la grogs po 'ga' yang med ces bstan// khyod kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs nas shing mchog drung du byang chub dam pa mchog thob gyur//
172a3(mdo sde): rdul med byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni grong khyer dam pa 'dir ni slar yang gshegs su gsol// 'dun pa de yang mchog tu yid mi dga' zhing sa 'tsho ma yi tshogs ni thos gyur nas// de ni nga ro/
172a4(mdo sde): mthon cing tshig tu smras pa sa 'tsho ma khyod bdag tshig legs par gson// nam gyi gung thun bud med tshegs rnams thams cad rab tu gnyid kyis log ste dben gyur pa// de yi tshe na bsod nams
172a5(mdo sde): brgyas 'phags de yis bdag la bsngags ldan nga la byin zhes gsung / / de skad tshig thos nas ni de ma thag tu bdag gis khyod ni gzims ma la gzims la bltas// de tshe khyod kyi sdug pa 'di ni
172a6(mdo sde): gshegs kyis 'tsho bzhengs zhes sgra skad chen po phyung / / lha yis tshig de bkag par gyur par bud med rnams las 'ga' tsam zhig kyang sad ma gyur// bdag ni rab tu ngu zhing rta yi rgyal po brgyan pa
172a7(mdo sde): bgyis nas mi mchog de la phul/ / bsngags ldan drag shul can gyi gzi ldan sgra phyung de yi sgra ni rgyang grags tsam du grags// 'on kyang lha yis gnyid kyis logs par bgyis pas grong khyer pa
172b1(mdo sde): las 'ga' yang sad ma gyur/ / gser dang dngul dang nor bu rnams kyis g.yogs pa'i sa la bsngags ldan rkang lag rab tu brdabs// de las snyan dang 'jigs dang mdzes pa'i sgra byung
172b2(mdo sde): 'on kyang mi 'ga' tsam sad ma gyur/ / de yi bar skabs skar ma rgyal dang ldan gyur zla ba skar ma dag kyang mkha' la gnas// mkha' las lha rnams bye bas thal mo sbyar te btud nas phyag kyang
172b3(mdo sde): rab tu 'tshal/ / gnod sbyin srin po'i tshogs rnams nye bar gnas shing 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che ldan bzhis// pad+ma'i ze ba lta bur rnam dag dri med lags pas bsngags ldan gyi ni
172b4(mdo sde): rkang lag bteg bsod nams gzi brjid pa rgyas 'phags de yang ku mu da dang bar sha lta bu de la bcibs/ / sa 'di rnam bcug tu tu g.yos shing sangs rgyas zhing rnams dri med 'od kyis khyab
172b5(mdo sde): bde sogs khyim thab brgya byin lha yi gtso bo nyid kyis de tshe 'chab sgo dbye ba bgyis/ / de ni bye ba khrag khrig lha yis mdun du bdar te lha dang klu yis mchod nas 9/ bsngags ldan gyis ni 'du
172b6(mdo sde): shes tsam gyis nges pa 'jig rten mgon po mkha' las bkur bar shes/ / lha dang lha ma yin tshogs dbang por bcas pa de dag bcibs te bde bar gshegs pa gshegs// lha yi bu mtshad
172b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab brjod cing / / de dag bsngags ldan la yang stobs btang byed la sman la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin// bsagasapa
173a1(mdo sde): 'dren pa myur ba myur bar khyer la skyo bar mi dga' ma skyed cig/ 'jig rten mgon po mnyes par byas na khyod la 'jigs dang ngan song ngan 'gro med par 'gyur// lha rnams
173a2(mdo sde): re re zhing yang bdag la 'jig rten mgon po bcibs par mngon du dga' bar gyur/ / yul sa 'di na bye ba lha yi rkang pa dag gi non par ma gyur cung zad med// bsngags ldan nam mkha'i skabs na sna
173a3(mdo sde): tshogs spras shing mdzes pa'i lam gnas rin chen stegs bu ni/ / rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan cing lha yi bdug pa snying po mchog bdugs 'di la ltos// bsngags ldan dge ba'i
173a4(mdo sde): las 'dis sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas shin tu legs par sprul pa der/ / lha yi bu mos bskor cing mdun gyis bltas la lha yi 'dod pa'i dga' bas dga' bar gyis// legs pas
173a5(mdo sde): mtsho ma khyod phyir zhing ma bshums dgyes par mdzad cing mchog tu dgyes par mdzod/ / mi mchog byang chub brnyes nas lha yis mdun du bdar ba ring por mi thogs gzigs par 'gyur// sa mtsho
173a6(mdo sde): mi rnams gang dag legs pa'i las bgyis de dag rtag tu bshums par bgyi ma lags/ / de ni bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags lags kyis dgyes par mdzod la bshums mo ma
173a7(mdo sde): mdzad cig/ rgyal po mngon par byung ba de na lha dang mi yi mchod pa'i bkod pa gang lags pa// bkod pa de ni sa mtsho bdag gis dgung bdun par du brjod kyang rdzogs par brjod mi nus// khyod
173b1(mdo sde): kyis 'grol phan mdzad pa la bsnyen bkur mdzad pas brnyes mchog bsam gyis mi khyab brnyes/ / bdag gis bsams na khyod kyang mi yi dam pa de ni ci 'drang sa 'gyur snyams bgyid// mngon
173b2(mdo sde): par 'byung ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o/ / // 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po bcu gcig pa/ dge slong
