173b3(mdo sde): ngag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ / 'dun pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya'i bu mo sa mtsho ma dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / shAkya'i tshogs thams
173b4(mdo sde): cad kyi mya ngan bsang ba'i gtam smras so/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu la gos ka shi pa rnams byin nas// de la gos ngur smrig rnams blangs
173b5(mdo sde): te/ 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba dang / sems can la snying brtse ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid rab tu byung ngo // de nas byang chub sems
173b6(mdo sde): dpa' bram ze'i rigs ldan gyi gnas ga la ba der song ba dang / des byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba dang / zas la mgron du bos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze pad+ma'i
173b7(mdo sde): gnas su song ba dang / des kyang byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba dang / zas la mgron du bos so// de nas bram ze drang srong nam gru'i gnas su song ba dang / des kyang de bzhin du
174a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mgron du bos so/ / de bzhin du gdul ba'i be con can gyi bu 'od ldan gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' mgron du bos te/ dge slong dag de ltar
174a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rim gyi grong khyer chen po yangs pa can du phyin to/ / de'i tshe sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / slob ma sum brgya dang lhan cig tu grong khyer
174a3(mdo sde): yangs pa can du gnas bcas shing gnas te/ de slob ma dag la ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi brtul zhugs dang mthun pa'i chos ston pa des byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ring po nas bong ba
174a4(mdo sde): mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te slob ma rnams la smras pa/ kye 'di'i gzugs la ltos shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ de bzhin du de la blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni ya mtshan che'o// dge
174a5(mdo sde): slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur ga la ba der song ste/ sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sgyu rtsa la shes kyi bu ring 'phur khyod las bdag gis
174a6(mdo sde): tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ / des smras pa/ kye go'u ta ma dad pa'i rigs kyi bu gang la spyad na/ tshegs chung ngus kun shes pa thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa/ de lta bu la spyod
174a7(mdo sde): cig/ dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsam ste/ ngal mos pa yang yod/ nga la brtson 'grus kyang yod/ dran pa yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin kyang yod/ shes rab kyang yod kyis chos de'i
174b1(mdo sde): thob par bya ba dang / mngon du bya ba'i phyir bdag gcig pu bag yod pa dang / brtun pa dang / dben par gnas bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas nga gcig pu bag yod pa dang / brtun pa dang
174b2(mdo sde): dben par gnas nas/ tshogs chung ngus chos de khong du chud cing mngon du gyur to// dge slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur ga la ba der song ste/ 'di skad ces smras so//
174b3(mdo sde): kye ring 'phur khyod kyis chos 'di tsam zhig khong du chud cing mngon du gyur tam/ des smras pa/ kye go'u ta ma/ de de bzhin no// ngas smras pa/ kye kho bos kyang chos de mngon du byas shing
174b4(mdo sde): khong du chud do/ / des smras pa/ kye go'u ta ma de bas na chos gang kho bos shes pa de khyod kyis shes la/ gang khyod kyis shes pa de yang kho bos shes te/ de bas na bdag cag gnyis kas
174b5(mdo sde): slob ma'i tshogs 'di la bstan to/ / dge slong dag de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyis nga la mchod pa dam pas mchod de/ nga slob ma rnams la yang don mthun par byed du bcug go/ dge
174b6(mdo sde): slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ ring 'phur gyi chos 'di ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ de byed pa yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par nges par 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ bdag gis de las
174b7(mdo sde): lhag pa zhig btsal zhing sprad do snyam mo/ / dge slong dag de nas nga ji srid dga' ba'i bar du grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas nas/ yul ma ga d+ha ra yul rgyu zhing / yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po'i khab
175a1(mdo sde): kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/ ri'i rgyal po skya bogal ba der song nas// ri'i rgyal po skya bo de'i ngos lang gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs med par lta bye ba khrag khrig
175a2(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag du mas bsrungs shing gnas so/ / de nas nang par sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te/ chu dron can gyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'gro ba dang
175a3(mdo sde): ldog pa dang mdun du blta ba dang / g.yas g.yon du blta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba mdzes pa dang / snam sbyar dang / thang ba dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'dzin pa mdzes pa
175a4(mdo sde): dang dbang po ma g.yengs pa dang / sprul pa bzhin du yid phyi rol tu ma byung ba dang / 'bru mar gyis gang ba'i snod thogs pa bzhin gnya' shing gang tsam du lta zhing bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so//
175a5(mdo sde): de na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyi mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ ci 'di tshangs pa yin nam/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'on te rnam thos kyi bu 'am/ 'on te ri'i lha 'ga' zhig yin
175a6(mdo sde): nam snyam mo/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de nas gzi brjid mtha' yas dri med ldan// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rab byung ste// sems ni zhi zhing spyod lam rab dul bar//
175a7(mdo sde): ri yi rgyal po skya bo'i ngos la gnas// byang chub sems dpas nam nangs shes nas ni// mchog tu blta na mdzes par shams thabs bgos// lhung bzed thogs te dma' ba'i yid kyi su
175b1(mdo sde): de ni rgyal po'i khab tu bsad snyoms zhugs/ / gser gyi sa le sbram bzhin rab dul la// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyig zugs pa// skyes pa'i nog dang bud med kyis mthongo na// su snang
175b2(mdo sde): blta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur ro/ / srang dag rin chen gos dang 'brus kyang brgyan// gang gi mthus ni grong khyer kun mdzes pa'i// sngon chad ma mthong sems can 'di su zhes// skye bo se
175b3(mdo sde): cing de yi phyi bzhin 'brang / / bud med stong dag khang pa'i steng 'dug cing // de bzhin sgo dang de bzhin skar khung dang // srang dag skang ste khyim ni stong byas na// de dag las gzhan med par mi
175b4(mdo sde): mchog lta/ / skyes bu mchog gi gzugs la lta ba'i tshe// nyo dang 'tshod pa dag kyang mi byed cing // chang dad can yang chang ni mi 'thung la// khyim dang srang na 'dug par mi dga'o// rings par
175b5(mdo sde): mi zhig rgyal po'i khab song ste/ / de dga' rgyal po gzugs can snying po la// grong 'dir tshangs pa bdag nyid bsod snyoms spyod// lha khyod brnyes pa dam pa brnyes shes zer// kha cig brgya byin/
175b6(mdo sde): lha yi rgyal zhes zer// gzhan dag 'thab bral lha yi bu zhes zer// de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan 'phrul pa dang // gzhan dag rab 'phrul lha yi bu zhes zer// kha cig nyi ma zla ba de bzhin
175b7(mdo sde): du/ / sgra gcan stobs ldan thags bzangs rigs zhes zer// kha cig dag ni tshigs kyang 'di skad du// ri rgyal skya la 'dug pa 'di yin zer// rgyal pos tshig ni de dag thos gyur nas// yid
176a1(mdo sde): ni mchog tu dga' zhing skar khung 'dug/ shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser ltar dpal 'bar ba// byang chub sems dpa' sems can mchog mthong ngo // rgyal po gzugs
176a2(mdo sde): can snying pos mi de la/ / bsod snyoms byin la gar song ltos shes bsgo// ri yi mchog la de ni song mthong nas// kha cig ri yi ngos la de mchis smras// gzugs can snying pos nam
176a3(mdo sde): nangs shes nas ni/ / mi dbang skye bo mang pos yongs bskor te// ri yi rgyal po skya bo'i drung du song // ri de dpal ni rab tu 'bar bar mthong // bzhon pa las ni babs te rkang gis song
176a4(mdo sde): ji ltar lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo zhing / / rtswa bting steng na skyil mo krung 'dug pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu gus pas mthong // rgyal pos rkang par mgo bos phyag byas te// rnam pa
176a5(mdo sde): sna tshogs dag gi gtam byas nas/ / khyod la rgyal srid kun gyi phyed sprin gyis// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di sprod ma 'phyan smras// byang chub sems dpas 'jam po'i tshig smras pa// sa yi
176a6(mdo sde): bdag po yun ring tshe srungs shig/ kho bos rgyal srid sdug pa bor nas su// re ba med par zhi phyir rab tu byung // gzhon nu thor bu dar la ba ba dang ldan// lus kyi kha dog mdzes shing shugs
176a7(mdo sde): ldan pa/ / nor mang dag dang bud med tshogs bzhes te// bdag gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod// ma ga d+ha'i rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa// bdag khyod mthong bas
176b1(mdo sde): mchog tu dga'/ / bdag gi rgyal srid kun gyi grogs mdzod cig/ bdag ni khyod la mnga' dbul 'dod pa spyod// nags tshal stong pa dag tu ma bzhugs shig/ slan chad sa gnas rtswa sted/
176b2(mdo sde): ma bzhugs shig/ khyod kyi sku ni mchog tu rab tu gzhon// bdag gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam zhing gya gyu med// dga' 'gyur phan zhing
176b3(mdo sde): snying brtse'i tshig smras pa/ / rgyal po khyod ni rtag tu bkra shis gyur// kho bo 'dod pa'i yon tan mi 'dod do// 'dod pa dug 'dra nyes pa mtha' yas ldan// sems can dmyal dang yi dgas
176b4(mdo sde): dud 'gror lhung / / mkhas pas smad cing 'dod pa'i 'phags ma yin// kho bos ngar snabs rul ba bzhin du dor// 'dod pa shing gi 'bras bu bzhin du lhung // ji ltar sprin dang char sprin bzhin
176b5(mdo sde): du 'gro/ / mi brtan 'gyur las ji ltar rlung bzhin 'gro// dge ba thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing slu// de bzhin 'dod pa mi rnyed phyir yang gdungs// rnyed du zin kyang chog par 'dzin mi 'gyur//
176b6(mdo sde): gang tshe dbang po ma rung rab gyur pa// de tshe 'dod pa sdug bsngal drag chen skyed// rgyal po lha yi 'dod pa gang yin dang // mi yi 'dod pa bzang po gang yin pa'i// 'dod pa thams cad mi gcig
176b7(mdo sde): gis thob kyang / / de la chog pa med de yang tshol lo// rgyal po gang dag zhi zhing dul gyur pa// 'phags pa zag med chos kyi 'du shes kyang // shes rab mkhas pas chog pa de legs chog
177a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa cung zad med/ / rgyal po'i 'dod pa dag la bsten byas shing // sngon chad 'dus byas pa yi mtha' ma med// ji ltar mi dag lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs
177a2(mdo sde): bzhin/ 'dod pa bsten na phyir zhing sred pa 'phel// rgyal po'i lus la yang stobs de mi bstan// snying po med de sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor bzhin// bu ga dgu yi sgo nas rtag tu 'dzag/
177a3(mdo sde): rgyal po kho bo'i 'dod pa'i 'dod chags med// kho bos 'dod pa mang dang de bzhin du// blta na sdug pa'i bud med stong bor te// mchog zhi byang chub dam pa thob 'dod nas// kho bo srid pa mi dag
177a4(mdo sde): nges par 'byung / / dge slong phyogs ni gang dang gang nas byon// gang du khyod skyes yab yum gang na bzhugs// rgyal rigs lags sam bram ze 'am rgyal po lags// dge slong khur gyi 'du shes
177a5(mdo sde): med na gsungs/ / rgyal po shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i grong // mchog tu 'byor cing rgyas pa thos gyur tam// kho bo'i pha yi ming ni zas gtsang yin// yon tan 'dod pas kho bo der rab byung //
177a6(mdo sde): khyod mthong legs par mthong ste legs pa lags// gang las khyod skyes bdag kyang de'i slob ma'o// 'dod chags bral ba 'dod par spyan drangs pa// thugs pas bdag la bzod pa mdzad
177a7(mdo sde): du gsol/ / gang tshe khyod kyis byang chub rnyes gyur tshe// chos rjes bdag la chos kyi bgo bsha' mdzod// rang byung bdag gi yul nas bzhugs pa ni// bdag gis mchog mchod rnyed par ba
177b1(mdo sde): rnye do/ de nas kyang ni na dur byag byas te// rgyal thos shen gus par bskur byas nas// mi dbang ngag sgrubs mangs pan ts+tsha// srang yang rgyam pa'i lab tu grags par gyur//
177b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon po ma ga d+ha yi grong zhugs te// ji srid 'dod par zhi ba'i yid kyis 'dug/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don byas nas// mi dbang ne rat+na na'i chu 'gram song // gzugs can snying
177b3(mdo sde): po 'ongs pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ bcu drug pa'o// / dge slong dag yang de'i tshe// rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gnas bcas nas/
177b4(mdo sde): slob ma'i tshogs chen po slob ma bdun brgya dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de de dag la 'du shes med min gyi brtul zhugs dang mthun pa'i chos ston to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' rangs
177b5(mdo sde): byed kyi bu lhag spyod tshigs dang ldan pa tshogs can/ tshogs kyi slob dpon grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod pa mkhas pa/ kun gyis shes pa mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam
177b6(mdo sde): du sems te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod 'di tshogs dang ldan pa/ tshogs can tshogs kyi slob dpon/ grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod pa mkhas pa kun gyis shes
177b7(mdo sde): pa yin na/ gal te bdag de'i drung du song ste/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub ma brtsams na ni/ 'di dag la khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed la/ mngon sum gyi shes pas
178a1(mdo sde): kyang shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas zag pa dang bcas pa nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang sun
178a2(mdo sde): phyung bar ma 'gyur gyis/ gang gis na de la bsam gtan gyi spyod yul dag dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dmigs pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag
178a3(mdo sde): kyang 'byung ba ma yin par bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs shig bstan par bya 'am/ bdag rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung du song ste/ bdag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan gyi khyad par
178a4(mdo sde): bstan pa'i phyir de'i slob mar khas blangs la/ 'dus byas kyi ting nge 'dzin snying po med par bstan par bya 'am snyam mo// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas don de'i dbang du byas te/
178a5(mdo sde): rangs byed kyi bu lcags spod ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po khyod kyi ston pa ni su zhig sus ston pa kun shes/ de skad ces
178a6(mdo sde): smras pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis byang chub sem dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po kho bo la ston pa gang yang med de/ 'on kyang kho bo rang gis 'di yang dag par khong
178a7(mdo sde): du chud do/ / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis ci khong du chud/ smras pa/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i lam mo// byang chub sems dpas
178b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ bdag gis khyod las ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa thob par 'tshal lo// smras pa/ de ltar bya'o zhes bya ba nas/ gdams ngag byin pa'i bar du'o//
178b2(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu song ste/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug go// 'dug ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par dang / shes
178b3(mdo sde): kyi khyad par dang / sngon spyod pa legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'dris pa'i khyad par dang / de sems la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir bsam gtan la sog
178b4(mdo sde): pa 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa brgya stong thams cad rnam par dang bcas/ bye brag dang bcas par mngon sum du gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang / shes bzhin du sa
178b5(mdo sde): las langs te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi
178b6(mdo sde): lam las gong na gzhan 'ga' zhig yod dam/ des smras pa med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ lhag spyod 'ba' zhig la dad pa yod pa dang // brtson 'grus dang
178b7(mdo sde): dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pa ma yin gyi/ bdag la yang dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod do snyam mo// de nas byang chub
179a1(mdo sde): sems dpas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so/ / grogs po khyod gang du nges par 'byung ba'i chos de kho bos kyang khong du chud do// de smras pa/ de bas na
179a2(mdo sde): 'dod / khyod dang kho bos tshogs 'di dag la rjes su bslab bo zhes byang chub sems dpa' don mthun pa dang / slob dpon gyi gnas su bzhag go// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po
179a3(mdo sde): lam 'di ni yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'gog par 'gyur ba ma yin/ nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ mngon par shes par 'gyur ba ma yin/
179a4(mdo sde): rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba ma yin/ dge sbyong nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba ma yin no// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lhag spyod slob ma dang
179a5(mdo sde): bcas pa 'dun par byas nas/ de tsam gyis chog go zhes bya ba nas/ chog par byas te song ba'i bar du'o// de'i tshe lnga sde bzang po rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod las tshangs par
179a6(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis 'di'i phyir yun ring por btsal zhing brtson par byas kyang mtha' dang mu khong du chud par ma nus kyi/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas tshegs chung ngus
179a7(mdo sde): khong du chud cing mngon du byas la de de yang mi 'dod cing de las gong du tshol ba las the tsom med par de ni 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyur ro/ / gang des mngon du byed par 'gyur ba de bdag cag la yang
179b1(mdo sde): 'gyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ / de ltar dpyad nas lnga sde bzang pos rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung nas dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems
179b2(mdo sde): dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du rgyal po'i khab tu gnas nas/ lnga sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu yul ma ga d+har yul rgyu zhing song ngo // yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab dang / ri ga ya'i bar na tshogs
179b3(mdo sde): gzhan dag gcig dus ston byed de/ / tshogs de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' lnga sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya ba dang / zas la mgron du bos so// dge slong dag de nas byang
179b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yul ma ga d+har rgyu zhing / yul ma ga d+ha'i ri ga ya ga la ba der song ste/ der phyin par gyur to// ri ga ya'i rtse mo dor byang chub sems dpas spong ba'i phyir gnas te/ de der
179b5(mdo sde): gnas pa'i tshe/ sngon ma thos pa dang / sngon mi shes pa'i dpe gsum mngon du gyur to// gsum gang zhe na/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang la la 'dod pa dag las lus dben par mi gnas//
179b6(mdo sde): 'dod pa dag las sems dben par mi gnas shing / de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la brkam pa dang / 'dod pa la
179b7(mdo sde): yongs su gdung ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi bar ma yin la/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing / lus la gdung bar byed pas/ sdug bsngal gyis tshor ba drag po
180a1(mdo sde): mi bzad pa tsha ba myong ste/ 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nus so// 'di lta ste/
180a2(mdo sde): dper na/ skyes bu zhig me 'dod la shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan dang / shing rlom pa'i gtsub shing thogs la chur bcug ste gtsubs na des me phyin par mi nus so// de bzhin du dge sbyong dang / bram
180a3(mdo sde): ze de dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par mi ga nas/ 'dod pa rnams las sems dben par mi gnas te/ de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la sred pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /
180a4(mdo sde): 'dod pa la sgom pa dang / 'dod pa las yongs su gdungs pa dang / 'dod pa la brkam pa dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin gyi// de dag bdag nyid kyi gnod par byed cing /
180a5(mdo sde): lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po ma bzad pa tsha ba myong mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi
180a6(mdo sde): nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' la dpe mngon du gyur pa dang po'o// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems
180a7(mdo sde): dben par gnas kyang / de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' zhes bya ba nas/ me tshol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de so shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan thogs la thang la bzhag ste/
180b1(mdo sde): shing rlon pa'i gtsub shing gi gtsubs na des me phyin par mi nus so// de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu/
180b2(mdo sde): gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par du mngon bya bar mi nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni sngon ma thos shing mi shes pa'i dpe mngon du gyur pa gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang gang
180b3(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas shing / de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas/ thams cad de bzhin du sbyar te/ de dag gi de ni nye ba
180b4(mdo sde): zhi ba yin te/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing/ lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa myong mod kyiga'on kyang de dag mi'i chog bus lags chos tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa le sheg sang du sa
180b5(mdo sde): kha'i khyad par mngon du bya bar mi nus so/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu zhig me 'dod cing 'od 'dod pa dang / 'od tshol bar gyur la/ des shing skam pos gtsub stan dang / gtsub shing thang la bzhag ste
180b6(mdo sde): gtsubs na/ des me 'byung ba dang / 'od 'bar bar byed nus so// de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang / bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas/ tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/ 'or kang de
180b7(mdo sde): mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni sngon ma thos shing sngon mi shes pa'i dpe gsum pa'o//
181a1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag kyang da ltar 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par gnas/ 'dod pa rnams las sems
181a2(mdo sde): dben par gnas la/ bdag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas/ thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag gi de yang nye bar zhi ba yin la/ bdag nyid kyis gnod par byas shing / lus la
181a3(mdo sde): gdung bar byed pa sa/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba nas/ tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ 'on kyang bdag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong
181a4(mdo sde): ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so snyam mo/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du ga ya'i ri ra ga ya'i rtse mo la gnas te/ rkang gis yul rgyu zhing sde dpon gyi grong
181a5(mdo sde): khyer lteng rgyas ga la bar song ste phyin pa dang / de na klung ne ran dzA na chu gsal ba 'bab stegs bde ba/ shing dang shing gel ba mdzes pa dag gis brgyan pa/ nyen 'khor na spyod yul gyi grong yod pa
181a6(mdo sde): mthong ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' yid shin tu dga' bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma ho sa phyogs 'di ni mnyam zhing nyams dga' ba/ nang du yang dag 'jog dang mthun pa ste/ rigs
181a7(mdo sde): kyi bu spong ba don du gnyer ba la ni 'dis chog go/ / bdag kyang spong ba don du gnyer ba yin gyis/ bdag 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du
181b1(mdo sde): sems te/ bdag ni 'dzam bu gling 'dir snyigs ma lnga'i dus la bab cing sems can rnams dman pa la mos pa dang / mu stegs can gyi sdes gang ba dang / lta ba sna tshogs la zhugs pa dang /
181b2(mdo sde): lus la ril por 'dzin pa la zhen pa'i tshe 'ongs te/ blun po dag gdung bas yongs su gdung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dag pa tshol zhing ston pa 'di lta ste/ sngags la spyod pa dang / lag pa la ldag pa dang
181b3(mdo sde): mi slong ba dang / mi smra ba dang / rtsa ba du ma za ba dang / sha dang nya mi za ba dang / dbyar mi 'byung ba dang / chang dang phub ma dang / chu yongs su spangs pa dang / khyim gcig dang gsum dang / lnga dang bdun
181b4(mdo sde): nas/ zas len pa dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu dang / nya lcibs dang / rtsa ku sha dang / lo ma dang / ba lang gi lci ba dang / ba'i gcin dang / bo thug dang / zho dang / mar dang / bu ram dang
181b5(mdo sde): ma btags pa za zhing 'thung ba dang / bya ngang pa dang / phug ron gyis zos te bor ba bkrus te za ba dang / grong dang dgon pas 'tsho ba dang / ba lang gi brtul zhugs dang / ri dgas dang / khyi dang / pag
181b6(mdo sde): dang / spre'u dang / glang po che'i brtul zhugs dang / 'greng ba dang / mi smra ba dang / dpa' bo'i tshul du 'dug pa dang / kham gcig za ba dang / kham bdun gyi bar du za ba dang / zas lan cig za
181b7(mdo sde): ba dang / nyin zhag gcig za ba dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / drug gi skabs skabs su za ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig za bar byed pa dang / zla ba la lta ba dang / bya rgod dang / rul ba'i
182a1(mdo sde): ga shog pa thogs pa dang / shing leb dang / rtswa mun dza dang / zar ma'i shun pa dang / rtswa dur bya dang / bres ma dang / rnga bal gyi la ba dang / ra bal gyi la ba dang
182a2(mdo sde): skra'i la ba dang / ko pags gyon pa dang / gos gsher ba dang / stegs bu'i steng dang / chu'i nang na nyal ba dang / thal ba dang / rdo dang / gyo mo dang / shing leb dang / tsher ma dang / rtswa dang
182a3(mdo sde): gtun shing gi steng du nyal ba dang / mgo thur du bstan pa dang / tsog tsog por 'dug pa dang / thang la nyal ba dang / gos gcig pa dang / gos gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang /
182a4(mdo sde): drug dang / bdun dang / gos mang po srel ba dang / gcer bur 'dug pa dang / 'khru ba dang / mi 'khru ba'i cho ga dang / sgra dang / sen mo dang / a ga tsom ring por 'jog pa dang / ral pa'i
182a5(mdo sde): thor tshugs 'chang ba dang / rgyags shug dang / til dang / 'bras 'bru gcig za ba dang / thal ba dang / sngag tsha dang / me tog spyad spyad pa dang / rdul 'thul ba dang / rdul nag po dang / phyag
182a6(mdo sde): dar dang / rdzab kyis lus la skud pa dang / ba s+phu dang / mi'i thod pa dang / skra dang / sen mo dang / tsha bu'i smad g.yogs dang / rdzab dang / keng rus thogs pa dang / chu dron po dang /
182a7(mdo sde): 'bras kyi khu ba dang / la bang btsags pa dang / khrud ma 'thung ba dang / mdag ma dang / tshon rtsi dang / gos ngur smrig dang / khar ba gsum dang / mgo 'dreg pa dang / ril pa dang / mi'i thod pa dang /
182b1(mdo sde): khri'i zur shing 'chang ba sa blun po rnams dag par khong du chud do// du ba rngub pa dang / me rngub pa dang / nyi ma la lta ba dang / gdung ba lnga byed pa dang / rkang pa gcig dang / lag pa gcig bstod pa dang /
182b2(mdo sde): rkang pa gcig gtsugs pa dang / gnas gcig na bdug pas dka' thub sogs dang / phub ma la sogs pa dang / mdag ma bsregs pa dang / bum pa bsregs pa dang / rdo bsregs pa dang / me 'bar
182b3(mdo sde): bar 'jug pa dang / zas mi za ba dang / mya ngan dang / 'bab stegs su song ste shi bas sdug pa'i 'gro ba tshol lo// rab bsngags shes bya ba dang / gzhi mi 'grib pa zhes bya ba dang / gzhi srung zhes
182b4(mdo sde): bya ba dang / gzhi tshugs zhes bya ba dang / smon lam dang / bstod pa dang / sbyin bsreg dang / dbab pa dang / sngags kyi bzlas brjod dang / klag pa 'dzin cing byed pas dag par khong du chud do// bdag
182b5(mdo sde): dag par sems shing de dag la rten te/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / gu lang dang / khyab 'jug dang / lha mo dang / gzhon nu dang / ma mo dang / ka t+ya'i bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang
182b6(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bu dang / chu lha dang / nor can gyi bu dang / tha skar gyi bu dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
182b7(mdo sde): srin po dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / 'khor dang / tshogs dang / mtshan dang / za dang / lha'i drang srong dang / rgyal po'i drang srong dang / tshangs pa'i drang srong dag
183a1(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal zhing / de dag la nyid por 'du shes so// sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' la yang rten/ ri dang / ri sul dang / klung dang / chu//
183a2(mdo sde): mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing dang / rgya mtsho dang / lteng ka dang / khron pa dang / rdzing bu dang / shing dang / shing gel ba dang / 'khri shing dang / rtsa dang / sdong dum dang /
183a3(mdo sde): lhas dang / dur khrod dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / srang dag la yang rten to// khang pa dang / ka ba dang / rdo ba dang / tho ba dang / ral gri dang / gzhu dang / dgra sta dang / mda' dag
183a4(mdo sde): mdung mthung dang / rtse gsum dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo// zho dang / mar dang / yungs kar dang / nas dang / shing bal gyi phreng ba dang / rtswa dur ba dang / nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul
183a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa la bkra shis par 'dzin te/ gzhan mu stegs can 'di dag 'khor bas 'jigs skrag nas/ rnam pa de lta bu dag byed cing rten to// 'di na kha cig bdag cag gi mtho ris dang /
183a6(mdo sde): dzar pa yang 'di lta bu dag las 'grub bo snyam du sems te/ de ltar log pa lam du song bas/ skyabs ma yin pa la skyabs su 'du shes shing / bkra shis ma yin pa la bkra shis par 'du
183a7(mdo sde): shes la/ dag pa ma yin pa la dag par sems kyis/ bdag gis ci nas kyang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang / sems can las dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams kyis las dang
183b1(mdo sde): bya ba chud mi za ba bstan par bya ba dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha bsam gtan spyod yul pa rnams la bsam gtan gyi khyad par bstan pas 'dun par byed pa de lta bu'i brtu la zhugs dang dka'
183b2(mdo sde): thub kyi khyad par brtsam mo snyam mo/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas de 'di snyam du bsams nas/ lo drug tu brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub shin tu drag po shin tu spyad par dka'
183b3(mdo sde): bshin tu byang bar dka' ba'i dka' ba spyad par brtsams so/ / ci'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni spyad par dka' ba ste/ de bas na dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems
183b4(mdo sde): dpa' srid pa tha ma pa gang bsam gtan mkha' khyab la snyoms par zhugs pa ma gtogs par sems can gyis ris na mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa sus kyang dka' ba spyad pa de lta bu spyod par nus pa med do//
183b5(mdo sde): ci'i phyir mkha' khyab ces bya zhe na/ de dang po nyid du bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba nye bar 'gog kun tu 'gog ste/ bsam gtan de ni rtog pa med
183b6(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa med/ g.yo ba med/ sems pa med/ 'gyur ba med cing / thams cad rjes su song ba thams cad la mi rten pa ste/ bsam gtan de la sngon slob pa 'am/ mi slob pa 'am/ rab sang
183b7(mdo sde): rgyas sam/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sus kyang snyoms par ma zhugs so// mkha' zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ste/ khyab par byed pa/ byed pa med pa/ rnam par mi 'thor ba ste/
184a1(mdo sde): des thams cad khyab par byed pas na/ bsam gtan de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de bas na mkha' khyab ces bya'o// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig
184a2(mdo sde): rten pa rnams la ngo mtshar yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags pa gzhil ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba rnams char bcad pa dang / lha rnams 'dun par bya ba dang / sems
184a3(mdo sde): can chad pa dang / rtag par smra ba/ las dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams/ las dang bya ba la gzud pa dang / bsod nams kyi 'bras bu brjod pa dang / ye shes kyi 'bras bu yang dag par bstan pa dang /
184a4(mdo sde): bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnam par dbye ba dang / lus kyi stobs dang mthu yang dag par bstan pa dang / sems kyi dpa' ba yang dag bskyed pa'i phyir/ byi dor ma byas pa'i sa la skyil mo krung bcas te
184a5(mdo sde): 'dug go/ / 'dug nas rang gi lus sems kyis tshar bcad cing gzir to// dge slong dag de nas nga dgun gyi tshes brgyad pa'i nub mo// de ltar lus tshar bcad cing gzir bas man khung nas kyang rdul
184a6(mdo sde): byung ste zags/ dpral ba nas kyang rdul byung ste zags nas sa la lhung zil par chags nas dro zhing drangs pa byung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na nyes su stobs dang ldan pas skyes bu shin tu nyam chung ba zhig
184a7(mdo sde): mgrin pa nas bzung ste/ btsir ba de bzhin du dge slong dag lus 'di sems kyis tshar bcad cing gzir na/ mchan khung nas kyang rdul byung zhing zags/ dpral ba nas kyang rdul byung zhing zags nas
184b1(mdo sde): sa la lhung ste/ zil par chags nas dro zhing rlangs pa byung ngo // dge slong dag de nas ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis bsam gtan ma la khyab la lasam gtan du bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas ngas bsam
184b2(mdo sde): gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du byas pa dang / kha dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur te/ rna ba'i bu ga gnyis nas sgra drag po dang sgra chen po byung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dperan
184b3(mdo sde): sduspud pa bus pa'i tshe/ sgra drag po dang / sgra chen po 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dge slong dag kha dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur pa dang / rna ba'i bu ga gnyis nas sgra drag po dang /
184b4(mdo sde): sgra chen po byung ngo // dge slong dag de nas ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ yang bdag gis bsam gtan mkha' khya ba la bsam gtan du bya'o snyam pa dang / de nas nga'i kha dang sna dang / rna ba 'gags par
184b5(mdo sde): gyur to/ / de dag 'gags pa dang / rlung gong du mgo'i thod pa la gnod par gyur to// dge slong dag 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig gis mdung thung rtul pos mgo'i thod pa la btab pa de
184b6(mdo sde): bzhin du/ dge slong dag kha dang sna dang / rna ba'i dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags pa dang / gong du mgo'i thod pa la gnod par gyur to// der lha'i bu gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' na ba de mthong
184b7(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye ma ho kyi hud gzhon nu don grub 'di 'chi ba'i dus byas so// gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces smras so// 'di 'chi ba'i dus byas pa ma yin gyi/ dgra bcom pa bsam
185a1(mdo sde): gtan la gnas pa rnams kyi tshul ni de lta bu'o zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// mi yi bdag po shAkya'i sras pa 'di// brnag pa ma rdzogs don
185a2(mdo sde): kyang ma mdzad cing / / 'jig rten gsum pa sdug bsngal mgon med par// mdzad nas mgon 'dir grongs par mi 'gyur grang // kyi hud sems can snying po thugs dam brtan// mgon pos sngon
185a3(mdo sde): chad bdag cag dga' ldan du/ / dam chos mchod sbyin la ni mgron du bos// sems can dag khyod dam bcas te ga re// de nas lha de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du song ste/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul
185a4(mdo sde): la gzhon nu ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so zhes don de brjod de/ de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas nam phyed tsam na/ klung ne ran dzA na'i 'gram ga la ba dang
185a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ba dang / des byang chub sems dpa' lus bskams shing 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang 'dra ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang mchi mas brnangs shing ngus nas
185a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / lum bi ni zhes bya ba'i tshal du nga bu btsas pa'i tshe// seng ge bzhin du 'dzin pa med par gom bdun khyod nyid song // phyogs bzhir bltas shing
185a7(mdo sde): 'di ni nga yi skye ba tha ma zhes/ / khyod kyi tshig snyan smras pa de yang khyod la yong ma rdzogs// 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes drang srong nag pos bstan pa yi/ de yi lung bstan pa yang nyams la mi
185b1(mdo sde): rtag des ma mthong / / bus ni yid dga' 'khor lo sgyur ba'i dpal yang ma myong la// byang chub kyang ni rjes su ma thob tshal tu 'grongs par 'gyur// bu phyir su la sgrub cing sdug bsngal su yi gan du
185b2(mdo sde): mdud/ / bdag gi bu gcig cung zad gson pa'i srog ni su yis sbyin/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ shin tu snying rjes par ni du byed cing // skra yang bshig la mdzes pa rnams bor ba/
185b3(mdo sde): shin tu bu yi smre sngags 'don byed la// sa stangs 'dug cing 'greng ba 'di su zhig/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis smras pa// bdag gis zla ba bcu bar du// rdo rje 'dra ba mngal du bcangs// bu de'i
185b4(mdo sde): ma ni bdag yin te/ / rab tu sdug bsngal rnam par smra// de nas byang chub sems dpas ma'i dbugs 'byin cing smras pa// bu la byams pa khyod kyi ngal ba 'bras bu yod par bya yis ma
185b5(mdo sde): 'jigs shig/ sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir yongs su btang ba ni don yod pa ste/ drang srong nag pos bstan pa yang mngon par gsal bar bya'o// mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa yang mngon par gsal
185b6(mdo sde): bar bya'o/ / sa ni rnam rgyang 'thor bar 'gyur yang srid// rin chen rtse mo lhun po tshur 'pho srid// nyi zla skar tshogs sa la lhung 'gyur srid// so so'i skye bo yin yang nga mi 'chi// de phyir 'di la
185b7(mdo sde): mya ngan khyod ma byed/ / ring por mi thogs byang chub sangs rgyas mthong // lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis thos ma thag tu rab tu dga' ste/ ba spu g.yos nas byang chub sems dpa' la me tog man dar bas
186a1(mdo sde): gtor te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i sil snyan dkrom zhing rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo // dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ dge sbyong dang bram
186a2(mdo sde): ze gang dag kha cig zas chung ngus dag par sems pa yod kyis/ ngas kyang zas chung ngu la nan tan bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te/ zas su rgyag shug 'bru gcig pu kho na ste/
186a3(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa zos so// dge slong dag khyed kyi blo 'di snyam du de'i tshe'i rgya shug che ba snyam du sems par gyur na/ de ltar mi lta ste de'i tshe/ rgya shug kyang 'di nyid tsam mo// dge slong dag ngas
186a4(mdo sde): zas su rgya shug 'bru gcig kho na ste/ gnyis su med pa zos pas/ lus shin tu nyam chung zhing rid par gyur to// dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper na/ ldum du a si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang
186a5(mdo sde): ka li ka'i tshigs pa ci 'dra bar nga'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams kyang de 'dra bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ srog chags kar ka ta ka'i rtsib logs ci 'dra bar nga'i rtsib logs gnyis kyang de 'dra bar
186a6(mdo sde): to/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ bzhon pa'i bres khang ngam/ glang po'i bres khang rnying pa ngos gnyis zhig pa ni gdung rten gyi bar sdang zhing mngon no// de bzhin du nga'i rtsib logs gnyis ka nas lus kyi
186a7(mdo sde): nang snang zhing mngon no/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ lan bur blas pa ni mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nga'i sgal tshig kyang mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par
186b1(mdo sde): gyur to/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ ku ba kha bo gzhon nur bcad pa ni rnaMs pa dang / kun tu rnyis pa dang / cu bcul por 'gyur ro// de bzhin du da'imag yang rnyis pa dang / kun tu rnyis pa dang / rtsu
186b2(mdo sde): rtsub por gyur to/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la khron pa'i skar ma dma' bar song ste/ tshegs chen por snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nga'i mig gi 'bras bu yang khung du song ste/ tshegs
186b3(mdo sde): chen pos snang bar gyur to/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ ra'i rkang pa dang / rnga mo'i rkang pa ci 'dra bar nga'i mchan khung dang / lto dang / brang la sogs pa yang de 'dra bar gyur to// dge slong dag de nas nga gang gi
186b4(mdo sde): tshe lag pas lto ba la byug go snyam na sgal tshigs nyid la reg go/ / ldang ngo snyam nas langs na yang / de bzhin du sgur por gyur te 'gyel to// sha thang ste langs na rdul gyis lus yog pa lag pas
186b5(mdo sde): phyis pa dang / ba spu rul ba thams cad lus las lhags so// gang sngon nga kha dog mdzes shing 'jam par gyur pa de yang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub bor btang bas med par gyur to// nga'i spyod
186b6(mdo sde): yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyon 'khor pa rnams kyang nga la 'di ltar e ma ho dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni gnag go/ / e ma ho dge sbyong goT ta ma ni sngo bsangs so// e ma ho dge sbyong go'u ma na
186b7(mdo sde): mang gu ra'i mdog 'dra'o/ / sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to snyam du shes so// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung
187a1(mdo sde): du la nan tan bya'o snyam mo/ / dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te/ ngas zas su 'bras 'bru gcig pu kho na ste/ gnyis su med par zos so// dge slong dag khyed 'di
187a2(mdo sde): snyam du de'i tshe 'bras che ba snyam du sems par gyur na/ de ltar mi lta ste/ de'i tshe 'bras kyang 'di nyid tsam mo// dge slong dag ngas zas su 'bras 'bru gcig zos pas lus myur du snga ma bzhin du
187a3(mdo sde): gyur to/ / e ma ho dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyam dgu ra'i mdog 'dra'o// sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsam
187a4(mdo sde): te/ bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung ngu nyid la nan tan bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te/ ngas zas su til 'bru gcig pu kho na ste/ gnyis su med pa zos pa nas/ de'i kha
187a5(mdo sde): dog 'jam po med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ / dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig zas mi za bas dag par sems te/ bdag gis kyang yang mas
187a6(mdo sde): cad du zas mi za bar nan tan bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas ngas zas mi za bar 'dug go// dge slong dag ngas ma zos pas lus shin tu bskams shing nyam chung ba dang rid par gyur to//
187a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ ldum bu a si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang / ka li ka'i tshigs pa bas kyang nyis gyur dang / su ma gyur dang / bzhi gyur dang / lnga gyur dang / bcu gyur gyis/ nga'i yan lag
187b1(mdo sde): rang nying lag skem par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ rtsib logs ni srog chags kar ka ta ka'i rtsib logs dang / gzhon pa'i bres khang lta bur gyur to// skal tshigs ni la klas pa lta bur gyur to//
187b2(mdo sde): mgo'i thod pa ni slu ba kha ba lta bur gyur to// mig gi 'bras bu ni khron pa'i skar ma lta bur gyur to// dge slong dag nga legs par ldang ngo snyam nas lus kyis bskyod nas/ sgur por gyur te 'gyel lo//
187b3(mdo sde): sha thang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus yog pa lag pas phyis pa dang / ba spu rul ba thams cad lus las lhags so// gang sngon nga kha dog mdzes shing 'jam par gyur pa de yang 'di ltar/ bdag nyid
187b4(mdo sde): spong ba brtsub por btang ba'i phyir med par gyur to/ / nga'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nye kor ba rnams kyang / 'di ltar a ma ho dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni gnag go// e ma ho dge sbyong go'u tam
187b5(mdo sde): ni sngo bsangs so/ / e ma ho dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni nyam dgu ra'i mdog 'dra'o// sngon 'di'i kha dog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to snyam du shes so// de'i tshe rgyal
187b6(mdo sde): po zas gtsang mas kyang nyin re bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i drung du pho nya btong ngo / / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du bya ba rmad du byung ba bstan pa dang / bya ba nyams pa'i
187b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams las dang bya ba la gzung ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams brjod pa dang / ye shes chen po'i yon tan bstan pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir
188a1(mdo sde): til 'bru gcig dang / rgya shug 'bru gcig dang / 'bras 'bru gcig gi lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pa bstan te/ yid dman pa med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi
188a2(mdo sde): bar du skyil mo krung bcas nas ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin du gnas te/ spyod lam nyams pa med do// nyi mas bab nas kyang grib ma la ma song ngo // grib ma las kyang nyi ma la ma song ngo // rlung dang nyi ma
188a3(mdo sde): dang char pa'i skyabs ma btsal to/ / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / sdig sbrul ma bskrad do// bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / mchil ma dang / snabs ma bor ro// bskum pa dang sbyang ba ma byas
188a4(mdo sde): so/ glos phab pa'am/ khas bub pa 'am/ gan rgyal ma yin par gnas pas gnas so// sprin chen po dang / yul ngan chen po dang / char pa dang / ser ba dang / ston dang / dpyid dang /
188a5(mdo sde): dgun gang yin pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la ma phog go// tha na byang chub sems dpas lag pas kyang ma skyabs so// dbang po yang ma bkag go// dbang po'i yul yang ma
188a6(mdo sde): blangs so/ / gang dag der 'ong bgrong gi gzhon nu 'am/ grong gi gzhon nu ma 'am/ ba lang rdzi 'am/ phyugs rdzi 'am/ rtsa thun nam/ shing thun nam/ gci thun de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'
188a7(mdo sde): la dur khrod kyi 'dre yin pa snyam du sems shing de la rtsen te/ de la sas skud do// der byang chub sems dpa' lo drug po de dag gis lus ngan pa dang / gong ba dang / ring par gyur te/ de'i rna ba gnyis su
188b1(mdo sde): swa 'am/ shing bal bcug nas/ sna'i bu ga gnyis su 'byin to// sna'i bug gnyis su bcug nas/ rna ba'i bug gnyis su 'byin to// rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su bcug nas khar 'byin to// khang
188b2(mdo sde): bcug nas rna ba dang sna'i bu gar 'byin to/ / snar bcug nas 'byin to// lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
188b3(mdo sde): po gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mngon sum du gyur pa de dag nyin mtshan du gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed do// smon lam yang 'debs so// de na byang chub sems dpa
188b4(mdo sde): lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyod pa ston cing / lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis tshangs pa dag theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim
188b5(mdo sde): byang ba/ / yon tan dag dang ldan pa de// sems can don dang phan pa'i phyir// thabs dang ldan pa'i bsam pa skyes// snyigs ma lnga yi dus kyi tshe// chos dman mos pa'i 'jig rten pa//
188b6(mdo sde): las dang bya bor 'jig rten du/ 'dzam bu gling 'dir skyes par 'gyur// mu stegs tshogs kyi rab tu gang // ltad mo dang ni bltas su lta// lus la gnod pa bya ba byed/ byis pa de dag dag par sems
188b7(mdo sde): g.yang sa me dang mya ngan 'jug/ sgren mo sa dang thal ba skud// lus ni yongs su gdung ba'i phyir// gdung ba lnga la brtson dang ldan// lag pa brkyang ste rgyu ba dang // mi mkhas kha cig lag pa ldag/
189a1(mdo sde): bum pa khar gzhong las mi len// sgo dang ka bas chos mi len// gang na khyi yod pa nas min// 'dug ce'am chur shog ces las min// khyim nas kha cig kha zas
189a2(mdo sde): cig len pas/ / bdag ni dag par 'gyur snyam sems// mar dang 'bru mar bu ram zho// nya dang sha dang 'o ma spong // ldam ldam sre da pad+ma'i rtsa// gzegs dang ba lang gci ba za// rtsa ba
189a3(mdo sde): 'bras bu lo ma dang / / ku sha tshal bu la ba sbags// srel byed kha cig sgren mor rgyu// glen pa 'di bden gzhan brdzun snyam// lag pa sgreng bar byed pa dang // skra bsgreng ral bar bsgreng ba
189a4(mdo sde): dag/ lam las rab tu rnam par nyams// las min gnas shing bde 'gro 'dod// rtswa dang gtun shing thal bar nyal// tsher mar nyal zhing cog pur 'dug/ kha cig rkang pa gcig pus
189a5(mdo sde): 'greng / / gdong bstod nyi dang zla la lta// chu mig mtsho dang lteng ka dang // rgya mtsho chu bo nyi zla dang // shing dang ri yi rtse mo dang // rdza dang sa la phyag kyang 'tshal// glen pa de dag mnod mang
189a6(mdo sde): gis/ / lus ni yongs su skam par byed// log par lta dang ldan pa dag/ myur du ngan song rnams su ltung // nga ni dka' thub brtul zhugs dang // dka' spyad gang zhig lha dang mis//
189a7(mdo sde): spyad par nus pa ma yin pa'i// dka' spyad drag po rtsom snyam sems// bsam gtan gang zhig rang rgyal gyis// blta bas nus pa ma yin pa'i// rdo rje lta bur brtan gnas pa// mkha'
189b1(mdo sde): khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed/ / mu stegs brtul zhugs ngan pa yis// dga' ba'i lha mi 'di na yod// de dag yongs su smin bya'i phyir// dka' spyad brtul zhugs drag po brtsams
189b2(mdo sde): sa stengs ci yang mi bting bar/ / skyil mo krung ni bcas te 'dug/ rgya shug til dang 'bras 'bru gcig/ za ba'i cho ga rnam par ston// dbugs dbyung rngub po rnam par spangs// stobs
189b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa g.yo ba med/ / lo drug bar du bsam gtan mchog/ nam mkha' khyab la bsam gtan byed// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med// g.yo ba med cing sems rgyu med// nam mkha'i khams
189b4(mdo sde): su khyab pa yi/ / mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de ni nyin las grib mar ram// grib las nyi mar song ma byas// lhun po lta bur mi g.yo ba'i// mkha' khyab bsam gtan
189b5(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed/ / rlung dang char dang sha sbrang dang // sdig sbrul sbrang bu skyob mi byed// rnam par ma 'khrugs spyod pa yis// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// bdag nyid gcig pu'i
189b6(mdo sde): don gyi phyir/ / mkha' khyad bsam gtan byed pa min// gzhan du snying rje'i sems kyis ni// 'jig rten don mang ched du sgom// grong gi byis pa ba lang rdzi// shing thun dag dang rtsa thun dag/ de la dur
189b7(mdo sde): khrod 'dre snyam sems/ / de la sa yis skud byed cing // mi gtsang ba yang 'thor bar byed// de dag gnod pa mang byed kyang // g.yo ba med cing 'khrugs med par// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan
190a1(mdo sde): byed/ / mtho ba med cing dma' ba med// lus ma bsrungs par chos ma reg/ bshang ba mi byed gci mi byed// sgra yis mi 'jigs gzhan mi lta// sha dang khrag rnams skams gyur/
190a2(mdo sde): te/ pags pa rtsa rgyus rus pa lus// sgal tshigs dag ni lto bar snang // lan bu blas pa ci bzhin no// gang dag lhag par byas lha dang // lha min gnod sbyin dri za klu// yon tan ldan pa mngon
190a3(mdo sde): sum pas/ / nyin dang mtshan du mchod pa byed// ji ltar mkha' 'dra'i sems ldan 'di// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de 'drar bdag cag myur gyur ces// smon lam dag kyang
190a4(mdo sde): 'debs par byed/ / snying rje blo yis 'jig rten gyi// don mang phyir byed ma gtogs par// bdag phyir ma yin bde blos min// bsam gtan ro ni myang phyir min// phas kyi rgol ba rab tu bcom// mu
190a5(mdo sde): stegs blo nyams zil gyis mnan/ / mgo rog byang chub ga la yod// byang chub bskal mang rnyed dka' zhes// 'od srungs la ni tshig smras pa'i// las dang bya ba rab tu bstan// skye bo dag ni dga'
190a6(mdo sde): bya'i phyir/ / mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// lha mi khrag khrig bcu gnyis tshang // theg pa gsum la rab tu btul// de yi ched du blo gros bzang // mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam
190a7(mdo sde): gtan byed/ / dka' ba spyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// // dge slong dag bdud sdig can yang // byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa'i
190b1(mdo sde): tshe/ / phyi bzhin 'brang ste glags bltas/ skabs btsal kyang / nam yang glags cung zad kyang ma rnyed do// de glags ma rnyed nas/ yi chad de yid la gcags bzhin du song ngo // de la 'di skad ces
190b2(mdo sde): bya ste/ dgon pa nyams ni dga' ba dang // nags tshal gel ba sgra med dang // lteng rgyas kyi ni shar phyogs na// chu klung ne ran dzA ra der// spong ba'i phyir ni brtson par byas// rtag tu mthu rtsal
190b3(mdo sde): brtan pa po/ / grub dang bde ba thob bya'i phyir// brtson pas rab tu brtul de la// bdud ni 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig/ smra bar byed cing 'ongs par gyur// kye srog gces kyis 'tsho bar gyis//
190b4(mdo sde): gson na chos ni spyod par 'gyur// gson tshe bya ba gang yod pa// de dag byas nas mya ngan med// khyod dge mdog nyams dman par gyur// khyod ni shi la thug cing 'dug/ 'chi ba'i cha ni stong snyed
190b5(mdo sde): tsam/ / cha gcig tsam zhig gson par zad// sbyin pa dag ni rtag tu byin// me yi sbyin bsreg sbyin bsreg byos// 'on tang bsod nams chen por 'gyur// spong ba yis ni ci zhig bya// spong ba'i
190b6(mdo sde): lam ni sdug bsngal te/ / sems dul ba ni bya dka' zhes// de tshe bdud kyi de skad tshig/ byang chub sems dpa' de la smras// de skad smra ba'i bdud de la// byang chub sems dpas 'di skad
190b7(mdo sde): smras/ / sdig can myos pa'i rtsa lag po// khyod ni rang gi don phyir 'ongs// nga la bsod nams cung zad kyang // don du gnyer ba med do bdud// gang dag bsod nams don du gnyer// de la
191a1(mdo sde): 'di skad smra ba'i rigs/ / 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi yin pas// mi 'chi snyam dung mi sems// tshangs par spyod la gzhol gyur pas// phyir ldog par ni mi bya'o// chu klung
191a2(mdo sde): dag gi chu rgyun kyang / / rlung gis rnam par skems byed na// spangs pa nyid kyi khrag tsam lta// 'di yis ci phyir skams mi 'gyur// khrag ni skams par gyur pa dang // de yi 'og tu sha skams 'gyur/
191a3(mdo sde): sha ni zad par gyur pa dang // phyir zhing sems ni dang bar 'gyur// phyir zhing 'dun dang brtson 'grus dang // ting nge 'dzin kyang gnas par 'gyur// nga ni de ltar gnas pas na// tshor ba dam pa
191a4(mdo sde): thob gyur kyang / / lus dang srog la mi lta ste// sran thub dag par gyur la ltos// nga la 'dun pa yod gyur cing // brtson 'grus dang ni shes rab yod// nga ni brtson 'grus skyed nus pa// 'jig
191a5(mdo sde): rten de dag ngas mi mthong / / srog chad shi ba ches bla ste// 'tsho ba ngan pa de ltar min// g.yul ngor shi ba legs pa ste// pham nas gson pa de ltar min// sngar ma dpung las mi rgyal te// dpa'
191a6(mdo sde): bo dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur/ / rgyal yang de ni rlom sems med// bdud khyod las ni myur rgyal bya// 'dod pa khyod kyi dang po'i dpung // mi dga' ba ni gnyis pa yin// khyod kyis gsum pa
191a7(mdo sde): bkres dang skom/ / sred pa dpung tshogs bzhi pa yin// rmugs pa gnyis ni lnga pa ste// 'jigs pa drug par brjod pa yin// khyod kyi the tsom bdun pa ste// khro dang 'chab pa brgyad pa yin// 'thab
191b1(mdo sde): dang tshigs bcad bkur ste dang / / log par grags pa gang thob dang // bdag la bstod par byed pa dang // gzhan la smod par byed pa dang // de dag nag po'i rtsa lag tu// lhung ba'i bdud kyi dpung
191b2(mdo sde): yin no/ / dge sbyong bram ze kha cig ni// 'di na glags lta 'khod par snang // khyod dpung gang yin lhar bcas kyi// 'jig rten 'di ni rab 'dul ba// so btang ma byas snod chus zhing // shes
191b3(mdo sde): rab kyis ni de dag bshig/ dran pa legs par nyer gzhag ste// shes rab legs par bsgom byas nas// shes bzhin du ni spyad par bya// blo ngan khyod kyi ci byar yod// de skad ces smras pa dang
191b4(mdo sde): bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ / yi ma rangs nas yid la gcags bzhin du// de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// // 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes
191b5(mdo sde): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te// dge sbyong dang / bram ze gang dag kha cig 'das pa dang
191b6(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus na// bdag la gnod pa byed pa dang / lus la gdung ba byed de/ sdug bsngal drag po chob mi bzang ba/ yid du mi 'ang ba'i tshor ba myong par byed pas// de dag shin tu
191b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal myong ngo snyam mo/ / dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ spyad pa 'di dang sgrub pa 'das/ mi'i chos tha ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang sa
192a1(mdo sde): mngon du ma byas te/ 'di ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin/ lam 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba 'byung ba nub par byed pa ma yin te/ byang chub kyi lam ma 'ongs pa'i
192a2(mdo sde): skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba nub par byed pa gzhan zhig yod do snyam mo// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ ngas pa'i skyed mo'i tshal du/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib
192a3(mdo sde): ma la 'dug ste/ 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam
192a4(mdo sde): gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du bsgrubs te gnas pa de byang chub kyi lam yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba rnams nub par 'gyur ba yin
192a5(mdo sde): snyam nas/ de byang chub kyi lam yin no snyam ste/ nga'i rnam par shes pa de'i rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// ras 'di snyam du bsams te/ 'di ltar nyam chung bar gyur pas ni lam de mngon par rdzogs
192a6(mdo sde): par byang chub par bya mi nus so/ / gal te 'di ltar lus ngan cing nyam chung bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyi byang chub kyi snying por song na ni/ ngas phyi ma'i skye bo la snying
192a7(mdo sde): brtse ba byas par mi 'gyur te/ 'di yang byang chub kyi lam ma yin gyis/ ngas kha zas rags pa zos la lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de/ de nas gdod byang chub kyi snying por 'gro snyam mo// dge
192b1(mdo sde): slong dag de na lha'i bu gang dag nga la mos pa de dag gis/ nga'i sems kyi yongs su rtog par sems kyis shes nas/ nga ga la ba der 'ongs te/ nga la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa
192b2(mdo sde): zhal zas rags pa ma gsol cig/ bdag cag gis ba spu'i khung bur mdangs stsal bar bgyi'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag ni zas mi bza' bar bdag nyid kyis dam bcas
192b3(mdo sde): la/ / bdag gi spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyon 'khor ba rnams kyis kyang 'di ltar dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni zas mi za ba yin par yang shes te/ nga la mos pa'i lha'i bu 'di dag gis nga'i ba
192b4(mdo sde): spu'i khung bur mdangs bcug par gyur na/ ngas shin tu brdzun smras par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' brdzun smra ba spang ba'i phyir/ lha'i bu de dag gi tshig ma mnyan par kha zas rags
192b5(mdo sde): pa bza' bar sems btud do/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lo drug gi bar du brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub nyams su blangs nas/ stan de las langs te kha zas rags pa
192b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bu ram gyi dbu ba dang / mon sran sde'u'i khu bcud dang / ha re nu ka'i khu bcud dang / zan dang / 'bras chan dang / 'dren mar bza'o zhes tshig tu brjod do// dge slong dag de nas
192b7(mdo sde): lnga sde bzang po dag 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas/ lam 'di dang bsgrub pa 'dis mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang yang
193a1(mdo sde): mngon du byed ma nus na/ kha zas rags pa 'di zos te/ bsod nams la sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas pas ci nus te/ mi gsal ba byis pa yin no snyam du bsams nas/
193a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i gan nas song ste/ grong khyer wA ra Na ser song nas/ drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags su gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa na/ grong
193a3(mdo sde): pa'i bu mo gzhon nu bsus lta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir bsnyen bkur byas so// lnga sde bzang po de dag gis kyang rim gro byas shing rgya shug 'bru gcig dang / 'bras 'bru gcig dang til 'bru gcig dbul ba
193a4(mdo sde): yang phul lo/ / grong pa'i bu mo bcu ni bu me stobs ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / stobs sbed ma dang / shin tu sdug dang / sde las rnam par rgyal dang / a ti mug ta ka'i phreng ba can dang / mdzes ma dang /
193a5(mdo sde): rdza byed ma dang / skra lcang lo rgyas dang / ral bu can dang / legs skyes ma zhes bya ba ste/ gzhon nu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshod ma'i rnam pa de dag thams cad byas te phul lo// byang chub
193a6(mdo sde): sems dpas kyang de dag zos nas rim gyis spyod yul gyi grong du bsod snyoms spyad pas/ mdog dang / gzugs dang / stobs dang ldan par gyur to// de tshun chad byang chub sems dpa' la
193a7(mdo sde): dge sbyong mdzes pa/ dge sbyong chen po zhes 'dzer to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa na/ byang chub sems dpas brtul zhugs dang / dka'
193b1(mdo sde): thub nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba dang lus rtas par bya ba'i phyir grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas/ nyin gcig bzhin du bram ze brgyad brgya zas byin zhing 'di skad du bdag gi zas zos pas/ bya
193b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog cig ces smon lam yang btab bo/ / dge slong dag lo drug 'das nas/ ngas 'di snyam du bas
193b3(mdo sde): te/ gal te bdag gis mdoms g.yogs 'ga' zhig rnyed na re ste snyam mo// dge slong dag de'i tshe grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i bran mo grub ma zhes bya ba zhig shi nas/ de sha na'i ras kyis
193b4(mdo sde): dkris te/ dur khrod du bor bar gyur pa'i phyag dar khrod pa de ngas mthong nas/ ngas phyag dar khrod pa de blang ba'i phyir// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te dgus nas/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba dang
193b5(mdo sde): de nas sa bla'i lhas par snang gi lha rnams la sgra bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bor te/ phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo
193b6(mdo sde): mtshar te/ grogs po dag 'di ni rmad du byung ba'o// bar snang gi lha rnams kyis/ sa bA'i lha rnams kyi sgra thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis lha rnams la sgra bsgrags so// rgyal chen bzhi
193b7(mdo sde): ris pas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa la'o/ / sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang 'thab bral ba la'o// 'thab bral bas kyang dga' ldan pa la'o// dga' ldan pas kyang 'phrul dga' ba la'o// 'phrul dga'
194a1(mdo sde): bas kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa la'o/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pas kyang tshangs ris pa'i bar du'o// skad cig de dang / thang cig de dang / yud tsam de la grogs po
194a2(mdo sde): 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs skyes pa/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bor te/ phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar te/ 'di ni rmad du byung ba'o zhes sgra gcig dang / brjod pa gcig 'og min
194a3(mdo sde): gyi gnas kyi bar du grags par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpas yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis phyag dar khrod pa ni rnyed na/ gal te chu zhig rnyed na re ste snyam mo
194a4(mdo sde): de nas de nyid du lhas lag pa sa la brdabs pa dang / der rdzing bu zhig byung bar gyur te/ deng sad du'ang lag pa brdabs pa'i rdzing zhes grags so// de nas yang byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam
194a5(mdo sde): du bsams te/ bdag gis chu ni rnyed na/ gal te phyag dar khrod pa 'di bkru ba'i rdo lab cig rnyed na re ste snyam pa dang / skad cig de nyid la brgya byin gyis der rdo leb bzhag nas/ de la byang chub sems
194a6(mdo sde): rabs phyag dar khrod de bkrus so/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa 'di kho bo la stsol cig dang / kho zas bkru'o// de nas byang
194a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpas rab tu byung ba ni bdag nyid kyis bya bar bstan pa'i phyir/ brgya byin la ma byin par bdag nyid kyis bkrus so// de lus ngal te changad nas rdzing nas 'byung snyam pa dang / bdud
194b1(mdo sde): sdig can phrag dog gi chos dang ldan pas rdzing du ga pa mthon po zhig sprul to/ / rdzing de'i 'gram na shing sgrub byed ces bya ba chen po zhig yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dang mthun par
194b2(mdo sde): bya bas/ lha mo la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ shing de'i lha mo la smras pa/ lha mo shing gi yal ga spod cig/ des kyang shing gi ya la ga smad nas// byang chub sems dpas del 'jus te byung ngo //
194b3(mdo sde): byung nas kyang shing sgrub byed de'i drung du phyag dar khrod ba chos gos snam sbyar du byas nas drubs te ding sang du yang de phyag dar khrod badrubs pa zhes ming du grags so// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i
194b4(mdo sde): bu 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba des lha'i gos ngur smrig gi tshon du bcos pa rung ba/ dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag blangs te/
194b5(mdo sde): snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos bgos nas spyod yul gyi grong du phyogs pa dang // de na lha rnams kyis lteng rgyas kyi sde dpon gyi grong na/ dga' byed ces bya ba'i grong mi zhig yod pa'i bu mo legs
194b6(mdo sde): skyes ma la nam phyed tsam na smras pa/ khyod kyis gang gi phyir mchod sbyin byas pa de brtul zhugs de nyams 'og tu chud nas/ de kha zas rags pa bzang po bza' bar sems kyis/ sngon khyod kyis
194b7(mdo sde): bdag gi phas zos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par tshangs rgya bar shog cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa khyod kyi bya ba de gyis
195a1(mdo sde): shig/ dge slong dag de nas grong mi dga' byed kyi bu mo legs skyes mas/ lha de dag gi tshig de thos nas myur ba myur bar/ ba stong gi 'o ma lan bdun du bsnyen bkur byas pa
195a2(mdo sde): bzang po mchog tu 'gyur ba snying po can zang te/ blangs nas kyang 'o ma de 'bras gsar pa gsar pa dag dang / phrub gsar par blugs nas thab gsar par btsugs te/ kha zas de sgrub bo// de sgrub
195a3(mdo sde): ba na snga ltas 'di dag snang ste/ 'o ma de'i nang na dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung 'khrung 'khyil ba dang / pad+ma dang / sdong ris la sogs pa bkra shis rnams snang ngo // de nas
195a4(mdo sde): des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ltas 'di lta bu 'di dag snang ba las na/ byang chub sems dpas zas zos nas byang chub thob par 'gyur tu the tshom med do snyam pa dang / brgya mtsho ba shes shing
195a5(mdo sde): cho ga shes pa'i mtshan mkhan phyogs der phyin par gyur nas des kyang bdud rtsi 'thob pa nyid du lung bstan to/ / de nas legs skyes mas thug pa de chos pa dang thang la bzhag ste/
195a6(mdo sde): me tog gis gtor/ spos chus gtor nas gus par stan bting ste/ bran mo gong ma zhes bya ba la smras pa/ gong ma song la bram ze bos shig/ ngas ni 'o thub sbrang rtsi can 'di blta'o//
195a7(mdo sde): jo mo legs so zhes de'i ltar mnyan nas/ shar phyogs logs su song ba dang / de byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo // de bzhin du lho phyogs loH su song na yang byang chub sems dpa'
195b1(mdo sde): mthong ngo / / de bzhin du nub dang byang phyogs logs su song na yang de dang der/ des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo // de'i tshe na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis gzhan mu
195b2(mdo sde): stegs can thams cad tshar bcad par gyur pas 'ga' tsam yang mi gnang ngo / / de nas de slar log ste jo mo la 'di skad ces smras so// gang dang gang du mchis kyang de dang de na dge sbyong
195b3(mdo sde): mdzes pa gda' ba las/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan ni bga' tsam yang mig da'o// legs skyes mas smras pa/ de nyid bram ze yin te de'i phyir 'di brtsams kyis/ gong ma song
195b4(mdo sde): la de nyid bos shig/ jo mo legs so zhes smras te/ gong ma song nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te legs skyes ma zhes bgyi bas spyan 'dren to zhes smras so// /
195b5(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i khyim du song ste stan bting ba la 'dug go/ dge slong dag de nas grong pa'i bu mo logs skyes mas 'o thug sbrang rtsi can
195b6(mdo sde): gyis gser gyi snod chen po bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bsams te/ legs skyes mas kha zas 'di lta bu 'di byin
195b7(mdo sde): pa 'di bdag gis deng zos te/ the tsom med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpas zas
196a1(mdo sde): de blangs nas/ grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes ma la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe gser gyi snod chen po 'di ji ltar bya/ des smras pa/ khyod snoms shig/ byang
196a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bo la ni gnod 'di lta bu mi dgos so// legs skyes mas smras pa/ ci dgyes su mdzod cig/ bdag ni snod ma mchis par su la yang zas mi sol to// de nas
196a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas zas de thogs te/ lteng rgyas nas byung nas/ drol bab pa dang / klu'i klung chu bo nor na dzA na'i ngogs su song ste/ zas dang chos gos rnams phyogs cig tu bzhag nas
196a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lus bsil bar bya ba'i phyir/ klung ne ran dzA na'i nang du zhugs so// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khrus byed pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgya stong du ma
196a5(mdo sde): dag 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i a ka ru dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / byugs pa dag klung du ldugs shing lha'i me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyang chu'i nang du
196a6(mdo sde): 'thor ro/ / de'i tshe klung chen po no rAn dzA na lha'i spos rnams dang / me tog rnams kyis gang bar gyur te 'bab bo// byang chub sems dpa' spos chu gang gis khrus byas par gyur pa de lha'i bu bye ba khrag
196a7(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong dag gis blangs te/ mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rang rang gis gnas su khyer ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang ag com gang yin pa de dag kyang grong pa'i bu mo
196b1(mdo sde): legs skyes mas/ bkra shis pa yin no snyam nas/ mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro// byang chub sems dpa' klung nas byung nas 'dug par 'dod de gling la lta'o// de nas
196b2(mdo sde): klung ne ran dzA na'i klu'i bu mo gang yin pa de sa'i 'og nas byung ste/ yid las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de la 'dug ste/ grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes
196b3(mdo sde): ma la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/ ci tsam dgos par 'othug sbrang rtsi can de 'thungs so// 'thungs nas kyang gser gyi snod chen po de la ma chags par chur bor ro// bor ma thag tu klu'i rgyal po rgya
196b4(mdo sde): mtshos mchod pa'i 'os yin no zhes dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de blangs nas rang gi gnas su song ngo / / de nas mig stong pa grong khyer 'jigs pa nam mkha' lding gi gzugs su sprul nas kha rdo rje'i mchur
196b5(mdo sde): bsgyur te/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho las gser gyi snod chen po dang brog tu brgal na/ ma nus nas rang gi gzugs kyis gus par byas te/ bslangs nas mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir
196b6(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su khyer ro/ / khyer nas kyang snod chen po'i dge 'dun gyis dus ston byas te/ ding sang du yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lo gcig bzhin du snod chen po'i dus ston
196b7(mdo sde): byed do/ / seng ge'i khri de yang klu'i bu mo de nyid kyis mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' zas rags pa zos ma thag tu
197a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyis stobs kyis skad cig de nyid la lus la snga ma'i kha dog bzang po rgyas pa dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
197a2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba yang byang bar gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lo drug bar du brtul zhugs nyams 'og chud byas bcom ldan blo gros
197a3(mdo sde): 'di snyam sems/ gal te bdag ni 'di ltar ring bzhin bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes stobs ldan pa// shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya na ni// de lta na yang/
197a4(mdo sde): bdag gis phyi ma'i skye bo dag la snying brtse ma byas 'gyur/ bsod nams ngan ngon tsam dang ldan pa'i lha mi 'di dag ngan pas ye shes tshol// de dag lus ni nyam chung gyur na bdud rtsi 'tshang rgya byed par
197a5(mdo sde): mi nus pas/ / kha zas rags pa dam pa zos te lus kyi mthu stobs skyed par byas nas ni// shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya bar bsams// grong pa'i
197a6(mdo sde): bu mo sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa legs skyes ma zhes bya ba de/ / 'dren pa brtul zhugs grub par shog ces de lta'i yid kyis rtag tu mchod sbyin byed// de ni lha yis bskul ba thos nas de che 'o thug
197a7(mdo sde): sbrang rtsi can blangs te/ / glang gi 'gram du song nas dga' ba'i yid kyis ne ran dzA na'i ngogs na 'dug/ bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad cing dbang po zhi la rab tu zhi ba de// lha dang klu yi tshogs dang drang
197b1(mdo sde): srong dag gis bskor te ne ran dz+nyA nar 'ongs/ / pha rol rgal nas sems can sgrol ba blo gros ldan pa khrus byas bsams nas ni// thub pa dag pa dri med 'jig rten snying rtse phyir ni klung du zhugs te 'brus
197b2(mdo sde): bye ba phrag stong lha dag dga' ba'i yid kyis spos rnams dang ni phye ma dag/ klung du 'thor zhing sems can dam pa bkru ba'i don tu chu la gang bar byed// byang chub sems dpa'i dri med nges pa bkrus
197b3(mdo sde): te 'dug par shes gyur nas/ / lha stong rab tu dga' ste sems can dag pa bkrus pa'i chu de mchod phyir khyer// ngur smrig bzang po dri ma med pa'i gos dag lha yi bu yis de la byin// rung
197b4(mdo sde): ba dag dang sham thabs bgos nas bcom ldan 'das ni chu klung ngogs na 'dug/ klu yi bu mo dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis seng ge'i khri yang bshams// de la 'jig rten dag gi mig
197b5(mdo sde): byed yid kyang rab tu zhi ba de 'dug nas/ / blo gros ldan pa legs skyes ma des gser gyi snod du kha zas blugs te byin// rkang par phyag 'tshal nas ni de dag kha lo sgyur ba bdag gis gsol zhes byas
197b6(mdo sde): blo gros ldan pas ji tsam dgos par zas kyang zos nas snod ni chur bor te/ / de ni grong khyer 'jig pa lha yi bla mas bdag gis mchod par bya zhes khyer// gang tshe rgyal bas kha zas rags pa dam pa
197b7(mdo sde): zos pa de yi skad cig la/ / de yi lus kyi stobs dang gzi brjid dag dang dpal yang snga mkho bzhin du gnas// legs skyes ma dang lha rnams dag la chos gtam byas nas don kyang mang du byas//
198a1(mdo sde): seng ge ngang pa'i stabs dang glang po'i dbang po'i gros kyis byang chub shing drung chas// ne ran dzA na'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bco brgyad pa'o// // dge slong dag
198a2(mdo sde): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' klung ne ran dzA nar khrus byas te zas zos nas/ / lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de/ bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs shing
198a3(mdo sde): gi rgyal po byang chub chen po'i drung ga la ba der skyes bu chen po'i stabs gang yin pa'i stabs des song ste mi bskyod pa'i stabs dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong lta bu'i bstabs dang / ri'i rgyal po lhun
198a4(mdo sde): po ltar shin tu brtan pa'i stabs dang / mi ngom pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang / ya yo med pa'i stabs dang / 'tshe ba med pa'i stabs dang / rings pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang / sdod pa med pa'i
198a5(mdo sde): stabs dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i stabs dang / 'khyor pa med pa'i stabs dang / 'drud pa med pa'i stabs dang / zhum pa med pa'i stabs dang / ha cang mi sdod pa'i stabs dang / mi g.yo
198a6(mdo sde): ba'i stabs dang / tab tab po med pa'i stabs dang / tshul du shis pa'i stabs dang / dri ma med pa'i stabs dang / dge ba'i stabs dang / zhe sdang med pa'i stabs dang / gti mug med
198a7(mdo sde): pa'i stabs dang / chags pa med pa'i stabs dang / seng ge'i stabs dang / ngad pa'i rgyal po'i stabs dang / klu'i rgyal po'i stabs dang / sred med kyi bu'i stabs dang / sa la mi rig pa'i
198b1(mdo sde): stabs dang / rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i ri mo sa la snang ba'i stabs dang / sor mo drabs 'brel cing sen mo zangs lta bu'i stabs dang / so sgra 'byin pa'i stabs dang / ri rdob
198b2(mdo sde): pa'i stabs dang / mthon dman mnyam par byed pa'i rkang mthil gyi stabs dang / dra ba'i bar na sa bod dang 'od zer phyung nas/ sems can la reg na bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang / pad+ma drim
198b3(mdo sde): med pa la gom pa 'dor ba'i stabs dang / sngon dge ba legs par sprad pa'i 'gros kyi skabs dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i stabs dang rdo rje ltar bsam pa ba
198b4(mdo sde): zhing mi phyed pa'i stabs dang / ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad gcod pa'i stabs dang / bde ba thams cad skyed pa'i stab dang / khar pa'i lam ston pa'i stan dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa'i stabs dang
198b5(mdo sde): ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs phas kyi rgol ba chos dang mthun pas tshar bcad pa'i stabs dang / mun pa'i ling tog dang / nyon mongs pa sel ba'i stabs dang / 'khor ba'i phyogs
198b6(mdo sde): phyogs med par byed pa'i stabs dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i stabs dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen
198b7(mdo sde): kho na dpa' bo gcig pu'i stabs dang / rang byung zil gyis mi non pa'i stabs dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i stabs dang / dran pa dang blo gros kyi stabs dang / bde
199a1(mdo sde): 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i stabs dang / zhi ba rdul med pa/ bdud kyi 'jigs pa med pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong
199a2(mdo sde): khyer du 'gro ba'i stabs te/ de 'dra ba'i stabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por chas so// dge slong dag de ltar klang ne ra na dzA na dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der/ rlung gi
199a3(mdo sde): sprin gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis lam phyag dar byas par gyur to/ / char sprin rnams kyis spos chus chag chag btab bo// me tog kyang chal bar bkram mo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
199a4(mdo sde): khams 'di na shing ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shing byang chub ga la ba de logs su rtse mo 'dud par gyur to// gang dag de'i nyin par btsas pa'i byis pa de dag kyang / byang chub kyi
199a5(mdo sde): snying po logs su mgo bstan te nyal lo/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri rab la sogs pa ri gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba
199a6(mdo sde): de logs su 'dud par gyur to/ / klung ne ran dz+nyA na nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kha tshon rgyang grags tsam tshun chad kyi lam mngon par bshad
199a7(mdo sde): par gyur to/ / lam de'i 'gram g.yas g.yon du yang rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam du mtho ba/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ lha'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
199b1(mdo sde): ba dan gyis legs par rgyan pa sprul to// mda' rgyang gang tsam mda' rgyang gang tsam gyi zhing / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la stegs bu de bas mtho ba mngon par sprul te/ shing ta la thams cad rin po che/
199b2(mdo sde): brgyus pas phan tshun 'brel par 'dug go/ shing ta la gnyis gnyis kyi bar du rdzing spos chus yongs su gang ba gser gyi bye ma brdal ba/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dA dang / pad+ma
199b3(mdo sde): dkar po la sogs pas gang ba rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Yas thems skas brgyan pa/ chu sreg dang / bya gar dang / ngang pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma byaH
199b4(mdo sde): 'byin pa'i rdzing dag byas so/ / lam de na lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni spos chus chag chag 'debs so// lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni me tog sil ma lha'i dri bsung dang ldan pa 'thor ro// shing ta la thams
199b5(mdo sde): cad kyi mdun logs su rin po che'i mkha' rten bzhag go/ / rin po che'i mkha' rten thams cad lha'i bu mo tsan dan dang / a ga ru'i phye ma'i phung ma thogs pa dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bdug
199b6(mdo sde): pa'i pog por thogs pa brgyad khri 'khod par gyur to/ / rin po che mkha' rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo lha'i glu dbyangs len pa lnga khri ba khod par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhing
199b7(mdo sde): rnams ni rab tu spyod/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni 'byin/ sil snyan brgya stong ni sgrogs/ me tog mang po'i char chen po ni 'bebs/ gos brgya stong gi g.yab mo ni 'dor/ rnga bo che brgya stong na
200a1(mdo sde): brdung / rta dang / glang po che dang / glang khyab rnams ni sgra 'byin/ bya ne co dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ka la bing+ga dang / shang shang te'u dang / ngang pa dang / dur/
200a2(mdo sde): pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya brgya stong ni bskor ba byed/ bkra shis pa brgya stong ni 'bul zhing lam gyi bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu des/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por song ngo // gang gi
200a3(mdo sde): n ub mo byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod par gyur pa de nyid kyi nub mo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa dbang sgyur zhes bya ba des tshangs pa'i
200a4(mdo sde): 'khor chen po de la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/ / grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po ma nabs pa// dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/
200a5(mdo sde): go cha sra ba banabs pa/ thugs yongs su mi skyo ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad tshar phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la
200a6(mdo sde): mnga' dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad kyi bya ba shin tu mkhyen pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad
200a7(mdo sde): la shin tu zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
200b1(mdo sde): pa/ sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa// ded dpon chen por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa/
200b2(mdo sde): chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen por rnam par grol ba'i babs thob pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba tog chen po'i rgyal po//
200b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mgos pa/ pad+ma chen po lta bu/ chos thams cad kyi gzungs ma skyes pa/ rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ mi g.yo ba/
200b4(mdo sde): mi skyod pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu/ shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu yongs su dag pa/ shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sems las
200b5(mdo sde): su rung ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu btul ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang / stobs
200b6(mdo sde): bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa dang
200b7(mdo sde): chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar bcad pa dang
201a1(mdo sde): sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes pa'i mdzad pa'i phyir// byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis
201a2(mdo sde): de la grogs po dag khyed byang chub sems dpa' lam mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i las thams cad la spro bar gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur gyis/ de'i tshe tshigs
201a3(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / gang gi bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid dpal gyis byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ni bsam gtan dag dang de bzhin mngon shes
