201a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i lam snang ba/ / bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad pa de ni byang chub shing drung chas par gyur// thub pa de la bsam pa'i brtul bzhugs sgrub par byed pa'i mchod pa legs par bya// de la
201a5(mdo sde): skyab su song na ngan 'gro'i 'jig dang mi phrad mi khom mi 'gyur te/ / lha yi nang du 'dod pa'i bde ba rnyed nas tshang ba'i gnas yang 'gro bar gyur// lo drug bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyad nas 'di ni byang chub shing drung bzhud// kun kyang dga'
201a6(mdo sde): zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis de la mchod pa legs par gyis/ de ni stong gsum rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po ste// brgya byin tshangs pa nyi zla grong khyer dag na de dang mnyam pa gang yang med//
201a7(mdo sde): gang bcas tshe na zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur pa// de ni de ring bdud kyi dpung las rgyal bar mdzad phyir shing chen mchog drung bzhud// gang gi spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i gnas
201b1(mdo sde): 'dir gnas kyang blta bar nus pa ma yin zhing / / gang gi sku la mtshan rab dam pa ldan zhing sum cu rtsa gnyis legs brgyan la// gang gi gsung 'dir yid du 'ong zhing snyan la rnar 'thad tshangs
201b2(mdo sde): dbyangs sgra snyan cing / / gang gi thugs ni rab zhi khro dang bral ba de la mchod pa byed du 'dong // gang dag blo gros brgya byin tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan bde bas 'da' bya dang // nyon mongs 'ching
201b3(mdo sde): ba'i 'khri shing kun dang dra ba de dag gcod par byed 'dod dang / / gzhan las ma thos par ni rang rgyal byang chub zhi pa 'chi med thob 'dod dang // gal te sa gsum dag na sangs rgyas nyid 'dod dag 'dran
201b4(mdo sde): ba mchod par gyis/ / gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin po che rnams mtha' yas dang // khang bzangs skar khung bsil khang mang ldan pa dang zung du sbrel dang bzhon pa dang //
201b5(mdo sde): me ton 'phreng ba shin tu mdzes pas brgyan pa skyed mo'i tshal gyis rab brgyan dang // rkang lag mgo dang mig rnams yongs su btang ba de ni byang chub snying por gzhugs// dge slong dag de ltar stong
201b6(mdo sde): gsum gyi tshangs pa chen po de skad cig de la/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyir te/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa/ gyo mo dang rdo med pa/ nor bu dang / mu
201b7(mdo sde): tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul mang ba/ rtswa sngo zhing 'jam la g.yas su 'khyil cing g.yung drung 'khyil ba/ ka tsa lin+di ka'i gos ltar reg
202a1(mdo sde): na bde ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa 'dir phyin to/ / de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po thams cad sa lta bur gyur kyang chu na rgyu ba'i sems can rnam
202a2(mdo sde): la gnod pa cung zad kyang med do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de ltar brgyan pa 'di phyogs bcu'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas byang chub sems
202a3(mdo sde): dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong legs par brgyan to// byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang lha'i
202a4(mdo sde): d ang mi'i las shin tu 'das pa'i mchod pa bkod pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyasmrasangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig

202a7(mdo sde): mud ka li zhes bya ba dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang / dpa' stobs dang / dpung rgyan stobs dang / rab brtan dang / sa 'dzin dang / sdang byed dang / dri ma med dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang /
202b1(mdo sde): chos kyi rtog dang / 'gro grub dang / mig thogs pa med pa dang / bkod pa chen po dang / tshul khrims rnam dag dri ldan dang / pad+ma'i 'od de lha'i bu bcu drug po de dag ni byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba
202b2(mdo sde): ngag ste/ thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa thob pa sha stag go/ de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi snying po brgyan te/ dpag tshad brgyad cu khor yus
202b3(mdo sde): tu rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis ni bskor/ shing ta la'i 'phreng ba rim bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim bdun dang / rin po che'i brgyus pa rim pa bdun gyis

202b5(mdo sde): mchog gi spos kyis ni bdugs/ rin po che'i dra ba ni bris so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na shing sna tshogs mngon par 'phags pa/ bzang ba mngon du mchod pa/
202b6(mdo sde): lha yul ba dang / mi yul pa gang dag na yod pa de dag thams cad kyang // byang chub kyi snying po dor snang bar gyur to// phyogs bcu dag na chu nas skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa'i me tog rnam
202b7(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub kyi snying po dar snang bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
203a1(mdo sde): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa'i bkod pa dag gis byang chub kyi snying po rgyan par byed pa de dag kyang / byang chub kyi snying po dor snang bar gyur to// de ltar
203a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub kyi snying po yongs su skyong ba dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa de 'dra ba dag sprul par gyur te/ de dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dag gis
203a3(mdo sde): mthong nas/ rang rang gis gnas la dur khrod tsam gyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to// bkod pa de dag mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin te/ e ma ho bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu
203a4(mdo sde): mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa legs so zhes ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod do/ / byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi yod de// 'di lta ste/ 'od ma dang / snyam ldan dang / yid
203a5(mdo sde): bzangs dang / mdangs ldan ma ste/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi po de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi shing rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sdong po phun
203a6(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa/ yal ka dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa/ khrun dang sboms phun sum tshogs pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug paH/ shin tu 'grel ba
203a7(mdo sde): 'phang du shing ta la bdun srid du tsam du mtho ba de dang 'tsham par 'grel pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rin po che'i
203b1(mdo sde): shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun dang / rin po che brgyus pa'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor cing phyi rim bskor ba/ shing yongs
203b2(mdo sde): 'du sa brtol dang 'dra ba/ mig gis blta bas mi ngoms pa bskyed do// gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug nas/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs de ni/
203b3(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i dkyil de sra ba/ snying po yod pa/ mi phyed pa/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems
203b4(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na/ lus las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'gyed de/ 'od des ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyur to// mi khom pa thams cad bcad par gyur to// ngan 'gro'i tshor
203b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad bskams par gyur to/ / sems can gang dag dbang po ma tshang ba de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs par thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad sos par gyur to//
203b6(mdo sde): mi bde ba thams cad ni bde ba thob par gyur to// 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams ni dbugs phyin pa thob par gyur to// bcing bas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las grol bar gyur to// sems can
203b7(mdo sde): dbul po rnams ni longs spyod dang ldan par gyur to/ / nyon mongs pas gdungs pa ni yongs su gdungs pa med par gyur to// bkres pa rnams ni lto 'grangs par gyur to// skom pa rnams ni
204a1(mdo sde): skom pa med par gyur to/ / sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas par gyur to// zhum pa nyam chung ba rnams ni stobs phun sum tshogs par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can ga
204a2(mdo sde): la yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / khro ba dang / 'chab pa dang / tha ba dang / gnod sems dang / phrag dog gi gnod pa med par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can gang yang
204a3(mdo sde): 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ skye ba med do// de'i tshe sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing gcig la cig pha mar 'du shes skyed par gyur to//
204a4(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste// / mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar// dmyal ba mi bzad snang ba yi// sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi// bde ba'i tshor ba thob par gyur// dud 'gro'i skye 'gro
204a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams/ phan tshun gnod byed ji snyed pa// thub chen 'od kyis reg pas na// de dag byams pa'i sems kyang skyes// yi dgas 'jig rten yi dgas rnams// bkres skom nyed
204a6(mdo sde): pa ji snyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dag zas skom rnyed par gyur// mi khom thams cad chad gyur cing // ngan 'gro rnams kyang skams par gyur// sems can thams
204a7(mdo sde): cad bder gyur te/ / lha yi bde bas rab tu tshim// mig dang rna ba med pa dang // gzhan yang gang dag dbang po nyams// de dag dbang po kun rdzogs shing // yan lag thams cad mdzes
204b1(mdo sde): par gyur/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa'i// nyon mongs rnams kyis sems can gang // gnod gyur de tshe nyon mongs kun// zhi bar gyur te bde dang ldan// smyos pa dag ni dran ldan
204b2(mdo sde): zhing / / dbul po dag kyang nor dang ldan// nad kyis btab pa nad sos shing // bcing bas bcings pa grol bar 'gyur// ser sna med cing dgra med de// gnod sems dang ni rtsod pa dag/ phan tshun
204b3(mdo sde): byed pa med gyur te/ / de tshe byams pa'i sems su gnas// pha dang ma dag bu gcig la// ji ltar phangs par sems pa ltar// de bzhin sems can phan tshun du// de tshe bu phangs bzhin
204b4(mdo sde): du sems/ / byang chub sems dba'i 'od dra yis// phyogs bcu'i phyogs ni kun tu yang // gang+gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi// zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khya ba ga sa la// ri bo nag po rnams
204b5(mdo sde): dang ni/ / khor yug dag kyang mi snang gyur// rgya chen zhing rnams de dag kun// gcig po ji bzhin de ltar snang // lag mthil lta bur gyur pa te// byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir//
204b6(mdo sde): zhing rnams thams cad legs brgyan pas// thams cad rin chen nyid du snang // byang chub snying po'i rim gro ba// lha ni de ltar bcu drug yod// dpag tshad brgyad cu'i sa khyon nang // byang
204b7(mdo sde): chub snying por brgyan par gyur/ / zhing rnams bye ba mtha' yas na// bkod pa chen po gang yod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dag thams cad der yang snang // lha dang
205a1(mdo sde): klu dang gnod sbyin dang / / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rang rang gzhal med khang rnams la// dur khrod tsam du shes par gyur// 'dir ni bkod pa de mthong nas// lha
205a2(mdo sde): dang mi rnams ngo mtshar gyur/ / bsod nams gang gi rgyu mthun 'dir// phun sum 'di 'dra 'di legs mtshar// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// brtson par byed pa med par yang //
205a3(mdo sde): de yi yid la 'dod pa dang // bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// ji ltar bsam pa gzhan dag kyang // sngon spyod chen rdzogs gyur pa// las de'i rnam par smin pa yis// 'di 'dra'i phun
205a4(mdo sde): sum tshogs 'di byung / / byang chub shing gi lha mo bzhin// lha yi shing gi yongs 'du ba// de bas khyad par 'phags pa yis// byang chub snying por rgyan par byas// byang chub snying po'i bkod pa
205a5(mdo sde): gang / lha yis mngon par 'dus byas pa// yon tan de dag tshig gis ni// thams cad brjod par yong mi nus// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od phyung ba//
205a6(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems tshim par byed cing dga' ba skyed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba// sems can la dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / dad pa dang /
205a7(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' ba thams cad skyed pa des/ klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas snang bar byas par mthong nas// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po rang gi 'khor gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshigs
205b1(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / gang phyir bdag gis gnas 'dir gser gyi 'od kyi brgyan par lhang nger gyur pa las// ji ltar 'khor ba 'jig gi 'od mdzes mthong zhing gser zhes bya ba
205b2(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / / ji ltar 'od srungs chos kyi rgyal po'i skyon med pa yi dri med 'od mthong ltar// mtshan mchog ldan zhing phan mdzad ye shes 'od ldan pa zhig byung du the tsom med// sngon
205b3(mdo sde): chad nyes par byas pa'i las kyi bdag gi khyim ni shin tu mun pas gang / / khyim 'di na ni nyi ma zla ba dag gi rgya chen 'od kyang yong mi snang // me dang nor bu dag dang dri med klog dang skar ma rnams
205b4(mdo sde): kyi 'od mi snang / / brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha min rnams kyi 'od mi snang na// de ring khyim 'di nang du nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba yi dge bas mdzes gyur la// sems kyang dga' ba skyed
205b5(mdo sde): cing lus kyang bde bar gyur la lus ni bsil gyur te/ / lus kyi steng du bye tshan 'bab pa de yang bdag la bsil bar gyur pa las// bskal pa bye ba mang por spyad pa byang chub shing drung bzhud par shi
205b6(mdo sde): tu gsal/ / klu'i me tog mdzes dang bzang la dri zhim gos dang mu tig do shal dang // rgyan dang gdub bu dag dang phye ma rnams dang bdug pa mchog rnams myur thogs la// glu dbyangs dag dang rol
205b7(mdo sde): mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs gyis shig rnga dang rdza rnga dag/ brdung zhing 'gro ba kun gyi mchod 'os phan pa mdzad la mchod pa byed du 'deng // de ni langs te klu yi bu mo rnams dang lhan cig phyogs bzhin
206a1(mdo sde): bltas pa dang / / de nas ri bo lhun po lta bur gzi brjid rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig/ lha dang lha min bye ba dag dang tshangs pa'i dbang dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis
206a2(mdo sde): bskor/ / dga' ba'i yid kyis de la mchod byed shul ni 'di zhes ston cing 'dod pa mthong // klu yi rgyal de rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas 'jig rten mchog la mchod byas te// gus dang bcas pas
206a3(mdo sde): de yi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal thub pa'i mdun du 'dug/ klu yi bu mo rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis thub la mchod pa byed// me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa dag kyang 'thor zhing
206a4(mdo sde): sil snyan rnams kyang byed/ / klu yi rgyal po rab tu dga' nas thal sbyar yang dag yon tan rnams kyis stong // 'dren pa 'jig rten dam pa dgung zla nya ba'i zhal 'dra mthong bar gyur pa legs//
206a5(mdo sde): bdag gis sngon chad drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong ba khyod kyang de 'dra ste// de ring khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom ste bzhed pa'i go 'phangs brnyes par 'gyur// gang gi don du sngon chad
206a6(mdo sde): dul dang sbyin dang bsdams shing bdog pa kun btang la/ / gang gi don du dul dang tshul khrims byams dang snying rje ba dang bzod pa bsgom// gang gi don du brtson 'grus brtan dang bsam gtan dgyes dang
206a7(mdo sde): shes rab 'bar mdzad pa/ / khyod kyi smon lam de dag thams cad rab tu rdzogs nas de ring rgyal bar 'gyur// ji ltar ljon shing lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas pa byang chub shing la 'dud// ji ltar dus
206b1(mdo sde): pa chab kyis gang ba stong dag khyod la skor ba rab bgyid cing / / ji ltar tsam shi'i tshogs rnams rab tu dga' ste snyan pa'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang // ji ltar ngang pa khrung khrung tshogs kyang mkha' la mchi zhing
206b2(mdo sde): tshul du shis ldan pa/ / dang ba'i yid kyis drang srong la ni skor ba bgyid las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur// ji ltar gser gyi kha dog lta bur mdzes pa'i 'od rnams zhing ni brgyar mchi ste// ji ltar ngan
206b3(mdo sde): song mtha' dag zhi bar gyid cing skye dgu'i sdug bsngal thar bgyid dang / / ji ltar nyi ma zla ba'i gnas kyis rgyun chad ser ma'ang dal bus 'dang ba las// srid pa gsum du skye dang rga ba thar mdzad pa yi
206b4(mdo sde): ded dpon de ring 'gyur/ / ji ltar lha rnams 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs te khyod la mchod du lhags pa dang // tshangs dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang lha rnams bsam gtan bde ba spangs pa dang /
206b5(mdo sde): gang yang srid pa gsum na dbang phyug dam pa thams cad 'dir lhags las// srid pa gsum du skye rga thar bar mdzad pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po de ring byon// ji ltar lha rnams dag gis phyag dar bgyis
206b6(mdo sde): pa'i shul des nas ni khyod gshegs la/ / bcom ldan 'khor ba 'jig dang gser zhes bgyi dang 'od srungs dag kyang de nas gshegs// ji ltar pad+ma bzang po dri ma ma mchis rnam dag dogs
206b7(mdo sde): btol byung ste/ / de la stobs chen ldan pa zhabs kyi gom pa 'dar las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur// bye ba khrag khrig stong brag du ma'i gang+gA'i klung gi byem snyed kyi bdud// de dag rnams kyis zang
207a1(mdo sde): chub shing drung nas ni khyod la bskyod pa 'am g.yo ma nus/ / mchod sbyin khrag khrig phrag stong rnam pa du ma gang+gA'i klung gis bye ma snyed// khyod kyis mdzad cing 'gro la phan phyir
207a2(mdo sde): spyad pa des na 'dir ni rnam par mdzes/ / rgyu skar zla bar bcas shing skar ma nyi mar bcas pa mkha' las sar lhung gda'// ri mchog chen po rang gi gnas nas g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams par
207a3(mdo sde): 'gyur yang gda'/ / skyes bu mkhas pa bzhi po dag re re nas ni ston nus gda'// khyod ni shing gi rgyal po'i drung du gshegs nas byang chub ma thob bzhengs mi gda'// gang gi slad du kha lo sgyur
207a4(mdo sde): ba mthong zhing mchod bgyis yon tan brjod pa dang / / byang chub tu yang spro bas bdag gis rnyed pa 'phel ba rgya chen rnyed par gyur// bur bcas bdag dang klu yi bu mo thams cad skye gnas 'di las
207a5(mdo sde): thar gyur cing / / glang po dregs pa'i stabs su bzhud pa khyod kyi stabs des bdag cag mchis par bgyi// dge slong dag de ltar klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba/ klu'i
207a6(mdo sde): bu mo rin po che'i gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan sna tshogs thogs pa dang / mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs thogs pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha dang mi'i phreng
207a7(mdo sde): babargyus pa sna tshogs thogs pa dang / bog por sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs len pa rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems
207b1(mdo sde): dpa'i gan du 'dong zhing rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mngon par gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang bstod do// 'khrul pa mi mnga' mi bsnyengs mi 'joms bag mi tsha// ma zhus ma
207b2(mdo sde): dman rab tu dgyes par gdul dka' ba/ / ma chags mi sdang ma rmongs brkam pa mi mnga' ba// chags bral rnam grol drang srong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sman pa zug rngu bral ba gdul ba gdul mdzad pa/
207b3(mdo sde): 'grol ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar mdzad sman pa mchog/ gnas dang skyabs ma mchis shing dman pa mkhyen nas ni// 'jig rten gsum 'dir gnas dang skyabs su khyod byung ngo // ji ltar
207b4(mdo sde): lha tshogs rab tu dad cing dgar 'gyur te/ / me tog char pa chen po mkha' las 'bebs pa dang // 'di dag ji ltar gos chen 'thor bar bgyid pa las// de ring rgyal bar 'gyur gyis rab tu dgyes
207b5(mdo sde): ba mdzod/ / shing dbang drung du gshegs la brnyengs pa mi mnga' bzhugs// bdud kyi sde las rgyal mdzod nyon mongs dral ba drol// sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar/
207b6(mdo sde): byang chub zhi ba dam pa mchog tu 'tshang rgyar mdzod// khyod kyis gang gi don du bskal pa bye mang du// 'gro ba sgrol ba'i don du dka' ba spyad pa mdzad// khyod kyi dgongs pa rdzogs te dus la dbab kyis//
207b7(mdo sde): shing dbang drung du gshegs de byang chub mchog reg mdzod// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bsams te// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ci
208a1(mdo sde): zhig la bzhugs nas/ / bla na med pa yang dag par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas snyam mo// de nas des yang 'di snyam du bsams te// rtswa bting nas
208a2(mdo sde): bzhugs so snyam mo/ / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i tshogs brgya stong par snang la 'khod pa dag gis// byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshig
208a3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ / de de bzhin no// skyes bu dam pa de de bzhin te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rtsa bting ba la bzhugs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
208a4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas lam gyi g.yas rol na rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtswa sngo ba 'jam pa/ shin tu gzhon pa/ nyams dka' ba/
208a5(mdo sde): lcang lor 'khyil par 'dug pa g.yas su 'khyil pa/ rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu/ ka tsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ dri rab tu zhim pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag rnga zhing 'dug
208a6(mdo sde): pa mthong ngo / / mtho nas kyang byang chub sems dpas lam bor te/ rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa la snyan pa'i tshig gis smras te/ tshig de ni
208a7(mdo sde): kun shes par byed pa dang / rnam par shes par byed pa dang / rnam par gsal ba dang / mi chod pa dang / chags par byed pa dang / snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang /
208b1(mdo sde): snum pa dang / go bar byed pa dang / skul ba dang / tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / sha sha bo ma yin pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / mi brkam pa dang /
208b2(mdo sde): 'jam pa dang / snyan pa dang / rnar bde ba dang / lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa sel
208b3(mdo sde): ba dang / ka la bing+ge'i sgra skad lta bu dang / bya ku na la dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / rnga bo che dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyi nga ro dang / ldan pa dang
208b4(mdo sde): gnod pa med pa dang / bden pa dang / gsal ba dang / yang dag pa dang / tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i gdangs lta bu dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / ri rdob pa'i sgra lta
208b5(mdo sde): bu dang ldan pa dang / b+ha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang pos mngon par bstod pa dang / zab pa dang gting dpag dka' ba dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i smra ba 'jom
208b6(mdo sde): pa dang / seng ge'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / rta dang glang po che'i sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / glu sgra sgrogs pa lta bu dang / 'brug zer ba'i sgra lta bu dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
208b7(mdo sde): thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / gdul ba'i sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / tabatab po ma yin pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / mi shol ba dang / 'tsham pa dang
209a1(mdo sde): rigs pa dang / dus su smra ba dang / dus las mi yol ba dang / chos brgya stong legs par brgyus pa dang / gnyes pa dang / thogs pa med pa dang / rgyun chad pa med
209a2(mdo sde): pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / skad cig gis skad thams cad sgrogs pa dang / bsam pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang / bde ba thams cad skyed pa dang / thar pa'i lam yang dag par
209a3(mdo sde): ston pa dang / lam gyi tshogs smra ba dang / 'khor las mi 'da' ba dang / 'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang mthun pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas
209a4(mdo sde): de lta bu'i tshig gis rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ / bkra shis rtswa dag nga la myur du byin// de ring nga la rtswas ni don chen 'gyur// dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud ni bcom nas
209a5(mdo sde): su byang chub dam pa zhi ba reg par 'gyur/ / gang gi ched dung yis bskal stong du// sprin dang dul dang sdom dang stong byas dang // tshul khrims brtul zhugs dka' thub rab sprad pa// de ni de
209a6(mdo sde): ring nga yis thob par 'gyur/ / bzod pa'i stobs dang de bzhin brtson 'grus stobs// bsam gtan stobs dang de bzhin shes rab stobs// bsod nams dang ni mngon shes rnam thar stobs//
209a7(mdo sde): de ni de ring nga la 'grub par 'gyur// shes rab stobs dang thabs kyi stobs gang dang // rdzu 'phrul dang ni chags med byams pa'i stobs// so so yang dag rig dang bden pa'i stobs// de ni de ring
209b1(mdo sde): nga la 'grub par 'gyur/ / de ring nga la rtswa sbyin byas na ni// khyed la bsod nams stobs ni mtha' yas te/ de ni khyod kyi ngan pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur khyod kyang ston pa bla na med par 'gyur// bkra shis pas ni 'dren pa'i tshig snyan rab tu mdzes thob
209b2(mdo sde): nas/ / dga' zhing mgu la yi rang rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// rtswa 'ja ma gzhon zhing bzang la reg par ldan pa spar gang thogs// mdun du 'dug nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis 'di skad
209b3(mdo sde): smras/ / gal te rtswa yis byang chub go 'phang dam pa 'chi med pa// mchog gyur zhi ba blta dka' sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam 'thob na// yon tan chen po rgya mtsho'i grags pa dpag med khyod pa zhes shig/
209b4(mdo sde): bdag gis go 'phang dam pa 'chi med thog mar 'tshang brgyar bgyi// brtul zhugs dka' thub rnam mang bya dka' bskal mang ma spyad par// bkra shis rtswa mchog bting bas byang chub 'di ni thob mi 'gyur//
209b5(mdo sde): gang tshe blo gros ldan pa shes rab bsod nams thabs kyis 'phags// de nas rgyal ba grub pas rdul med 'gyur zhes lung ston to// bkra shis gal te byang chub skye bo gzhan la sbyin nus na//
209b6(mdo sde): srog chags bsdu ba byas te sbyin par yid gnyis khyod ma za// gang tshe nga yis byang chub thob shes bdud rtsi rnam par dbyes// khyod 'ongs chos kyi dam pa nyon dang rdul dang bral bar 'gyur// 'dren pas
209b7(mdo sde): shin tu mchog tu 'jam pa'i rtsa ni sbar gang blangs/ / seng ge ngang pa'i stabs kyis chas nas ni rab tu g.yos// lha klu tshogs rnams thal mo sbyar te rab tu dga' yid kyis// deng 'dis bdud
210a1(mdo sde): dpung bcom nas bdud rtsi reg par 'gyur snyam sems/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba na/ lha'i bu rnams
210a2(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' deng 'dir 'dug nas byang chub thob par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste/ byang chub kyi shing brgyad khris
210a3(mdo sde): brgyan par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni me tog gi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad brgya pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni spos kyi rang bzhin can la/ 'phang du dpag tshad
210a4(mdo sde): stong pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni tsan+dan gyi rang bzhin mas 'phang bu dpag tshad 'bum pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni gos kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad lnga 'bum pa
210a5(mdo sde): yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che'i rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang
210a6(mdo sde): du dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pa yang yod do/ / byang chub kyi shing de dag thams cad kyi drung na yang ji ltar 'tsham pa'i seng ge'i khri/ lha'i ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba bshams
210a7(mdo sde): par gyur to/ / byang chub kyi shing kha cig gi drung du ni pad+ma'i khri stan bshams par gyur to// kha cig gi drung du ni spos kyi khri stan no// kha cig gi drung du ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khri stan
210b1(mdo sde): no/ / byang chub sems dpa' ni rol pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' snyoms
210b2(mdo sde): p ar zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyi byang chub kyi shing drung gi seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad la
210b3(mdo sde): 'dug par kun tu snang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha'i bu so so'i yid la yang / byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyi seng ge'i khri la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dug gi/ gzhan
210b4(mdo sde): gyi la ni ma yin par shes so/ / ji ltar de dag gis shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di nyid kyi mthus sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye
210b5(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa thams cad dang / lha dang mi thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi
210b6(mdo sde): shing drung na seng ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo / / de lta mod kyi 'on kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi blo gros yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rtsa spar
210b7(mdo sde): gang thogs te/ byang chub kyi shing ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi shing la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bdag nyid kyi rtswa'i rtse mo ni nang du bstan/ rna ba ni phyir bstan nas
211a1(mdo sde): rtswa'i gding ba kun nas bzang po bting ste/ seng ge lta bu dang / dpa' bo lta bu dang / stobs lta bu dang / brtan pa lta bu dang / brtson 'grus lta bu dang / mthu
211a2(mdo sde): bu dang / glang po lta bu dang / dbang phyug lta bu dang / rang byung lta bu dang / ye shes can lta bu dang / bla na med pa lta bu dang / khyad par du 'phags pa lta bu dang / mngon par 'phags pa lta /
211a3(mdo sde): dang / grags pa lta bu dang / brjod pa lta bu dang / sbyin pa lta bu dang / tshul khrims lta bu dang / bzod pa lta bu dang / btsan 'grus lta bu dang / bsam gtan lta bu dang / shes rab lta bu
211a4(mdo sde): dang / ye shes lta bu dang / bsod nams lta bu dang / bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa lta bu dang / tshogs lta bur skyil mo krung bcas nas/ rtsa bting ba de la shar phyogs su ltas te 'dug nas
211a5(mdo sde): lus drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'di 'dra ba'i yi dam brtan po byas so// stan 'dir bdag gi lus ni skams kyang rung / pags pa rus pa sha rnams zhig kyang rung / bskal
211a6(mdo sde): mang rnyed dkar byang chub ma thob par/ stan 'di las ni lus bskyod mi bya'o// byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu'o// //
211a7(mdo sde): / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg po'i chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu gsum pa/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang
211b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ris drug gi lha rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed pa mi 'byung grang snyam ste/ shar phyogs logs su gnas par gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs
211b2(mdo sde): kyang lha rnams kyis yongs su bsrung bar gyur to/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od byung nas/
211b3(mdo sde): 'od des phyogs bcu kun tu grangs med/ dpag tu med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur to// de nas shar
211b4(mdo sde): phyogs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas
211b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la der so ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems
211b6(mdo sde): dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de byas pas phyogs bcur nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas
211b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad 'khor gyi khyams bai DUR+Ya sngon po dag las byas pa gcig tu bstan to/ / 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mdun du yang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying
212a1(mdo sde): bo la 'dug par bstan to/ / sems can de dag kyang phan tshun du sor mo gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' ston cing sems can tshul du shis pa'i gzugs 'di lta bu dang
212a2(mdo sde): ldan pa 'di su zhig/ 'di ltar rnam par mdzes pa'i sems can 'di su zhig zhes 'dzer to// sems can de dag gi mdun du byang chub sems dpa' des byang chub sems dpa' rnam kyang sprul te/
212a3(mdo sde): de na byang chub sems dpa' gzugs de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// ci yang med pa'i 'dod chags zhe sdang rnyog pa gang yin bag chags bcas bton pa/ gang gis lus las 'od
212a4(mdo sde): phyung phyogs bcu'i 'od rnams thams cad 'od ni med par byas/ / gang gis bsod nams ting 'dzin ye shes tshogs ni bskal pa mang por kun spel ba/ shAkya thub pa thub pa chen po dam pa 'di ni/
212a5(mdo sde): phyogs rnams kun tu mdzes// de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bkod par/ byang chub sems dpa/
212a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gdugs brtsegs kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas// byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/
212a7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis thams cad dang ldan
212b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo/ / de na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag phan tshun 'di skad 'dzer to// gang gi phyir rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di
212b2(mdo sde): snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i 'bras bu zhes 'dzer to/ / de nas rin po che'i gdugs de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis rin po che dang spos gdugs stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig dag/ byams
212b3(mdo sde): pa'i yid kyis do zla med par bzhugs dang mya ngan 'das la phul/ / de yis mtshan mchog ldan pa phan mdzad sred med bu yi mthu ldan pa// yon tan mnga' ba byang chub shing drung gshegs pa de la
212b4(mdo sde): mchod pa byas/ / de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog phreng ba dang nags tshal gyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi
212b5(mdo sde): khams me tog tsam pa ka'i kha dog tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po'i dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ / byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis
212b6(mdo sde): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i//
212b7(mdo sde): dra ba gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams te bkab bo// de na phyogs bcu'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dag phan tshun du 'di skad 'dzer te/ 'od kyi bkod pa rnam/
213a1(mdo sde): pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzer to// de nas rin po che'i dra ba de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // rin chen 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum dga' rin chen
213a2(mdo sde): to/ / rin chen dam pa rin chen grags pa de chos dgyes// dkon mchog gsum po rgyun mi 'chad pa'i brtson 'grus brnyes// byang chub mchog brnyes 'gyur te de yi mchod pa 'di/
213a3(mdo sde): denas byang phyogs na da bzhin gshegs pa nyi bla zis du chag par byed pa'i 'ad dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma 'khor bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba zag
213a4(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
213a5(mdo sde): ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji snyed pa de snyed 'khor gyi khyas
213a6(mdo sde): der kun tu bstan to/ / de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di skad 'dzer te/ bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes 'dzer to// de nas bkod pa de dag thams cad las tshigs su
213a7(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di byung ngo / / gang gis bsod nams ye shes shin tu mang pos lus ni rnam spangs shing / gang gis brtul zhugs dka' thub dag dang bden pa'i chos kyis ngag spangs la/ gang gis
213b1(mdo sde): khrel yod mos pa byams dang de bzhin snying rjes sems sbyangs pa/ de ni shing rgyal drung gshegs shAkya khyu mchog de la mchod pa byed// de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na de
213b2(mdo sde): b zhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung gnas su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi blo gros zhes bya ba
213b3(mdo sde): 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba
213b4(mdo sde): der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 'khor gyi khyams der yon tan gyi bkod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul te khang
213b5(mdo sde): pa brtsegs pa de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / / gang gi yon tan dag gis lha dang lha min dang / gnod sbyin lto 'phye che dag rtag tu yon tan bsgos/ yon tan can de yon tan
213b6(mdo sde): ldan pa'i rgyal rigs skyes/ yon tan rgya mtsho byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs/ de nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srong shing gi sangs rgyas
213b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che 'byung bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las
214a1(mdo sde): 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po gal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub
214a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 'khor gyi khyams der rin po che'i mkha' rten grangs med dpag tu med pa mngon par sprul te/ rin po che'i mkha' rten de dag las tshigs su
214a3(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di byung ngo / / gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin chen rnam dag dang // khang bzangs skar khung bsil khang cho ga dang zung dang bzhon pas mkha' rten brgyan// me tog
214a4(mdo sde): phreng ba mdzes dang 'dun sa dag dang bskyed mo'i tshal rnams dang / / rkang pa lag pa mgo dang mig btang ba de byang chub snying por 'dug/ de nas nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams na/
214a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sprin dang ldan par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin brtsegs 'brug bsgrags dbyangs
214a6(mdo sde): shes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba
214a7(mdo sde): der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i las a ga ru'i sprin mngon par sprul te/ 'khor gyi khyams der tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye
214b1(mdo sde): ma'i char mngon par phab bo/ / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor de las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // rigs dang rnam par grol ba'i 'od kyi sprin gyis srid gsum thams cad
214b2(mdo sde): khyab/ / dam chos 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das par thob byed char pa 'bebs// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'ching ba'i 'khri shing thams cad bag chags bcad de gcod par 'gyur//
214b3(mdo sde): bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul stobs dang dbang po'i me tog rgyas pa dad par byed pa 'byin// de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon
214b4(mdo sde): par 'phags pa snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas khebs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'od des
214b5(mdo sde): bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin
214b6(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad dang / rin po che'i mkha' brten rnams su byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mtshan sum cu
214b7(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag mngon par sprul te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang lha dang mi'i me tog gi phreng ba thogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba
215a1(mdo sde): der logs su lus btud nas/ me tog gi phreng ba dbyangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// gang gis sangs rgyas khrag khrig sngon bstod cing / gus dang
215a2(mdo sde): bcas pas dad pa che bskyed la/ / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig smras pa// byang chub snying por byon la mgos phyag 'tshal// de nas 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs
215a3(mdo sde): pa kun tu gzugs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rnam par bltas par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang
215a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems
215a5(mdo sde): dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ bai DUr+ya'i 'khor gyi khyams der 'jam bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad+ma rnams mngon du 'byung bar bstan to// pad+ma de dag gi snying po la bud med lus phyed snang ba/
215a6(mdo sde): kha dog dang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bstan te/ lag pa g.yas g.yon na mgul gdub dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser skud dang / mu tig
215a7(mdo sde): gi do shal la sogs pa rgyan rnam pa mang po thogs shing / me tog dang / dar gyi lnga ldi dpyangs nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der logs su lus btud
215b1(mdo sde): te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ / gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas nyan thos dang / rang rgyal dag dang bla ma rnams la 'dud/ khrims ldan rtag dran dga' la nga rgyal med/ yon tan ldan pa de la
215b2(mdo sde): 'dud pa byos/ / de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs kyi dam par// byang chub sems dpa' sems
215b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang /
215b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi yongs su bskor cing / nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
215b5(mdo sde): zhing thams cad na sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / bdug spos dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang // rgyal
215b6(mdo sde): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung
215b7(mdo sde): dang / bzhon pa dang / shing ljon pa dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
216a1(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed yod pa dag thams cad
216a2(mdo sde): nam mkha'i dkyil nas char chen po mngon par phab ste/ thams cad dga' ba dang / bde ba skyed kyi/ sems can gang la yang 'jigs pa 'am/ gnod par mi byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/
216a3(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya'o// phyogs bcu de dag rnams nas rgyal ba'i sras po gang // phan pa byed pa mchod par byang chub lhags gyur pa// 'gro la phan pa de dag rnams kyi bkod rim dang // rtsal
216a4(mdo sde): dang rim pa mdzes pa dag gi dpe tsam nyon/ / kha cig do shal khrag khrig rab tu sbyang byas te// nam mkha' las ni 'brug ltar shin tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig mkha' las me tog gzhal
216a5(mdo sde): med khang ston cing / / cod pan rin chen thogs la gtsugs bud 'phyang zhing lhags// kha cig stong pa mtshan med smon med mchog brjod cing // sa las seng ge lta bur shin tu sgrogs shing
216a6(mdo sde): lhags/ / kha cig sngon chad ma mthong me tog mdzes 'thor zhing // khyu mchog ci 'dra de 'drar shin tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig rang gi lus kyi kha dog stong ston cing // rma bya lta bur mkha' las shin tu/
216a7(mdo sde): sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig bde gshegs sras kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing // zla ba lta bur mkha' las shin tu rgyas shing lhags// kha cig nyi ma lta bur 'od zer rab 'gyed de// bdud
216b1(mdo sde): kyi gnas rnams thams cad mog mog byed cing lhags/ / bsod nams tshogs bsags kha cig dbang po'i mchod sdong 'dra'i// dri med tog thogs byang chub snying po der yang lhags// kha cig
216b2(mdo sde): mkha' las nor bu rin chen 'dra ba 'thor/ / zla ba zla bzangs thang skyes rnams mdzes man+da ra// bar sha tsam pa ka dang sna ma'i me tog phreng // byang chub sems dpa' shing rgyal drung na bzhugs la
216b3(mdo sde): mthor/ / kha cig rkang pa gnyis kyis sa ni rab bskyod la// sa bskyod nas kyang skye bo dga' bar byed cing lhags// kha cig ri bo lhun po lag na thogs byed la// bar snang gnas te me tog skon bu
216b4(mdo sde): 'thor zhing lhags/ / kha cig rgya mtsho bzhi po mgo la thogs nas ni// sa la spos chu 'thor te chag chag 'debs shing lhags// kha cig rin chen mchod sdong sna tshogs thogs nas ni// rgyang rings
216b5(mdo sde): 'dug ste byang chub sems dpa' ston cing lhags/ / kha cig tshangs pa lta bu zhi ba'i gzugs bsgyur te// yid zhi ra ba zhi gnas shing bsam gtan bsam gtan pa// de dag ba spu dag las
216b6(mdo sde): byams dang snying rje dang / / dga' dang btang snyoms tshad med yid 'ong sgra 'byin lhags// kha cig brgya byin lha ltar stong phrag khrag khrig gi/ lha rnams dag gis mdun du bdar nas lhags gyur
216b7(mdo sde): cing / / de dag byang chub shing drung phyin nas thal sbyar te// brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin chen sna tshogs 'thor// kha cig phyogs bzhi dag gi skyong ba ji lta bar// dri za srin po mi 'am ci yis
217a1(mdo sde): yongs bskor te/ / glog ltar gsal ba'i me tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags// dri za mi 'am ci yi skad kyis ston pa stod// kha cig me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing 'bras/
217a2(mdo sde): bur bcas// me tog bcas shing mchog gi dri ni rab 'byin la// lo mar sangs rgyas sras po lus phyed gnas thogs lhags// btud nas sa yi snying por me tog rnams kyang 'thor// kha cig
217a3(mdo sde): ut+pa la pad+ma dkar po rgyas/ / pad+ma'i snying por sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan gnas// de 'drar me tog rgyas pa'i rdzing bu thogs te lhags// chags med yid ldan byang chub sems dpa'
217a4(mdo sde): mkhas la stod/ / kha cig lhun po lta bur lus chen bsgyur te lhags// bar snang gnas nas rang gi lus kyang rab tu 'dor// bor ma thag tu me tog 'phreng ba rnams su gyur// stong gsum
217a5(mdo sde): ngag gi rgyal ba'i zhing rnams khebs par byed/ / kha cig mig gnyis sreg pa'i bskal ba lta bu dang // de bzhin chags pa dang ni 'jig par ston cing lhags// de dag lus las chos kyi sgo
217a6(mdo sde): mo mang grag ste/ / de dag thos pas sems can khrag khrig sred pa spong // kha cig mchu ni bim pa 'bral bzhin mdzes shing // kha bzhin rdzogs la mi 'am ci 'dra'i sgra sgrogs lhags/
217a7(mdo sde): zo shal sna tshogs legs brgyan bu mo ches pa 'dra// de la lta bas lha yi tshogs rnams ngams mi 'gyur// kha cig rdo rje lta bur mi byed lus can te/ rkang pas 'ag gi chu yi phung po 'bog cing /
217b1(mdo sde): lhags// nyi ma 'dra zhing zla ltar bzhin rgyas snang byed la// 'od byed nyon mongs skyon rnams bcom pa kha cig lhags// kha cig rin po chos brgyan lag na rin chen thogs// zhing ma byed
217b2(mdo sde): stong dag khebs par byed cing lhags/ / sems can mngal phan dang bde dang tshim bya'i phyir// rin chen me tog dam pa dri zhim char pa 'bebs// kha cig gzungs chen rin po che mdzod gyur cing //
217b3(mdo sde): ba spu rnams nas mdo sde khrag khrig rab brjod la// spobs par ldan zhing blo gros ldan la blo mchog ldan// rgyags shing rab dregs skye bo rtogs par byed cing lhags// kha cig ri bo lhun po rnga
217b4(mdo sde): ltar thogs nas ni/ / rab tu brdung zhing mkha' las yid 'ong sgra 'byin lhags// de yi sgra ni phyogs bcur bye ba'i zhing song ste// bdud rtsi ma thob ston pa do mod 'tshang rgyar sgrog/ byang chub
217b5(mdo sde): kyi snying por bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu 'o/ / // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis
217b6(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag mngon par byas par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis kyang phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang //
217b7(mdo sde): ma byon pa dang / da ltar byang ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po der kun tu
218a1(mdo sde): bstan to/ / dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di'i
218a2(mdo sde): bdag po dbang phyug dbang sgyur ba/ bdud sdig can de la bdag gis ma sbran par/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni bdag gis mi chas
218a3(mdo sde): bdag gis bdud sdig can bskul bar bya'o/ / de las rnam par rgyal na/ 'dod pa na spod pa'i lha la sogs pa thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang bdud kyi 'khor na bdud kyi ris kyi
218a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu sngon dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'khod pa dag gis/ nga'i seng ge rnam par rol pa mthong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo//
218a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar bsams nas/ de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod spu nas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jom par byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gcig
218a6(mdo sde): phyung ste/ 'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams 'di thams cad kyi bdud kyi gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ mog mog por byas te/ rab tu g.yos par byas
218a7(mdo sde): par yang gyur to/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos yongs su khyab par gyur to// bdud sdig can gyis 'od de las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i
218b1(mdo sde): sgra 'di yang thos so/ / sems can shin tu dag pa bskal mang spyod spyad pa// zas gtsang sras pos rgyal srid dag ni rab spangs te/ phan byed de ni bdud rtsi mngon par 'dod pas byung // byang
218b2(mdo sde): chub shing drung 'ongs kyis de rings bsgrim pa bgyis/ / de ni bdag kyang sbrul la gzhan yang sgrol bar byed// de ni bdag nyid grol bas gzhan yang grol bar byed// de ni bdag kyang dbugs phyin gzhan
218b3(mdo sde): ngag dbugs kyang 'byin/ / yongs su mya ngan 'das nas gzhan dag mya ngan zla// ngan song gsum po ma lus stongs par byed par 'gyur// lha mi rnams kyi grong khyer gang bar byed par 'gyur//
218b4(mdo sde): phan pa byed pa de ni bdud rtsi thob gyur nas// bsam gtan mngon shes bdud rtsi bde mchog sbyin par 'gyur// gang tshe rang byung nyid kyis chos char mngon phab tshe// nag po'i rtsa lag khyed kyi grong
218b5(mdo sde): khyer stongs byed 'gyur/ / stobs med pas kyang stobs med 'gyur te dpungs nyams 'gyur// phyogs ni phyogs min ci bya gar 'gro shes mi 'gyur// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can bskul
218b6(mdo sde): ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul nas/ rmi lam rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis rmis so// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gi gnas mun pas khyab par rmis pa dang /
218b7(mdo sde): rang gi gnas rdul gyis gang zhing gyo mo dang / gseg mas gang bar rmis pa dang / bdag nyid sngangs skrag nas phyogs phyogs su 'bros par rmis pa dang / bdag cod pan dang bral zhing rna cha lhung bar rmis
219a1(mdo sde): pa dang / bdag mchu dang / gre ba dang / rkan skams par rmis pa dang / bdag snying kun tu gdungs par rmis pa dang / skyed mo'i tshal gyi lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu
219a2(mdo sde): rnams rnyis par rmis pa dang / rdzing rnams skams te chu med par rmis pa dang / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ka la bing+ga dang / ku na la dang / shang shang ti'u la sogs/ bya'i tshogs
219a3(mdo sde): rnams 'dab gshog zegs par rmis pa dang / rnga dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / pi wang dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / pheg rdob dang / khar ba'i sil khrol la sogs
219a4(mdo sde): pa rol mo'i cha spyad rnams chag grugs te/ sa la lhung bar rmis pa dang / 'khor sdug pas kyang bdud spangs te ngo 'dzums gnag cing phyogs gcig tu dong nas/ sems shing 'khod par rmis pa dang / chung
219a5(mdo sde): ma'i dam pa phreng ba can yang mal nas sa la lhung ste/ lag pa gnyis mgo la rdob par rmis pa dang / bdud kyi bu gang dag shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang / shin tu
219a6(mdo sde): gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / shin tu shes rab dang ldan pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la phyag 'tshal bar rmis pa dang / bdag gi bu mo rnams kyang kyi hud yab/
219a7(mdo sde): kyi hud yab ces chong de 'don par rmis pa dang / bdag lus la gos dri ma can gyon par rmis pa dang / bdag mgo rdul gyis gang la skya'o ba seng bsang ba dang / nyam chung ba dang / mdangs nyams par
219b1(mdo sde): rmis pa dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung dang / rta babs rnams kyang rdul gyis gang nas rdib par rmis pa dang / de'i sde dpon gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
219b2(mdo sde): grul bum dang / dri za'i bdag po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang skom tshugs bcas te ngu zhing cho nges btab nas bye bar rmis pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i bdag po 'di lta ste/
219b3(mdo sde): yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos bu dang / brgya byin dang / rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dang / dbang sgyur la
219b4(mdo sde): sogs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bdud la mi gus shing / byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs par rmis pa dang / 'thab mo'i nang na de'i ral gri shubs nas ma phyin cing / bdag mi shis
219b5(mdo sde): pa'i sgra 'byin par rmis pa dang / rang gi 'khor gyis bdag bor bar rmis pa dang / bkra shis kyi bum pa sgor lhung bar rmis pa dang / bram ze mis byin bu yang bkra mi shis pa'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa
219b6(mdo sde): dang / sgo ba kun tu dga' byed kyang kun tu mi dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang / nam mkha'i dkyil mun pas khebs par rmis pa dang / 'dod pa'i gnas na gnas pa'i dpal yang ngu bar rmis
219b7(mdo sde): pa dang / bdag gi dbang yang dbang med par gyur par rmis pa dang / rang gi phyogs kyang phyogs ma yin par rmis pa dang / nor bu dang / mu tig gi dra ba rnams kyang chad cing rnam par chad nas 'brul bar
220a1(mdo sde): rmis pa dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos par rmas pa dang / shing rnams kyang bcad cing ba gam yang lhung bar rmis pa dang / bdud kyi sde bkod pa
220a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang bas bub tu skyel bar rmis pa ste/ dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi rmi lam du rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta bu rmis so// de sad pa dang / 'jigs skrag sngangs nas
220a3(mdo sde): nang mi thams cad ba sogs te/ dpung dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang sde dpon dang / sgo ba dang / de dag 'dus par rig nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdud des rmi lam de dag
220a4(mdo sde): mthong nas nyam thag ste/ sde dpon bdud po seng ge za 'gram zhes bya dang / bu rnams dag dang 'khor rnams gang dag yin la smras// nag po'i rtsa lag de dag kun la yongs su dris// shAkya'i
220a5(mdo sde): nang du skyes pa mtshan mchog yan lag spras/ / lo drug bar du bya dka' brtul zhugs drag po spyad// byang chub shing drung 'ongs kyis rab tu sgrims shig ces// ma dang sum par snang las ni tshigs
220a6(mdo sde): bcad de skad grag/ byang chub sems dpa' de nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po rnam rtogs byed// gang tshe bdud rtsi thob ste bsil ba'i dngos reg che// des ni
220a7(mdo sde): nga gnas ma lus stongs par byed par 'gyur/ / dpung chen rnams dang lhan cig der ni rab dong la// shing dbang drung 'dug dge sbyong gcig de gzhom par bya// yan lag bzhi pa'i sde rnams myur
220b1(mdo sde): du rab tu bsgrims/ / gal te nga la sdug sems phyi shol ma byed cig/ dgra bcom rang sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gang gyur kyang // mya ngan 'da' bas bdag dpung nyam chung yong mi 'gyur//

220b3(mdo sde): bcad de smras pa/ / yab cig ci nongs zhal gyur cing zhal mdog nyams// thugs kyang 'phar la khyod kyi yan lag nyid lag 'dar// khyod kyis cigs na cigazigs myur du bka' stsol cig/
220b4(mdo sde): yang dag bsams nas de bzhin sbyor ba 'tshal bar bgyi// nga rgyal med bdud smras pa bu gcig nga las nyon// ngas ni sdig pa'i rmi lam shin tu mi bzang rmis// de ring 'khor 'dir de kun ma
220b5(mdo sde): lus smras na ni/ / khyed rnams brgyal te sa la rab tu skyel bar 'gyur// ded dpon gyis smras pa/ gal te 'thab dus bab ste brgyal na nongs ma mchis// gal te der ni bcom par gyur na
220b6(mdo sde): nongs dang bcas/ / gal te khyod kyi rmi lam de 'dra'i ltas lags na// gzhag na dge ste g.yul ngor yongs su gnas mi 'gyur// bdud kyis smras pa/ brtsal ba grub pa'i skyes bu g.yul ngor
220b7(mdo sde): grags par 'gyur/ / gal te brtan la brten te legs byas bdag cag rgyal// kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa mthong nas langs nas su// kho bo'i rkang par mgos phyag mi 'tshal des mi nus//
221a1(mdo sde): ded dpon gyis smras pa/ rgya chen dpung bdog kyang ni shin tu mthu chung ste// stobs ldan dpa' bo gcig pu mchis na g.yul las rgyal// gal te srin bu me khyed stong gsum/
221a2(mdo sde): gang gyur kyang // nyi ma gcig pu'i zil du rlag ste 'od mi bgyid// gzhan yang gang la nga rgyal gti mug mchis la dpyod ma mchis// mkhas dang mi mthun bgyid pa de ni gso mi nus// dge
221a3(mdo sde): slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyis ded dpon gyis tshig ma mnyan nas/ yan lag bzhi pa'i dbun chen po stobs che ba/ thab mo la dpa' ba 'jigs su rung ba/ spu zing zhes byed nus pa dang / lha dang

224b7(mdo sde): tu 'gas 'gyur la/ / 'jig rten dag na snying po ldan pa'i shing chen 'gas// bdag gi lta bas phog na 'gro ba 'chis log ltar// 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i mthu ni dalag la mchis/

225a2(mdo sde): lod/ gal te bltas pas ri bo lhun po 'jigs 'gyur yang // de yi mdun du khyod ni mig 'byed yong mi nus// gzhan yang / mi gang rgya mtsho lag pa gnyis kyis rgal 'dod cing // de yi/

225a4(mdo sde): pa/ bdag gis lus ni lag pa brgya mchis pa// gcig gis kyang ni mda' brgya 'phang bgyi ste// dge sbyong de yi lus ni dbug par bgyi// yab cig bder 'gyur ma shol khyod gshegs
225a5(mdo sde): shing / g.yas rol nas blo bzang po zhes bya bas smras pa// ba spu rnams kyang ci phyir lag pa min// lag pa brgya dang khyad par ci zhig yod// lag pa re rer de ltar mdung yod kyang // de dag
225a6(mdo sde): gis kyang de la ci mi nus/ / ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ni 'jig rten 'das pa'i byams pa bsgoms// byams ldan thub pa de yi sku la ni/ dug dang mtshon dang me yis mi tshugs te/ mtshon cha phangs pa thams cad me tog 'gyur// gzhan
225a7(mdo sde): yang mkha' dang sa dang chu la stobs ldan gang / / mi 'am gnod sbyin ral gri dgra sta thogs// mi dbang bzod pa'i stobs ldan de drung phyin// stobs chen stobs ldan de kun stobs chung 'gyur//
225b1(mdo sde): g.yon rol nas gzi brjid drag shul can zhes bya bas spras pa/ bdag ni de yi lus bzang gis// khong du zhugs te bsreg par bgyi// 'brog gi me ltar chung ngu yis// rkang dang
225b2(mdo sde): bcas pa'i shing yang skam/ / g.yas rol nas mig bzang gis smras pa// khyod ni ri rab sa yi na bzhugs te// thams cad ma lus bsreg par nus gyur kyang // khyod dang 'dra ba gang+gA'i
225b3(mdo sde): bye snyed kyis/ / rdo rje'i thugs ldan de ni bsreg mi nus// gzhan yang / ri bo thams cad 'gul yang srid// rgya mtsho chen po zad kyang srid// nyi zla sa la lhung yang srid// sa ni zhu bar 'gyur/
225b4(mdo sde): yang srid// 'jig rten don du rtsom mdzad pa// thugs dam nges par mdzad pa po// byang chub dam pa ma thob par// shing chen drung nas bzhengs mi srid// g.yon rol nas lag rings kyis
225b5(mdo sde): bsgyings te smras pa/ khyod kyi gnas 'dir mchis bzhin du// bdag gi sug pas nyi ma dang // zla ba skar ma rnams kyi gnas// thams cad rab tu mnye bar bgyi// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi
225b6(mdo sde): po las/ / tshul du shis bar chab kyang blang // yab cig dge sbyong de bzung ste// rgya mtsho'i pha rol dor bar bgyi// yab gcig dpung ni bzhag tu gsol// khyod ni thugs ngan che ma mdzad//
225b7(mdo sde): byang chub shing de drungs phyung ste// sug pas phyogs phyogs gtong bar bgyi// g.yas rol nas dang ba thob pas smras pa// gal te khyod ni dregs bsgyings te// lha dang lha min dri zar bcas//
226a1(mdo sde): sa dang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// de dag lag pas phyir glog kyang // khyod dang 'dra ba stong phrag ni// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
226a2(mdo sde): can/ de yi ba spu g.yos mi nus// g.yon rol nas 'jigs byed kyis smras pa/ dpung gi nang na bzhugs bzhin du// yab khyod ci slad rab tu bsnyengs// de la dpung grogs ga la mchis//
226a3(mdo sde): ci slang khyod 'dir de la bsnyengs// g.yas rol nas blo gros rtse gcig gis smras pa// 'jig rten dag na nyi zla dpung ma mchis// 'khor lo sgyur dang seng ge dpung ma mchis// byang chub sems
226a4(mdo sde): dpa' 'di na dpung ma mchis/ / 'on kyang gcig pus bdud ni gzhom par spyod// g.yon rol nas klags ltas smras pa// mdung thung rtse gsum dbyug tho ral gri rta// glang po shing rta rkang thang ma masmi/
226a5(mdo sde): pa// dge sbyong gcig pu mchis pa de dag gis do mod dgum gyis cung zad ma bsnyengs yab// g.yas rol nas bsod nams brgyan pas smras pa// sred med bu ltar mi shigs sku dang ldan/
226a6(mdo sde): bzod stobs go man pas brtson 'grus brtan pa'i ral gri mda'// rnam par thar gsum gzhom pa shes rab gzhu lags yab// bsod nams stobs kyis de ni bdud kyi dpung las rgyal// g.yon
226a7(mdo sde): rol nas phyir mi ldog pas smras pa/ / 'brog me rtsa la tshig pa phyir mi ldog/ lobs pas 'phangs pa'i mda' yang phyir mi ldog/ mkha' las rdo rje 'bab pa phyir mi ldog/ shAkya'i bu las ma rgyal
226b1(mdo sde): bdag gnas med/ / g.yas rol nas chos 'dod kyis spras pa// gsher ba'i rtsa dang phrad na ma yang ldog/ brag gi rtse mor bab na mda' yang ldog/ rdo rje sar bab de nas gang du 'gro/ zhi ba bdud
226b2(mdo sde): rtsi ma tho ba de mi ldog/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ yab gcig par snang la ni ri mo bri bar nus kyang gda'// sems can ji snyed kun gyi sems ni gcig bsdur nus kyang gda'// yab cig nyi zla rlung ni zhags
226b3(mdo sde): pas bcings du nus kyang gda'/ / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub snying po las ni bskyod mi nus// g.yon rol nas nye bar ma zhi bas smras pa/ lta ba'i gdug pa chen pos lhun po bsreg par gyi/
226b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi chab kyang skam par bgyi// bdag gis do mod de gnyis thal bar rlag par bgyi// yab gcig byang chub dang ni dge sbyong gzigs su gsol// g.yas rol nas don grub kyis
226b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ / gal te dug gis 'di kun gang gyur la// stong gsum dam pa rab tu 'bar gyur kyang // yon tan 'byung gnas kyis ni gzigs tsam gyis// dug ni dug ma yin par rab tu 'gyur/
226b6(mdo sde): srid pa gsum na gdug pa drag po ni// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug ste// de dag de yi sku dang thugs la med// mkha' la rdzab dang rdul ni med pa bzhin// sku dang gsung dang thugs
226b7(mdo sde): kyang rab tu dag/ sems can kun la byams pa'i thugs dang ldan// de la mtshon dang dug gis yongs mi tshugs// de bas yab gcig thams cad bzlog tu gsol// g.yon rol nas dga' ba chags
227a1(mdo sde): pas spras pa/ / bdag gis sil snyan skyong dgas bgyi ste// lha yi bu mo brgyan pa ze stong gis// chags par bgyis te grong khyer mchog tu bkri// 'dod la dga' bar khyod
227a2(mdo sde): dbang du bgyi/ / g.yas rol nas chos dgas smras pa// de 'dir rtag tu chos la dgyes pas dgyes// bsam gtan dgyes shing bdud rtsi don la dgyes// sems can thar bar mdzad dang byams la
227a3(mdo sde): dgyes/ / 'dod chags dga' la de ni dgyes mi mdzad// g.yon rol nas rlung gi shugs shes bya bas smras pa// bdag gis shugs kyis nyi zla ming bgyis la// nam mkha' las ni rlung yang rab btang zhing
227a4(mdo sde): yab cig do mod dge sbyong bzung nas ni/ / rlung gis phub ma bzhin du gtor bar bgyi// g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gros mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar khyod kyi shugs
227a5(mdo sde): mgyogs drag pa ltar/ / gal te lha dang mi rnams de 'drar 'gyur// de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus pas kyang // zla med gang zag de la gnod mi nus// g.yon rol nas tshangs pa'i blo gros kyis smras
227a6(mdo sde): pa/ de 'dra'i drag po phal cher gyur kyang ni// khyod kyi nga rgyal cung zad 'jom mi nus// bgyi ba thams cad mang pos 'grub lags na// gcig pus khyod la ci bgyi spros ci 'tshal// g.yas rol
227a7(mdo sde): nas seng ge'i blo gros kyi smras pa/ / sa la seng ge khyud 'khod sngon ma byung // lta ba'i gdug pa dag kyang khyus mi 'khod// gzi ldan bden pa pha rol gnon pa po// skyes bu khyu mchog rnams kyang khyus mi
227b1(mdo sde): 'khod/ / g.yon rol nas thams cad du gdol pa zhes bya bas smras pa// ji ltar khyod kyi sras po brtson 'grus dang // shugs dang stobs dang ldan pa sgra sgrogs pa// tshig 'bar de 'dra yab kyis
227b2(mdo sde): sngon gsan tam/ / myur du dge sbyong de ni gzhom du bzhud// g.yas rol nas seng ge sgra sgrogs shes bya bas smras pa// nags tshal dag gi khrod na wa mang po// seng ge med pa de ni sgra yang sgrogs//
227b3(mdo sde): seng ge sgra sgrogs 'jigs pa thos pa dang // skrag nas phyogs phyogs dag tu rab tu 'bros// de ltar bdud bu mi mkhas 'di dag kyang // mi mchog gsung ni ma thos de bar du// de dag spyi rdol byed
227b4(mdo sde): cing byung rgyal smra/ / mi yi seng ge gsung bsgrags 'bros par 'gyur// g.yon rol nas nyes par bsam pa sems pas smras pa// bdag gis gang bsam myur du 'dir 'grub na// de ni ci slad dpung
227b5(mdo sde): cho ga 'di mi lta/ / gang phyir lang te myur du mi 'bros pas// de ni glen pa cho ga ma 'tshal ga g.yas rol nas don legs par bsam pa sems pa zhes bya bas smras pa// de ni mi glen pha rol gnon pa ste// khyed cag glen
227b6(mdo sde): zhing shin tu ma bsdams pa/ / khyed kyis de yi mthu rtsal yong mi shes// de yi shes rab stobs kyis thams cad pham// bdud kyi bu ni gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// khyed cag rnams kyis de 'dra'i mthu rtsal
227b7(mdo sde): can/ / de yi ba spu gcig kyang g.yos mi nus// bsad par bsams pa mi 'grub smos ci dgos// khyod ni de la yid kyis gnod ma sems// gus dang bcas par dad pa'i sems su gyis//
228a1(mdo sde): 'di ni srid gsum rgyal por gyur pas nA// thab mo ma byed par ni slar log cig/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa dang / nag po'i phyogs
228a2(mdo sde): pa stong du tshang ba de dag thams cad kyis/ so so nas bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad de smras so// de nas bdud sdig can gyi sde dpon sde bzang po zhes bya ba des/ bdud sdig
228a3(mdo sde): can la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang dag khyod kyi rjes 'brang brgya byin dang // skyong dang mi 'am ci yi tshogs rnams dang // lha min dbang dang mkha' lding dbang po rnams// thal mo sbyar
228a4(mdo sde): de la phyag 'tshal na/ / khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma lags pa// tshangs pa 'od gsal lha yi bu rnams dang // gnas gtsang ris kyi lha rnams de dag kun// de la phyag 'tshal ba ni smos ci 'tshal/

228a6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin la sogs bdud dpung 'di// phal cher rab tu dang yid kyis// kun kyang nyes pa med pa lta// 'jigs su rung zhing drag bsgyur ba// dpung tshogs mi bzad 'di gzigs nas//
228a7(mdo sde): ngo mtshar ma gyur zhum mi mnga'// nges par do mod 'di rgyal 'gyur// gang na dpung de gnas pa der// wa dang 'ug pa sgra 'byin la// bya rog bong bu sgra 'byin pas// myur du slar ni
228b1(mdo sde): ldog pa'i rigs/ / byang chub snying por gzigs su gsol// pa ta kun ta ngang pa dang // khu byug rma bya mngon skor bar// nges par do mod 'di rgyal 'gyur// gang na dpung 'di
228b2(mdo sde): gnas pa de/ / rdul dang stag cha'i char 'bab la// sa dkyil me tog char 'bab pas// bdag gi tshig bzhin ldog pa'i rigs// gang na dpung 'di gnas pa de// shang shong gyur
228b3(mdo sde): cing tsher mas gang / / sa dkyil dri med gser gyur pas// shes rab can dag ldog pa'i rigs// gal te mi 'dod sngar rmis pa'i// rmi lam de dag mngon sum 'gyur//
228b4(mdo sde): drang srong rnams kyis yul brlag pa// de bzhin dpung 'di thal bar rlog/ rgyal po 'gro ba drang srong mchog/ tshangs pas byin gyis khros byas pas// dan ta ka yi nags tshal tshig
228b5(mdo sde): lo mang zhig tu rtsa ma skyes/ / drang srong brtul zhugs spyod pa po// dka' thub ldan pa'i 'jig rten na// ji snyed 'khod pa kun gyi mchog/ 'byung po kun la mi 'tshe 'di// gang gi
228b6(mdo sde): lus la mtshan rab 'bar/ / khyim nas kyang ni byung ba der// nyon mongs pham byas 'tshang rgya zhes// khyod kyi sngon chad mags na nam// rgyal sras rnams kyis mchod don du//
228b7(mdo sde): 'byor pa 'di 'dra 'di dag sprul// de bas nges par sems can mchog/ sbyin sreg dam pa len par 'gyur// 'di yi mdzod spu dri med pa// bye ba khrag khrig zhing du mdzes//
229a1(mdo sde): de yis bdag cag mog mog bgyis// bdud dpung des bcom gdon mi 'tshal// srid pa'i rtse gnas lha rnams kyis// de yis spyi gtsug bltar mi nus/
229a2(mdo sde): nges par gzhan gyis ma bstan par thams cad mkhyen nyid thob par 'gyur// ji ltar lhun po khor yug dang // nyi zla brgya byin tshangs pa dang // shing ljon rnam so dang ri mchog kun//
229a3(mdo sde): sa dkyil phyag 'tshal bgyid las na// bsod nams stobs can shes rab stobs// ye shes stobs can bzod pa'i stobs// brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan pa de// bdud phyogs

229a5(mdo sde): tshig de skad thos pa dang / bdud kyi bu gzhan zhig shin tu khros nas mig dmar por 'gyur te smras pa/ khyod ni gcig po de yi bsngags pa dag/ shin tu dpag tu med par brjod byed na//

229a7(mdo sde): rten nyi zla seng ge dang / / 'khor lo sgyur la grogs byed med// byang chub zhugs nas nges pa med// byang chub sems dpa' grogs mi dgos/ de nas byang chub sems dpas bdud
229b1(mdo sde): mthu chung bar bya ba'i phyir/ gang mthong bas bdag gis dpung byang chub sems dpa'i kha'i nang du zhugs so snyam du sems shing / bdud bros par 'gyur ba dang / bros nas kyang ci yang ma
229b2(mdo sde): yin no snyam nas/ yang slar log ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs byang chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phen cing / ri rab tsam gyi ri de dag kyang / byang chub sem
229b3(mdo sde): dba'i steng du 'phangs pa dang / me tog gi bla re dang / gzhal med khang du gyur te gnas pa dang / gang dag mig gdug pa dang / myur du gdug pa dang / dbugs gdug pa sume lce gtor ba'i me'i

229b6(mdo sde): no snyam nas yang slar log go/ / slar log nas byang chub sems dpa'i steng du mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs/ ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / dgra sta dang /

230a1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa du ma 'phen te/ de dag kyang 'phangs ma thag tu me tog gi/ phreng ba dang / me tog gi bla rer gyur te gnas so// me tog gsil mar yang gyur nas sa la 'thor
230a2(mdo sde): ba dang / 'phreng ba'i chun por yang 'phyang bas/ byang chub kyi shing brgyan par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i bkod pa 'byor pa de dag mthong nas/ bdud sdig can phrag dog dang / ser snas

230b5(mdo sde): kyi mdog ltar 'dug pas brgyan pa/ / 'jam zhing mnyen la shin tu gzhon pa/ bskal pa dpag tu med par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i cho gas bsags pas grub pa'i lag pa g.yas pas lus thams
230b6(mdo sde): cad la byugs nas/ tshul du shis par sa la brdabs te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// sa 'di 'gro ba kun gyi gnas yin te/ rgyu dang mi rgyu snyoms shing nye mgon med
230b7(mdo sde): 'di ni bdag gi dbang ste bdag brdzun med/ 'di la khyod ni bdag gi dbang byos shig/ byang chub sems dpas sa chen po 'di la reg ma thag tu rnam pa drug tu gams rab tu g.yos// kun tu
231a1(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos so/ / chem chem rab tu ches ches so// kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// de 'di lta ste dper na/ yul ma ga d+ha'i brdab khar sgra 'byung zhing / sgra rgyun

231b3(mdo sde): la skyed bzhin du/ nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pas ma song la/ phyir yang ma log cing / bros kyang ma bros te/ phyir bltas nas yang dpung rnams la smras pa/ khyed lhan cig 'dus te/
