231b6(mdo sde): chags med/ ci gti mug can nam/ 'on te shes rab can/ ci ljongs pa zhig gam/ 'on te phyogs shes pa zhig gam/ 'on te dpung gnyen med pa zhig gam/ dman pa zhig gam
231b7(mdo sde): brten pa zhig yin pa goms shig/ tshig de thos nas/ lha'i bu mo do dag byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems
232a1(mdo sde): dpa'i mdun du 'khod de/ bud med kyi sgyu rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nye bar bstan to// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i nang nas kha
232a2(mdo sde): cig na bzhin phyed 'gebs pa dang / kha cig ni ma mkhrang zhing 'bur ba ston pa dang / kha cig ni cung zad 'dzums pas so'i 'phreng ba ston pa dang / kha cig ni lag pa brkyang ste
232a3(mdo sde): bya sbyangs byed cing mtshan khung ston pa dang / kha cag ni shing tog bim pa ltar dmar ba'i mchu ston pa dang / kha cig ni mig phyed btsums te byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing
232a4(mdo sde): bltas nas myur ba myur bar 'dzum pa dang / kha cig ni nu ma phyed g.yogs te ston pa dang / kha cig ni gos snyil bar byas te/ gser gyi phag ska dang bcas pa'i rked pa ston
232a5(mdo sde): ba dang / kha cig ni gos dug ku la sra mo gyon te/ gser gyi phag ska dang bcas pa'i rked pa ston pa dang / kha cig ni rkang gdub sgra sil sil 'byin pa dang / kha cig ni nu ma'i
232a6(mdo sde): bar nas/ phreng ba gcig nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni brla phyed tsam brdzes pa nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni mgo dang phrag pa dag la bya 'dab skyed dang ne tso dang / ri skegs 'dug
232a7(mdo sde): par nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la mig zur gyis lta ba dang / kha cig ni gos legs par bgos kyang / mgo ma legs pa lta bur bcos pa dang / kha cig/
232b1(mdo sde): ni rked pa dang / gser gyi phag ska spyod pa dang / kha cig ni 'khrul pa ltar 'chos shing sgeg ste/ phan tshun 'chag pa dang / kha cig ni gar byed pa dang / kha cig ni glu len pa dang / 2
232b2(mdo sde): cig ni bsgeg cing ngo tsha ba ltar yang 'chos pa dang / kha cig ni chu shing rlung gis bskyod pa ltar brla sgul ba dang / kha cig ni brjid pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang / kha cig ni seng ras bgos te/
232b3(mdo sde): gser gyi phag ska dril bu can bcings nas rgod cing 'chag pa dang / kha cig ni gos dang rgyan rnams sa la 'dor zhing ngo tsha ltar slar yang len pa dang / kha cig ni gsang ba dang // gsal
232b4(mdo sde): ba'i rgyan thams cad nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni lag pa spos kyis bskus pa ston pa dang / kha cig ni mkhur ba bskus shing rna cha yang ston pa dang / kha cig ni mgo yang g.yogs shing bzhin
232b5(mdo sde): yang g.yogs la skad cig tsam gyis ston pa dang / kha cig ni sngon rgod rgod pa dang / dga' dga' ba dang / rtse rtse ba phan tshun dran par byed cing yang ngo tsha ba ltar 'dug pa dang / kha cig ni gzhon nu'i
232b6(mdo sde): gzugs dang / bu ma btsas pa'i gzugs dang / na chung tshad la bab pa'i gzugs ston pa dang / kha cig ni 'dod pa dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' la sgugs pa dang / kha cig ni byang chub
232b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' la me tog sil mas 'thor ba dag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa'i bsams pa la rtog cing gdong du yang lta ste/ 'di ci chags pa'i dbang
233a1(mdo sde): pos lta 'am/ 'on te mi rtsa ring du lta 'am/ g.yo 'am mi g.yo zhes bltas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzhin dag cing dri ma med la/ sgra gcan las thar pa'i zla ba'i dkyil
233a2(mdo sde): 'khor lta bur 'dug pa dang / nyi ma thog ma shar ba lta bu dang / gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu dang / pad+ma 'dab ma stong rgyas pa lta bu dang / gtor bar bya ba gtor ba'i me lta bu dang / lhun po
233a3(mdo sde): ltar mi g.yo ba dang / khor yug ltar mngon par 'phags pa dang / dbang po shin tu bsrungs pa dang / glang po ltar sems shin tu dul bar mthong ngo // de nas bdud kyi bu mo
233a4(mdo sde): de dag gi/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu chags par bya ba'i phyir/ gla dang gar du sbar ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dus kyi dam pa sos ka bzang la bab/ zhugs shing me
233a5(mdo sde): tog rgyas kyis dgyes par rol/ / khyod kyi gzugs ni gzugs bzang mdzes pa ste// mtshan gyis spras pa'i dbang du bdag cag gyur// bdag cag skyes pa legs skyes dbyibs legs te//
233a6(mdo sde): lha mi bde ba'i rkyen du bdag cag byung // byang chub rnyed dkas thugs ni slar sbyar la// myur du bzhengs te dar la bab pa spyod// khyod kyi ched du chas nas rab tu brgyan te lhags gyur pa// lha yi bu
233a7(mdo sde): mo legs par brgyan pa 'di dag rnams la gzigs/ / gzugs 'di bltas nas shing rul lta bur srog tsam lus pa yang // chags par gyur na chags pas dga' ba su zhig chags mi
233b1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / sgra 'jam shin tu dri zhim dri dang ldan// cod pan rna cha 'dab ris bzhin rgyas la// 'phral ba legs shing legs byugs bzhin dang ldan// pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur mig yangs legs/
233b2(mdo sde): kha bzhin zla ba nya ba lta bu ste// shing tog bim pa smin 'dra'i mchu dang ldan// dung dang kun da kha ba dkar so ldan// sdug pa dga' la chags pa rnams la gzigs// nu ma shin tu mkhrang
233b3(mdo sde): zhing rgyas la 'bur/ / lto ba'i rked na gnyer gsum shin tu mdzes// rked pa 'khor sa lta bu yangs shing mdzes// na chung shin tu mdzes la mgon po gzigs// glang po'i sna 'dra ba yi brla
233b4(mdo sde): ldan zhing / / lag pa gdu bus chal par gang ba can// rked pa gser gyi pha skar ba mdzes brgyan/ khyod kyi bran mo 'di la mgon pos gzigs// ngang pa'i stabs ldan dal gyis mchi bgyid pa/
233b5(mdo sde): 'jam zhing yid 'ong 'dod ldan mdzes smra ba// rnam pa 'di ltar shin tu logs brgyan la// lha yi dga' ba rnams la shin tu mkhas// glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gar rab bslabs// dga'
233b6(mdo sde): ba'i ched du mdzes pa'i gzugs can skyes/ / 'dod la rab dga' gal te mi bzhed na// 'jig rten dag na khyod ni shin tu bslus// mi len nor gyis bde ba mi shes 'ga'// gter mthong
233b7(mdo sde): nas ni 'bros par bgyid pa ltar/ / khyod kyang 'dod chags mi mkhyen rang lhags pa// na chung rnams la mi spyod de dang 'dra// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzum par
234a1(mdo sde): 'dzum dmyal te/ bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung shing / dbang po rnam par ma 'khrugs pa dang lus ma bcos pa dang / brjid pa dang / ma chags pa dang / mi sdang ba dang / ma rmongs
234a2(mdo sde): pa dang / / ri'i dbang po ltar mi g.yo ba dang / ma zhum pa dang / ma gyur pa dang / 'dzem pa med pa dang / blo shin tu legs par gnas pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu spang ba'i phyir/
234a3(mdo sde): rang gi kha na las pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang / 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang / tshangs pa las lhag pa'i nga ro dang / bya ka la bing+ka'i sgra dbyangs dang / snyan pa dang yid du 'ongs pas bdud kyi
234a4(mdo sde): bu mo de dag la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ 'dod pa sdug bsngal mang po sogs shing sdug bsngal rtsa ba ste// mi mkhas rnams la bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dka' thub nyams par byed//
234a5(mdo sde): bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa med ces mkhas pas smras// nga ni mi mkhas rnams la shes rab chog par byed par 'gyur// 'dod pa bsten na sred pa phyir zhing rnam par 'phel 'gyur te//
234a6(mdo sde): dper na mi 'ga' la la tshwa chu 'thungs par gyur pa bzhin// de la zhugs pa bdag gi don min gzhan gyi don kyang min// da ni bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don la spro ba yin// khyod kyis gzugs
234a7(mdo sde): ni chu bur dag dang dbu ba mtshungs shing 'dra/ / sgyu ma'i tshon ltar rang gi blo yis rnam par bsgrubs pa ste// rmi lam dag na rtse ba lta bur mi brtan mi rtag kyang // byis pa mi mkhas rnams kyi sems
234b1(mdo sde): ni rtag tu rmongs par byed/ / mig ni chu yi chu bur mtshungs shing 'dra ste pags pas g.yogs// khrag brlang mkhrang zhing 'bur ba dper na nad kyi 'bras dang mtshungs// lte ni gcin dang bya
234b2(mdo sde): sa sogs te shin tu mi gtsang ba dang ldan/ / sdug bsngal bakhrul 'khor las dang nyon mongs pa las yang dag byung // byis pa'i blo can dag ni rmongs gyur phyin ci log pa yis// lus
234b3(mdo sde): gang la ni sdug par rtog pa mkhas pa de lta min/ / sdug bsngal rtsa bar gyur pa'i 'khor bar yun ring 'khor byed na// sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal mi bzad mang po
234b4(mdo sde): myong / / rked pa nas nirab tu yid mi 'ong ba'i dri can 'dzag/ brla dang byin pa rkang pa dag ni 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas// nga yis khyed la yang dag brtags nas sgyu ma ji
234b5(mdo sde): bzhin te/ / phyin ci log gi rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar gyur pa yin// 'phags pa'i ye shes lam las gol ba phyin ci log gyur pa// me dang dug gi lo ma 'dra zhing sbrul chen khros 'dra ba//
234b6(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan min zhing yon tan nyams mthong na// de la byis pa bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed cing rgyal bar gyur// mi gang 'dod pas bud med rnams kyi khol bor gyur pa dang /
234b7(mdo sde): gang zhig chos kyi dga' ba bor te 'dod pas dga' byed cing // dga' la brkam pa de ni tshul khrims lam las gol gyur cing // bsam gtan la ma gol blo nyams ye shes las ni rab
235a1(mdo sde): ring gnas/ nga ni 'dod chags zhe sdang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin te// rtag dang sdug dang bdag dang lhan cig gnas par byed ma yin// mi dga' ba dang dga' dang
235a2(mdo sde): lhan cig gnas pa ma yin la/ / nga yi sa rab tu grol te mkha' la rlung dang 'dra// gal te khyod 'dra'i 'gro ba kun gyis 'dir ni gang gyur la// bskal par de dag rnams dang lhan cig
235a3(mdo sde): 'dre zhing gnas kyang ni/ / nga la tha ba med ce/ med gti mug min 'gyur te// rgyal ba rnams kyis thugs ni nam mkha' mtshungs zhing 'dra phyir ro// lha dang lha mo shin tu dri med la/
235a4(mdo sde): khrag dang rus pa med cing rab bzang ba/ de ngas kun kyang 'jigs pa cher gnas te// rtag dngos bral zhing ther zug med phyir ro// de nas bdud kyi bu mo bud med kyi rgyu
235a5(mdo sde): rnams shin tu bslabs pa de dag de bas kyang / cher 'dod chags dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa bskyed dang / steg pa bstan nas/ lus rnams brgyan te/ bud med kyi g.yo nyo bar bstan
235a6(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la rjod // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bu mo'i nang na gces mchog sred dang dga' dang dga' can lhan cig tu// bdud kyi btang ba shin tu tshul du shis par
235a7(mdo sde): rings par lpags gyur te/ shing drug ma gzhan nu lo mar bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// gar byed cing ni rgyal po'i sras po shing drung 'dug la rjod par byed// dus kyi nang na dam
235b1(mdo sde): pa mchog tu dgyi ba sos ka'i dus 'di ste/ / skyes pa dag dang bud med dga' bar bgyid cing mun pa rdul yang bcom// khu byug dang ni ngang pa rma bya sgra 'byin bya tshogs rnams kyi gang /
235b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba myong bar bgyi ba'i dus la dbab po// bskal pa stong du tshul khrims dga' zhing brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad gyur pa// ri yi rgyal po lta bur mi g.yo nyi ma
235b3(mdo sde): shar ma thag pa'i gzugs/ / 'brug bsgrags lta bur sgra snyan ri dgas dbang pos sgra bsgrags 'dra ba po// 'gro la phan pa byed pa de yis don dang ldan pa'i tshig smras pa// 'dod pa rtsod
235b4(mdo sde): dang ngag dang 'thab dang nyon mongs bcas dang 'jigs byed pa/ byis pa'i skye bos nye bar bsten gyi mkhas pa'i skye bos rtag spangs la// gang du bde gshegs rnams kyis bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i
235b5(mdo sde): dus la bab gyur kyis/ / do mod bdud las rgyal te stobs bcu rnams dang ldan pa dgra bcom 'gyur// sgyu rnams bstan nas smras pa zhal ras pad+ma 'dra ba bstan du gsol// khyod ni
235b6(mdo sde): rgyal po dbang phyug dam pas bdag stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ / bud med dam pa'i tshogs kyis sil snyan stong dag rab tu bgyid 'gyur na// thub pa'i cha byad kyis ni ci bgyis spongs la
235b7(mdo sde): dga' ba bsnyen du gsol/ / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nga ni srid pa gsum na dbang phyug lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod la// chos kyi 'khor los 'gro zhing stobs bcu stobs dang
236a1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ / slob dang mi spong bu rnams khrag khrig rtag tu 'dud pa mngon du byed// chos kyi dga' bas dga' ba'i yul la nga yi yid ni dga' ma yin// de dag gis
236a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ re zhig dar la bab pa ma yol dang por thor bur gyur pa dang / khyod ni re zhig snyun gyis ma btab mi shis bgres par ma gyur dang // ji srid dar la bab cing bdag cag grogs kyang dar la
236a3(mdo sde): bab gyur pa/ / de srid par du 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis 'dod pa dga' ba spyad du gsol// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ji sri do mod dal ba dam pa 'chi med dkon pa rnyed pa dang // ji srid
236a4(mdo sde): lha dang lha min grong khyer mi khom sdug bsngal spangs pa dang / / ji srid rga dang na dang 'chi ba'i dgra yis dkrugs par ma gyur pa// de srid nga ni 'jigs med grong khyer 'gro ba'i
236a5(mdo sde): lam mchog bsgom par bya/ / de dag gis smras pa/ lha yi gnas na sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po lha mos bskor ba dang // 'tha pa bral 'thab bral rab dang dga' ldan rab dang bdud kyi grong
236a6(mdo sde): khyer na/ / lha mchog bstod pa bzhin du bud med dbang du gyur nas 'dod dga' la// rol cing spyod la bdag cag rnams dang lhan cig dgyes pa rgya chen mdzod// byang chub sems dpas smras
236a7(mdo sde): pa/ 'dod pa rtswa rtse'i zil thig bzhin du mU ra la ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs// klu yi bu mo khro ba lta bur shin tu 'jigs par byed pa yin// brgya byin 'thab bral rab lha dga' ldan pa dag bdud
236b1(mdo sde): kyi dbang du song / / 'phags min rnams kyis 'dod pa sdug bsngal ldan pa 'di la su zhig dga'// de dag gis smras pa/ shing mchog 'di dang lo ma gzhon dang ldan zhing me tog rgyas gyur na/
236b2(mdo sde): shang shang te'u dang khu byug sba 'byin bung ba sgra 'byin ldan pa gzigs// sa las rtsa 'khrungs rab sngo 'jam zhing ma la ljang lo can mchis pa// ga nas mchog mi ci tshogs kyis brten par na chung rnams dang
236b3(mdo sde): dgyes par mdzod/ / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lo mar bcas pa'i shing rnams 'di dag dus kyi dbang gis me tog rgyas// bung ba dag kyang bkres dang skom pas nyen nas me tog rnams
236b4(mdo sde): su lhags/ / gang zhig dus na sa las skyes pa rnams kyang nyi mas skams par gyur// nga 'dir sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis spyad pa bdud rtsi nges par spyad// bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis
236b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ zla 'dra'i zhal mnga' gzigs shig parlagasar pa 'dra ba'i kha bzhin can// snyan can yid du 'ong ba'i tshigs ldan so ni dngul dang kha ba 'dra// 'di 'dra lha yis gnas na dka
236b6(mdo sde): na ma'i gnas na ga la mchis/ / gang dag lha mchog rnams kyis rtag tu 'dong par bgyi ba khyod kyis brnyes// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lus ni ngan skyugs mi gtsang srin bu'i rigs kyis
236b7(mdo sde): gang ba shig shig po/ / myur du 'gyes shing 'jigs pa bde ba ma yin rnams dang ldan par mthong // rgyu bar bcas dang mi rgyu ba yi 'gro la bde ba mchog byed pa// go 'phang 'chi 'pho mod pa
237a1(mdo sde): skye bo mkhas pas mchod pa de thob bya/ / de dag 'dod pa'i sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi myong bar gyur pa ste// rkang gdub gser gyi phag ska 'khrol zhing gos kyang shag shig byas
237a2(mdo sde): nas ni/ / 'dod pa'i mda' yis phog pa rgyags pa 'dzum zhing 'di skad smras// jo bo khyod la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na 'di dag bsten mi bgyi// srid pa kun gyi nyes pa rig nas rdul dang bral
237a3(mdo sde): bapas 'di skad smras/ / 'dod pa ral gri mdung thung rtse gsum sbrang rtsi can gyi spu gri 'dra// sbrul gyi mgo dang me mur 'dra ba rangs 'dir rab tu rika pas na// bud med yon tan 'phrogs pas de
237a4(mdo sde): phyir nga yis bud med tshogs rnams spangs/ / bud med yon tan rnam pa mang po khrag khrig bye ba de dag gis// gang gi tshe na glang po phrug gu'i stabs can de brjed ma ngas che// ngo tsha bskyengs nas
237a5(mdo sde): thub pa'i rkang pa gnyis la rab tu phyag 'tshal te/ / dga' zhing mgu ba bskyed nas phan pa byed pa de la bstod pa byas// pad+ma dri ma med pa'i snying po 'dra zhing ston zla lnga bu'i zhal// mar gyis sprin
237a6(mdo sde): bsreg bgyis pa'i 'od 'phro me 'dra gser gyi ri 'dra ba/ / srid pa brgya nas spyad cing dgongs dang smon lam btab pa grub gyur cig/ bdag nyid rgal nas sdug bsngal dag dang ldan pa'i 'grob
237a7(mdo sde): bsgral du gsol/ / de dag rnams kyis dong ka'i shing dang tsam pa ka 'dra rnams mang bstod// mchog tu gyur pa ri ltar mi g.yo ba la bskor ba byas nas ni// song ste pha yi rkang la mgo bos
237b1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig kyang smras/ / yab cig lha dang mi yi bla ma de la khong khro spangs na legs// bzhin ni 'dzum par gyur nas pad+ma'i mdab ma 'dra ba'i mig gis lta// de ni chags
237b2(mdo sde): pas skye bo mi lta de la khro gnyer mchis ma lags/ / lhun po g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams la nyi zla ltung bar 'gyur yang gda'// srid pa gsum gyi nyes mthong de ni bud med rnams kyi dbang mi 'gyur
237b3(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshigs de skad thos nas/ / de bas kyang cher sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la// yid ma rangs shing tshig pa za ba'i yid kyis rang gi bu mo de dag la
237b4(mdo sde): smras pa/ / kye mi shis shing glen te/ khyod kyi gzugs dbang rod ma mthong ngam/ ji ltar gyur na/ de byang chub kyi snying po las bslangs par ma nus/ de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis// rang
237b5(mdo sde): gi pha la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ / snyan cing 'jam por smra yang chags pa ma mchis te/ gsang ba chen po ltar yang sdang ba mchis ma lags/ spyod lam dag dang spyod pa lta yang
237b6(mdo sde): rmongs ma mchis/ / lus rnams thams cad rtogs kyang bsam pa shin tu zab// bud med nongs pa rgya chen the tsom ma mchis rtogs// 'dod las dben pa'i yid ldan 'dod chags chags
237b7(mdo sde): ma mchis/ / gang zhig de yi sems dang spyod pa yongs 'tshal ba// lha yul mi yul 'di na lha mi de ma mchis// de la bud med sgyu rnams gang lags bstan na yab// chags bcas gang
238a1(mdo sde): lags de yi snying zhu 'gyur rigs na/ de dag mthong yang de yi sems ni gcig ma g.yos/ ri dbang rgyal po bzhin du de ni mi g.yo mchis// bsod nams gzi brji
238a2(mdo sde): brgyas bltams yon tan gzi brjid rdzogs/ / bskal pa bye ba mang por tshul khrims brtul zhugs spyad// lha dang tshangs pa sems can gzi brjid rnam dag dge/ de dag de yi rkang par
238a3(mdo sde): mgos gtugs phyag kyang 'tshal/ / sde dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams bcom nas sngon chad kyi// rgyal bas bzhed pa byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur nges// yab cig bdag cag g.yul ngor
238a4(mdo sde): 'thab pa mi 'tshal te/ stobs ldan bdag dang 'thab par sbyor 'di tshegs rab che// yab cig mkha' la nor bu rin chen gtsug pud can/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig
238a5(mdo sde): gus par gnas/ / rin chen 'byung gnas yan lag me tog phreng bas brgyan// stobs bcu mnga' bas mchod phyir 'dir btang rnams la gzigs// gang dag sems pa mchis dang
238a6(mdo sde): gang sems ma mchis/ / shing ri lha dbang gnod sbyin mkha' lding dbang po dag/ yon tan ri bor mngon par 'dud cing phyogs pa las// yab cig do mdo slar log na ni legs pa 'dra//
238a7(mdo sde): gzhan yang gang gi pha mthar mi phyin der ni rkyal mi bgyi// gang zhig rtsa nas mi phyin de ni brko mi bgyi// gang la bzod pa yang gsol de ni dkrug mi bgyi// gang gis yid mi bde bar 'gyur/
238b1(mdo sde): pa de mi bgyi/ dge slong dag de nas de'i tshe shing gi lha mo brgyad la 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan dang / 'phel mo dang / dka' thub dang / dge ma dang / mkhas ma dang / mdangs
238b2(mdo sde): stobs dang / bden smras dang / ldan ma ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par mchod nas/ dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed/ mngon du
238b3(mdo sde): stod par byed de/ sems can dag pa khyod ni dgun zla yar gyi ngo ltar mdzes pa'o// blo rnam par dag pa khyod ni gdugs dang po shar ba ltar lhang nge ba'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni chab kyi
238b4(mdo sde): nang na pad+ma ltar rab tu rgyas pa'o/ / sems can dag pa khyod ni nags dang nags mdab na rgyu ba'i seng ge ltar sgrogs pa'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni rgya mtsho'i dbus na ri'i rgyal po ltar
238b5(mdo sde): mdzes pa'o/ / sems can dag pa khyod ni khor yug gi ri ltar mngon par 'phags pa'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni rgya mtsho ltar rin po chos bltams zhing gting dpag par dka' ba'o//
238b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni nam mkha' ltar thug pa ma mchis shis thugs kyi rgya che ba'o// sems can rnam par dag pa khyod ni dog sa ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cing
238b7(mdo sde): thugs shin tu brtan pa'o/ / sems can dam pa khyod ni mtsho ma dros pa ltar rtag tu dang zhing thugs rnyog pa mi mnga' ba'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni rlung mar ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
239a1(mdo sde): thams cad la rtag tu mi chags shing thugs gnas pa ma mchis pa'o/ / sems can dam pa khyod ni gzi brjid kyi rgyal po ltar rlom sems can thams cad spangs
239a2(mdo sde): bsnyen par dka' ba'o/ / sems can dam pa khyod ni sred med kyi bu ltar thul bar dka' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni byang chub kyi snying po las mi bzhengs pa
239a3(mdo sde): dam bcas pa bstan pa'o/ / sems can dam pa khyod ni dbang po'i lag gis 'phangs pa'i rdo rje ltar slar mi ldog pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni ring po mi thogs par stobs bcu dang
239a4(mdo sde): ldan par byin pas brnyes pa legs par brnyes pa'o/ / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo rnams kyis dpal rnam pa bcu drug gos byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed do/
239a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag de na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud nyams dmas par byed de/ rnam pa bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can
239a6(mdo sde): khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po ltar sems khong du chud cing dmas pa'o/ / sdig can khyod ni glang po rgan po 'dam du bying ba ltar nyam chung ba'o// sdig can khyod ni dpa' bor khas 'ches pa
239a7(mdo sde): pham pa ltar gcig pur gyur pa'o/ / sdig can khyod ni nad kyis nyen pa 'brog tu bor ba ltar gnyis su med pa'o// sdig can khyod ni glang bu khal gyis nyon mongs pa ltar stobs med pa'o/
239b1(mdo sde): sdig can khong ni shing rlung gis btab pa ltar skyel ba'o// sdig can khyod ni 'dron pa lam stor ba ltar lam ngan par gnas pa'o// sdig can khyod ni mi dbul po bu lon can ltar dman pa bas
239b2(mdo sde): kyang dman pa'o/ / sdig can khyod ni bya rog byung rgyal ba ltar mu cor smra ba'o// sdig can khyod ni ma dul ba byas pa mi gzo ba ltar nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa'o// sdig can khyod ni seng ge'i
239b3(mdo sde): sgras wa 'bros pa ltar deng 'bros par 'gyur ba'o/ / sdig can khyod ni rnam par 'thor rlung gi sa gtor ba'i bya bzhin du deng 'dar bar 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni sprang po bsod nams
239b4(mdo sde): zad pa ltar dus mi shes pa'o/ / sdig can khyod ni snod chag pa rdul gyis gang ba ltar deng rnam par spang bar 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni sngags la dpa' ba sprul la bab pa ltar de tshar chod par 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni mi rkang lag bcad pa ltar
239b5(mdo sde): stob thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'o/ / dge slong dag ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can nyams smad par byas so// dge slong dag de la byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur
239b6(mdo sde): ba'i lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed do/ / bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod ni dpa' bo pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpas ngo
239b7(mdo sde): mod pham par byas par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyod ni gyang stobs chung ngu la gyad stobs chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas tshar bcad par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni srin bu me khyer
240a1(mdo sde): la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni phub ma sbar ba gang la rlung mar bab pa ltar do mad
240a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas gtor bar 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyod ni wa la seng ge bab pa ltar do med byang chub sems dpas spangs par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni shing sA la chen po
240a3(mdo sde): rtsa ba nas bcad pa ltar de mod byang chub sems dpas bsgyel bar 'gyuraro/ / sdig can khyod ni mi mdza' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas brlag par
240a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyod ni ba rjes kyi chu la nyi tshan chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni mi g.yon can bsad par bya ba shor
240a5(mdo sde): ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyod ni me'i tsha bas bung ba'i khyu ltar ngo mod byang chub sems dpas mgo 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig
240a6(mdo sde): can khyod ni chos kyi rgyal po rgyal srid nyams pa ltar do mong byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du bcug par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po mdab ma bregs pa ltar do mod byang chu
240a7(mdo sde): sems dpas sems khong du bcug par 'gyur ro/ / sdig can khyod ni 'brog dgon par lam brgyags chad pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas phongs par byas par 'gyur ro//
240b1(mdo sde): can khyod na rgya mtsho tshan por gru zhig pa ltar nam byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'dzin du bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig cam khyod ni sreg pa'i bskal pas rba dang nags tshal ltar na mad nga
240b2(mdo sde): chub sems rapas rnyis par byas par 'gyuraro/ / sdig can khyang na rab rtsom man rdzobapa pa ltar/ dmod byang chub sems dpas brnyim par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang
240b3(mdo sde): chung kyisasnyen bkur ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa 'acu drug gis bdud sdig cad zlog par byed cing / bdud sreg can phyi ma logag/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha ma tshogs kyis yang dag
240b4(mdo sde): bskul ba thos kyang bdud ni phyir log ma gyur te/ slongs shig rgyub shig 'di ni brlag par gyis shig srog kyang sbyin par ma byed cig/ 'di ni rang nyid rgal nas nga yi yul mas gzhan yang sgrol bar
240b5(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur/ / langs te bros pa ma gtogs dge sbyong 'di la thar gzhan cung zad med ces sba// byang chub sems dpas spras pa/ ri'i rgyal po lhun po gnas nas gam sring 'gro ba
240b6(mdo sde): thams cad med 'gyur srid/ / skar ma'i tshogs rnams thams cad zla ba bcas par mkha' las sa la lhung yang srid// sems can kun gyi bsam pa gcig byed 'gyur srid rgya mtsho chen po
240b7(mdo sde): skam srid kyi/ / nga 'di shing gi rgyal ba'i drung na 'dug pa la nig yo ba yang mi srid// bdud kyis spras pa/ kha po 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten 'di kun dbang / lha dang lha min tshogs
241a1(mdo sde): bcas mi dang dud 'gro rnams/ / kho bos khyab ste thams cad kho bo'i dbang du gyur/ kho bo'i yul na gdugs pa 'ongs la tshig bzhin gyis// byang chub sems
241a2(mdo sde): dpas smras pa/ gal te 'dod dbang khyod yin gsal bar khyod dbang min// yang dag nga ltos nga yang chos kyi dbang phyug yin// gal te ngan 'gror mi 'gro khyod na 'dod dbang phyug/ dbang
241a3(mdo sde): med khyod ni lta bzhin byang chub ngas thob 'gyur/ / bdud kyis smras pa/ dge sbyong bdag nyid gcig pu dgon par ci zhig byed// khyod kyis gang bcal de dang phrad par sla ma yin//
241a4(mdo sde): rab 'gro shes ldan la sogs dka' thub rab sgrims kyang // go 'phangs mchog de ma thob mir gyur khyod ci spos// byang chub sems dpas spras pa/ kho bo'i zil non blo dang lha yul
241a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / bdag la rtag snyan du gnas pa dang / yul du 'gro bas gnas pa thar snyam gnas pa yi// drang srong mi shes sngon du 'gro bas dka' thub spyad// de dag yang dag don dang bral
241a6(mdo sde): zhing skyes pa smra/ / khyab dang phyogs gcig ches dang kha cig rtag ces smra// lus can lus min yon tan min dang yon tan can// byed pa po dang byed po min zhes gzhan dag 'dzer//
241a7(mdo sde): stan 'dir 'dug ste nga rgyal bcom pa sde dpung bcas// khyod pham byas te byang chub rdul med deng thob nas// 'gro ba 'di la 'byung dang byang dang mya ngan 'das// sdug bsngal zhi ba bsil
241b1(mdo sde): ba'i dngos po bstan par bya/ / bdud ni khros shing 'khrugs te tshig pa zos nas mdun du rtsub pa'i tshig tu smras pa dge sbyong 'di bzung shig/ gcig pu dgon par bor bar gyur pa 'di ming yi
241b2(mdo sde): mdun nas zung la song ste myur du dbang du gyis/ nga yi khyim du myur du song la shing sgrog dang ni lcags sgrog phrugs su chug ste sgo ba byed du chug/ sdug bsngal nyen nas ku co rnams pa mang po
241b3(mdo sde): 'don cing lha yi khol po yin par bdag gis bdag mthong byos/ / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nam mkha' la ni ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs cha cha ris ris phye ste so sor bri bar nus kyang sring
241b4(mdo sde): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba'i shugs can rlung ni mi yis rab tu bsgrims te zhags pas bcing du nus kyang srid/ / nyi ma zla ba mun pa rab rib med byed mkha' las sa la ltung bar byed
241b5(mdo sde): par nus srid kyi/ / khyod dang 'dra ba rab tu mang po bgrang las 'das pa dag gis shing drung nas ni nga bskyod nus mi 'gyur// bdud dpung stobs dang ldan pa langs te ha zhes zer/ dung dang
241b6(mdo sde): rngadza dang rdza lnga mchog gi sgra 'byin langs/ bdud dpung shin tu 'jigs pa 'di dag mthong nas ni// kyi hud bu sdug khyod cis ma rung gyur ces zer// 'dzam gling gser dang tsam pa'i snying po
241b7(mdo sde): 'dra bar ser/ / shin tu gzhon nu lha mis bstod cing mchod pa'i 'os// khod deng g.yul ngo chen po rab tu brlag 'gyur te// dbang pos lnga min lta bar bdud kyi dbang nga 'gar
242a1(mdo sde): pa'i dbyangs dang ka la bing+ga'i sgra skad kyi/ / bde bar gshegs pas gnod sbyin srin tshogs de la smras// mi mkhas gang zhig nam mkha' skrag par byed 'dod pa//
242a2(mdo sde): de ni shing mchog drung nas nga 'dra slong bar 'dod// gang zhig stong gsum chen po bshig nas rdul 'grang dang // gang zhig ba spu yis ni rgya mtsho chu 'byin dang / skad cig gis ni rdo rje'i rang
242a3(mdo sde): bzhin ri 'thor ba/ / des kyang shing drung 'dug pa nga la 'tshe mi nus// bdud khros sems kyis gnya' shing gang gi bar tsam 'dug/ shubs nas phyung ba ral gri rnon po lag na thogs//
242a4(mdo sde): dge sbyong myur du longs la nga yi bsam pa bzhin du song // 'od ma'i myu gu sngo ltar do mod bcad da re// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// gal te stong gsum sa rnams 'di dag thams cad
242a5(mdo sde): bdud kyis rab tu gang gyur la/ / kun gyi lag na ri bo lhun po mchog 'dra ba yi ral gri thogs gyur kyang // de dag nga yi ba spu bskyod par mi nus nga la gnod byed smos ci dgos// sun 'byin
242a6(mdo sde): ma rings zhig dang de'u re brtags te nga yis brtan por dran par bya/ / rnga mo ba lang glang chen mgo dang 'jigs mig dang // myur gdug sbrul dang mig gdug mi bzad 'dra ba dag/ me 'bar
242a7(mdo sde): kha dog rtse mor bcas pa'i ri 'phen cing / / rtsa bar bcas pa'i shing dang zangs dang lcags rnams 'phen// sprin ltar langs te phyogs bzhi dag tu sgra sgrog cing // rdo rje'i lce dang lcags
242b1(mdo sde): kyi thu lum char pa 'bebs/ / ral gri mdung thung rna dang dgra sta dug can 'bebs// sa ni brtol bar byed cing shing dag rab tu 'joms// kha cig lag pa brgya dag gis ni mnga' brgya 'phen
242b2(mdo sde): kha nas myur du gdug pa'i sbrul dang me yang 'thor/ / chu skyes chu srin la sogs pa dag mtsho nas len// kha cig nam mkha' lding du bsgyur nas klu yang 'phen// kha cig khros nas lcags
242b3(mdo sde): kyi thu lum ri rab tsam/ / me 'bar kha dog rtse mor bcas pa rnams kyang 'phen// sa la lhags nas sa ni rab tu 'khrugs par byed// 'og gi chu yi phung po'i chu yang rnam par 'khrug
242b4(mdo sde): kha cig de yi mdun dang de bzhin rgyab tu mchong / / kye ma bu zhes g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon du mchod // rkang pa lag pa log par 'dug cing mgo 'bar la// glog ltar rab tu 'bar ba
242b5(mdo sde): mig gnas mngon du 'byin/ / bdud kyis dpung ni bsgyur ba mi sdug byas mthong nas// sems can dag pa sgyu ma byas pa ji bzhin tog/ 'di la bdud med stobs med 'gro med bdag kyang
242b6(mdo sde): med/ / chu zla'i tshul 'dra ba yi 'jig rten gsum po 'khor// mig dang skyes pa bud med med cing bdag gi med// rna ba sna dang de bzhin lde dang de bzhin lus// chos 'di byed pa po dang
242b7(mdo sde): tshor ba po dang bral/ / brten nas skyes te nang yang stong zhing phyi yang stong // bden tshig gang gis 'dir chos shin tu stong zhe na// 'dul mthun gnod sbyin nges pa gang yin de dag gis//
243a1(mdo sde): lag pa'i mtshon cha me tog phreng bar mthong gyur ces// rtag tu bden spras de yis bden pa'i tshig byas te// de yis lag mthil g.yon pa dra ba mchog spras pa/
243a2(mdo sde): sen mo zangs mdog rab mdzes rtsibs stong 'khor lo can// 'dzam gling gser 'bar 'dra ba bsod nams bgyis bsten pas// tshul du shis par mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du byugs/
243a3(mdo sde): mkha' las glog 'dra bar ni lag pa brkyang byas nas// tshig tu smras pas 'di ni nga yis dbang yin te// ngas ni sngon chad mchod sbyin khrag khrig sna tshogs byas// slong la mi sbyin snyam
243a4(mdo sde): ste don med gzhan ma byin/ / chu dang me dang rlung ni nga yi dbang yin te// tshangs pa skyes dgu bdag dang skar bcas nyi zla dang // gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
243a5(mdo sde): bdag khrims brtul zhugs byang chub yan lag 'phags pa dbang // sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod pa nga yi dbang // brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan de ltar shes rab dang //
243a6(mdo sde): tshad med bzhi dang de bzhin mngon shes nga yi dbang // rim gyis byang chub spyod pa thams cad nga yi dpang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sems can mtha' dag ji snyed pa// de dag rnams
243a7(mdo sde): kyi bsod nams tshul khrims ye shes dang / / gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa bsdoms kyang ni// de dag nga yi ba spu'i brgya yis char mi phod// de yis tshul du shis par lag pa sa la brdug
243b1(mdo sde): khar ba'i snod ltar sa 'di sgra yang byung bar gyur/ / bdud kyi sgra thos nas ni sa la skyel gyur te// nag po'i rtsa lag rgyob shig zung shig sgra yang thos// lus las rdul byung gzi brjid nyams shing
243b2(mdo sde): bzhin mdog gyur/ / rga bas bcom par bdud de nyid kyis mthong bar gyur// brang brdung cho nge 'don cing 'jigs nyen mgon yang med// bdud kyi yid 'khrul gyur cing sems ni myos par gyur//
243b3(mdo sde): glang po rta dang bzhon pa shing rta sa la lhung // srin po grul bum dag dang sha za sdangs shing rgyug/ mgo rmongs lam mi rnyed cing gnas med skyabs kyang med// rlung btab nags mes byas ltar
243b4(mdo sde): bltas nas song bar gyur/ / pha ma bu dang sring mo de bzhin phu nu dag/ gang na mthong zhing gang du dong zhes 'dri bar byed// de yi rkyen gyis de dag phan tshun 'thab cing rtsod// bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur
243b5(mdo sde): te 'tsho ba'i bskabs kyang med/ / bdud dpung rgya che mang ba mi 'khrugs snyed po do// thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing tha dgur gyes 'gyur te// zhag bdun 'das kyi bar du phan tshun phrad ma
243b6(mdo sde): gyur/ / mthong nas spras pa gal te gson na dga' zhes 'dzer/ shing gi lha mos de tshe de la snying rje byas// chu yi bum pa thogs te nag po'i rtsa lag gtor// myur du longs la phyi shol ma
243b7(mdo sde): byed skyen du song / / bla ma'i tshig ma mnyan pas de ltar gyur pa yin// bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag gis bu yi snyan tshig phan pa ma mnyan te/ sems can shin tu dag la nyes pa bas pas
244a1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'jigs 'phongs mya ngan brlag dang brnyas pa dang / cir mi rung ba'i sgra dang dman nyid bdag gis thob// lha mos smras pa/ mi mkhas gang zhig nyes pa med
244a2(mdo sde): la nyes byed pa/ / de ni nyes dang sdug bsngal ba dang 'phongs pa dang / cir mi rung zhes bya ba'i sgra dang dman nyid dang // bsad dang bcing dang nyes pa du ma rnyed par 'gyur// lha dang lha min mang
244a3(mdo sde): lding mi ci srin po'i dbang / / tshangs pa brgya byin gzhan 'phrul 'og min bcas pa dag/ 'di ltar khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i bdud kyi dpung bcom pas// 'jig rten dpa' bo rgyal zhes de yi rgyal ba brjod// rgyar 'gre
244a4(mdo sde): po zla ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan 'bul/ me tog a ga ru dang rgya spos tsan dan phye char 'bebs// sil snyan dag kyang rab tu dkrol ba byed cing tshig brjod pa// dpa' bo dgra tshogs rgyal rnams
244a5(mdo sde): khyod la dgab pa mdzad par 'gyur/ / stan mchog 'dir ni byams pas g.yon can bdud kyi phyogs// rgya chen pham mdzad dpa' bo de mod byang chub brnyes// stobs bcu ma 'dres so so yang dag
244a6(mdo sde): rig pa dang / / sangs rgyas yul rnams thams cad do mad brnyes par 'gyur// bdud 'dul ched du 'dir ni g.yul ngor rab tu zhugs// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rtsal sus
244a7(mdo sde): mthong ba/ / bye ba sum cu drug dang khrag khrig nyi shu bzhi// de dag sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu yid kyis smon// bdud btul ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / dgra
244b1(mdo sde): slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ / dgra btul ba/ g.yul ngor g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan bsgreng bas 'dod pa
244b2(mdo sde): rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can// bsam gtan dang po
244b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
244b4(mdo sde): bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas// btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba
244b5(mdo sde): lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste// dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas
244b6(mdo sde): te gnas so/ / de bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa/ btang
244b7(mdo sde): snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems
245a1(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba// mnyen pa las su rung bar gnas pa/ mig so
245a2(mdo sde): bar gyur pas nam gyi cha stod la lha'i mig las ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ / sems mngon par sgrub cing / mngon par gtod do// de nas byang chub
245a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' lha'i mig yongs su dag pa/ mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa rnams
245a4(mdo sde): mthong ngo / / las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spad pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis nyes par
245a5(mdo sde): spyad pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu ngan sa
245a6(mdo sde): 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dag go/ / sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis legs par
245a7(mdo sde): spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de dag yang dag par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas/
245b1(mdo sde): bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dag ces bya bar rab tu shes so// de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang //
245b2(mdo sde): skye ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bde 'gror song ba dang / ngan 'gror song ba dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dag dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams mthong
245b3(mdo sde): ngo / / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha stod la rig pa mngon sum du byed do// mun pa sel te/ snang ba skyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms
245b4(mdo sde): par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa
245b5(mdo sde): mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod do// de dag dang /
245b6(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa dus rjes su dran te/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba gcig dang / gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang /
245b7(mdo sde): bzhi bcu dang / skye ba lnga bcu dang / skye ba brgya dang / skye ba stong dang / skye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba dang / skye ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / skye ba bye ba phrag stong
246a1(mdo sde): dang / skye ba bye ba brgya stong dang / skye bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / skyed bye ba stong phrag du ma dang / skya dbye ba brgya stong phrag du ma
246a2(mdo sde): skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nas/ 'jig pa'i bskal pa dang / chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jig pa dang / chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jig pa dang / chags pa'i bskal
246a3(mdo sde): pa du ma dag kyang rjes su dran no/ / bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes bya'o// kha dog ni 'di lta bu'o// kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig
246a4(mdo sde): za za'o/ / tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig thub bo// yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo // bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhes bya ba
246a5(mdo sde): zhig tu skyes so/ / de nas shi 'phos nas kyang che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so// de nas shi 'phos na kyang 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang sems
246a6(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/

246b1(mdo sde): tsam na/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba nub par bya ba dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par btod de/ de 'di snyam du
246b2(mdo sde): sems te/ kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni 'di lta ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye bas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa yin na/ 'on kyang rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la
246b3(mdo sde): sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 'di las 'byung bar bya ba mi shes te/ e ma ho rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di thams
246b4(mdo sde): cad zad par bya bar shes na ci ma rung snyam nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas rga ba dang / 'chi ba 'byung / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam
246b5(mdo sde): nas 'di snyam du sems te/ skye ba yod pas rga shi byung ste/ rga shi'i rkyen ni skye ba yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas skye ba byung
246b6(mdo sde): skye ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ srid pa yod pas skye ba byung ste/ skye ba'i rkyen ni srid pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du
246b7(mdo sde): sems te/ gang yod pas srid pa byung / srid pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ len pa yod pas srid pa byung ste/ srid pa'i rkyen ni len pa yin no snyam mo//

247a6(mdo sde): no snyam mo/ / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas skye mched drug byung / skye mched drug gi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te//

251a1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la 'jog pa por ni gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i khri chen po la ni bzhugs/ rnam

252a1(mdo sde): skyes bu seng ge de yis dpung bcas bdud btul te/ ston pa bsam gtan bde ba mngon du mdzad nas ni// gang tshe stobs bcus rig pa gsum po brnyes gyur tshe//
252a2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing mang bye ba g.yos par gyur// chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yongs lhags pa// zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad tshig smras ma mnyal tam//
252a3(mdo sde): bdag cag mngon sum ci 'dra shin tu 'jigs dpung de/ shes rab bsod nams stobs dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis bcom// khrag khrig zhing nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis gdugs rnams
252a4(mdo sde): bskur/ / des pa skyes bu chen po bdud kyi sde rnams btul// khyod kyis gnas mchog 'chi med mya ngan med pa brnyes// srid pa gsum du dam chos char pa myur du phob// phyogs bcu'i sems
252a5(mdo sde): can snying po rnams kyis phyag brkyang ste/ / ka la bing+ka'i sgra yi gsung du brjod na ni// bdag cag ji ltar byang chub thob ltar khyod sangs rgyas// dper na mar dang mar gyi snying khu mtshungs 'dra
252a6(mdo sde): bzhin/ / dge slong dag de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa// mngon par shes pa brnyes pa dang // brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa
252a7(mdo sde): dang / g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang // bdud phyir rgol ba pham par mdzad pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba dang / dpa' dang / rgyal ba 'phags pa dang
252b1(mdo sde): skyes bu dang / skyes bu chen po dang / sman pa'i mchog dang / zug rngu 'byin pa chen po dang / seng ge'i ltar mi snying shing spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga' ba dang / glang po ltar thugs shin tu dul ba
252b2(mdo sde): dang / dri ma gsum spangs pas dri ma mi mnga' ba dang / rig pa gsum brnyes pas mkhyen pa po dang / chu bo bzhi las brgal bas pha rol tu byon pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs gcig 'dzin pas
252b3(mdo sde): rgyal rigs su gyur pa dang / sdig pa'i chos spangs pas 'jig rten gsum gyi bram zer gyur pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pas dge slong du gyur pa dang / chags pa thams cad las
252b4(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pas/ dge sbyong du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa bsal bas gtsang sbra can du gyur pa dang / rgyal mtshan ma bsnyal bas dpa' ba dang / stobs bcu mnga' bas shin tu stobs
252b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas ltar chos rin po che thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rig nas/ byang chub kyi snying logs su phyogs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
252b6(mdo sde): par bstod do/ / 'di ni shing gi rgyal drung du// bdud sde mngon du pham mdzad nas// ri rab lta bur mi g.yo bzhugs/ bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'bros mi mdzad// 'di ni bskal pa bye mang
252b7(mdo sde): du/ sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis// byang chub dam pa yang dag bsgrubs// des na 'dir ni do mod mdzes// byang chub dam pa tshol ba na// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// tshul khrims
253a1(mdo sde): brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis/ / brgya byin tshangs pa zil du rlag/ 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// bzod pa'i stobs kyi go mnabs te// sdug bsngal rnams ni
253a2(mdo sde): dang du blangs/ / des na gser mdog 'od dang ldan// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// brtson 'grus stobs dang rtsal gyis ni// gzhan dag phyir bsnyil mdzad pa de// des na bdud kyi sde las rgyal//
253a3(mdo sde): 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes kyis// thub pa'i dbang po yang dag mchod// des na do med 'di la mchod// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// shes rab
253a4(mdo sde): dang ni gsan pa bsags/ / sems can bye ba phan yang btags// des na byang chub myur du brnyes// 'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal// 'chi bdag nyon mongs bdud las rgyal// 'di ni lA
253a5(mdo sde): yi bdud las rgyal/ / des 'di mya ngan mi mnga'o// 'di ni shin tu lha yi lha// lha rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i cha// 'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os// bsod nams don du gnyer ba'i
253a6(mdo sde): zhing / / 'chi med 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa// 'di ni sbyin gnas dam pa ste// 'di la sbyin pa btang na de// byang chub dam pa thob bar du// bar ma dor ni chud mi za// 'di yi mdzod spu
253a7(mdo sde): mdzes pa yis/ / zhing mdo bye ba gsal bar bgyid// nyi zla dag kyang zil du rlag/ sems can rnams la snang bar gyur// 'di yi gzugs ni gzugs mdzes te// gzugs kyi dam pa
253b1(mdo sde): legs pa'i gzugs/ / mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan bzhed pa// 'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os// 'di spyan shin tu rnam dag ste// zhing rnams dang ni sems can tshogs//
253b2(mdo sde): sems dang ldan dang sems med pa// mang po dag la rang byung gzigs// 'di snyan shin tu rnam dag ste// lha yi dag dang mi yi dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi chos smra dang // mtha' yas pa
253b3(mdo sde): yi sgra rnams gsan/ / 'di yi ljags ni yangs pa ste// ka la bing+ga 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'chi med rab tu zhir 'gro ba'i// chos ni 'di las bdag cag mnyan// bdud kyi sde rnams gzigs
253b4(mdo sde): gyur kyang / / de yi thugs ni 'khrug mi mnga'// lha yi tshogs rnams gzigs gyur kyang // shin tu thugs gzhungs dgyes mi mnga'// 'di yis mtshon dang mda' rnams kyis// bdud
253b5(mdo sde): kyi sde las rgyal ba lags/ / bden pa brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis// sdang ba'i gyad las 'di rgyal lo// gdan las ma skyod bzhin du ni// de yi sku la gnod ma byung // de yi skabs
253b6(mdo sde): su byams mi mnga'/ / zhe sdang gyur pa'ang ma lags so// gang dag khyod las chos thos nas// sgrub pa bgyid par 'tshal ba yi// lha dang mi rnams de dag ni// rnyed pa legs par rnyed
253b7(mdo sde): pa lags/ / rgyal ba bsod nams gzi mnga' ba// khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams kyis// mi yi zla ba khyod 'dra bar// kun kyang myur du 'gyur bar shog/ skyes bu khyu mchog
254a1(mdo sde): 'dra bas byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ / khrag khrig zhing rnams spyod cing bdud kyang pham mdzad de// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang kA lA bing ka'i sgra skad kyis// 'dren
254a2(mdo sde): pas thog mar tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ / bsod nams rnam smin bde ste sdug bsngal thams cad sel// bsod nams ldan pa'i mi yi bsam pa rnams kyang 'grub/
254a3(mdo sde): bdud bcom nas ni byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po 'thob// de bas bsod nams bya bas chog par su zhig 'dzin// bdud rtsi chos mnyan
254a4(mdo sde): pas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin/ / skye bo mod pa'i nags gnas chog par su zhig 'dzin// sems can don bya bas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin// byang chub sems dpas lag pa
254a5(mdo sde): brkyang ste tshig brjod pa/ / mchod pa byas kyis rang rang dag gi zhing du deng // kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// sna tshogs bkod pas rang rang dag gi zhing du dog
254a6(mdo sde): dpung rnams phan tshun chen po byung ba de gzigs nas/ / bde bar gshegs pa tshul du shis par rnam par rol// dpung bcas bdud las rgyal de bdud rtsi reg shog ces// sems can rnams
254a7(mdo sde): kyis mtshungs med sems kyis byang chub smon/ / dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ skad
254b1(mdo sde): cig de la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dpag tu med pa mdzad de/ de dag ni bskal par yang bstan par sla ba ma yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa ni lag mthil lta bur mnyam
254b2(mdo sde): bar gnas par gyur/ / mdab ma brgya pa rgyas pa 'od dang ldan pa byung // lha rnams brgya stong byang chub snying por rab tu 'dud// seng ge'i sgra yi mtshan ma dang po 'di 'dir mthong // stong gsum
254b3(mdo sde): shing brgya dag dang ri rnams du ma dang / / ri yi rgyal po lhun po byang chub snying por 'dud// stobs bcu'i gan du song ste brgya byin tshangs pa 'dud// 'di yang mi yi seng ge byang chub snying por rol//
254b4(mdo sde): sku las 'od zer brgya stong dag ni rab bkye ste// rgyal ba'i zhing mchog khyab nas ngan song gsum po zhi// de nas skad cig yid tsam mi khom bskams par gyur// sems can gang la'ang tha brgyags
254b5(mdo sde): sdang gnod pa med/ / 'di yang mi yi seng ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol// nyi zla nor bu me dang glog dang lha yi 'od// 'od ldang ba'i rlabs kyis zil mnan lam me min// 'gro ba gang gis
254b6(mdo sde): kyang ni ston pa'i gtsug mi mthong / / 'di yang mi yi seng ge gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol// phyag gi mthil gyis reg nas sa yang rnam drug g.yos// de yis bdud kyi sde rnams shing bal bzhin
254b7(mdo sde): dkrugs/ / bdud ni mda' thogs sa la ri mo gang 'dra ba// 'di yang mi yi seng ge gdan la rol pa lags// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis lo/
255a1(mdo sde): de nas gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas te/ lha'i tsan dan
255a2(mdo sde): gyi phye ma'i char mngon par phab nas/ tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do// 'jig rten gsal bar mdzad pa byung // 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa// 'jig
255a3(mdo sde): rten ldongs par gyur pa la/ / nyon mongs spangs pa mig sbyin pa// khyod ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal// bsod nams dag gis dgongs pa rdzogs// dkar po'i chos rnams kun tu rdzog
255a4(mdo sde): khyod ni 'gro ba tshim mdzad 'gyur/ / sdig pa mi mnga' 'dam las rgal// go'u ta ma thang la bzhugs// sems can gzhan dag klung chen gyis// khyer ba rnams kyang sgrol bar 'gyur//
255a5(mdo sde): shes rab chen po khyod 'phags te// 'jig rten dag na zla ma mchis// 'jig rten chos kyis khyod mi gos// chab na mchis pa'i pad+ma bzhin// 'jig
255a6(mdo sde): rten ring nas gnyid log 'di/ / mun pa'i phung pos gtibs pa la// khyod ni shes rab sgron ma yis// rab tu sad par mdzad spyod pa// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ring nas ni// nyon mongs nad
255a7(mdo sde): kyis gzir ba la/ / nad rnams kun las thar mdzad pa// sman pa'i rgyal po yang dag byung // 'jig rten mgon po khyod byung bas// mi khom rnams ni stongs par 'gyur// lha rnams dang ni mi dag
255b1(mdo sde): kyang / bde ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// skyes bu khyu mchog nges pa khyod// lta bar gang dag 'dod bgyid pa// de dag bskal pa stong rnams su// nam yang ngan 'gror mchi mi 'gyur// gang
255b2(mdo sde): ngadag chos nyan 'gyur ba rnams/ / de dag mkhas shing nad med dang // zab dang phung po zad pa dang // 'jigs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur// nyon mongs bcings pa bcad nas ni// kun kyang len
255b3(mdo sde): pa ma mchis par/ / myur du rab tu grol 'gyur te// dge ba mchog gi 'bras bu 'thob// de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas te// sbyin pa rnams ni blang ba'i 'os// de dag yon phul mi chung ste//
255b4(mdo sde): kun kyang mya ngan 'das rgyu lags// dge slong dag de ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te// de bzhin gshegs
255b5(mdo sde): pa la phyag 'tshal zhing / / phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
255b6(mdo sde): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis cho ga bzhin du mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ tshigs su bcad pa
255b7(mdo sde): 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / thub pa thugs zab gsung ni shin tu snyan// thub mchog tshangs dbyangs glu ltar gsung snyan mchog/ byang chub rab mchog shin tu dam pa brnyes// dbyang
256a1(mdo sde): kun mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / khyod skyabs khyod ni gling khyod dpung gnyen te// khyod ni 'jig rten mgon po byams thugs mdzad// khyod ni sman pa'i dam
256a2(mdo sde): pa zug rngu 'byin/ / gso ba phan mdzad khyod ni dam pa mchog/ mar me mdzad pa gzigs ma thag tu khyod// byams dang thugs rje'i sprin gyi dra ba bsgrubs// mgon po bdud rtsi'i rgyun
256a3(mdo sde): gyi char pho bo la/ / lha mi rnams kyi gdung ba zhi bar mdzod// khyod ni srid gsum mi gos pad+ma 'dra// khyod ni mi g.yo ma spyod lhun po 'dra// khyod ni thugs dam mig yo rdo rje bzhin// yon
256a4(mdo sde): tan mchog kun mnga' ste zla ba 'dra/ / dge slong dag de ltar 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas// thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
256a5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas lha'i bu rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs rigs kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs
256a6(mdo sde): pa la nor bu rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas spras pa'i rin po che'i dra bas bkab ste/ / lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
256a7(mdo sde): par bstod do/ / dge ba dri med shes rab 'od dang gzi brjid ldan// mtshan gyi dam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog mnga' ba// dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan pa ye shes mnga'// mnyel ba mi
256b1(mdo sde): mnga' khyod la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/ / dri gsum dri mi mnga' ba dri med dri ma bral// 'jig rten gsum du grags shing rig pa gsum brnyes pa// rnam par thar pa dam pa gsum gyi mig sbyin
256b2(mdo sde): pa spyan gsum dri ma mi mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dus ngan rnyog pa bsal zhing rab tu zhi thugs ldan// thugs brtse thugs rjes 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thub pa dgyes
256b3(mdo sde): pas 'phags pa thugs ni rab zhi ba/ / khyod ni yid gnyis grol bar mdzad pa btang snyoms dgyes// brtul zhugs dka' thub 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// rang spyod rnam par dag cing
256b4(mdo sde): spyod pa'i pha rol byon/ / bden pa bzhi po ston pa rnam thar dgyes pa po// grol bar gyur nas 'gro ba gzhan yang grol mdzad pa// stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bdud po 'dir lhags pa
256b5(mdo sde): shes rab brtson 'grus de bzhin byams bas pham mdzad nas/ / khyod kyis go 'phang dam pa 'chi ba med pa brnyes// g.yon can dpung rnams bcom pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong dag
256b6(mdo sde): de ltar lha'i bu rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ / de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te// de bzhin gshes
256b7(mdo sde): ba la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / de nas bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang // rin po che'i gdus
257a1(mdo sde): dang bla re chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkab nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
257a2(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod do/ / khyod stobs shin tu rgya che ba dang bdud dpung drag po bdag cag mngon sum ste/ bdud dpung rab 'jigs chen po de yang khyod kyis skad cig cig la pham par
257a3(mdo sde): mdzad/ khyod ni bzhengs par ma gyur sku yang mi g.yo gsung yang brjod pa ma mdzad de// thub pa don kun grub pa 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// 'du
257a4(mdo sde): kyi bu mo bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i bye ma snyed/ / de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing mchog drung nas khyod ni bskyod cing g.yos ma nus// mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma
257a5(mdo sde): gang+gA'i bye ma snyed mdza de/ / byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa des na de ring khyod ni rnam par mdzes pa lags// byang chub spad pa dam pa sprod mdzad tshe na shin tu sdug pa'i btsun mo dang /
257a6(mdo sde): phangs pa'i sras dang bran mo de bzhin bskyed mo'i tshal dang grong khyer dang // yul 'khor grong rdal dag dang rgyal srid rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang glang po dang // dbu dang spyan dang
257a7(mdo sde): ljags dang de bzhin zhabs btang des na de ring rnam par mdzes/ / nga ni sangs rgyas 'gyur te bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul blo yi go bgos nas// sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po sdug
257b1(mdo sde): bsngal rgya mtshos khyer bar gyur pa rnams/ / dam chos gru yis nyid kyis bsgral bar bya zhes khyod kyis lan mang gsung brjod pa// khyod kyis smon lam de ni grub lags srog chags
257b2(mdo sde): rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur/ / smra ba'i khyu mchog 'jig rten mig sbyin mdzad pa khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams des// bdag cag thams cad dga' mgur yid gyur thams
257b3(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab bsngags byang chub dam pa mtshungs med yang dag bsgrubs nas ni// de ltar bdud sde 'khor de bcom nas thams
257b4(mdo sde): cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar gyur par shog/ dge slong dag de ltar bdud kyis bu rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
