257b6(mdo sde): pa la 'dzam bu gling gi gser gyi pad+ma dag gis mngon par gtor te/ spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// gsung ni dpyas ma mchis shing ma 'khrug rnam
257b7(mdo sde): par ma 'khrugs pa/ / mun rdul bral zhing 'chi med rtogs par thugs su chud par gyur// lha yul mi yul ba yi dpal dang bgyi ba gzhal med 'os// rab tu 'bar ba'i blo gros ldan
258a1(mdo sde): / la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// dka' ba mdzad pa nyon mongs spong ba rdul dang dri ma sel// shin tu dga' ba'i gsung gis lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzod//
258a2(mdo sde): sku mchog 'od zer rgyas pa'i dri ma shin tu mi mnga' bas// lha dang mi yi bdag po bzhin du 'gro ba 'di las rgyal// pha rol tshogs rnams rab tu 'jom pa gzhan gyi spyod mkhas pa// lha dang
258a3(mdo sde): mi yi srid par dga' ba gzhan gyi blo sol ba/ / shin tu mkhas pa blo ldan gzhan gyi spyod pa rnam par phye// stobs bcu mnga' ba gshegs pa'i lam 'dir rnam par rgyu ba mdzad// srid pa 'dzin
258a4(mdo sde): dang sdug bsngal log 'dzin 'dor sel te/ / lha mi blo gros 'dul ba ji lta bzhin du 'dul ba mdzod// zla ba bzhin du mkhas las phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam rgyu ba// srid pa gsum 'dir rmad
258a5(mdo sde): byung mig dang dpung gnyen gyur par shog/ lha dang mi yi srid par dga' yang yul la 'khrul mi mnga'// 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral zhing dge ba'i dga' la dgyes pa po// 'khor la sgrogs pa
258a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum na khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/ / khyod 'dir 'gro ba rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen lags// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan
258a7(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas lha
258b1(mdo sde): rab 'phrul gyi lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dar gyi lda ldis g.yogs nas/ spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon
258b2(mdo sde): par bstod do/ / dri ma rnam gsum spangs pas khyod ni chos kyi sdang ba yang dag 'phags// gti mug dang ni lha dang ma rig 'joms pa mdzes dang dpal gyis rgyas// log pa'i lam
258b3(mdo sde): la dga' ba'i skye bo 'di dag 'chi med dgod mdzad pa/ 'jig rten 'dir byung mchod rten lha yul ba dang mi yul pas mchod pa// khyod ni gso ba'i sman pa mkhas pa bdud rtsi bde ba sbyin
258b4(mdo sde): ba bo/ / lha dang nyon mongs pa dang ma rig bsags pa sngon gyi bag la nyal// lus can rnams kyi nad kun sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam gyis sel ba ste// de bas sman pa dam pa 'dren pa khyod ni
258b5(mdo sde): sa la rnam par rgyu/ / nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma rnams dang me dang de bzhin nor bu dang // brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od rnams dpal stug spyan sngar lam me ma lags te// shes rab snang ba
258b6(mdo sde): mdzad dang 'od dang dpal gyis rab tu rgyas/ / khyod kyi ye shes rmad byung mngon sum gyur pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par 'dren pa snyan pa'i gsung ldan pade dang bden min gsung //
258b7(mdo sde): dul ba thugs zhi dbang po dul ba rab tu zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa// ston pa lha dang mi yi 'khor la bstan par bgyi ba ston mdzad pa// shAkya thub pa mi yi khyu mchog lha mis mchod la phyag
259a1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / ye shes mnga' ba ye shes bka' mchid mchog can srid gsum go mdzad pa// dri ma gsum bsal rig pa gsum dang rnam par thar gsum ston pa po//
259a2(mdo sde): thub pa blo gros ji ltar gdul ba skal dang skal med rab mkhyen pa// stong gsum rmad du byung ba lha mis mchod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu rab 'phrul 'khor dang
259a3(mdo sde): bcas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu yongs
259a4(mdo sde): su dga' ldan dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ lha'i gos kyi dra ba chen pos/ byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
259a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mngon par bkab ste/ spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// khyod ni dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs te der ni khyod kyis rgya chen chos kyang bshad//
259a6(mdo sde): khyod kyis bstan pa de ni da dung lha yi bu rnams chos spyod rgyun mi 'chad// khyod la blta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur chos mnyan pas kyang ngoms pa rnyed mi 'gyur// yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig
259a7(mdo sde): rten sgron ma khyod la mgo dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo/ / khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos te de tshe khyod kyis mi khom thams cad sbyangs// gang tshe byang chub shing drung bzhugs tshe 'gro ba
259b1(mdo sde): kun gyi nyon mongs rab tu zhi/ / gang gi ched du rgya chen byang chub btsal ba brnyes te bdud kyang pham par mdzad// khyod kyi smon lam de ni rab tu rdzogs kyis 'khor lo rgya chen myur du skor/
259b2(mdo sde): chos 'tshal ba dag chos mnyan bgyi zhes te// srog chags stong phrag mang po sdod cing mchis// 'khor la rgyo chen myur du bskor du gsol// srog chags stong rnams srid las bsgral
259b3(mdo sde): du gsol/ / dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan 'khor dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
259b4(mdo sde): 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ me tog dang
259b5(mdo sde): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod de/ spyan snga nas tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
259b6(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod do/ / tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs rab kyis// khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis ga la lhag/ mos dang rnam par grol la mkhas pa po//
259b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// byang chub snying por lha yis gang bgyis pa// bkod pa mdzes pa de dag mthong lags te// ji ltar khyod la lha dang mis mchod
260a1(mdo sde): pa/ de ni gzhan gang la yang 'os ma lags// khyod byung don ma mchis pa ma lags te// gang gi don du dka' ba mang po spyad// shin tu g.yon can sde dang bcas
260a2(mdo sde): las rgyal/ / khyod kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub brnyes// phyogs bcu dag tu snang ba mdzad par gyur// shes rab sgron mas 'jig rten gsum po gsal// khyod ni rab rib sel bar
260a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba ste/ / 'gro la bla na med pa'i mig sbyin pa// khyod la bstod pa bskal par brjod kyang ni// khyod kyi ba spu'i khung bu mtha' ma mchis// yon tan rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten rnam par
260a4(mdo sde): grags/ / de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// de ltar lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod
260a5(mdo sde): nas phal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang lhan
260a6(mdo sde): cig tu me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bkod pa rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas tshigs su
260a7(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / thub pa ma 'khrul kha na ma tho mi mnga' rtag tu legs bzhugs lhun po 'dra// phyogs bcu dag tu ye shes 'od grags bsod nams
260b1(mdo sde): dag dang gzi brjid ldan pa po/ / thub pa khyod kyis sngon chad sangs rgyas brgya phrag mtha' yas yang dag mchod pa mdzad// de yi yul de yis ni byang chub shing drung bdud kyi sde las
260b2(mdo sde): rgyal bar gyur/ / tshul khrims dang ni thos dang ting 'dzin shes rab 'byung gnas ye shes rgyal mtshan tog/ rga shi 'joms par mdzad pa sman pa dam pa 'jig rten dag la mig sbyin
260b3(mdo sde): pab/ thub pa dri ma gsum dang tha ba spangs shing dbang po zhi la thugs zhi ba// shAkya khyu mchog 'gro ba dag gis chos kyi rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi// khyod kyis brtson 'grus mthu
260b4(mdo sde): yis 'phags pa'i byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas gyur lags te/ / shes rab stobs dang thabs dang byams pa'i stobs dang bsod nams stobs rnams dang // stobs rnams de dag
260b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das khyod byang chub bzhugs pa'i tshe na mtha' yas te/ / stobs dang ldan pa de ring byang chub snying por bzhugs nas stobs bcu mnga' bar gyur// dpung tshogs mtha' yas
260b6(mdo sde): mthong nas dge sbyong rgyal po byang chub snying por bzhugs pa de/ / nyams par mi gyur grang zhes lha rnams thams cad rab tu sngangs shing skrag par gyur// khyod ni 'byung po rnams kyis
260b7(mdo sde): bsnyengs par ma gyur sku yang g.yo ba mi mnga' ste/ / khur lci phyag gis brdabs nas kun tu g.yos te bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur// ji ltar snga ma rnams kyi seng ge'i khri la byang chub
261a1(mdo sde): dam pa brnyes gyur pa/ / de ltar khyod kyis rjes su sangs rgyas mtshungs shing mnyam ste gzhan du 'gyur ma lags// yid kyang mnyam zhing sems kyang mnyam ste khyad
261a2(mdo sde): bdag nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes/ / des na khyod ni 'jig rten dam pa rang byung 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams zhing // dge slong dag de ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu
261a3(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu/ / de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te// de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'dug go//
261a4(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhan cig tu/ de bzhin gshegs bag la ba der song ste phyin nas/ me tog a ti mug ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang /
261a5(mdo sde): mi'i me tog dang / ba ra sha ka dang / d+ha nu ska ri'i 'phreng ba dang / chun po thogs te/ lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis bskor nas lha'i glu dbyangs len pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/
261a6(mdo sde): tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// shin tu gsung snyan dbyangs mi yid du mchi// zla ltar rab tu zhi mdzad thugs dang ba// 'dzum pa'i zhal ldan ljags ni
261a7(mdo sde): rab yangs pa/ / thub mchog dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mi rnams kyi snyan cing dgar 'gyur ba// sgra skad gang dag 'jig rten mchis pa kun// khyod kyi 'jam pa'i gsung ni phyung bas
261b1(mdo sde): na mi yi sgra skad thams cad zil gyis non/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nyon mongs zhi// mi min dga' ba rnam par dag pa skyed// rnyog pa ma mchis snying gis chos thos nas// de kun 'phags/
261b2(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par grol ba thob// khyod ni mi mkhas rnams la brnyas mi mdzad// mkhas pa'i rgyags pas nam yang rgyags ma gyur// khyod ni 'gying ba mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'// rgya mtsho'i dbus
261b3(mdo sde): nas ri mchog 'phags pa bzhin/ / de 'dra'i sems can 'jig rten byung bas na// mi rnams 'dir ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed// pad+ma dpal ltar nor rnams sbyin pa po// de ltar 'jig rten kun la
261b4(mdo sde): chos sbyin mdzad/ / de ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis// byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo
261b5(mdo sde): sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas bar snang gi lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags te/ mngon par rdzogs par byang
261b6(mdo sde): chub pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bar snang thams cad rin po che'i dra ba dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs rnams dang / rin po che'i ba dan rnams dang / rin po che dang / dar
261b7(mdo sde): gyi lda ldi dang / rin po che'i me tog rna rgyan dang / mu tig gi chun khor dang / me tog gi lda ldi sna tshogs rnams lus phyed phyung ba'i lha rnams kyis bzung ba dang / zla gam rnams kyis legs par brgyan
262a1(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/ / phul nas kyang spyan snga nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thub pa mkha' la bdag cag mchis nas ni/
262a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i spyod kun ji bzhin gsal bltas shing / sems can dag pa khyod kyi spyod bltas na// de ltar khyod kyi thugs gcig 'khrul ma mthong // mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang lhags pa/
262a3(mdo sde): mi yi 'dren pa de dag nam mkha' khyab// 'di ltar de dag nam mkha'i lus lags pas// gzhal med khang rnams la yang gnod ma mchis// bar snang nas ni me tog char phab pa// stong chen byung
262a4(mdo sde): brar rab tu gang gyur pa/ / de dag ma lus khyod kyi skur bab kyang // 'bab chu rgya mtsho bab pa bzhin du gyur// gdugs dang me tog rna rgyan me tog phreng // me tog tsam pa ka yi lda ldi dang // rgyan
262a5(mdo sde): phreng zla ba zla gam rnams kyang mthong / / lha yis gtor kyang 'dres par gyur ma mchis// bar snang thams cad lha yis gang gyur te// 'di la skra tsam gzhag pa'i gnas ma mchis// rkang gnyis
262a6(mdo sde): mchog la mchod pa bgyid kyang ni/ / khyod la rgyags pa 'am ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'// de ltar bar snang gi lha rnams kyis// byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon
262a7(mdo sde): bar bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas sa bla'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/
262b1(mdo sde): sa gzhi thams cad legs par phyags te byugs nas/ spos chus chag chag btab ste/ me tog gis chal par bkang nas ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyi bla re bres te de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas
262b2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / stong gsum rdo rje lta bur mi shigs gnas par gyur// nga 'dir bags pa sha dang rus pa rkang bskams kyang // byang chub ma reg nga ni 'di nas ma
262b3(mdo sde): ldang zhes/ / rdo rje'i gnas kyis de ni byang chub snying por bzhugs// gal te mi yi seng ge khyod kyis stong gsum kun// byin gyis ma brlabs na ni gang dag rkang mthil gyis// bye ba'i zhing rnams
262b4(mdo sde): bskyod pa de ltar shugs che ba/ / byang chub sems dpa' lhags tshe ma lus zhigs par 'gyur// sa phyogs gang du sems can dam pa 'chag pa ni// sa yi lha yis rnyed pa rgya chen legs par rnyed// /
262b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten rdul rnams ji snyed khyod kyis snang bar mdzad// stong gsum mchod rten gyur na khyod sku smos ci 'tshal// 'og gi chu yi phung po brgya stong ji snyed dang // sa yi steng na 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba ji snyed
262b6(mdo sde): pa stong gsum sa rnams thams cad bdag cag bzung bar bgyi/ / khyod la kun dbul ji ltar bzhid bzhin spyad du gsol// gang du khyod ni bzhugs sam 'chag gam mnal ba dang // go'u ta ma
262b7(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa'i sras po nyan thos gang / / chos gtam smra dang gang yang de dag nyan pa dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o// de ltar sa bla 'i lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi
263a1(mdo sde): snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'khod do// mngon
263a2(mdo sde): pabar bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / / dge slong dag de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la lha rnams kyis bstod cing
263a3(mdo sde): skyil mo krung ma bshig/ spyan mi 'dzum par shing gi rgyal po la gzigs shing bsam gtan dang / dga' ba'i zas kyis bde ba myong bar byang chub kyi shing drung du zhag bdun 'das par gyur to//
263a4(mdo sde): de nas zhag bdun 'das pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams spos chu'i bum pa khri thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der lhags so// gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams
263a5(mdo sde): kyang spos chu'i bum pa khri thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub kyi shing dang de bzhin gshegs pa la spos chus bkrus so// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang
263a6(mdo sde): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la phog pa'i spos chu des rang rang gi lus la
263a7(mdo sde): bskus so/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang sems bskyed do// lha'i bu la sogs pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su phyin kyang spos chu de dang ma bral bar gyur te/ spos
263b1(mdo sde): gzhan la 'dod pa mi skyed do/ / de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gus par yid la bya ba las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang // mchog tu dga' ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
263b2(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu kun nas me tog ces bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs te
263b3(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgung bdun du skyil mo krung ma bshig par
263b4(mdo sde): bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa des lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i
263b5(mdo sde): ming ni dga' ba'i zas bkod pa zhes bya ste/ / ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhag bdun du skyil mo krung ma bshig par bzhugs so// dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu
263b6(mdo sde): kun nas me tog gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// zhabs ni 'khor los khyab pa po// pad mdab rdul med stong gzi ldan// lha yi cod
263b7(mdo sde): pa na zhabs gtugs pa/ / dpal stug zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// de tshe lha bu de sems dga'// g+ha mi rab tu zhi byed pa// yid gnyis sel bas tshig 'di smras//
264a1(mdo sde): shAkya'i rigs la dgyes skyed pa// chags sdang gti mug mthar 'byin pa// zhus pa rnams kyang mthar 'byin pa// lha mi dogs pa bsal du gsol// dpag/
264a2(mdo sde): med thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// sangs rgyas stobs bcu ci slad du// rgyal ba dog sa snying por ni// dgung bdun skyil mo krung ma bshig/ 'dab brgya rgyas pa'i spyan mnga' ba//
264a3(mdo sde): ci zhig gzigs na dgung bdun du// mi yi seng ge rnam dag spun// spyan mi 'dzum par gzigs pa mdzad// gang gis shing rgyal drung du ni// skyil krung ma bshig dgung bdun
264a4(mdo sde): bzhugs/ / smon lam 'di ni khyod kyi'am// smra ba'i seng ge kun gyi lags// tshems ni mnyam zhing rnam dag pa// stobs bcu'i zhal ni bri rab gda'// ma nor legs par bka
264a5(mdo sde): srul te/ / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzod// zla 'dra'i zhal gyis bka' stsal pa// ngas bshad lha yi bu nyon cig/ ngas ni dris pa de yi lan// cung zad tsam zhig bshad par bya//
264a6(mdo sde): dper na rgyal po phyogs gang du// gnyen gyi tshogs kyis dbang bskur ba// zhag bdun bar du sa phyogs de// mi 'dor rgyal po'i chos nyid do// de bzhin stobs bcu mnga' ba yang /
264a7(mdo sde): gang tshe smon rdzogs dbang bskur ba// sa yi snying por zhag bdun du// rgyal ba'i skyil mo krung mi 'jig/ dper na dpa' bo dgra tshogs rnams// ma lus pham byas lta ba ltar//
264b1(mdo sde): byang chub snying por sangs rgyas kyang // nyon mongs bcom nas gzigs pa mdzad// gti mug byung ba'i 'dod dang bro// de dag 'gro ba'i dgra 'dra ste// chom po chas ni bzang 'dra ba/
264b2(mdo sde): de dag ma lus ngas 'dir bshig/ nga 'dir nga rgyal rnam dgu dang // gnas med rlom sems rab tu bcom// zag pa thams cad rab tu spangs// nga yi ye shes dam pa skyes// ngas 'dir/
264b3(mdo sde): sred pa'i sred rgyu dang // ma rig bya min byed pa de// bag nyal bcas rtsa dra ba rnams// ye shes gsal ba'i me yis bsregs// ngas 'dirang dang nga yi dang // nyes zhags ris
264b4(mdo sde): 'gro rtsa zug pa/ / sgrib pa'i mdud pa dam po do// ye shes mtshon gyis bcad par gyur// ngas 'dir ring nas nga'i ldan pa// slu ba tha ma rnams 'jig pa// len par bcas pa'i
264b5(mdo sde): phung po do/ / ye shes kyis ni yongs su shes// gnyis su rmongs pa log 'dzin pa// tha mar dmyal 'gyur de dag rnams// ngas 'dir ma lus bsal byas te// phyin chad nam
264b6(mdo sde): yang skyer mi 'gyur/ / ngas 'dir dge ba'i rtsa ba yi// me yis sgrib pa'i nags tshal bsregs// phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi yang // nga yis ma lus nges par bsregs// 'du shes
264b7(mdo sde): skud pas brgyus pa yi/ / rnam rtog phreng ba gnod byed pa// ngas 'dir byang chub yan lag gi/ phreng ba sna tshogs rnams kyis bzlog/ bgrod dka' drug cu rtsa lnga dang // gti mug
265a1(mdo sde): sum cu dri ma can/ / sdig pa dag ni bzhi bcungs// sa yi snying po 'dir bsal to// sa yi snying por 'dug nas ngas// sdom pa ma yin bcu drug dang /
265a2(mdo sde): khams ni rnam pa bco brgyad dang // khyab pa nyi shu rtsa lnga bsal// nyon mongs chu bo nyi shu dang // 'gro ba 'jigs pa nyi shu brgyad// brtson 'grus mthu dang rtul ba yis// nga 'dir de dag
265a3(mdo sde): shin tu 'das/ / de bzhin sangs rgyas bsgyings sgrog pa// lnga brgya ngas 'dir yang dag rtogs// brgya phrag stong du tshang ba yi// chos rnams nga yis yang dag rtogs// ngas 'dir
265a4(mdo sde): bag nyal ma lus pa/ / dgu bcu rtsa brgyad rtsar bcas mtha'// kun nas ldang ba'i lo ma rnams// ye shes me yis nges par bsregs// dogs dang yid gnyis kun 'byung ba// lnga
265a5(mdo sde): ba'i chu yis gang gyur pa/ / mi dge ngogs can sreg pa'i klung // shugs drag ye shes nyi mas bskams// tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag spangs// sgyu dang ser sna phrag dog sdang // nyon mongs
265a6(mdo sde): dgon pa deng 'dir bcad/ / 'dul ba'i me yis rab tu bsregs// 'dir ni rtsod pa'i rtsa ba de// ngan 'gro nyam ngar 'dren byed pa// 'phags pa skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig/ ye shes mchog gi
265a7(mdo sde): sman gyis bskyugs/ / ngas 'dir ye shes yon tan dang // ting 'dzin thob nas ngu ba dang // cho ngo 'don dang mya ngan dang // sme ba ma lus mthar mar phyin// ngas 'dir bden tshul ting nge
265b1(mdo sde): 'dzin/ / thob nas chu bo sbyor ba dang // mdud pa mya ngan zug rngu dang // rgyags dang bag med kun las rgyal// ngas 'dir nyon mongs gzings pa yi// srid pa'i ljon shing rtog rtsa brtan
265b2(mdo sde): dran pa'i ste res ma lus par/ / bcad nas ye shes me yis bsregs// ngas 'dir nga snyam nga rgyal te// khams gsum dbang byed stobs che ba// g.yon can ye shes ral gris bcom//
265b3(mdo sde): lha min dbang la dbang po bzhin// dra ba ma lus sum cu drug/ 'jug pa sa yi snying po 'dir// shes rab ral gri stobs ldan pas// bcad nas ye shes me yis bsregs// nyon mongs
265b4(mdo sde): rtsa ba bag nyal bcas/ / sdug bsngal mya ngan 'byung de dag/ ngas 'dir shes rab dam pa yi// thong lcags kyis ni ma lus bton// rang bzhin gyis dag sems can gyis// shes rab mig
265b5(mdo sde): 'dir nga yis sbyangs/ / ye shes mig sman chen po yis// gti mug ling tog rgya chen bsal// 'byung khams bzhi po rgyags pa yi// chu srin gyis dkrugs sred yangs pa// srid pa'i
265b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho dran pa dang / / zhi gnas nyi ma'i 'od kyis bskams// ngas 'dir yul gyi shing gi tshogs// rnam rtog tu 'phrul chags chen me// rab tu 'bar ba rnam thar chu// bsil ba'i khu bas
265b7(mdo sde): bsad par gyur/ / ngas 'dir bag la nyal ba'i sprin// ro myang glog 'dra rnam rtog 'brul// brtson 'grus stobs kyi rlung shugs kyis// bdas te kun tu gtor bar gyur// ngas 'dir dran pa
266a1(mdo sde): dri med pa'i/ / ting 'dzin thob nas sems spyod dgra// srid pa'i khon rgyud ma lus par// shes rab ral gri'i stobs kyis bcad// ngas 'dir rgyal mtshan mchog
266a2(mdo sde): 'chang ba/ / shing rta glang po rtas mtho ba// gzugs bsgyur bdud dpung brtson pa'i sde// byams pa thob nas rnam par bcom// mi sdug ting nge 'dzin thob nas// ngas 'dir dbang po drug
266a3(mdo sde): gi rta/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas rtas pa// rtag tu rgyags yan ma lus btags// smon med ting nge 'dzin thob nas// ngas 'dir rjes su chags pa dang // khong khro ba dang 'thab pa dang
266a4(mdo sde): rtsod spangs ma lus mtha' mar phyin/ / stong pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas// ngas 'dir phyi dang nang dag gi/ rlom sems kun dang rtog pa dang // rnam par rtog pa yongs su zad// mtshan
266a5(mdo sde): med ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ / lha mi srid pa'i rtser thug pa'i// bde ba thams cad ma lus par// nga yis 'dir ni yongs su btang // ngas 'dir rnam thar gsum thob nas// ngas 'dir
266a6(mdo sde): shes rab stobs kyis ni/ / srid pa dag gi 'ching ba kun// ma lus kun las grol bar gyur// ngas 'dir rgyu mthong gyur nas ni// rtag dang mi rtag 'du shes dang // bdag dang
266a7(mdo sde): bdag med bde sdug bsngal/ / rgyu yi 'bu shes gsum las rgyal// ngas 'dir las kyis rnam par dag/ skye mched drug rtsa kun 'byung las// byung ba thams cad shing dbang drung //
266b1(mdo sde): mi rtag pa yis bsnun te bcad// ngas 'dir ye shes nyi ma yis// gti mug mun pa'i rnyog pa dang // lta gyur rgyags dang khros gang ba// yun ring mun pa bsal snang byas// ngas
266b2(mdo sde): 'dir brtson 'gyur stobs kyi grus/ / 'dod dang chags pa'i chu srin can// ngar 'dzin lta ngan sred rlabs chu// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho de las rgal// gang rtogs chags dang gti mug dang
266b3(mdo sde): sems kyi rnam par rtog bsregs te/ / phye blags nags mer lhung 'dra bkangs 'dir de ni rjes su rtogs// nga 'dir ring nas song ba yi// bskal pa dpag med bye khrag khrig/ 'khor ba'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa/
266b4(mdo sde): gdung ba med nas ngal yang sos// 'jig rten phan phyir rga shi dang // mya ngan sdug bsngal mthar phyin pa// phas rgol kun gyis ma thob pa// bdud rtsi de ni ngas 'dir rtogs// sred
266b5(mdo sde): las byung ba'i skye mched kyis/ / sdug bsngal phung pos sdug bsngal ba// phyir mi 'byung ba 'jigs med kyis// grong khyer 'dir ni ngas phyin to// ngas 'dir nang gi dgra chen po//
266b6(mdo sde): khyab pa de dag rjes su rtogs// rtogs nas rab tu bsregs te ngas// de dag yang byung gnas med byas// bdud rtsi don du bskal pa ni// bye ba khrag khrig rang gi sha/ mig dang rin chen
266b7(mdo sde): mang btang ba/ / de 'dir nga yis rjes su rtogs// sngon gyi rgyal ba dpag med pas// gang sangs rgyas de ngas 'dir rtogs// gang gi snyan pa nyams dga' ba// sgra ni 'jig rten
267a1(mdo sde): rnams su grags/ / rten nas byung ba'i 'gro ba stong // sems kyi skad cig cig la 'jig/ smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer 'dra// de 'dir nga yis rjes su rtogs/
267a2(mdo sde): gang gis lag pa'i mthil du ni// shing tog bzhag bzhin 'jig rten khams// thams cad mthong ba'i mig mchog de// nga yis 'dir ni dag par byas// sngon gyi gnas ni ngas 'dir
267a3(mdo sde): dran/ / rig pa gsum yang thob par gyur// bskal pa khrag khrig dpag med pa// gnyis kyis log las sad bzhin dran// lha mi nor cing 'du shes log/ phyin ci log gyur gang
267a4(mdo sde): 'bar ba/ / de yang de bzhin ma nor bar// ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i snying khu 'thungs// gang gis don du stobs bcu po// sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms// byams pa'i
267a5(mdo sde): stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas/ / ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i snying khu 'thungs// gang gi don du stobs bcu po// sems can kun la snying rjes bsgoms// snying rje'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas
267a6(mdo sde): ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i snying khu 'thungs/ / gang gi don du stobs bcu po// sems can kun la dga' ba bsgoms// dga' ba'i stobs kyis rgyal gyur nas// ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i snying
267a7(mdo sde): khu 'thungs/ / gang gi don du stobs bcu po// bskal pa khrag khrig btang snyoms bsgoms// btang snyoms de yis stobs kyis rgyal// ngas 'dir bdud rtsi'i snying khu 'thungs// stobs
267b1(mdo sde): bcu gang+gA'i bye ma bas/ / rab tu mang bas gang gsol pa// sngon rgyal seng gis sngon gsol ba// bdud rtsi'i snying khu ngas 'dir 'thungs// rga shi mtha' mar ma phyin par// skyil mo
267b2(mdo sde): krung ni mi gzhig ces/ / sder bcas pa yi bdud mdun 'dir// nga yis tshig ni gang smras pa// ye shes rdo rje brtan par byas// nga yis ma rig pa yang bcom// stobs bcu nyid ni
267b3(mdo sde): thob par gyur/ / de lta bas na skyil krung gzhig/ nga yis dgra bcom nyid thob ste// nga yi zag pa ma lus zad// bdud kyi sde yang bcom par gyur// de lta bas na skyil krung gzhig/
267b4(mdo sde): sgrib pa lnga yi sgo glegs rnams// nga yis 'dir ni thams cad bcag/ sred pa'i 'khri shing rnams kyang bcad// da 'dir skyil mo krung gzhig go/ de nas mi yi zla ba de// dal gyis
267b5(mdo sde): gdan las bzhengs nas su/ / dbang bskur chen po bzhengs nas ni// seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs par gyur// lha tshogs rnams kyis rin chen snod// steng nas spos chu sna tshogs
267b6(mdo sde): kyis/ / stobs bcu yon tan mthar phyin pa// 'jig rten rtsa lag sku yang bsil// bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams dag/ lha mo khrag khrig lhan cig tu// kun nas rol mo stong dag gis
267b7(mdo sde): mchod pa gzhal du med pa byed/ / lha yi bu dag de ltar na// sa yi snying por zhag bdun du// rgyal po'i skyil krung ma shig pa// rgyur bcas rkyen bcas gzhi dang bcas// dge slong dag de
268a1(mdo sde): ltar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ngas 'dir/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
268a2(mdo sde): rgyas so/ / ngas 'dir thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang // rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes zhag bdun pa dang po la gdan de nyid la bzhugs so// zhag bdun pa gnyis
268a3(mdo sde): pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du rgyang ring du 'chag pas 'chag go/ / zhag bdun pa gsum pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa ngas
268a4(mdo sde): 'dir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang // rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes
268a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po la spyan mi 'dzums par gzigs so/ / zhag 'dun pa bzhi pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa shar gyi rgya mtsho nas/ nub kyi rgya mtsho'i bar du mi ring ba'i 'chag pas
268a6(mdo sde): 'chag go/ / / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu drug pa// de nas bdud sdig can de bzhin gshegs
268a7(mdo sde): pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lags kyis// bcom ldan
268b1(mdo sde): 'das yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar gsol/ / bde bar gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gsol// dge slong dag de skad ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas
268b2(mdo sde): bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sdig can nga'i dge slong gnas brtan/ gnas brtan dul ba/ gsal ba/ byang ba/ bag tsha ba med pa/ mang du thos pa/ chos kyi rjes
268b3(mdo sde): su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa bdag nyid slob dpon du sgrogs pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba 'byung ba/ byung ba rnams chos dang mthun pas tshar bcad de/ dad par byas nas// cho 'phrul/
268b4(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'i chos ston par nus pa dag ma byung gi bar de srid du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o// sdig can ngas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra bzhag
268b5(mdo sde): par ma gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par ma gyur gyi bar de srid du nga yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o//
268b6(mdo sde): sdig can nga'i 'khor bzhi po dul ba/ gsal ba/ byang ba/ bag tsha ba med pa nas/ cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos ston pa'i bar du nus pa dag byung bar ma gyur gyi bar de srid du yongs su
268b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ / de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig de skad thos nas/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ phyogs gcig tu song nas 'dug ste/ mgo smod nas mdas sa la ri mo 'dre
269a1(mdo sde): zhing bdag gi yul las 'das so snyam du sems par gyur to/ / de nas bdud kyi bu mo dga' ma dang / mi dga' ma dang / sred ma gsum gyis bdud sdig can la
269a2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yab cig ji ltar thugs mi dgyes// mi dgyes gang lags bka' stsol dang / 'dod chags zhags pas de bcings nas// glang po bzhin du dgug par bgyi//
269a3(mdo sde): bkug nas de ni myur du yang // khyod kyis dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi// de ltar thugs ngan 'o brgyal por// dgyes pa rgya chen brnyes par 'gyur// bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jig rten dgra bcom
269a4(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs/ / 'dod chags dbang du de mi 'gro// nga yi yul las shin tu 'das// de bas nga ni mya ngan che// de nas de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu byang chub sems dpa'
269a5(mdo sde): mdzad pa rnams kyang shes mod kyi/ / bud med kyi mi brtan pas pa'i tshig ma mnyan te// bu cig btsas tsam gyi mchod kyi dar la bab par bsgyur nas// mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir
269a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas de dag yid la mdzad par de dag rgas pas 'khogs par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas de dag pha'i gan du dong ste/ 'di
269a7(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ / de ni chags pas mi bkri ste// nga yi yul las shin tu 'das// de bas mya ngan nga che ste// yab kyis bdag cag gsungs pa mang // go'u ta ma brlag pa'i phyir// bdag
269b1(mdo sde): cag rnams kyis gang sprul pa/ / gzugs la gal te de lta na// de yis de snying 'gas par 'gyur// yab bdag cag gi lus rga bas 'khogs pa 'di ma mchis par mdzad du gsol// bdud
269b2(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ gang zhig sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs ni gzhan du sgyur bar byed nus pa// rgyu dang mi rgyu dag gi 'jig rten dag na mi dengs ma mthong // myur du song ste thub pa de la rang byas nyes pa
269b3(mdo sde): shogs shig dang / des ni khyod kyis bsam pa bzhin du sngon gyi lus su sgyur bar 'gyur// de nas de dag dong ste// bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la sku brnyas bgyi bar bsams pas//
269b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byis pa rnams dang // ji ltar glen pa rnams dang / ji ltar mi bsal ba/ mi mkhas shing ma 'tshal ba rnams ltar bdag cag nongs pa can du bzung du gsol// bde bar
269b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa bdag cag nongs pa can du bzung du gsol/ / zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la bzod pa gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa// sen
269b6(mdo sde): mos ri la bra ba dang / so yis lcags ni bca' ba dang // mgo yis ri ni dbug pa dang / gting mi dpogs la dpog par 'dod// de ltar bas na bu bo khyod/ nyes pa can du gzung ngo // de ci'i phyir
269b7(mdo sde): zhe na/ gang nyes pa la nyes par mthong nas 'chags shing phyin chad kyang sdom par byed pa de ni// 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag zhag bdun pa lnga pa zhag
270a1(mdo sde): bdun du yul ngan chen po byung ba'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas na bzhugs so/ / de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung / bcom
270a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi sku la grang ba dang / rlung gis phog tu 'ong zhes rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lan bdun du dkris nas mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab
270a3(mdo sde): bo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la grang ba dang / rlung gis phog tu 'ong zhes/ shar phyogs nas kyang klu'i rgyal po gzhan mang du lhags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lus rnams kyis
270a4(mdo sde): khan bdun du dkris nas mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab po/ / shar phyogs nas ji lta ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la grang ba dang rlung gis phog tu 'ong ngo zhes lho dang / nub dang
270a5(mdo sde): byang phyogs nas kyang klu'i rgyal po rnams lhags nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la lus rnams kyi lan bdun du dkrin nas mgo'i gdengs ka rnams kyis bkab bo// klu'i rgyal po lus
270a6(mdo sde): kyi phung po de ni ri'i dbang po lhun po ltar mthong por gnas par gyur to/ / klu'i rgyal po de dag gis kyang ji ltar nyin bdun mtshan bdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la reg pa de lta bu'i bde ba de dag gis
270a7(mdo sde): sngon nam yang ma rnyed do/ / de nas zhag bdun 'das nas/ klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yul ngan med par shes te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las lus bkrol nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
270b1(mdo sde): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo // klu'i rgyal po btang bzung yA de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
270b2(mdo sde): te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnas su bzhugs so// zhag bdun pa drug pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas nas shing n+ya gro dar skyong gi drung du bzhud do//
270b3(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po btang ba zung gi gnas dang / shing na gro dar skyong gi bar du klung ne ran dzA na'i ngogs su spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / nyan thos rgan po dang / go'u ta ma dang / gcer bu pa dang /
270b4(mdo sde): kun tu 'tsho ba pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das go'u ta mas zhog bdun pa yul ngan chen po'i dus 'di bde bas bde bar gnas par byas sam zhes zer
270b5(mdo sde): to/ / dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// chos thos pa dang / mthong ba dang / dben par dga' ba bde ba yin/
270b6(mdo sde): srog chags 'byung po rnams la bsdams// gnod pa mi byed 'jig rten bde// sdig pa rnams las rab 'das pa/ 'dod chags bral ba 'jig rten bde// nga snyam nga rgyal gang 'dul ba/
270b7(mdo sde): de ni mchog tu bde ba yin/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
271a1(mdo sde): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams kyis 'jig rten kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bar gzigs nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
271a2(mdo sde): brjod do/ / sgra reg ro gzugs dang dri rnams kyis// 'jig rten 'di ni kun tu gdungs par gyur// srid pas 'jigs kyang srid pa'i sred pa yis// phyir zhing srid pa tshol bar byed pa
271a3(mdo sde): yin/ zhag bdun pa bdun pa'i tshe ni de bzhin gshegs pa shing sgrol rgyu'i drung du bzhugs so// de'i tshe byang phyogs pa'i tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po zhes bya ba/ mkhas pa gsal ba spun
271a4(mdo sde): gnyis rnyed pa chen po rnyed nas/ zong rnam pa mang po thogs te/ 'gron pa phal po che dang / shing rta shin tu gang ba lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs nas/ byang phyogs su dong ngo // de gnyis
271a5(mdo sde): la glang bu cang shes legs skyes dang grags pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod do/ / de gnyis la thogs pa'i 'jigs pa med de/ gang glang bu gzhan mi thar pa der de gnyis gtong ngo // gang du
271a6(mdo sde): mdun rol na 'jigs pa yod pa der de gnyis phur pa la btags pa bzhin du 'dug go/ / de gnyis la lcags mi 'ju'i me tog ut+pa la sbar gang ngam/ sna ma'i me tog phreng bas de gnyis
271a7(mdo sde): ded de/ shing sgrol rgyu dang nye ba zhig tu shing 'o ma can gyi nags na gnas pa'i lha mos byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/ de dag gi shing rta de dag thams cad mi 'gro ste/ phreng ba
271b1(mdo sde): la sogs pa shing rta'i cha rkyen thams cad kyang chad grugs so/ / shing rta'i phang lo rnams kyang lte ba la thug par sa'i nang du nub ste/ thams cad kyis rab tu bsgrims kyang shing rta de dag 'gro ba
271b2(mdo sde): ma gyur nas/ kha cig ngo mtshar dang skrag par gyur te// shing rta de dag thang la yang thogs par gyur pa 'di la rgyu ni ci zhig yod/ 'di'i 'gyur ba ni ci zhig yin snyam nas/ de dag gis glang bu
271b3(mdo sde): legs skyes dang / grags pa de gnyis 'dren du bcug ste/ me tog ut+pa la spar gang dang / sna ma'i me tog gi phreng bas bdas kyang 'gro bar ma gyur nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/
271b4(mdo sde): gang gi phyir 'di gnyis kyang mi 'gro ba las mdun na 'jigs pa 'ga' zhig 'byung du gdon mi za'o snyam nas/ de dag gis sa 'khru ba rta pa dag sngar btang ngo // sa 'khru ba rta pa rnams
271b5(mdo sde): slar log nas 'jigs pa ci yang med ces smras so/ / lha mo dos kyang rang gi gzugs bstan ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs phyung ngo // glang bu de gnyis kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
271b6(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su shing rta drangs pa dang / de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa me ltar rab tu 'bar ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshon sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan gyis legs par brgyad/ nyi ma shar nas
271b7(mdo sde): ring por ma lon pa lta bu dpal gyis 'bar ba mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di ni ci zhig tshangs pa 'dir phyin tam/ 'on te lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'on te/
272a1(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bu 'am/ 'on te nyi ma dang zla ba 'am/ 'on te ri'i lha 'ga' zhig gam/ klung gi lha zhig snyam mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas na bza' dur
272a2(mdo sde): smig rnams bstan to/ / de nas de dag gis ngur smrig bgos pa 'di ni rab tu byung ba yin gyis bdag cag 'jigs pa med do zhes smras te/ de dag dad pa thob nas yang phan tshun du smras
272a3(mdo sde): pa/ rab tu byung ba 'di ni dus su za ba yin na/ cung zad ci yod/ smras pa/ sbrang rtsi dang / skye ma dang / bu ram shing bshus pa yod do// de dag gis sbrang rtsi dang / skye ma dang / bu ram
272a4(mdo sde): shing bshus pa khyer nas de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig
272a5(mdo sde): tu 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang / de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ spyan
272a6(mdo sde): gzigs 'di bzhes su gsol/ / dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bdag gis lag pas 'di blangs na ni ma legs na/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
272a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyis snod ji lta bus bzhes snyam nas mkhyen pa 'jug par gyur to/ / dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs kyi dus la bab par rig nas skad cig de nyid
272b1(mdo sde): la phyogs bzhi nas rgyal po chen po bzhis gser gyi lhung bzed bzhi thogs te/ lhags nas de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ gser/
272b2(mdo sde): gyi lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag bzhes su gsol zhes phul lo// de dag dge sbyong gi cha ma yin par dgongs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas ma bzhes so// de bzhin du dngul gyi bzhi dang /
272b3(mdo sde): bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po las byas pa bzhi bzhi dang / rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i lhung bzed bzhi thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul na yang dge sbyong gi
272b4(mdo sde): cha ma yin par dgongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pas ma bzhes so// dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
272b5(mdo sde): lhung bzed rnam pa ji 'dra ba dag gis bzhes snyam dgongs na rdo'i lhung bzed rnams kyis bzhes par mkhyen nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pas de lta bu'i thugs bskyed pa dang / de nas rgyal po chen
272b6(mdo sde): bornam thos kyi bus rgyal po chen po gzhan gsum la sbas pa/ grogs po dag sngon po'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bdag la rdo'i lhung bzed bzhi byin pa dang / de la bdag gis 'di snyam du
272b7(mdo sde): bsams te/ 'di spyad par bya'o snyam pa dang / de nas sngon po'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnam par snang byed ces bya ba des bdag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye snod 'di dag spyad par ma bya bar/
273a1(mdo sde): 'di dag chongs shig mchod rten grags par 'gyur// shAkya thub ces bya ba'i rgyal ba 'byung // de la lhung bzed 'di dag dbul ba gyis// grogs po bdag cag shAkya
273a2(mdo sde): thub pa la/ / snod 'bul ba yi dus dang chod la bab// glu dbyangs dag dang sil snyan sgra phyung ste// mchod pa byas nas lhung bzed dbul bar bya/ snod de chos kyi rang bzhin mi gshegs pa//
273a3(mdo sde): snod 'di rdo yi rang bzhin bzhes su rung // gzhan gyis blang bar bzod pa ma yin gyis// da ni bdag cag de dag len du 'dong // de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis rang gi gnyen dang 'khor du bcas te/
273a4(mdo sde): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs len cing / rang rang gi lag tu lhung bzed de dag thogs nas/ de bzhin
273a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ lhung bzed de dag lha'i me tog gis bkang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// dge slong dag
273a6(mdo sde): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po chen po dang pa dang ba bzhi po 'di dag gis bdag la rdo'i lhung bzed bzhi phul na/ bdag la bzhir mi rung la ji ste gcig gis blangs na ni/
273a7(mdo sde): gsum yang mi dga' bar 'gyur na/ bdag gis lhung bzed bzhi po 'di dag blangs te/ lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlab po snyam mo// dge slong dag de nas de bzhin pas phyag g.yas pa brkyang
273b1(mdo sde): ste/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa// bde bar gshegs la lhung bzed phul cig dang // khyod ni theg pa mchog gis snod du 'gyur// nga 'dra dag la lhung//
273b2(mdo sde): bzed phul ba ni// dran dang blo gros nam yang nyams mi 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu las lhung bzed
273b3(mdo sde): ba zhes so/ / bzhes nas kyang rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs la lhung bzed phul// nam yang dran dang shes
273b4(mdo sde): rab nyams mi 'gyur/ / bsil dngos go 'phang sangs rgyas thob bar du// bde bas bde bar dus rnams zad par byed// dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgod
273b5(mdo sde): te/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung las lhung bzed bzhes so// bzhes nas kyang rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa// rnam par dag sems de bzhin
273b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa la/ khyod kyis yongs dag lhung bzed phul cig dang // khyod kyi sems ni myur du dag par 'gyur// lha mi 'jig rten dag na bsngags par 'os// dge slong dag de nas de bzhin
273b7(mdo sde): gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po las lhung bzed bzhes so// bzhes nas kyang rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la tshigs su bcad pas bka'
274a1(mdo sde): stsal pa bskyon med sems dang dad pas skyon med snod/ / de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims skyon med ces// tshul skyon med la rab tu phul cig dang // khyod kyi sbyin pa
274a2(mdo sde): bson nams skyon med 'gyur/ / dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang las lhung bzed bzhes so// bzhes nas kyang mos
274a3(mdo sde): pa'i stobs kyis lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlabs te/ de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// nga yis sngon gyi srid par snod kyi rnams// bzang byas 'bras bus rab tu bkang
274a4(mdo sde): ste byin/ de nas lhung bzed dbyibs legs bzhi po 'di// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha bzhi rnams kyis byin/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ brtan pa dam pa'i don de dgongs pa de// zhag bdun
274a5(mdo sde): byang chub shing mchog gzigs nas ni/ / seng ge'i stabs 'dra mi yi seng ge de// sa ni rnam pa drug tu bskyod nas bzhengs// glang po'i dbang ltar kun tu dal gyis gshegs// rim gyis
274a6(mdo sde): sgrol rgyu'i shing gi drung byon nas/ / lhun po lta bur g.yo ba mi mnga' bzhugs// thub pa bsam gtan ting nge 'dzin rnams dgongs// de yi tshe na ga gon bzang po spun / gnyis dang tshong
274a7(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs dang shing rta ni/ / nor gyis gang ba dag dang lhan cig tu// sA la'i me tog nags tshal rgyas par zhugs// drang srong chen po'i gzi yis skad cig du// srog shing thug par
274b1(mdo sde): phang lo sa nang nub/ / de dag de 'dra ba yi gnas mthong nas// tshong pa'i tshogs ni 'jigs pa chen po skyes// de dag ral gri mda' dang mdung thung thogs// nags na ri dgas bzhin du
274b2(mdo sde): su zhes tshol/ / sprin med 'od zer stong ldan 'dra ba'i rgyal// zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra ba mthong // khro ba spangs shing rgyags pa bsal nas su// mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'di ni su
274b3(mdo sde): zhes dpyod/ / mkha' las lha yis 'di skad tshig smras te// 'di ni sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan don mdzad// nyin bdun mtshan bdun bza' dang btung ba dag/ thugs rje'i bdag nyid
274b4(mdo sde): 'dis ni ma gsol to/ / gal te bdag gi nyon mongs zhi 'dod na// sku dang thugs bsgoms 'di la bshos gsol cig/ de dag gis ni sgra snyan de thos nas// rgyal la phyag 'tshal bskor ba
274b5(mdo sde): byas nas ni/ / dga' nas de dag grogs dang lhan cig tu// rgyal ba bshos gsol bar ni grogs bcas so// dge slong dag de'i tshe tshong pa ga gon dang / bzang po gnyis kyi ba'i khyu mtha'
274b6(mdo sde): 'khob kyi 'or cig na gnas so/ / de nas de'i tshe ba de dag bzhos na mar gyi snying khu byung bar gyur to// de nas ba lang rdzi de dag gis mar gyi snying khu de khyer nas/ tshong bag gon
274b7(mdo sde): dang bzang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de dag gis tshul spos te/ btsun pa dag mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// khyed kyi ba thams cad ni bzhos nas/ mar gyi snying khu byung na 'di ci dge
275a1(mdo sde): ba zhig lags sam/ 'on te ma lags/ de na bram ze zas la bskams pa'i rang bzhin can dag 'di skad ces/ 'di ni dge ba ma yin te/ bram ze rnams la mchod//
275a2(mdo sde): sbyin chen po byed dgos so zhes 'dzed to// dge slong dag de'i tshe tshong pa ga gon dang // bzang po dag gi tshe rabs snga ma'i snag gi gnyen mtshams bram ze rma bya zhes bya ba tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du
275a3(mdo sde): skyes par gyur pa des/ bram ze'i gzugs su sprul nas/ tshong pa de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyed kyi sngon ni smon btab pa/ byang chub brnyes nas de bzhin gshegs// bdag cag
275a4(mdo sde): rnams kyi bshos gsol te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shog/ smon lam de ni rdzogs zin gyis// byang chub brnyes pa de bzhin gshegs// de la zhal zas phul cig dang // gsol
275a5(mdo sde): nas 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur/ / khyed kyi ba mar snying khu byung // shin tu bkra shis skar ma bzang // drang srong chen po de yi ni// bsod nams las kyi mthu 'di'o// de ltar chod pa
275a6(mdo sde): bskul nas ni/ / / rma bya rang gi gnas su song // ga gon zhes ni bya la sogs// thams cad yid ni mgu bar gyur// kha stong 'o ma ji snyed yod pa dag/ de kun ma lus par ni bsdug
275a7(mdo sde): nas su/ / de yi steng nas phris ma zham byas te// de dag rab tu gus par zhal zas sbyar// rin chen gzhong pa'i tsam byed ces bya ba// srang cig la yang 'bum phrag gcig ri ba/
275b1(mdo sde): gtsang mar rab bkrus dri ma med byas nas// zhal zas kyis ni khad chad du bkang // sbrang rtsi dang ni rin chen gzhong thogs te// sgrol rgyu'i shing gi drung song ston pa la// btsun pa
275b2(mdo sde): bzhes te bdag cag sman yang thogs/ / zhal zas gya nom pa 'di mnabs su gsol// spun gnyis po la thugs brtse mdzad pa dang // byang chub bzhugs pa'i sngon ni bsam mkhyen
275b3(mdo sde): nas/ ston pas bzhes pa mdzad de zhal zas gsol// gsol nas gzhong ba nam mkha'i dkyil du dor// lha yi bu pho rab tshangs zhes bya ba// de yis rin chen gzhong pa mchog de blangs
275b4(mdo sde): des de dung tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na/ / lha gzhan grogs dang lhan cig mchod pa byed// de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas tshong pag gon dang / bzang po de dag las 'di
275b5(mdo sde): dag gis rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/ / lha yi bkra shis don sgrub cing // phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des// khyed kyi don rnams sgrub gyur cig/ thams cad myur du mthun par shog/
275b6(mdo sde): phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar// lag pa g.yas na dpal yod shog/ g.yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig/ yan lag kun na'ang dpal yod shog/ tshong pa dag ni nor tshol zhing // phyog
275b7(mdo sde): bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams/ / rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur cing // de dag bde ba skyid par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir// shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa
276a1(mdo sde): yi rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ smin drug dang ni snar ma dang // mgo dang lag dang nab so dang // rgyal dang skag ces bya ba ste// de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa//
276a2(mdo sde): rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni// 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa// shar phyogs logs na yod ces bstan// de dag khyed la kun tu srungs// de dag bdag po rgyal po ni// yul 'khor bsru
276a3(mdo sde): zhes grags pa ste/ / de ni dri za kun gyi bdag/ nyi ma lhan cig srung bar shog/ de la bu ni mang yod la// mkhas shing ming yang mthun pa ste// dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang // dbang po zhes
276a4(mdo sde): bya stobs po che/ / de rnams khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs chan// lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de// rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang
276a5(mdo sde): don grub ma dang mi 'pham dang / / dga' mchog ma dang dga' sde dang // dga' can ma dang dga' 'phel ma// de dag khyod la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong bar shog/ shar phyogs

276a7(mdo sde): skyong gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ dgos pa la la gang gi phyir//
276b1(mdo sde): lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na// gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi// rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig/ mchu dang gre dang dbo dang ni// me bzhi nag pa lnga pa yin// sa ri dang ni sa ga ste// de dag

276b6(mdo sde): med cing / / shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig/ lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na// pad+ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod// rtag tu gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar// rtag tu thams cad gsal

277a2(mdo sde): lha mtshams dang ni snron dang yang / / brtson 'grus brtan ldan sbubs dang ni// chu stod chu sma dbyi zhin dang // gro bzhin de ni bdun pa yin// de dag rnams ni nub phyogs pa// rgyu

277b6(mdo sde): gtong lha mo/ / sa dang de bzhin pad+ma can// rgyal po che la nyer gnas dang // re dang khrel yod dpal ldan ma// de dag khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong bar shog/ byang phyogs
277b7(mdo sde): logs kyi phyogs cha na/ / spos dang ldan pa'i ri bo yod// gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams kyi gnas// rtse mo sna tshogs blta na sdug/ de yang khyed la nad med cing // shis par lhag par skyong
278a1(mdo sde): gyur cig/ phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas// nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa
278a2(mdo sde): brgyad po/ / phyogs bzhi dag na bdun bdun gnas// lha yi bu mo sum cu gnyis// phyogs bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas// dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze brgyad// yul rnams na ni grong rdal
278a3(mdo sde): brgyad/ / dbang por bcas pa'i lha brgyad rnams// de dag khyed la kun tu srungs// khyed cag 'gro na'ang bkra shis gyur// ldog pa na yang bkra shig shog/ gnyen la lta ba bkra shis gyur//
278a4(mdo sde): gnyen gyis blta ba'ang ba kra shis shog/ dbang bcas gnod sbyin rgyal chen dang // dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse bas// thams cad du ni bkra shis dang // bdud rtsi shis pa thob par shog
278a5(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang / / zag pa med pa rnam par grol rnams dang // klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu snying brtses bsrungs// ston brgyar mtshungs par tshe na skyong bar shog/ rnam 'dren

278a7(mdo sde): rnam par 'dren pa rgyal ba yis/ / lung bstan chags med 'di ni dang po yin// phyin chad byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mang // gang dag lung bstan de dag phyir mi ldog/ rgyal bas lung
278b1(mdo sde): bstan pa ni 'di thos nas/ / sems ni mgu zhing mchog tu dga' gyur te// de dag spun dang grogs dang lhan cig tu// de dag sangs rgyas chos la skyabs su dong // ga gon dang bzang
278b2(mdo sde): po'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa shing sgrol rgyu'i drung na bzhugs pa/ dang po mngon par rdzogs par sangs
278b3(mdo sde): rgyas pa gcig pu dben par gshegs te/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas 'jig rten dang mthun par mdzad pa'i phyir 'di snyam du dgongs te/ kye ma ngas thob cing mngon par rdzogs par sangs
